40001001	This is a record of the ancestors of Jesus the Messiah , a descendant of David and of Abraham :
40001002	Abraham was the father of Isaac . Isaac was the father of Jacob . Jacob was the father of Judah and his brothers .
40001003	Judah was the father of Perez and Zerah ( whose mother was Tamar ) . Perez was the father of Hezron . Hezron was the father of Ram .
40001004	Ram was the father of Amminadab . Amminadab was the father of Nahshon . Nahshon was the father of Salmon .
40001005	Salmon was the father of Boaz ( whose mother was Rahab ) . Boaz was the father of Obed ( whose mother was Ruth ) . Obed was the father of Jesse .
40001006	Jesse was the father of King David . David was the father of Solomon ( whose mother was Bathsheba , the widow of Uriah ) .
40001007	Solomon was the father of Rehoboam . Rehoboam was the father of Abijah . Abijah was the father of Asa .
40001008	Asa was the father of Jehoshaphat . Jehoshaphat was the father of Jehoram . Jehoram was the father of Uzziah .
40001009	Uzziah was the father of Jotham . Jotham was the father of Ahaz . Ahaz was the father of Hezekiah .
40001010	Hezekiah was the father of Manasseh . Manasseh was the father of Amon . Amon was the father of Josiah .
40001011	Josiah was the father of Jehoiachin and his brothers ( born at the time of the exile to Babylon ) .
40001012	After the Babylonian exile : Jehoiachin was the father of Shealtiel . Shealtiel was the father of Zerubbabel .
40001013	Zerubbabel was the father of Abiud . Abiud was the father of Eliakim . Eliakim was the father of Azor .
40001014	Azor was the father of Zadok . Zadok was the father of Akim . Akim was the father of Eliud .
40001015	Eliud was the father of Eleazar . Eleazar was the father of Matthan . Matthan was the father of Jacob .
40001016	Jacob was the father of Joseph , the husband of Mary . Mary gave birth to Jesus , who is called the Messiah .
40001017	All those listed above include fourteen generations from Abraham to David , fourteen from David to the Babylonian exile , and fourteen from the Babylonian exile to the Messiah .
40001018	This is how Jesus the Messiah was born . His mother , Mary , was engaged to be married to Joseph . But before the marriage took place , while she was still a virgin , she became pregnant through the power of the Holy Spirit .
40001019	Joseph , her fiancé , was a good man and did not want to disgrace her publicly , so he decided to break the engagement quietly .
40001020	As he considered this , an angel of the Lord appeared to him in a dream . “ Joseph , son of David , ” the angel said , “ do not be afraid to take Mary as your wife . For the child within her was conceived by the Holy Spirit .
40001021	And she will have a son , and you are to name him Jesus , for he will save his people from their sins . ”
40001022	All of this occurred to fulfill the Lord’s message through his prophet :
40001023	“ Look ! The virgin will conceive a child ! She will give birth to a son , and they will call him Immanuel , which means ‘ God is with us . ’ ”
40001024	When Joseph woke up , he did as the angel of the Lord commanded and took Mary as his wife .
40001025	But he did not have sexual relations with her until her son was born . And Joseph named him Jesus .
40002001	Jesus was born in Bethlehem in Judea , during the reign of King Herod . About that time some wise men from eastern lands arrived in Jerusalem , asking ,
40002002	“ Where is the newborn king of the Jews ? We saw his star as it rose , and we have come to worship him . ”
40002003	King Herod was deeply disturbed when he heard this , as was everyone in Jerusalem .
40002004	He called a meeting of the leading priests and teachers of religious law and asked , “ Where is the Messiah supposed to be born ? ”
40002005	“ In Bethlehem in Judea , ” they said , “ for this is what the prophet wrote :
40002006	‘ And you , O Bethlehem in the land of Judah , are not least among the ruling cities of Judah , for a ruler will come from you who will be the shepherd for my people Israel . ’ ”
40002007	Then Herod called for a private meeting with the wise men , and he learned from them the time when the star first appeared .
40002008	Then he told them , “ Go to Bethlehem and search carefully for the child . And when you find him , come back and tell me so that I can go and worship him , too ! ”
40002009	After this interview the wise men went their way . And the star they had seen in the east guided them to Bethlehem . It went ahead of them and stopped over the place where the child was .
40002010	When they saw the star , they were filled with joy !
40002011	They entered the house and saw the child with his mother , Mary , and they bowed down and worshiped him . Then they opened their treasure chests and gave him gifts of gold , frankincense , and myrrh .
40002012	When it was time to leave , they returned to their own country by another route , for God had warned them in a dream not to return to Herod .
40002013	After the wise men were gone , an angel of the Lord appeared to Joseph in a dream . “ Get up ! Flee to Egypt with the child and his mother , ” the angel said . “ Stay there until I tell you to return , because Herod is going to search for the child to kill him . ”
40002014	That night Joseph left for Egypt with the child and Mary , his mother ,
40002015	and they stayed there until Herod’s death . This fulfilled what the Lord had spoken through the prophet : “ I called my Son out of Egypt . ”
40002016	Herod was furious when he realized that the wise men had outwitted him . He sent soldiers to kill all the boys in and around Bethlehem who were two years old and under , based on the wise men’s report of the star’s first appearance .
40002017	Herod’s brutal action fulfilled what God had spoken through the prophet Jeremiah :
40002018	“ A cry was heard in Ramah weeping and great mourning . Rachel weeps for her children , refusing to be comforted , for they are dead . ”
40002019	When Herod died , an angel of the Lord appeared in a dream to Joseph in Egypt .
40002020	“ Get up ! ” the angel said . “ Take the child and his mother back to the land of Israel , because those who were trying to kill the child are dead . ”
40002021	So Joseph got up and returned to the land of Israel with Jesus and his mother .
40002022	But when he learned that the new ruler of Judea was Herod’s son Archelaus , he was afraid to go there . Then , after being warned in a dream , he left for the region of Galilee .
40002023	So the family went and lived in a town called Nazareth . This fulfilled what the prophets had said : “ He will be called a Nazarene . ”
40003001	In those days John the Baptist came to the Judean wilderness and began preaching . His message was ,
40003002	“ Repent of your sins and turn to God , for the Kingdom of Heaven is near . ”
40003003	The prophet Isaiah was speaking about John when he said , “ He is a voice shouting in the wilderness , ‘ Prepare the way for the Lord’s coming ! Clear the road for him ! ’ ”
40003004	John’s clothes were woven from coarse camel hair , and he wore a leather belt around his waist . For food he ate locusts and wild honey .
40003005	People from Jerusalem and from all of Judea and all over the Jordan Valley went out to see and hear John .
40003006	And when they confessed their sins , he baptized them in the Jordan River .
40003007	But when he saw many Pharisees and Sadducees coming to watch him baptize , he denounced them . “ You brood of snakes ! ” he exclaimed . “ Who warned you to flee God’s coming wrath ?
40003008	Prove by the way you live that you have repented of your sins and turned to God .
40003009	Don’t just say to each other , ‘ We’re safe , for we are descendants of Abraham . ’ That means nothing , for I tell you , God can create children of Abraham from these very stones .
40003010	Even now the ax of God’s judgment is poised , ready to sever the roots of the trees . Yes , every tree that does not produce good fruit will be chopped down and thrown into the fire .
40003011	“ I baptize with water those who repent of their sins and turn to God . But someone is coming soon who is greater than I amso much greater that I’m not worthy even to be his slave and carry his sandals . He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and with fire .
40003012	He is ready to separate the chaff from the wheat with his winnowing fork . Then he will clean up the threshing area , gathering the wheat into his barn but burning the chaff with never-ending fire . ”
40003013	Then Jesus went from Galilee to the Jordan River to be baptized by John .
40003014	But John tried to talk him out of it . “ I am the one who needs to be baptized by you , ” he said , “ so why are you coming to me ? ”
40003015	But Jesus said , “ It should be done , for we must carry out all that God requires . ” So John agreed to baptize him .
40003016	After his baptism , as Jesus came up out of the water , the heavens were opened and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove and settling on him .
40003017	And a voice from heaven said , “ This is my dearly loved Son , who brings me great joy . ”
40004001	Then Jesus was led by the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted there by the devil .
40004002	For forty days and forty nights he fasted and became very hungry .
40004003	During that time the devil came and said to him , “ If you are the Son of God , tell these stones to become loaves of bread . ”
40004004	But Jesus told him , “ No ! The Scriptures say , ‘ People do not live by bread alone , but by every word that comes from the mouth of God . ’ ”
40004005	Then the devil took him to the holy city , Jerusalem , to the highest point of the Temple ,
40004006	and said , “ If you are the Son of God , jump off ! For the Scriptures say , ‘ He will order his angels to protect you . And they will hold you up with their hands so you won’t even hurt your foot on a stone . ’ ”
40004007	Jesus responded , “ The Scriptures also say , ‘ You must not test the L ord your God . ’ ”
40004008	Next the devil took him to the peak of a very high mountain and showed him all the kingdoms of the world and their glory .
40004009	“ I will give it all to you , ” he said , “ if you will kneel down and worship me . ”
40004010	“ Get out of here , Satan , ” Jesus told him . “ For the Scriptures say , ‘ You must worship the L ord your God and serve only him . ’ ”
40004011	Then the devil went away , and angels came and took care of Jesus .
40004012	When Jesus heard that John had been arrested , he left Judea and returned to Galilee .
40004013	He went first to Nazareth , then left there and moved to Capernaum , beside the Sea of Galilee , in the region of Zebulun and Naphtali .
40004014	This fulfilled what God said through the prophet Isaiah :
40004015	“ In the land of Zebulun and of Naphtali , beside the sea , beyond the Jordan River , in Galilee where so many Gentiles live ,
40004016	the people who sat in darkness have seen a great light . And for those who lived in the land where death casts its shadow , a light has shined . ”
40004017	From then on Jesus began to preach , “ Repent of your sins and turn to God , for the Kingdom of Heaven is near . ”
40004018	One day as Jesus was walking along the shore of the Sea of Galilee , he saw two brothersSimon , also called Peter , and Andrewthrowing a net into the water , for they fished for a living .
40004019	Jesus called out to them , “ Come , follow me , and I will show you how to fish for people ! ”
40004020	And they left their nets at once and followed him .
40004021	A little farther up the shore he saw two other brothers , James and John , sitting in a boat with their father , Zebedee , repairing their nets . And he called them to come , too .
40004022	They immediately followed him , leaving the boat and their father behind .
40004023	Jesus traveled throughout the region of Galilee , teaching in the synagogues and announcing the Good News about the Kingdom . And he healed every kind of disease and illness .
40004024	News about him spread as far as Syria , and people soon began bringing to him all who were sick . And whatever their sickness or disease , or if they were demon possessed or epileptic or paralyzedhe healed them all .
40004025	Large crowds followed him wherever he wentpeople from Galilee , the Ten Towns , Jerusalem , from all over Judea , and from east of the Jordan River .
40005001	One day as he saw the crowds gathering , Jesus went up on the mountainside and sat down . His disciples gathered around him ,
40005002	and he began to teach them .
40005003	“ God blesses those who are poor and realize their need for him , for the Kingdom of Heaven is theirs .
40005004	God blesses those who mourn , for they will be comforted .
40005005	God blesses those who are humble , for they will inherit the whole earth .
40005006	God blesses those who hunger and thirst for justice , for they will be satisfied .
40005007	God blesses those who are merciful , for they will be shown mercy .
40005008	God blesses those whose hearts are pure , for they will see God .
40005009	God blesses those who work for peace , for they will be called the children of God .
40005010	God blesses those who are persecuted for doing right , for the Kingdom of Heaven is theirs .
40005011	“ God blesses you when people mock you and persecute you and lie about you and say all sorts of evil things against you because you are my followers .
40005012	Be happy about it ! Be very glad ! For a great reward awaits you in heaven . And remember , the ancient prophets were persecuted in the same way .
40005013	“ You are the salt of the earth . But what good is salt if it has lost its flavor ? Can you make it salty again ? It will be thrown out and trampled underfoot as worthless .
40005014	“ You are the light of the worldlike a city on a hilltop that cannot be hidden .
40005015	No one lights a lamp and then puts it under a basket . Instead , a lamp is placed on a stand , where it gives light to everyone in the house .
40005016	In the same way , let your good deeds shine out for all to see , so that everyone will praise your heavenly Father .
40005017	“ Don’t misunderstand why I have come . I did not come to abolish the law of Moses or the writings of the prophets . No , I came to accomplish their purpose .
40005018	I tell you the truth , until heaven and earth disappear , not even the smallest detail of God’s law will disappear until its purpose is achieved .
40005019	So if you ignore the least commandment and teach others to do the same , you will be called the least in the Kingdom of Heaven . But anyone who obeys God’s laws and teaches them will be called great in the Kingdom of Heaven .
40005020	“ But I warn youunless your righteousness is better than the righteousness of the teachers of religious law and the Pharisees , you will never enter the Kingdom of Heaven !
40005021	“ You have heard that our ancestors were told , ‘ You must not murder . If you commit murder , you are subject to judgment . ’
40005022	But I say , if you are even angry with someone , you are subject to judgment ! If you call someone an idiot , you are in danger of being brought before the court . And if you curse someone , you are in danger of the fires of hell .
40005023	“ So if you are presenting a sacrifice at the altar in the Temple and you suddenly remember that someone has something against you ,
40005024	leave your sacrifice there at the altar . Go and be reconciled to that person . Then come and offer your sacrifice to God .
40005025	“ When you are on the way to court with your adversary , settle your differences quickly . Otherwise , your accuser may hand you over to the judge , who will hand you over to an officer , and you will be thrown into prison .
40005026	And if that happens , you surely won’t be free again until you have paid the last penny .
40005027	“ You have heard the commandment that says , ‘ You must not commit adultery . ’
40005028	But I say , anyone who even looks at a woman with lust has already committed adultery with her in his heart .
40005029	So if your eyeeven your good eye causes you to lust , gouge it out and throw it away . It is better for you to lose one part of your body than for your whole body to be thrown into hell .
40005030	And if your handeven your stronger hand causes you to sin , cut it off and throw it away . It is better for you to lose one part of your body than for your whole body to be thrown into hell .
40005031	“ You have heard the law that says , ‘ A man can divorce his wife by merely giving her a written notice of divorce . ’
40005032	But I say that a man who divorces his wife , unless she has been unfaithful , causes her to commit adultery . And anyone who marries a divorced woman also commits adultery .
40005033	“ You have also heard that our ancestors were told , ‘ You must not break your vows ; you must carry out the vows you make to the L ord . ’
40005034	But I say , do not make any vows ! Do not say , ‘ By heaven ! ’ because heaven is God’s throne .
40005035	And do not say , ‘ By the earth ! ’ because the earth is his footstool . And do not say , ‘ By Jerusalem ! ’ for Jerusalem is the city of the great King .
40005036	Do not even say , ‘ By my head ! ’ for you can’t turn one hair white or black .
40005037	Just say a simple , ‘ Yes , I will , ’ or ‘ No , I won’t . ’ Anything beyond this is from the evil one .
40005038	“ You have heard the law that says the punishment must match the injury : ‘ An eye for an eye , and a tooth for a tooth . ’
40005039	But I say , do not resist an evil person ! If someone slaps you on the right cheek , offer the other cheek also .
40005040	If you are sued in court and your shirt is taken from you , give your coat , too .
40005041	If a soldier demands that you carry his gear for a mile , carry it two miles .
40005042	Give to those who ask , and don’t turn away from those who want to borrow .
40005043	“ You have heard the law that says , ‘ Love your neighbor ’ and hate your enemy .
40005044	But I say , love your enemies ! Pray for those who persecute you !
40005045	In that way , you will be acting as true children of your Father in heaven . For he gives his sunlight to both the evil and the good , and he sends rain on the just and the unjust alike .
40005046	If you love only those who love you , what reward is there for that ? Even corrupt tax collectors do that much .
40005047	If you are kind only to your friends , how are you different from anyone else ? Even pagans do that .
40005048	But you are to be perfect , even as your Father in heaven is perfect .
40006001	“ Watch out ! Don’t do your good deeds publicly , to be admired by others , for you will lose the reward from your Father in heaven .
40006002	When you give to someone in need , don’t do as the hypocrites doblowing trumpets in the synagogues and streets to call attention to their acts of charity ! I tell you the truth , they have received all the reward they will ever get .
40006003	But when you give to someone in need , don’t let your left hand know what your right hand is doing .
40006004	Give your gifts in private , and your Father , who sees everything , will reward you .
40006005	“ When you pray , don’t be like the hypocrites who love to pray publicly on street corners and in the synagogues where everyone can see them . I tell you the truth , that is all the reward they will ever get .
40006006	But when you pray , go away by yourself , shut the door behind you , and pray to your Father in private . Then your Father , who sees everything , will reward you .
40006007	“ When you pray , don’t babble on and on as people of other religions do . They think their prayers are answered merely by repeating their words again and again .
40006008	Don’t be like them , for your Father knows exactly what you need even before you ask him !
40006009	Pray like this : Our Father in heaven , may your name be kept holy .
40006010	May your Kingdom come soon . May your will be done on earth , as it is in heaven .
40006011	Give us today the food we need ,
40006012	and forgive us our sins , as we have forgiven those who sin against us .
40006013	And don’t let us yield to temptation , but rescue us from the evil one .
40006014	“ If you forgive those who sin against you , your heavenly Father will forgive you .
40006015	But if you refuse to forgive others , your Father will not forgive your sins .
40006016	“ And when you fast , don’t make it obvious , as the hypocrites do , for they try to look miserable and disheveled so people will admire them for their fasting . I tell you the truth , that is the only reward they will ever get .
40006017	But when you fast , comb your hair and wash your face .
40006018	Then no one will notice that you are fasting , except your Father , who knows what you do in private . And your Father , who sees everything , will reward you .
40006019	“ Don’t store up treasures here on earth , where moths eat them and rust destroys them , and where thieves break in and steal .
40006020	Store your treasures in heaven , where moths and rust cannot destroy , and thieves do not break in and steal .
40006021	Wherever your treasure is , there the desires of your heart will also be .
40006022	“ Your eye is a lamp that provides light for your body . When your eye is good , your whole body is filled with light .
40006023	But when your eye is bad , your whole body is filled with darkness . And if the light you think you have is actually darkness , how deep that darkness is !
40006024	“ No one can serve two masters . For you will hate one and love the other ; you will be devoted to one and despise the other . You cannot serve both God and money .
40006025	“ That is why I tell you not to worry about everyday lifewhether you have enough food and drink , or enough clothes to wear . Isn’t life more than food , and your body more than clothing ?
40006026	Look at the birds . They don’t plant or harvest or store food in barns , for your heavenly Father feeds them . And aren’t you far more valuable to him than they are ?
40006027	Can all your worries add a single moment to your life ?
40006028	“ And why worry about your clothing ? Look at the lilies of the field and how they grow . They don’t work or make their clothing ,
40006029	yet Solomon in all his glory was not dressed as beautifully as they are .
40006030	And if God cares so wonderfully for wildflowers that are here today and thrown into the fire tomorrow , he will certainly care for you . Why do you have so little faith ?
40006031	“ So don’t worry about these things , saying , ‘ What will we eat ? What will we drink ? What will we wear ? ’
40006032	These things dominate the thoughts of unbelievers , but your heavenly Father already knows all your needs .
40006033	Seek the Kingdom of God above all else , and live righteously , and he will give you everything you need .
40006034	“ So don’t worry about tomorrow , for tomorrow will bring its own worries . Today’s trouble is enough for today .
40007001	“ Do not judge others , and you will not be judged .
40007002	For you will be treated as you treat others . The standard you use in judging is the standard by which you will be judged .
40007003	“ And why worry about a speck in your friend’s eye when you have a log in your own ?
40007004	How can you think of saying to your friend , ‘ Let me help you get rid of that speck in your eye , ’ when you can’t see past the log in your own eye ?
40007005	Hypocrite ! First get rid of the log in your own eye ; then you will see well enough to deal with the speck in your friend’s eye .
40007006	“ Don’t waste what is holy on people who are unholy . Don’t throw your pearls to pigs ! They will trample the pearls , then turn and attack you .
40007007	“ Keep on asking , and you will receive what you ask for . Keep on seeking , and you will find . Keep on knocking , and the door will be opened to you .
40007008	For everyone who asks , receives . Everyone who seeks , finds . And to everyone who knocks , the door will be opened .
40007009	“ You parentsif your children ask for a loaf of bread , do you give them a stone instead ?
40007010	Or if they ask for a fish , do you give them a snake ? Of course not !
40007011	So if you sinful people know how to give good gifts to your children , how much more will your heavenly Father give good gifts to those who ask him .
40007012	“ Do to others whatever you would like them to do to you . This is the essence of all that is taught in the law and the prophets .
40007013	“ You can enter God’s Kingdom only through the narrow gate . The highway to hell is broad , and its gate is wide for the many who choose that way .
40007014	But the gateway to life is very narrow and the road is difficult , and only a few ever find it .
40007015	“ Beware of false prophets who come disguised as harmless sheep but are really vicious wolves .
40007016	You can identify them by their fruit , that is , by the way they act . Can you pick grapes from thornbushes , or figs from thistles ?
40007017	A good tree produces good fruit , and a bad tree produces bad fruit .
40007018	A good tree can’t produce bad fruit , and a bad tree can’t produce good fruit .
40007019	So every tree that does not produce good fruit is chopped down and thrown into the fire .
40007020	Yes , just as you can identify a tree by its fruit , so you can identify people by their actions .
40007021	“ Not everyone who calls out to me , ‘ Lord ! Lord ! ’ will enter the Kingdom of Heaven . Only those who actually do the will of my Father in heaven will enter .
40007022	On judgment day many will say to me , ‘ Lord ! Lord ! We prophesied in your name and cast out demons in your name and performed many miracles in your name . ’
40007023	But I will reply , ‘ I never knew you . Get away from me , you who break God’s laws . ’
40007024	“ Anyone who listens to my teaching and follows it is wise , like a person who builds a house on solid rock .
40007025	Though the rain comes in torrents and the floodwaters rise and the winds beat against that house , it won’t collapse because it is built on bedrock .
40007026	But anyone who hears my teaching and doesn’t obey it is foolish , like a person who builds a house on sand .
40007027	When the rains and floods come and the winds beat against that house , it will collapse with a mighty crash . ”
40007028	When Jesus had finished saying these things , the crowds were amazed at his teaching ,
40007029	for he taught with real authorityquite unlike their teachers of religious law .
40008001	Large crowds followed Jesus as he came down the mountainside .
40008002	Suddenly , a man with leprosy approached him and knelt before him . “ Lord , ” the man said , “ if you are willing , you can heal me and make me clean . ”
40008003	Jesus reached out and touched him . “ I am willing , ” he said . “ Be healed ! ” And instantly the leprosy disappeared .
40008004	Then Jesus said to him , “ Don’t tell anyone about this . Instead , go to the priest and let him examine you . Take along the offering required in the law of Moses for those who have been healed of leprosy . This will be a public testimony that you have been cleansed . ”
40008005	When Jesus returned to Capernaum , a Roman officer came and pleaded with him ,
40008006	“ Lord , my young servant lies in bed , paralyzed and in terrible pain . ”
40008007	Jesus said , “ I will come and heal him . ”
40008008	But the officer said , “ Lord , I am not worthy to have you come into my home . Just say the word from where you are , and my servant will be healed .
40008009	I know this because I am under the authority of my superior officers , and I have authority over my soldiers . I only need to say , ‘ Go , ’ and they go , or ‘ Come , ’ and they come . And if I say to my slaves , ‘ Do this , ’ they do it . ”
40008010	When Jesus heard this , he was amazed . Turning to those who were following him , he said , “ I tell you the truth , I haven’t seen faith like this in all Israel !
40008011	And I tell you this , that many Gentiles will come from all over the world from east and westand sit down with Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob at the feast in the Kingdom of Heaven .
40008012	But many Israelitesthose for whom the Kingdom was preparedwill be thrown into outer darkness , where there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth . ”
40008013	Then Jesus said to the Roman officer , “ Go back home . Because you believed , it has happened . ” And the young servant was healed that same hour .
40008014	When Jesus arrived at Peter’s house , Peter’s mother-in-law was sick in bed with a high fever .
40008015	But when Jesus touched her hand , the fever left her . Then she got up and prepared a meal for him .
40008016	That evening many demon-possessed people were brought to Jesus . He cast out the evil spirits with a simple command , and he healed all the sick .
40008017	This fulfilled the word of the Lord through the prophet Isaiah , who said , “ He took our sicknesses and removed our diseases . ”
40008018	When Jesus saw the crowd around him , he instructed his disciples to cross to the other side of the lake .
40008019	Then one of the teachers of religious law said to him , “ Teacher , I will follow you wherever you go . ”
40008020	But Jesus replied , “ Foxes have dens to live in , and birds have nests , but the Son of Man has no place even to lay his head . ”
40008021	Another of his disciples said , “ Lord , first let me return home and bury my father . ”
40008022	But Jesus told him , “ Follow me now . Let the spiritually dead bury their own dead . ”
40008023	Then Jesus got into the boat and started across the lake with his disciples .
40008024	Suddenly , a fierce storm struck the lake , with waves breaking into the boat . But Jesus was sleeping .
40008025	The disciples went and woke him up , shouting , “ Lord , save us ! We’re going to drown ! ”
40008026	Jesus responded , “ Why are you afraid ? You have so little faith ! ” Then he got up and rebuked the wind and waves , and suddenly there was a great calm .
40008027	The disciples were amazed . “ Who is this man ? ” they asked . “ Even the winds and waves obey him ! ”
40008028	When Jesus arrived on the other side of the lake , in the region of the Gadarenes , two men who were possessed by demons met him . They lived in a cemetery and were so violent that no one could go through that area .
40008029	They began screaming at him , “ Why are you interfering with us , Son of God ? Have you come here to torture us before God’s appointed time ? ”
40008030	There happened to be a large herd of pigs feeding in the distance .
40008031	So the demons begged , “ If you cast us out , send us into that herd of pigs . ”
40008032	“ All right , go ! ” Jesus commanded them . So the demons came out of the men and entered the pigs , and the whole herd plunged down the steep hillside into the lake and drowned in the water .
40008033	The herdsmen fled to the nearby town , telling everyone what happened to the demon-possessed men .
40008034	Then the entire town came out to meet Jesus , but they begged him to go away and leave them alone .
40009001	Jesus climbed into a boat and went back across the lake to his own town .
40009002	Some people brought to him a paralyzed man on a mat . Seeing their faith , Jesus said to the paralyzed man , “ Be encouraged , my child ! Your sins are forgiven . ”
40009003	But some of the teachers of religious law said to themselves , “ That’s blasphemy ! Does he think he’s God ? ”
40009004	Jesus knew what they were thinking , so he asked them , “ Why do you have such evil thoughts in your hearts ?
40009005	Is it easier to say ‘ Your sins are forgiven , ’ or ‘ Stand up and walk ’ ?
40009006	So I will prove to you that the Son of Man has the authority on earth to forgive sins . ” Then Jesus turned to the paralyzed man and said , “ Stand up , pick up your mat , and go home ! ”
40009007	And the man jumped up and went home !
40009008	Fear swept through the crowd as they saw this happen . And they praised God for sending a man with such great authority .
40009009	As Jesus was walking along , he saw a man named Matthew sitting at his tax collector’s booth . “ Follow me and be my disciple , ” Jesus said to him . So Matthew got up and followed him .
40009010	Later , Matthew invited Jesus and his disciples to his home as dinner guests , along with many tax collectors and other disreputable sinners .
40009011	But when the Pharisees saw this , they asked his disciples , “ Why does your teacher eat with such scum ? ”
40009012	When Jesus heard this , he said , “ Healthy people don’t need a doctorsick people do . ”
40009013	Then he added , “ Now go and learn the meaning of this Scripture : ‘ I want you to show mercy , not offer sacrifices . ’ For I have come to call not those who think they are righteous , but those who know they are sinners . ”
40009014	One day the disciples of John the Baptist came to Jesus and asked him , “ Why don’t your disciples fast like we do and the Pharisees do ? ”
40009015	Jesus replied , “ Do wedding guests mourn while celebrating with the groom ? Of course not . But someday the groom will be taken away from them , and then they will fast .
40009016	“ Besides , who would patch old clothing with new cloth ? For the new patch would shrink and rip away from the old cloth , leaving an even bigger tear than before .
40009017	“ And no one puts new wine into old wineskins . For the old skins would burst from the pressure , spilling the wine and ruining the skins . New wine is stored in new wineskins so that both are preserved . ”
40009018	As Jesus was saying this , the leader of a synagogue came and knelt before him . “ My daughter has just died , ” he said , “ but you can bring her back to life again if you just come and lay your hand on her . ”
40009019	So Jesus and his disciples got up and went with him .
40009020	Just then a woman who had suffered for twelve years with constant bleeding came up behind him . She touched the fringe of his robe ,
40009021	for she thought , “ If I can just touch his robe , I will be healed . ”
40009022	Jesus turned around , and when he saw her he said , “ Daughter , be encouraged ! Your faith has made you well . ” And the woman was healed at that moment .
40009023	When Jesus arrived at the official’s home , he saw the noisy crowd and heard the funeral music .
40009024	“ Get out ! ” he told them . “ The girl isn’t dead ; she’s only asleep . ” But the crowd laughed at him .
40009025	After the crowd was put outside , however , Jesus went in and took the girl by the hand , and she stood up !
40009026	The report of this miracle swept through the entire countryside .
40009027	After Jesus left the girl’s home , two blind men followed along behind him , shouting , “ Son of David , have mercy on us ! ”
40009028	They went right into the house where he was staying , and Jesus asked them , “ Do you believe I can make you see ? ” “ Yes , Lord , ” they told him , “ we do . ”
40009029	Then he touched their eyes and said , “ Because of your faith , it will happen . ”
40009030	Then their eyes were opened , and they could see ! Jesus sternly warned them , “ Don’t tell anyone about this . ”
40009031	But instead , they went out and spread his fame all over the region .
40009032	When they left , a demon-possessed man who couldn’t speak was brought to Jesus .
40009033	So Jesus cast out the demon , and then the man began to speak . The crowds were amazed . “ Nothing like this has ever happened in Israel ! ” they exclaimed .
40009034	But the Pharisees said , “ He can cast out demons because he is empowered by the prince of demons . ”
40009035	Jesus traveled through all the towns and villages of that area , teaching in the synagogues and announcing the Good News about the Kingdom . And he healed every kind of disease and illness .
40009036	When he saw the crowds , he had compassion on them because they were confused and helpless , like sheep without a shepherd .
40009037	He said to his disciples , “ The harvest is great , but the workers are few .
40009038	So pray to the Lord who is in charge of the harvest ; ask him to send more workers into his fields . ”
40010001	Jesus called his twelve disciples together and gave them authority to cast out evil spirits and to heal every kind of disease and illness .
40010002	Here are the names of the twelve apostles : first , Simon ( also called Peter ) , then Andrew ( Peter’s brother ) , James ( son of Zebedee ) , John ( James’s brother ) ,
40010003	Philip , Bartholomew , Thomas , Matthew ( the tax collector ) , James ( son of Alphaeus ) , Thaddaeus ,
40010004	Simon ( the zealot ) , Judas Iscariot ( who later betrayed him ) .
40010005	Jesus sent out the twelve apostles with these instructions : “ Don’t go to the Gentiles or the Samaritans ,
40010006	but only to the people of IsraelGod’s lost sheep .
40010007	Go and announce to them that the Kingdom of Heaven is near .
40010008	Heal the sick , raise the dead , cure those with leprosy , and cast out demons . Give as freely as you have received !
40010009	“ Don’t take any money in your money beltsno gold , silver , or even copper coins .
40010010	Don’t carry a traveler’s bag with a change of clothes and sandals or even a walking stick . Don’t hesitate to accept hospitality , because those who work deserve to be fed .
40010011	“ Whenever you enter a city or village , search for a worthy person and stay in his home until you leave town .
40010012	When you enter the home , give it your blessing .
40010013	If it turns out to be a worthy home , let your blessing stand ; if it is not , take back the blessing .
40010014	If any household or town refuses to welcome you or listen to your message , shake its dust from your feet as you leave .
40010015	I tell you the truth , the wicked cities of Sodom and Gomorrah will be better off than such a town on the judgment day .
40010016	“ Look , I am sending you out as sheep among wolves . So be as shrewd as snakes and harmless as doves .
40010017	But beware ! For you will be handed over to the courts and will be flogged with whips in the synagogues .
40010018	You will stand trial before governors and kings because you are my followers . But this will be your opportunity to tell the rulers and other unbelievers about me .
40010019	When you are arrested , don’t worry about how to respond or what to say . God will give you the right words at the right time .
40010020	For it is not you who will be speakingit will be the Spirit of your Father speaking through you .
40010021	“ A brother will betray his brother to death , a father will betray his own child , and children will rebel against their parents and cause them to be killed .
40010022	And all nations will hate you because you are my followers . But everyone who endures to the end will be saved .
40010023	When you are persecuted in one town , flee to the next . I tell you the truth , the Son of Man will return before you have reached all the towns of Israel .
40010024	“ Students are not greater than their teacher , and slaves are not greater than their master .
40010025	Students are to be like their teacher , and slaves are to be like their master . And since I , the master of the household , have been called the prince of demons , the members of my household will be called by even worse names !
40010026	“ But don’t be afraid of those who threaten you . For the time is coming when everything that is covered will be revealed , and all that is secret will be made known to all .
40010027	What I tell you now in the darkness , shout abroad when daybreak comes . What I whisper in your ear , shout from the housetops for all to hear !
40010028	“ Don’t be afraid of those who want to kill your body ; they cannot touch your soul . Fear only God , who can destroy both soul and body in hell .
40010029	What is the price of two sparrowsone copper coin ? But not a single sparrow can fall to the ground without your Father knowing it .
40010030	And the very hairs on your head are all numbered .
40010031	So don’t be afraid ; you are more valuable to God than a whole flock of sparrows .
40010032	“ Everyone who acknowledges me publicly here on earth , I will also acknowledge before my Father in heaven .
40010033	But everyone who denies me here on earth , I will also deny before my Father in heaven .
40010034	“ Don’t imagine that I came to bring peace to the earth ! I came not to bring peace , but a sword .
40010035	‘ I have come to set a man against his father , a daughter against her mother , and a daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law .
40010036	Your enemies will be right in your own household ! ’
40010037	“ If you love your father or mother more than you love me , you are not worthy of being mine ; or if you love your son or daughter more than me , you are not worthy of being mine .
40010038	If you refuse to take up your cross and follow me , you are not worthy of being mine .
40010039	If you cling to your life , you will lose it ; but if you give up your life for me , you will find it .
40010040	“ Anyone who receives you receives me , and anyone who receives me receives the Father who sent me .
40010041	If you receive a prophet as one who speaks for God , you will be given the same reward as a prophet . And if you receive righteous people because of their righteousness , you will be given a reward like theirs .
40010042	And if you give even a cup of cold water to one of the least of my followers , you will surely be rewarded . ”
40011001	When Jesus had finished giving these instructions to his twelve disciples , he went out to teach and preach in towns throughout the region .
40011002	John the Baptist , who was in prison , heard about all the things the Messiah was doing . So he sent his disciples to ask Jesus ,
40011003	“ Are you the Messiah we’ve been expecting , or should we keep looking for someone else ? ”
40011004	Jesus told them , “ Go back to John and tell him what you have heard and seen
40011005	the blind see , the lame walk , the lepers are cured , the deaf hear , the dead are raised to life , and the Good News is being preached to the poor .
40011006	And tell him , ‘ God blesses those who do not turn away because of me . ’ ”
40011007	As John’s disciples were leaving , Jesus began talking about him to the crowds . “ What kind of man did you go into the wilderness to see ? Was he a weak reed , swayed by every breath of wind ?
40011008	Or were you expecting to see a man dressed in expensive clothes ? No , people with expensive clothes live in palaces .
40011009	Were you looking for a prophet ? Yes , and he is more than a prophet .
40011010	John is the man to whom the Scriptures refer when they say , ‘ Look , I am sending my messenger ahead of you , and he will prepare your way before you . ’
40011011	“ I tell you the truth , of all who have ever lived , none is greater than John the Baptist . Yet even the least person in the Kingdom of Heaven is greater than he is !
40011012	And from the time John the Baptist began preaching until now , the Kingdom of Heaven has been forcefully advancing , and violent people are attacking it .
40011013	For before John came , all the prophets and the law of Moses looked forward to this present time .
40011014	And if you are willing to accept what I say , he is Elijah , the one the prophets said would come .
40011015	Anyone with ears to hear should listen and understand !
40011016	“ To what can I compare this generation ? It is like children playing a game in the public square . They complain to their friends ,
40011017	‘ We played wedding songs , and you didn’t dance , so we played funeral songs , and you didn’t mourn . ’
40011018	For John didn’t spend his time eating and drinking , and you say , ‘ He’s possessed by a demon . ’
40011019	The Son of Man , on the other hand , feasts and drinks , and you say , ‘ He’s a glutton and a drunkard , and a friend of tax collectors and other sinners ! ’ But wisdom is shown to be right by its results . ”
40011020	Then Jesus began to denounce the towns where he had done so many of his miracles , because they hadn’t repented of their sins and turned to God .
40011021	“ What sorrow awaits you , Korazin and Bethsaida ! For if the miracles I did in you had been done in wicked Tyre and Sidon , their people would have repented of their sins long ago , clothing themselves in burlap and throwing ashes on their heads to show their remorse .
40011022	I tell you , Tyre and Sidon will be better off on judgment day than you .
40011023	“ And you people of Capernaum , will you be honored in heaven ? No , you will go down to the place of the dead . For if the miracles I did for you had been done in wicked Sodom , it would still be here today .
40011024	I tell you , even Sodom will be better off on judgment day than you . ”
40011025	At that time Jesus prayed this prayer : “ O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , thank you for hiding these things from those who think themselves wise and clever , and for revealing them to the childlike .
40011026	Yes , Father , it pleased you to do it this way !
40011027	“ My Father has entrusted everything to me . No one truly knows the Son except the Father , and no one truly knows the Father except the Son and those to whom the Son chooses to reveal him . ”
40011028	Then Jesus said , “ Come to me , all of you who are weary and carry heavy burdens , and I will give you rest .
40011029	Take my yoke upon you . Let me teach you , because I am humble and gentle at heart , and you will find rest for your souls .
40011030	For my yoke is easy to bear , and the burden I give you is light . ”
40012001	At about that time Jesus was walking through some grainfields on the Sabbath . His disciples were hungry , so they began breaking off some heads of grain and eating them .
40012002	But some Pharisees saw them do it and protested , “ Look , your disciples are breaking the law by harvesting grain on the Sabbath . ”
40012003	Jesus said to them , “ Haven’t you read in the Scriptures what David did when he and his companions were hungry ?
40012004	He went into the house of God , and he and his companions broke the law by eating the sacred loaves of bread that only the priests are allowed to eat .
40012005	And haven’t you read in the law of Moses that the priests on duty in the Temple may work on the Sabbath ?
40012006	I tell you , there is one here who is even greater than the Temple !
40012007	But you would not have condemned my innocent disciples if you knew the meaning of this Scripture : ‘ I want you to show mercy , not offer sacrifices . ’
40012008	For the Son of Man is Lord , even over the Sabbath ! ”
40012009	Then Jesus went over to their synagogue ,
40012010	where he noticed a man with a deformed hand . The Pharisees asked Jesus , “ Does the law permit a person to work by healing on the Sabbath ? ” ( They were hoping he would say yes , so they could bring charges against him . )
40012011	And he answered , “ If you had a sheep that fell into a well on the Sabbath , wouldn’t you work to pull it out ? Of course you would .
40012012	And how much more valuable is a person than a sheep ! Yes , the law permits a person to do good on the Sabbath . ”
40012013	Then he said to the man , “ Hold out your hand . ” So the man held out his hand , and it was restored , just like the other one !
40012014	Then the Pharisees called a meeting to plot how to kill Jesus .
40012015	But Jesus knew what they were planning . So he left that area , and many people followed him . He healed all the sick among them ,
40012016	but he warned them not to reveal who he was .
40012017	This fulfilled the prophecy of Isaiah concerning him :
40012018	“ Look at my Servant , whom I have chosen . He is my Beloved , who pleases me . I will put my Spirit upon him , and he will proclaim justice to the nations .
40012019	He will not fight or shout or raise his voice in public .
40012020	He will not crush the weakest reed or put out a flickering candle . Finally he will cause justice to be victorious .
40012021	And his name will be the hope of all the world . ”
40012022	Then a demon-possessed man , who was blind and couldn’t speak , was brought to Jesus . He healed the man so that he could both speak and see .
40012023	The crowd was amazed and asked , “ Could it be that Jesus is the Son of David , the Messiah ? ”
40012024	But when the Pharisees heard about the miracle , they said , “ No wonder he can cast out demons . He gets his power from Satan , the prince of demons . ”
40012025	Jesus knew their thoughts and replied , “ Any kingdom divided by civil war is doomed . A town or family splintered by feuding will fall apart .
40012026	And if Satan is casting out Satan , he is divided and fighting against himself . His own kingdom will not survive .
40012027	And if I am empowered by Satan , what about your own exorcists ? They cast out demons , too , so they will condemn you for what you have said .
40012028	But if I am casting out demons by the Spirit of God , then the Kingdom of God has arrived among you .
40012029	For who is powerful enough to enter the house of a strong man like Satan and plunder his goods ? Only someone even strongersomeone who could tie him up and then plunder his house .
40012030	“ Anyone who isn’t with me opposes me , and anyone who isn’t working with me is actually working against me .
40012031	“ So I tell you , every sin and blasphemy can be forgivenexcept blasphemy against the Holy Spirit , which will never be forgiven .
40012032	Anyone who speaks against the Son of Man can be forgiven , but anyone who speaks against the Holy Spirit will never be forgiven , either in this world or in the world to come .
40012033	“ A tree is identified by its fruit . If a tree is good , its fruit will be good . If a tree is bad , its fruit will be bad .
40012034	You brood of snakes ! How could evil men like you speak what is good and right ? For whatever is in your heart determines what you say .
40012035	A good person produces good things from the treasury of a good heart , and an evil person produces evil things from the treasury of an evil heart .
40012036	And I tell you this , you must give an account on judgment day for every idle word you speak .
40012037	The words you say will either acquit you or condemn you . ”
40012038	One day some teachers of religious law and Pharisees came to Jesus and said , “ Teacher , we want you to show us a miraculous sign to prove your authority . ”
40012039	But Jesus replied , “ Only an evil , adulterous generation would demand a miraculous sign ; but the only sign I will give them is the sign of the prophet Jonah .
40012040	For as Jonah was in the belly of the great fish for three days and three nights , so will the Son of Man be in the heart of the earth for three days and three nights .
40012041	“ The people of Nineveh will stand up against this generation on judgment day and condemn it , for they repented of their sins at the preaching of Jonah . Now someone greater than Jonah is herebut you refuse to repent .
40012042	The queen of Sheba will also stand up against this generation on judgment day and condemn it , for she came from a distant land to hear the wisdom of Solomon . Now someone greater than Solomon is herebut you refuse to listen .
40012043	“ When an evil spirit leaves a person , it goes into the desert , seeking rest but finding none .
40012044	Then it says , ‘ I will return to the person I came from . ’ So it returns and finds its former home empty , swept , and in order .
40012045	Then the spirit finds seven other spirits more evil than itself , and they all enter the person and live there . And so that person is worse off than before . That will be the experience of this evil generation . ”
40012046	As Jesus was speaking to the crowd , his mother and brothers stood outside , asking to speak to him .
40012047	Someone told Jesus , “ Your mother and your brothers are outside , and they want to speak to you . ”
40012048	Jesus asked , “ Who is my mother ? Who are my brothers ? ”
40012049	Then he pointed to his disciples and said , “ Look , these are my mother and brothers .
40012050	Anyone who does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother ! ”
40013001	Later that same day Jesus left the house and sat beside the lake .
40013002	A large crowd soon gathered around him , so he got into a boat . Then he sat there and taught as the people stood on the shore .
40013003	He told many stories in the form of parables , such as this one : “ Listen ! A farmer went out to plant some seeds .
40013004	As he scattered them across his field , some seeds fell on a footpath , and the birds came and ate them .
40013005	Other seeds fell on shallow soil with underlying rock . The seeds sprouted quickly because the soil was shallow .
40013006	But the plants soon wilted under the hot sun , and since they didn’t have deep roots , they died .
40013007	Other seeds fell among thorns that grew up and choked out the tender plants .
40013008	Still other seeds fell on fertile soil , and they produced a crop that was thirty , sixty , and even a hundred times as much as had been planted !
40013009	Anyone with ears to hear should listen and understand . ”
40013010	His disciples came and asked him , “ Why do you use parables when you talk to the people ? ”
40013011	He replied , “ You are permitted to understand the secrets of the Kingdom of Heaven , but others are not .
40013012	To those who listen to my teaching , more understanding will be given , and they will have an abundance of knowledge . But for those who are not listening , even what little understanding they have will be taken away from them .
40013013	That is why I use these parables , For they look , but they don’t really see . They hear , but they don’t really listen or understand .
40013014	This fulfills the prophecy of Isaiah that says , ‘ When you hear what I say , you will not understand . When you see what I do , you will not comprehend .
40013015	For the hearts of these people are hardened , and their ears cannot hear , and they have closed their eyes so their eyes cannot see , and their ears cannot hear , and their hearts cannot understand , and they cannot turn to me and let me heal them . ’
40013016	“ But blessed are your eyes , because they see ; and your ears , because they hear .
40013017	I tell you the truth , many prophets and righteous people longed to see what you see , but they didn’t see it . And they longed to hear what you hear , but they didn’t hear it .
40013018	“ Now listen to the explanation of the parable about the farmer planting seeds :
40013019	The seed that fell on the footpath represents those who hear the message about the Kingdom and don’t understand it . Then the evil one comes and snatches away the seed that was planted in their hearts .
40013020	The seed on the rocky soil represents those who hear the message and immediately receive it with joy .
40013021	But since they don’t have deep roots , they don’t last long . They fall away as soon as they have problems or are persecuted for believing God’s word .
40013022	The seed that fell among the thorns represents those who hear God’s word , but all too quickly the message is crowded out by the worries of this life and the lure of wealth , so no fruit is produced .
40013023	The seed that fell on good soil represents those who truly hear and understand God’s word and produce a harvest of thirty , sixty , or even a hundred times as much as had been planted ! ”
40013024	Here is another story Jesus told : “ The Kingdom of Heaven is like a farmer who planted good seed in his field .
40013025	But that night as the workers slept , his enemy came and planted weeds among the wheat , then slipped away .
40013026	When the crop began to grow and produce grain , the weeds also grew .
40013027	“ The farmer’s workers went to him and said , ‘ Sir , the field where you planted that good seed is full of weeds ! Where did they come from ? ’
40013028	“ ‘ An enemy has done this ! ’ the farmer exclaimed . “ ‘ Should we pull out the weeds ? ’ they asked .
40013029	“ ‘ No , ’ he replied , ‘ you’ll uproot the wheat if you do .
40013030	Let both grow together until the harvest . Then I will tell the harvesters to sort out the weeds , tie them into bundles , and burn them , and to put the wheat in the barn . ’ ”
40013031	Here is another illustration Jesus used : “ The Kingdom of Heaven is like a mustard seed planted in a field .
40013032	It is the smallest of all seeds , but it becomes the largest of garden plants ; it grows into a tree , and birds come and make nests in its branches . ”
40013033	Jesus also used this illustration : “ The Kingdom of Heaven is like the yeast a woman used in making bread . Even though she put only a little yeast in three measures of flour , it permeated every part of the dough . ”
40013034	Jesus always used stories and illustrations like these when speaking to the crowds . In fact , he never spoke to them without using such parables .
40013035	This fulfilled what God had spoken through the prophet : “ I will speak to you in parables . I will explain things hidden since the creation of the world . ”
40013036	Then , leaving the crowds outside , Jesus went into the house . His disciples said , “ Please explain to us the story of the weeds in the field . ”
40013037	Jesus replied , “ The Son of Man is the farmer who plants the good seed .
40013038	The field is the world , and the good seed represents the people of the Kingdom . The weeds are the people who belong to the evil one .
40013039	The enemy who planted the weeds among the wheat is the devil . The harvest is the end of the world , and the harvesters are the angels .
40013040	“ Just as the weeds are sorted out and burned in the fire , so it will be at the end of the world .
40013041	The Son of Man will send his angels , and they will remove from his Kingdom everything that causes sin and all who do evil .
40013042	And the angels will throw them into the fiery furnace , where there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
40013043	Then the righteous will shine like the sun in their Father’s Kingdom . Anyone with ears to hear should listen and understand !
40013044	“ The Kingdom of Heaven is like a treasure that a man discovered hidden in a field . In his excitement , he hid it again and sold everything he owned to get enough money to buy the field .
40013045	“ Again , the Kingdom of Heaven is like a merchant on the lookout for choice pearls .
40013046	When he discovered a pearl of great value , he sold everything he owned and bought it !
40013047	“ Again , the Kingdom of Heaven is like a fishing net that was thrown into the water and caught fish of every kind .
40013048	When the net was full , they dragged it up onto the shore , sat down , and sorted the good fish into crates , but threw the bad ones away .
40013049	That is the way it will be at the end of the world . The angels will come and separate the wicked people from the righteous ,
40013050	throwing the wicked into the fiery furnace , where there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
40013051	Do you understand all these things ? ” “ Yes , ” they said , “ we do . ”
40013052	Then he added , “ Every teacher of religious law who becomes a disciple in the Kingdom of Heaven is like a homeowner who brings from his storeroom new gems of truth as well as old . ”
40013053	When Jesus had finished telling these stories and illustrations , he left that part of the country .
40013054	He returned to Nazareth , his hometown . When he taught there in the synagogue , everyone was amazed and said , “ Where does he get this wisdom and the power to do miracles ? ”
40013055	Then they scoffed , “ He’s just the carpenter’s son , and we know Mary , his mother , and his brothersJames , Joseph , Simon , and Judas .
40013056	All his sisters live right here among us . Where did he learn all these things ? ”
40013057	And they were deeply offended and refused to believe in him . Then Jesus told them , “ A prophet is honored everywhere except in his own hometown and among his own family . ”
40013058	And so he did only a few miracles there because of their unbelief .
40014001	When Herod Antipas , the ruler of Galilee , heard about Jesus ,
40014002	he said to his advisers , “ This must be John the Baptist raised from the dead ! That is why he can do such miracles . ”
40014003	For Herod had arrested and imprisoned John as a favor to his wife Herodias ( the former wife of Herod’s brother Philip ) .
40014004	John had been telling Herod , “ It is against God’s law for you to marry her . ”
40014005	Herod wanted to kill John , but he was afraid of a riot , because all the people believed John was a prophet .
40014006	But at a birthday party for Herod , Herodias’s daughter performed a dance that greatly pleased him ,
40014007	so he promised with a vow to give her anything she wanted .
40014008	At her mother’s urging , the girl said , “ I want the head of John the Baptist on a tray ! ”
40014009	Then the king regretted what he had said ; but because of the vow he had made in front of his guests , he issued the necessary orders .
40014010	So John was beheaded in the prison ,
40014011	and his head was brought on a tray and given to the girl , who took it to her mother .
40014012	Later , John’s disciples came for his body and buried it . Then they went and told Jesus what had happened .
40014013	As soon as Jesus heard the news , he left in a boat to a remote area to be alone . But the crowds heard where he was headed and followed on foot from many towns .
40014014	Jesus saw the huge crowd as he stepped from the boat , and he had compassion on them and healed their sick .
40014015	That evening the disciples came to him and said , “ This is a remote place , and it’s already getting late . Send the crowds away so they can go to the villages and buy food for themselves . ”
40014016	But Jesus said , “ That isn’t necessaryyou feed them . ”
40014017	“ But we have only five loaves of bread and two fish ! ” they answered .
40014018	“ Bring them here , ” he said .
40014019	Then he told the people to sit down on the grass . Jesus took the five loaves and two fish , looked up toward heaven , and blessed them . Then , breaking the loaves into pieces , he gave the bread to the disciples , who distributed it to the people .
40014020	They all ate as much as they wanted , and afterward , the disciples picked up twelve baskets of leftovers .
40014021	About 5,000 men were fed that day , in addition to all the women and children !
40014022	Immediately after this , Jesus insisted that his disciples get back into the boat and cross to the other side of the lake , while he sent the people home .
40014023	After sending them home , he went up into the hills by himself to pray . Night fell while he was there alone .
40014024	Meanwhile , the disciples were in trouble far away from land , for a strong wind had risen , and they were fighting heavy waves .
40014025	About three o’clock in the morning Jesus came toward them , walking on the water .
40014026	When the disciples saw him walking on the water , they were terrified . In their fear , they cried out , “ It’s a ghost ! ”
40014027	But Jesus spoke to them at once . “ Don’t be afraid , ” he said . “ Take courage . I am here ! ”
40014028	Then Peter called to him , “ Lord , if it’s really you , tell me to come to you , walking on the water . ”
40014029	“ Yes , come , ” Jesus said . So Peter went over the side of the boat and walked on the water toward Jesus .
40014030	But when he saw the strong wind and the waves , he was terrified and began to sink . “ Save me , Lord ! ” he shouted .
40014031	Jesus immediately reached out and grabbed him . “ You have so little faith , ” Jesus said . “ Why did you doubt me ? ”
40014032	When they climbed back into the boat , the wind stopped .
40014033	Then the disciples worshiped him . “ You really are the Son of God ! ” they exclaimed .
40014034	After they had crossed the lake , they landed at Gennesaret .
40014035	When the people recognized Jesus , the news of his arrival spread quickly throughout the whole area , and soon people were bringing all their sick to be healed .
40014036	They begged him to let the sick touch at least the fringe of his robe , and all who touched him were healed .
40015001	Some Pharisees and teachers of religious law now arrived from Jerusalem to see Jesus . They asked him ,
40015002	“ Why do your disciples disobey our age-old tradition ? For they ignore our tradition of ceremonial hand washing before they eat . ”
40015003	Jesus replied , “ And why do you , by your traditions , violate the direct commandments of God ?
40015004	For instance , God says , ‘ Honor your father and mother , ’ and ‘ Anyone who speaks disrespectfully of father or mother must be put to death . ’
40015005	But you say it is all right for people to say to their parents , ‘ Sorry , I can’t help you . For I have vowed to give to God what I would have given to you . ’
40015006	In this way , you say they don’t need to honor their parents . And so you cancel the word of God for the sake of your own tradition .
40015007	You hypocrites ! Isaiah was right when he prophesied about you , for he wrote ,
40015008	‘ These people honor me with their lips , but their hearts are far from me .
40015009	Their worship is a farce , for they teach man-made ideas as commands from God . ’ ”
40015010	Then Jesus called to the crowd to come and hear . “ Listen , ” he said , “ and try to understand .
40015011	It’s not what goes into your mouth that defiles you ; you are defiled by the words that come out of your mouth . ”
40015012	Then the disciples came to him and asked , “ Do you realize you offended the Pharisees by what you just said ? ”
40015013	Jesus replied , “ Every plant not planted by my heavenly Father will be uprooted ,
40015014	so ignore them . They are blind guides leading the blind , and if one blind person guides another , they will both fall into a ditch . ”
40015015	Then Peter said to Jesus , “ Explain to us the parable that says people aren’t defiled by what they eat . ”
40015016	“ Don’t you understand yet ? ” Jesus asked .
40015017	“ Anything you eat passes through the stomach and then goes into the sewer .
40015018	But the words you speak come from the heartthat’s what defiles you .
40015019	For from the heart come evil thoughts , murder , adultery , all sexual immorality , theft , lying , and slander .
40015020	These are what defile you . Eating with unwashed hands will never defile you . ”
40015021	Then Jesus left Galilee and went north to the region of Tyre and Sidon .
40015022	A Gentile woman who lived there came to him , pleading , “ Have mercy on me , O Lord , Son of David ! For my daughter is possessed by a demon that torments her severely . ”
40015023	But Jesus gave her no reply , not even a word . Then his disciples urged him to send her away . “ Tell her to go away , ” they said . “ She is bothering us with all her begging . ”
40015024	Then Jesus said to the woman , “ I was sent only to help God’s lost sheepthe people of Israel . ”
40015025	But she came and worshiped him , pleading again , “ Lord , help me ! ”
40015026	Jesus responded , “ It isn’t right to take food from the children and throw it to the dogs . ”
40015027	She replied , “ That’s true , Lord , but even dogs are allowed to eat the scraps that fall beneath their masters’ table . ”
40015028	“ Dear woman , ” Jesus said to her , “ your faith is great . Your request is granted . ” And her daughter was instantly healed .
40015029	Jesus returned to the Sea of Galilee and climbed a hill and sat down .
40015030	A vast crowd brought to him people who were lame , blind , crippled , those who couldn’t speak , and many others . They laid them before Jesus , and he healed them all .
40015031	The crowd was amazed ! Those who hadn’t been able to speak were talking , the crippled were made well , the lame were walking , and the blind could see again ! And they praised the God of Israel .
40015032	Then Jesus called his disciples and told them , “ I feel sorry for these people . They have been here with me for three days , and they have nothing left to eat . I don’t want to send them away hungry , or they will faint along the way . ”
40015033	The disciples replied , “ Where would we get enough food here in the wilderness for such a huge crowd ? ”
40015034	Jesus asked , “ How much bread do you have ? ” They replied , “ Seven loaves , and a few small fish . ”
40015035	So Jesus told all the people to sit down on the ground .
40015036	Then he took the seven loaves and the fish , thanked God for them , and broke them into pieces . He gave them to the disciples , who distributed the food to the crowd .
40015037	They all ate as much as they wanted . Afterward , the disciples picked up seven large baskets of leftover food .
40015038	There were 4,000 men who were fed that day , in addition to all the women and children .
40015039	Then Jesus sent the people home , and he got into a boat and crossed over to the region of Magadan .
40016001	One day the Pharisees and Sadducees came to test Jesus , demanding that he show them a miraculous sign from heaven to prove his authority .
40016002	He replied , “ You know the saying , ‘ Red sky at night means fair weather tomorrow ;
40016003	red sky in the morning means foul weather all day . ’ You know how to interpret the weather signs in the sky , but you don’t know how to interpret the signs of the times !
40016004	Only an evil , adulterous generation would demand a miraculous sign , but the only sign I will give them is the sign of the prophet Jonah . ” Then Jesus left them and went away .
40016005	Later , after they crossed to the other side of the lake , the disciples discovered they had forgotten to bring any bread .
40016006	“ Watch out ! ” Jesus warned them . “ Beware of the yeast of the Pharisees and Sadducees . ”
40016007	At this they began to argue with each other because they hadn’t brought any bread .
40016008	Jesus knew what they were saying , so he said , “ You have so little faith ! Why are you arguing with each other about having no bread ?
40016009	Don’t you understand even yet ? Don’t you remember the 5,000 I fed with five loaves , and the baskets of leftovers you picked up ?
40016010	Or the 4,000 I fed with seven loaves , and the large baskets of leftovers you picked up ?
40016011	Why can’t you understand that I’m not talking about bread ? So again I say , ‘ Beware of the yeast of the Pharisees and Sadducees . ’ ”
40016012	Then at last they understood that he wasn’t speaking about the yeast in bread , but about the deceptive teaching of the Pharisees and Sadducees .
40016013	When Jesus came to the region of Caesarea Philippi , he asked his disciples , “ Who do people say that the Son of Man is ? ”
40016014	“ Well , ” they replied , “ some say John the Baptist , some say Elijah , and others say Jeremiah or one of the other prophets . ”
40016015	Then he asked them , “ But who do you say I am ? ”
40016016	Simon Peter answered , “ You are the Messiah , the Son of the living God . ”
40016017	Jesus replied , “ You are blessed , Simon son of John , because my Father in heaven has revealed this to you . You did not learn this from any human being .
40016018	Now I say to you that you are Peter ( which means ‘ rock ’ ) , and upon this rock I will build my church , and all the powers of hell will not conquer it .
40016019	And I will give you the keys of the Kingdom of Heaven . Whatever you forbid on earth will be forbidden in heaven , and whatever you permit on earth will be permitted in heaven . ”
40016020	Then he sternly warned the disciples not to tell anyone that he was the Messiah .
40016021	From then on Jesus began to tell his disciples plainly that it was necessary for him to go to Jerusalem , and that he would suffer many terrible things at the hands of the elders , the leading priests , and the teachers of religious law . He would be killed , but on the third day he would be raised from the dead .
40016022	But Peter took him aside and began to reprimand him for saying such things . “ Heaven forbid , Lord , ” he said . “ This will never happen to you ! ”
40016023	Jesus turned to Peter and said , “ Get away from me , Satan ! You are a dangerous trap to me . You are seeing things merely from a human point of view , not from God’s . ”
40016024	Then Jesus said to his disciples , “ If any of you wants to be my follower , you must turn from your selfish ways , take up your cross , and follow me .
40016025	If you try to hang on to your life , you will lose it . But if you give up your life for my sake , you will save it .
40016026	And what do you benefit if you gain the whole world but lose your own soul ? Is anything worth more than your soul ?
40016027	For the Son of Man will come with his angels in the glory of his Father and will judge all people according to their deeds .
40016028	And I tell you the truth , some standing here right now will not die before they see the Son of Man coming in his Kingdom . ”
40017001	Six days later Jesus took Peter and the two brothers , James and John , and led them up a high mountain to be alone .
40017002	As the men watched , Jesus’ appearance was transformed so that his face shone like the sun , and his clothes became as white as light .
40017003	Suddenly , Moses and Elijah appeared and began talking with Jesus .
40017004	Peter exclaimed , “ Lord , it’s wonderful for us to be here ! If you want , I’ll make three shelters as memorials one for you , one for Moses , and one for Elijah . ”
40017005	But even as he spoke , a bright cloud overshadowed them , and a voice from the cloud said , “ This is my dearly loved Son , who brings me great joy . Listen to him . ”
40017006	The disciples were terrified and fell face down on the ground .
40017007	Then Jesus came over and touched them . “ Get up , ” he said . “ Don’t be afraid . ”
40017008	And when they looked up , Moses and Elijah were gone , and they saw only Jesus .
40017009	As they went back down the mountain , Jesus commanded them , “ Don’t tell anyone what you have seen until the Son of Man has been raised from the dead . ”
40017010	Then his disciples asked him , “ Why do the teachers of religious law insist that Elijah must return before the Messiah comes ? ”
40017011	Jesus replied , “ Elijah is indeed coming first to get everything ready .
40017012	But I tell you , Elijah has already come , but he wasn’t recognized , and they chose to abuse him . And in the same way they will also make the Son of Man suffer . ”
40017013	Then the disciples realized he was talking about John the Baptist .
40017014	At the foot of the mountain , a large crowd was waiting for them . A man came and knelt before Jesus and said ,
40017015	“ Lord , have mercy on my son . He has seizures and suffers terribly . He often falls into the fire or into the water .
40017016	So I brought him to your disciples , but they couldn’t heal him . ”
40017017	Jesus said , “ You faithless and corrupt people ! How long must I be with you ? How long must I put up with you ? Bring the boy here to me . ”
40017018	Then Jesus rebuked the demon in the boy , and it left him . From that moment the boy was well .
40017019	Afterward the disciples asked Jesus privately , “ Why couldn’t we cast out that demon ? ”
40017020	“ You don’t have enough faith , ” Jesus told them . “ I tell you the truth , if you had faith even as small as a mustard seed , you could say to this mountain , ‘ Move from here to there , ’ and it would move . Nothing would be impossible . ”
40017022	After they gathered again in Galilee , Jesus told them , “ The Son of Man is going to be betrayed into the hands of his enemies .
40017023	He will be killed , but on the third day he will be raised from the dead . ” And the disciples were filled with grief .
40017024	On their arrival in Capernaum , the collectors of the Temple tax came to Peter and asked him , “ Doesn’t your teacher pay the Temple tax ? ”
40017025	“ Yes , he does , ” Peter replied . Then he went into the house . But before he had a chance to speak , Jesus asked him , “ What do you think , Peter ? Do kings tax their own people or the people they have conquered ? ”
40017026	“ They tax the people they have conquered , ” Peter replied . “ Well , then , ” Jesus said , “ the citizens are free !
40017027	However , we don’t want to offend them , so go down to the lake and throw in a line . Open the mouth of the first fish you catch , and you will find a large silver coin . Take it and pay the tax for both of us . ”
40018001	About that time the disciples came to Jesus and asked , “ Who is greatest in the Kingdom of Heaven ? ”
40018002	Jesus called a little child to him and put the child among them .
40018003	Then he said , “ I tell you the truth , unless you turn from your sins and become like little children , you will never get into the Kingdom of Heaven .
40018004	So anyone who becomes as humble as this little child is the greatest in the Kingdom of Heaven .
40018005	“ And anyone who welcomes a little child like this on my behalf is welcoming me .
40018006	But if you cause one of these little ones who trusts in me to fall into sin , it would be better for you to have a large millstone tied around your neck and be drowned in the depths of the sea .
40018007	“ What sorrow awaits the world , because it tempts people to sin . Temptations are inevitable , but what sorrow awaits the person who does the tempting .
40018008	So if your hand or foot causes you to sin , cut it off and throw it away . It’s better to enter eternal life with only one hand or one foot than to be thrown into eternal fire with both of your hands and feet .
40018009	And if your eye causes you to sin , gouge it out and throw it away . It’s better to enter eternal life with only one eye than to have two eyes and be thrown into the fire of hell .
40018010	“ Beware that you don’t look down on any of these little ones . For I tell you that in heaven their angels are always in the presence of my heavenly Father .
40018012	“ If a man has a hundred sheep and one of them wanders away , what will he do ? Won’t he leave the ninety-nine others on the hills and go out to search for the one that is lost ?
40018013	And if he finds it , I tell you the truth , he will rejoice over it more than over the ninety-nine that didn’t wander away !
40018014	In the same way , it is not my heavenly Father’s will that even one of these little ones should perish .
40018015	“ If another believer sins against you , go privately and point out the offense . If the other person listens and confesses it , you have won that person back .
40018016	But if you are unsuccessful , take one or two others with you and go back again , so that everything you say may be confirmed by two or three witnesses .
40018017	If the person still refuses to listen , take your case to the church . Then if he or she won’t accept the church’s decision , treat that person as a pagan or a corrupt tax collector .
40018018	“ I tell you the truth , whatever you forbid on earth will be forbidden in heaven , and whatever you permit on earth will be permitted in heaven .
40018019	“ I also tell you this : If two of you agree here on earth concerning anything you ask , my Father in heaven will do it for you .
40018020	For where two or three gather together as my followers , I am there among them . ”
40018021	Then Peter came to him and asked , “ Lord , how often should I forgive someone who sins against me ? Seven times ? ”
40018022	“ No , not seven times , ” Jesus replied , “ but seventy times seven !
40018023	“ Therefore , the Kingdom of Heaven can be compared to a king who decided to bring his accounts up to date with servants who had borrowed money from him .
40018024	In the process , one of his debtors was brought in who owed him millions of dollars .
