40018025	He couldn’t pay , so his master ordered that he be soldalong with his wife , his children , and everything he ownedto pay the debt .
40018026	“ But the man fell down before his master and begged him , ‘ Please , be patient with me , and I will pay it all . ’
40018027	Then his master was filled with pity for him , and he released him and forgave his debt .
40018028	“ But when the man left the king , he went to a fellow servant who owed him a few thousand dollars . He grabbed him by the throat and demanded instant payment .
40018029	“ His fellow servant fell down before him and begged for a little more time . ‘ Be patient with me , and I will pay it , ’ he pleaded .
40018030	But his creditor wouldn’t wait . He had the man arrested and put in prison until the debt could be paid in full .
40018031	“ When some of the other servants saw this , they were very upset . They went to the king and told him everything that had happened .
40018032	Then the king called in the man he had forgiven and said , ‘ You evil servant ! I forgave you that tremendous debt because you pleaded with me .
40018033	Shouldn’t you have mercy on your fellow servant , just as I had mercy on you ? ’
40018034	Then the angry king sent the man to prison to be tortured until he had paid his entire debt .
40018035	“ That’s what my heavenly Father will do to you if you refuse to forgive your brothers and sisters from your heart . ”
40019001	When Jesus had finished saying these things , he left Galilee and went down to the region of Judea east of the Jordan River .
40019002	Large crowds followed him there , and he healed their sick .
40019003	Some Pharisees came and tried to trap him with this question : “ Should a man be allowed to divorce his wife for just any reason ? ”
40019004	“ Haven’t you read the Scriptures ? ” Jesus replied . “ They record that from the beginning ‘ God made them male and female . ’
40019005	And he said , ‘ This explains why a man leaves his father and mother and is joined to his wife , and the two are united into one . ’
40019006	Since they are no longer two but one , let no one split apart what God has joined together . ”
40019007	“ Then why did Moses say in the law that a man could give his wife a written notice of divorce and send her away ? ” they asked .
40019008	Jesus replied , “ Moses permitted divorce only as a concession to your hard hearts , but it was not what God had originally intended .
40019009	And I tell you this , whoever divorces his wife and marries someone else commits adulteryunless his wife has been unfaithful . ”
40019010	Jesus’ disciples then said to him , “ If this is the case , it is better not to marry ! ”
40019011	“ Not everyone can accept this statement , ” Jesus said . “ Only those whom God helps .
40019012	Some are born as eunuchs , some have been made eunuchs by others , and some choose not to marry for the sake of the Kingdom of Heaven . Let anyone accept this who can . ”
40019013	One day some parents brought their children to Jesus so he could lay his hands on them and pray for them . But the disciples scolded the parents for bothering him .
40019014	But Jesus said , “ Let the children come to me . Don’t stop them ! For the Kingdom of Heaven belongs to those who are like these children . ”
40019015	And he placed his hands on their heads and blessed them before he left .
40019016	Someone came to Jesus with this question : “ Teacher , what good deed must I do to have eternal life ? ”
40019017	“ Why ask me about what is good ? ” Jesus replied . “ There is only One who is good . But to answer your questionif you want to receive eternal life , keep the commandments . ”
40019018	“ Which ones ? ” the man asked . And Jesus replied : “ ‘ You must not murder . You must not commit adultery . You must not steal . You must not testify falsely .
40019019	Honor your father and mother . Love your neighbor as yourself . ’ ”
40019020	“ I’ve obeyed all these commandments , ” the young man replied . “ What else must I do ? ”
40019021	Jesus told him , “ If you want to be perfect , go and sell all your possessions and give the money to the poor , and you will have treasure in heaven . Then come , follow me . ”
40019022	But when the young man heard this , he went away sad , for he had many possessions .
40019023	Then Jesus said to his disciples , “ I tell you the truth , it is very hard for a rich person to enter the Kingdom of Heaven .
40019024	I’ll say it againit is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle than for a rich person to enter the Kingdom of God ! ”
40019025	The disciples were astounded . “ Then who in the world can be saved ? ” they asked .
40019026	Jesus looked at them intently and said , “ Humanly speaking , it is impossible . But with God everything is possible . ”
40019027	Then Peter said to him , “ We’ve given up everything to follow you . What will we get ? ”
40019028	Jesus replied , “ I assure you that when the world is made new and the Son of Man sits upon his glorious throne , you who have been my followers will also sit on twelve thrones , judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
40019029	And everyone who has given up houses or brothers or sisters or father or mother or children or property , for my sake , will receive a hundred times as much in return and will inherit eternal life .
40019030	But many who are the greatest now will be least important then , and those who seem least important now will be the greatest then .
40020001	“ For the Kingdom of Heaven is like the landowner who went out early one morning to hire workers for his vineyard .
40020002	He agreed to pay the normal daily wage and sent them out to work .
40020003	“ At nine o’clock in the morning he was passing through the marketplace and saw some people standing around doing nothing .
40020004	So he hired them , telling them he would pay them whatever was right at the end of the day .
40020005	So they went to work in the vineyard . At noon and again at three o’clock he did the same thing .
40020006	“ At five o’clock that afternoon he was in town again and saw some more people standing around . He asked them , ‘ Why haven’t you been working today ? ’
40020007	“ They replied , ‘ Because no one hired us . ’ “ The landowner told them , ‘ Then go out and join the others in my vineyard . ’
40020008	“ That evening he told the foreman to call the workers in and pay them , beginning with the last workers first .
40020009	When those hired at five o’clock were paid , each received a full day’s wage .
40020010	When those hired first came to get their pay , they assumed they would receive more . But they , too , were paid a day’s wage .
40020011	When they received their pay , they protested to the owner ,
40020012	‘ Those people worked only one hour , and yet you’ve paid them just as much as you paid us who worked all day in the scorching heat . ’
40020013	“ He answered one of them , ‘ Friend , I haven’t been unfair ! Didn’t you agree to work all day for the usual wage ?
40020014	Take your money and go . I wanted to pay this last worker the same as you .
40020015	Is it against the law for me to do what I want with my money ? Should you be jealous because I am kind to others ? ’
40020016	“ So those who are last now will be first then , and those who are first will be last . ”

40020019	Then they will hand him over to the Romans to be mocked , flogged with a whip , and crucified . But on the third day he will be raised from the dead . ”
40020020	Then the mother of James and John , the sons of Zebedee , came to Jesus with her sons . She knelt respectfully to ask a favor .
40020021	“ What is your request ? ” he asked . She replied , “ In your Kingdom , please let my two sons sit in places of honor next to you , one on your right and the other on your left . ”
40020022	But Jesus answered by saying to them , “ You don’t know what you are asking ! Are you able to drink from the bitter cup of suffering I am about to drink ? ” “ Oh yes , ” they replied , “ we are able ! ”
40020023	Jesus told them , “ You will indeed drink from my bitter cup . But I have no right to say who will sit on my right or my left . My Father has prepared those places for the ones he has chosen . ”
40020024	When the ten other disciples heard what James and John had asked , they were indignant .
40020025	But Jesus called them together and said , “ You know that the rulers in this world lord it over their people , and officials flaunt their authority over those under them .
40020026	But among you it will be different . Whoever wants to be a leader among you must be your servant ,
40020027	and whoever wants to be first among you must become your slave .
40020028	For even the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve others and to give his life as a ransom for many . ”
40020029	As Jesus and the disciples left the town of Jericho , a large crowd followed behind .
40020030	Two blind men were sitting beside the road . When they heard that Jesus was coming that way , they began shouting , “ Lord , Son of David , have mercy on us ! ”
40020031	“ Be quiet ! ” the crowd yelled at them . But they only shouted louder , “ Lord , Son of David , have mercy on us ! ”
40020032	When Jesus heard them , he stopped and called , “ What do you want me to do for you ? ”
40020033	“ Lord , ” they said , “ we want to see ! ”
40020034	Jesus felt sorry for them and touched their eyes . Instantly they could see ! Then they followed him .
40021001	As Jesus and the disciples approached Jerusalem , they came to the town of Bethphage on the Mount of Olives . Jesus sent two of them on ahead .
40021002	“ Go into the village over there , ” he said . “ As soon as you enter it , you will see a donkey tied there , with its colt beside it . Untie them and bring them to me .
40021003	If anyone asks what you are doing , just say , ‘ The Lord needs them , ’ and he will immediately let you take them . ”
40021004	This took place to fulfill the prophecy that said ,
40021005	“ Tell the people of Jerusalem , ‘ Look , your King is coming to you . He is humble , riding on a donkey riding on a donkey’s colt . ’ ”
40021006	The two disciples did as Jesus commanded .
40021007	They brought the donkey and the colt to him and threw their garments over the colt , and he sat on it .
40021008	Most of the crowd spread their garments on the road ahead of him , and others cut branches from the trees and spread them on the road .
40021009	Jesus was in the center of the procession , and the people all around him were shouting , “ Praise God for the Son of David ! Blessings on the one who comes in the name of the L ord ! Praise God in highest heaven ! ”
40021010	The entire city of Jerusalem was in an uproar as he entered . “ Who is this ? ” they asked .
40021011	And the crowds replied , “ It’s Jesus , the prophet from Nazareth in Galilee . ”
40021012	Jesus entered the Temple and began to drive out all the people buying and selling animals for sacrifice . He knocked over the tables of the money changers and the chairs of those selling doves .
40021013	He said to them , “ The Scriptures declare , ‘ My Temple will be called a house of prayer , ’ but you have turned it into a den of thieves ! ”
40021014	The blind and the lame came to him in the Temple , and he healed them .
40021015	The leading priests and the teachers of religious law saw these wonderful miracles and heard even the children in the Temple shouting , “ Praise God for the Son of David . ” But the leaders were indignant .
40021016	They asked Jesus , “ Do you hear what these children are saying ? ” “ Yes , ” Jesus replied . “ Haven’t you ever read the Scriptures ? For they say , ‘ You have taught children and infants to give you praise . ’ ”
40021017	Then he returned to Bethany , where he stayed overnight .
40021018	In the morning , as Jesus was returning to Jerusalem , he was hungry ,
40021019	and he noticed a fig tree beside the road . He went over to see if there were any figs , but there were only leaves . Then he said to it , “ May you never bear fruit again ! ” And immediately the fig tree withered up .
40021020	The disciples were amazed when they saw this and asked , “ How did the fig tree wither so quickly ? ”
40021021	Then Jesus told them , “ I tell you the truth , if you have faith and don’t doubt , you can do things like this and much more . You can even say to this mountain , ‘ May you be lifted up and thrown into the sea , ’ and it will happen .
40021022	You can pray for anything , and if you have faith , you will receive it . ”
40021023	When Jesus returned to the Temple and began teaching , the leading priests and elders came up to him . They demanded , “ By what authority are you doing all these things ? Who gave you the right ? ”
40021024	“ I’ll tell you by what authority I do these things if you answer one question , ” Jesus replied .
40021025	“ Did John’s authority to baptize come from heaven , or was it merely human ? ” They talked it over among themselves . “ If we say it was from heaven , he will ask us why we didn’t believe John .
40021026	But if we say it was merely human , we’ll be mobbed because the people believe John was a prophet . ”
40021027	So they finally replied , “ We don’t know . ” And Jesus responded , “ Then I won’t tell you by what authority I do these things .
40021028	“ But what do you think about this ? A man with two sons told the older boy , ‘ Son , go out and work in the vineyard today . ’
40021029	The son answered , ‘ No , I won’t go , ’ but later he changed his mind and went anyway .
40021030	Then the father told the other son , ‘ You go , ’ and he said , ‘ Yes , sir , I will . ’ But he didn’t go .
40021031	“ Which of the two obeyed his father ? ” They replied , “ The first . ” Then Jesus explained his meaning : “ I tell you the truth , corrupt tax collectors and prostitutes will get into the Kingdom of God before you do .
40021032	For John the Baptist came and showed you the right way to live , but you didn’t believe him , while tax collectors and prostitutes did . And even when you saw this happening , you refused to believe him and repent of your sins .
40021033	“ Now listen to another story . A certain landowner planted a vineyard , built a wall around it , dug a pit for pressing out the grape juice , and built a lookout tower . Then he leased the vineyard to tenant farmers and moved to another country .
40021034	At the time of the grape harvest , he sent his servants to collect his share of the crop .
40021035	But the farmers grabbed his servants , beat one , killed one , and stoned another .
40021036	So the landowner sent a larger group of his servants to collect for him , but the results were the same .
40021037	“ Finally , the owner sent his son , thinking , ‘ Surely they will respect my son . ’
40021038	“ But when the tenant farmers saw his son coming , they said to one another , ‘ Here comes the heir to this estate . Come on , let’s kill him and get the estate for ourselves ! ’
40021039	So they grabbed him , dragged him out of the vineyard , and murdered him .
40021040	“ When the owner of the vineyard returns , ” Jesus asked , “ what do you think he will do to those farmers ? ”
40021041	The religious leaders replied , “ He will put the wicked men to a horrible death and lease the vineyard to others who will give him his share of the crop after each harvest . ”
40021042	Then Jesus asked them , “ Didn’t you ever read this in the Scriptures ? ‘ The stone that the builders rejected has now become the cornerstone . This is the Lord’s doing , and it is wonderful to see . ’
40021043	I tell you , the Kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a nation that will produce the proper fruit .
40021044	Anyone who stumbles over that stone will be broken to pieces , and it will crush anyone it falls on . ”
40021045	When the leading priests and Pharisees heard this parable , they realized he was telling the story against themthey were the wicked farmers .
40021046	They wanted to arrest him , but they were afraid of the crowds , who considered Jesus to be a prophet .
40022001	Jesus also told them other parables . He said ,
40022002	“ The Kingdom of Heaven can be illustrated by the story of a king who prepared a great wedding feast for his son .
40022003	When the banquet was ready , he sent his servants to notify those who were invited . But they all refused to come !
40022004	“ So he sent other servants to tell them , ‘ The feast has been prepared . The bulls and fattened cattle have been killed , and everything is ready . Come to the banquet ! ’
40022005	But the guests he had invited ignored them and went their own way , one to his farm , another to his business .
40022006	Others seized his messengers and insulted them and killed them .
40022007	“ The king was furious , and he sent out his army to destroy the murderers and burn their town .
40022008	And he said to his servants , ‘ The wedding feast is ready , and the guests I invited aren’t worthy of the honor .
40022009	Now go out to the street corners and invite everyone you see . ’
40022010	So the servants brought in everyone they could find , good and bad alike , and the banquet hall was filled with guests .
40022011	“ But when the king came in to meet the guests , he noticed a man who wasn’t wearing the proper clothes for a wedding .
40022012	‘ Friend , ’ he asked , ‘ how is it that you are here without wedding clothes ? ’ But the man had no reply .
40022013	Then the king said to his aides , ‘ Bind his hands and feet and throw him into the outer darkness , where there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth . ’
40022014	“ For many are called , but few are chosen . ”
40022015	Then the Pharisees met together to plot how to trap Jesus into saying something for which he could be arrested .
40022016	They sent some of their disciples , along with the supporters of Herod , to meet with him . “ Teacher , ” they said , “ we know how honest you are . You teach the way of God truthfully . You are impartial and don’t play favorites .
40022017	Now tell us what you think about this : Is it right to pay taxes to Caesar or not ? ”
40022018	But Jesus knew their evil motives . “ You hypocrites ! ” he said . “ Why are you trying to trap me ?
40022019	Here , show me the coin used for the tax . ” When they handed him a Roman coin ,
40022020	he asked , “ Whose picture and title are stamped on it ? ”
40022021	“ Caesar’s , ” they replied . “ Well , then , ” he said , “ give to Caesar what belongs to Caesar , and give to God what belongs to God . ”
40022022	His reply amazed them , and they went away .
40022023	That same day Jesus was approached by some Sadduceesreligious leaders who say there is no resurrection from the dead . They posed this question :
40022024	“ Teacher , Moses said , ‘ If a man dies without children , his brother should marry the widow and have a child who will carry on the brother’s name . ’
40022025	Well , suppose there were seven brothers . The oldest one married and then died without children , so his brother married the widow .
40022026	But the second brother also died , and the third brother married her . This continued with all seven of them .
40022027	Last of all , the woman also died .
40022028	So tell us , whose wife will she be in the resurrection ? For all seven were married to her . ”
40022029	Jesus replied , “ Your mistake is that you don’t know the Scriptures , and you don’t know the power of God .
40022030	For when the dead rise , they will neither marry nor be given in marriage . In this respect they will be like the angels in heaven .
40022031	“ But now , as to whether there will be a resurrection of the deadhaven’t you ever read about this in the Scriptures ? Long after Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob had died , God said ,
40022032	‘ I am the God of Abraham , the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . ’ So he is the God of the living , not the dead . ”
40022033	When the crowds heard him , they were astounded at his teaching .
40022034	But when the Pharisees heard that he had silenced the Sadducees with his reply , they met together to question him again .
40022035	One of them , an expert in religious law , tried to trap him with this question :
40022036	“ Teacher , which is the most important commandment in the law of Moses ? ”
40022037	Jesus replied , “ ‘ You must love the L ord your God with all your heart , all your soul , and all your mind . ’
40022038	This is the first and greatest commandment .
40022039	A second is equally important : ‘ Love your neighbor as yourself . ’
40022040	The entire law and all the demands of the prophets are based on these two commandments . ”
40022041	Then , surrounded by the Pharisees , Jesus asked them a question :
40022042	“ What do you think about the Messiah ? Whose son is he ? ” They replied , “ He is the son of David . ”
40022043	Jesus responded , “ Then why does David , speaking under the inspiration of the Spirit , call the Messiah ‘ my Lord ’ ? For David said ,
40022044	‘ The L ord said to my Lord , Sit in the place of honor at my right hand until I humble your enemies beneath your feet . ’
40022045	Since David called the Messiah ‘ my Lord , ’ how can the Messiah be his son ? ”
40022046	No one could answer him . And after that , no one dared to ask him any more questions .
40023001	Then Jesus said to the crowds and to his disciples ,
40023002	“ The teachers of religious law and the Pharisees are the official interpreters of the law of Moses .
40023003	So practice and obey whatever they tell you , but don’t follow their example . For they don’t practice what they teach .
40023004	They crush people with unbearable religious demands and never lift a finger to ease the burden .
40023005	“ Everything they do is for show . On their arms they wear extra wide prayer boxes with Scripture verses inside , and they wear robes with extra long tassels .
40023006	And they love to sit at the head table at banquets and in the seats of honor in the synagogues .
40023007	They love to receive respectful greetings as they walk in the marketplaces , and to be called ‘ Rabbi . ’

40023013	“ What sorrow awaits you teachers of religious law and you Pharisees . Hypocrites ! For you shut the door of the Kingdom of Heaven in people’s faces . You won’t go in yourselves , and you don’t let others enter either .

40023017	Blind fools ! Which is more importantthe gold or the Temple that makes the gold sacred ?
40023018	And you say that to swear ‘ by the altar ’ is not binding , but to swear ‘ by the gifts on the altar ’ is binding .
40023019	How blind ! For which is more importantthe gift on the altar or the altar that makes the gift sacred ?

40023021	And when you swear ‘ by the Temple , ’ you are swearing by it and by God , who lives in it .
40023022	And when you swear ‘ by heaven , ’ you are swearing by the throne of God and by God , who sits on the throne .
40023023	“ What sorrow awaits you teachers of religious law and you Pharisees . Hypocrites ! You should tithe , yes , but do not neglect the more important things .
40023024	Blind guides ! You strain your water so you won’t accidentally swallow a gnat , but you swallow a camel !
40023025	“ What sorrow awaits you teachers of religious law and you Pharisees . Hypocrites ! For you are so careful to clean the outside of the cup and the dish , but inside you are filthyfull of greed and self-indulgence !

40023037	“ O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , the city that kills the prophets and stones God’s messengers ! How often I have wanted to gather your children together as a hen protects her chicks beneath her wings , but you wouldn’t let me .
40023038	And now , look , your house is abandoned and desolate .
40023039	For I tell you this , you will never see me again until you say , ‘ Blessings on the one who comes in the name of the L ord ! ’ ”

40024003	Later , Jesus sat on the Mount of Olives . His disciples came to him privately and said , “ Tell us , when will all this happen ? What sign will signal your return and the end of the world ? ”

40024016	“ Then those in Judea must flee to the hills .
40024017	A person out on the deck of a roof must not go down into the house to pack .

40024021	For there will be greater anguish than at any time since the world began . And it will never be so great again .

40024023	“ Then if anyone tells you , ‘ Look , here is the Messiah , ’ or ‘ There he is , ’ don’t believe it .

40024027	For as the lightning flashes in the east and shines to the west , so it will be when the Son of Man comes .

40024029	“ Immediately after the anguish of those days , the sun will be darkened , the moon will give no light , the stars will fall from the sky , and the powers in the heavens will be shaken .

40024032	“ Now learn a lesson from the fig tree . When its branches bud and its leaves begin to sprout , you know that summer is near .
40024033	In the same way , when you see all these things , you can know his return is very near , right at the door .
40024034	I tell you the truth , this generation will not pass from the scene until all these things take place .

40024037	“ When the Son of Man returns , it will be like it was in Noah’s day .

40024039	People didn’t realize what was going to happen until the flood came and swept them all away . That is the way it will be when the Son of Man comes .
40024040	“ Two men will be working together in the field ; one will be taken , the other left .
40024041	Two women will be grinding flour at the mill ; one will be taken , the other left .
40024042	“ So you , too , must keep watch ! For you don’t know what day your Lord is coming .
40024043	Understand this : If a homeowner knew exactly when a burglar was coming , he would keep watch and not permit his house to be broken into .
40024044	You also must be ready all the time , for the Son of Man will come when least expected .
40024045	“ A faithful , sensible servant is one to whom the master can give the responsibility of managing his other household servants and feeding them .

40024047	I tell you the truth , the master will put that servant in charge of all he owns .
40024048	But what if the servant is evil and thinks , ‘ My master won’t be back for a while , ’
40024049	and he begins beating the other servants , partying , and getting drunk ?

40025001	“ Then the Kingdom of Heaven will be like ten bridesmaids who took their lamps and went to meet the bridegroom .

40027001	Very early in the morning the leading priests and the elders of the people met again to lay plans for putting Jesus to death .
40027002	Then they bound him , led him away , and took him to Pilate , the Roman governor .

40027016	This year there was a notorious prisoner , a man named Barabbas .

40027018	( He knew very well that the religious leaders had arrested Jesus out of envy . )

40027020	Meanwhile , the leading priests and the elders persuaded the crowd to ask for Barabbas to be released and for Jesus to be put to death .
40027021	So the governor asked again , “ Which of these two do you want me to release to you ? ” The crowd shouted back , “ Barabbas ! ”
40027022	Pilate responded , “ Then what should I do with Jesus who is called the Messiah ? ” They shouted back , “ Crucify him ! ”
40027023	“ Why ? ” Pilate demanded . “ What crime has he committed ? ” But the mob roared even louder , “ Crucify him ! ”
40027024	Pilate saw that he wasn’t getting anywhere and that a riot was developing . So he sent for a bowl of water and washed his hands before the crowd , saying , “ I am innocent of this man’s blood . The responsibility is yours ! ”
40027025	And all the people yelled back , “ We will take responsibility for his deathwe and our children ! ”

40027028	They stripped him and put a scarlet robe on him .

40027030	And they spit on him and grabbed the stick and struck him on the head with it .

41003034	Then he looked at those around him and said , “ Look , these are my mother and brothers .
41003035	Anyone who does God’s will is my brother and sister and mother . ”
41004001	Once again Jesus began teaching by the lakeshore . A very large crowd soon gathered around him , so he got into a boat . Then he sat in the boat while all the people remained on the shore .
41004002	He taught them by telling many stories in the form of parables , such as this one :
41004003	“ Listen ! A farmer went out to plant some seed .
41004004	As he scattered it across his field , some of the seed fell on a footpath , and the birds came and ate it .
41004005	Other seed fell on shallow soil with underlying rock . The seed sprouted quickly because the soil was shallow .
41004006	But the plant soon wilted under the hot sun , and since it didn’t have deep roots , it died .
41004007	Other seed fell among thorns that grew up and choked out the tender plants so they produced no grain .
41004008	Still other seeds fell on fertile soil , and they sprouted , grew , and produced a crop that was thirty , sixty , and even a hundred times as much as had been planted ! ”
41004009	Then he said , “ Anyone with ears to hear should listen and understand . ”
41004010	Later , when Jesus was alone with the twelve disciples and with the others who were gathered around , they asked him what the parables meant .
41004011	He replied , “ You are permitted to understand the secret of the Kingdom of God . But I use parables for everything I say to outsiders ,
41004012	so that the Scriptures might be fulfilled : ‘ When they see what I do , they will learn nothing . When they hear what I say , they will not understand . Otherwise , they will turn to me and be forgiven . ’ ”
41004013	Then Jesus said to them , “ If you can’t understand the meaning of this parable , how will you understand all the other parables ?
41004014	The farmer plants seed by taking God’s word to others .
41004015	The seed that fell on the footpath represents those who hear the message , only to have Satan come at once and take it away .
41004016	The seed on the rocky soil represents those who hear the message and immediately receive it with joy .
41004017	But since they don’t have deep roots , they don’t last long . They fall away as soon as they have problems or are persecuted for believing God’s word .
41004018	The seed that fell among the thorns represents others who hear God’s word ,
41004019	but all too quickly the message is crowded out by the worries of this life , the lure of wealth , and the desire for other things , so no fruit is produced .
41004020	And the seed that fell on good soil represents those who hear and accept God’s word and produce a harvest of thirty , sixty , or even a hundred times as much as had been planted ! ”
41004021	Then Jesus asked them , “ Would anyone light a lamp and then put it under a basket or under a bed ? Of course not ! A lamp is placed on a stand , where its light will shine .
41004022	For everything that is hidden will eventually be brought into the open , and every secret will be brought to light .
41004023	Anyone with ears to hear should listen and understand . ”
41004024	Then he added , “ Pay close attention to what you hear . The closer you listen , the more understanding you will be given and you will receive even more .
41004025	To those who listen to my teaching , more understanding will be given . But for those who are not listening , even what little understanding they have will be taken away from them . ”
41004026	Jesus also said , “ The Kingdom of God is like a farmer who scatters seed on the ground .
41004027	Night and day , while he’s asleep or awake , the seed sprouts and grows , but he does not understand how it happens .
41004028	The earth produces the crops on its own . First a leaf blade pushes through , then the heads of wheat are formed , and finally the grain ripens .
41004029	And as soon as the grain is ready , the farmer comes and harvests it with a sickle , for the harvest time has come . ”
41004030	Jesus said , “ How can I describe the Kingdom of God ? What story should I use to illustrate it ?
41004031	It is like a mustard seed planted in the ground . It is the smallest of all seeds ,
41004032	but it becomes the largest of all garden plants ; it grows long branches , and birds can make nests in its shade . ”
41004033	Jesus used many similar stories and illustrations to teach the people as much as they could understand .
41004034	In fact , in his public ministry he never taught without using parables ; but afterward , when he was alone with his disciples , he explained everything to them .
41004035	As evening came , Jesus said to his disciples , “ Let’s cross to the other side of the lake . ”
41004036	So they took Jesus in the boat and started out , leaving the crowds behind ( although other boats followed ) .
41004037	But soon a fierce storm came up . High waves were breaking into the boat , and it began to fill with water .
41004038	Jesus was sleeping at the back of the boat with his head on a cushion . The disciples woke him up , shouting , “ Teacher , don’t you care that we’re going to drown ? ”
41004039	When Jesus woke up , he rebuked the wind and said to the waves , “ Silence ! Be still ! ” Suddenly the wind stopped , and there was a great calm .
41004040	Then he asked them , “ Why are you afraid ? Do you still have no faith ? ”
41004041	The disciples were absolutely terrified . “ Who is this man ? ” they asked each other . “ Even the wind and waves obey him ! ”
41005001	So they arrived at the other side of the lake , in the region of the Gerasenes .
41005002	When Jesus climbed out of the boat , a man possessed by an evil spirit came out from a cemetery to meet him .
41005003	This man lived among the burial caves and could no longer be restrained , even with a chain .
41005004	Whenever he was put into chains and shacklesas he often washe snapped the chains from his wrists and smashed the shackles . No one was strong enough to subdue him .
41005005	Day and night he wandered among the burial caves and in the hills , howling and cutting himself with sharp stones .
41005006	When Jesus was still some distance away , the man saw him , ran to meet him , and bowed low before him .
41005007	With a shriek , he screamed , “ Why are you interfering with me , Jesus , Son of the Most High God ? In the name of God , I beg you , don’t torture me ! ”
41005008	For Jesus had already said to the spirit , “ Come out of the man , you evil spirit . ”
41005009	Then Jesus demanded , “ What is your name ? ” And he replied , “ My name is Legion , because there are many of us inside this man . ”
41005010	Then the evil spirits begged him again and again not to send them to some distant place .
41005011	There happened to be a large herd of pigs feeding on the hillside nearby .
41005012	“ Send us into those pigs , ” the spirits begged . “ Let us enter them . ”
41005013	So Jesus gave them permission . The evil spirits came out of the man and entered the pigs , and the entire herd of about 2,000 pigs plunged down the steep hillside into the lake and drowned in the water .
41005014	The herdsmen fled to the nearby town and the surrounding countryside , spreading the news as they ran . People rushed out to see what had happened .
41005015	A crowd soon gathered around Jesus , and they saw the man who had been possessed by the legion of demons . He was sitting there fully clothed and perfectly sane , and they were all afraid .
41005016	Then those who had seen what happened told the others about the demon-possessed man and the pigs .
41005017	And the crowd began pleading with Jesus to go away and leave them alone .
41005018	As Jesus was getting into the boat , the man who had been demon possessed begged to go with him .
41005019	But Jesus said , “ No , go home to your family , and tell them everything the Lord has done for you and how merciful he has been . ”
41005020	So the man started off to visit the Ten Towns of that region and began to proclaim the great things Jesus had done for him ; and everyone was amazed at what he told them .
41005021	Jesus got into the boat again and went back to the other side of the lake , where a large crowd gathered around him on the shore .
41005022	Then a leader of the local synagogue , whose name was Jairus , arrived . When he saw Jesus , he fell at his feet ,
41005023	pleading fervently with him . “ My little daughter is dying , ” he said . “ Please come and lay your hands on her ; heal her so she can live . ”
41005024	Jesus went with him , and all the people followed , crowding around him .
41005025	A woman in the crowd had suffered for twelve years with constant bleeding .
41005026	She had suffered a great deal from many doctors , and over the years she had spent everything she had to pay them , but she had gotten no better . In fact , she had gotten worse .
41005027	She had heard about Jesus , so she came up behind him through the crowd and touched his robe .
41005028	For she thought to herself , “ If I can just touch his robe , I will be healed . ”
41005029	Immediately the bleeding stopped , and she could feel in her body that she had been healed of her terrible condition .
41005030	Jesus realized at once that healing power had gone out from him , so he turned around in the crowd and asked , “ Who touched my robe ? ”
41005031	His disciples said to him , “ Look at this crowd pressing around you . How can you ask , ‘ Who touched me ? ’ ”
41005032	But he kept on looking around to see who had done it .
41005033	Then the frightened woman , trembling at the realization of what had happened to her , came and fell to her knees in front of him and told him what she had done .
41005034	And he said to her , “ Daughter , your faith has made you well . Go in peace . Your suffering is over . ”
41005035	While he was still speaking to her , messengers arrived from the home of Jairus , the leader of the synagogue . They told him , “ Your daughter is dead . There’s no use troubling the Teacher now . ”
41005036	But Jesus overheard them and said to Jairus , “ Don’t be afraid . Just have faith . ”
41005037	Then Jesus stopped the crowd and wouldn’t let anyone go with him except Peter , James , and John ( the brother of James ) .
41005038	When they came to the home of the synagogue leader , Jesus saw much commotion and weeping and wailing .
41005039	He went inside and asked , “ Why all this commotion and weeping ? The child isn’t dead ; she’s only asleep . ”
41005040	The crowd laughed at him . But he made them all leave , and he took the girl’s father and mother and his three disciples into the room where the girl was lying .
41005041	Holding her hand , he said to her , “ Talitha koum , ” which means “ Little girl , get up ! ”
41005042	And the girl , who was twelve years old , immediately stood up and walked around ! They were overwhelmed and totally amazed .
41005043	Jesus gave them strict orders not to tell anyone what had happened , and then he told them to give her something to eat .
41006001	Jesus left that part of the country and returned with his disciples to Nazareth , his hometown .
41006002	The next Sabbath he began teaching in the synagogue , and many who heard him were amazed . They asked , “ Where did he get all this wisdom and the power to perform such miracles ? ”
41006003	Then they scoffed , “ He’s just a carpenter , the son of Mary and the brother of James , Joseph , Judas , and Simon . And his sisters live right here among us . ” They were deeply offended and refused to believe in him .
41006004	Then Jesus told them , “ A prophet is honored everywhere except in his own hometown and among his relatives and his own family . ”
41006005	And because of their unbelief , he couldn’t do any miracles among them except to place his hands on a few sick people and heal them .
41006006	And he was amazed at their unbelief . Then Jesus went from village to village , teaching the people .
41006007	And he called his twelve disciples together and began sending them out two by two , giving them authority to cast out evil spirits .
41006008	He told them to take nothing for their journey except a walking stickno food , no traveler’s bag , no money .
41006009	He allowed them to wear sandals but not to take a change of clothes .
41006010	“ Wherever you go , ” he said , “ stay in the same house until you leave town .
41006011	But if any place refuses to welcome you or listen to you , shake its dust from your feet as you leave to show that you have abandoned those people to their fate . ”
41006012	So the disciples went out , telling everyone they met to repent of their sins and turn to God .
41006013	And they cast out many demons and healed many sick people , anointing them with olive oil .
41006014	Herod Antipas , the king , soon heard about Jesus , because everyone was talking about him . Some were saying , “ This must be John the Baptist raised from the dead . That is why he can do such miracles . ”
41006015	Others said , “ He’s the prophet Elijah . ” Still others said , “ He’s a prophet like the other great prophets of the past . ”
41006016	When Herod heard about Jesus , he said , “ John , the man I beheaded , has come back from the dead . ”
41006017	For Herod had sent soldiers to arrest and imprison John as a favor to Herodias . She had been his brother Philip’s wife , but Herod had married her .
41006018	John had been telling Herod , “ It is against God’s law for you to marry your brother’s wife . ”
41006019	So Herodias bore a grudge against John and wanted to kill him . But without Herod’s approval she was powerless ,
41006020	for Herod respected John ; and knowing that he was a good and holy man , he protected him . Herod was greatly disturbed whenever he talked with John , but even so , he liked to listen to him .
41006021	Herodias’s chance finally came on Herod’s birthday . He gave a party for his high government officials , army officers , and the leading citizens of Galilee .
41006022	Then his daughter , also named Herodias , came in and performed a dance that greatly pleased Herod and his guests . “ Ask me for anything you like , ” the king said to the girl , “ and I will give it to you . ”
41006023	He even vowed , “ I will give you whatever you ask , up to half my kingdom ! ”
41006024	She went out and asked her mother , “ What should I ask for ? ” Her mother told her , “ Ask for the head of John the Baptist ! ”
41006025	So the girl hurried back to the king and told him , “ I want the head of John the Baptist , right now , on a tray ! ”
41006026	Then the king deeply regretted what he had said ; but because of the vows he had made in front of his guests , he couldn’t refuse her .
41006027	So he immediately sent an executioner to the prison to cut off John’s head and bring it to him . The soldier beheaded John in the prison ,
41006028	brought his head on a tray , and gave it to the girl , who took it to her mother .
41006029	When John’s disciples heard what had happened , they came to get his body and buried it in a tomb .
41006030	The apostles returned to Jesus from their ministry tour and told him all they had done and taught .
41006031	Then Jesus said , “ Let’s go off by ourselves to a quiet place and rest awhile . ” He said this because there were so many people coming and going that Jesus and his apostles didn’t even have time to eat .
41006032	So they left by boat for a quiet place , where they could be alone .
41006033	But many people recognized them and saw them leaving , and people from many towns ran ahead along the shore and got there ahead of them .
41006034	Jesus saw the huge crowd as he stepped from the boat , and he had compassion on them because they were like sheep without a shepherd . So he began teaching them many things .
41006035	Late in the afternoon his disciples came to him and said , “ This is a remote place , and it’s already getting late .
41006036	Send the crowds away so they can go to the nearby farms and villages and buy something to eat . ”
41006037	But Jesus said , “ You feed them . ” “ With what ? ” they asked . “ We’d have to work for months to earn enough money to buy food for all these people ! ”
41006038	“ How much bread do you have ? ” he asked . “ Go and find out . ” They came back and reported , “ We have five loaves of bread and two fish . ”
41006039	Then Jesus told the disciples to have the people sit down in groups on the green grass .
41006040	So they sat down in groups of fifty or a hundred .
41006041	Jesus took the five loaves and two fish , looked up toward heaven , and blessed them . Then , breaking the loaves into pieces , he kept giving the bread to the disciples so they could distribute it to the people . He also divided the fish for everyone to share .
41006042	They all ate as much as they wanted ,
41006043	and afterward , the disciples picked up twelve baskets of leftover bread and fish .
41006044	A total of 5,000 men and their families were fed from those loaves !
41006045	Immediately after this , Jesus insisted that his disciples get back into the boat and head across the lake to Bethsaida , while he sent the people home .
41006046	After telling everyone good-bye , he went up into the hills by himself to pray .
41006047	Late that night , the disciples were in their boat in the middle of the lake , and Jesus was alone on land .
41006048	He saw that they were in serious trouble , rowing hard and struggling against the wind and waves . About three o’clock in the morning Jesus came toward them , walking on the water . He intended to go past them ,
41006049	but when they saw him walking on the water , they cried out in terror , thinking he was a ghost .
41006050	They were all terrified when they saw him . But Jesus spoke to them at once . “ Don’t be afraid , ” he said . “ Take courage ! I am here ! ”
41006051	Then he climbed into the boat , and the wind stopped . They were totally amazed ,
41006052	for they still didn’t understand the significance of the miracle of the loaves . Their hearts were too hard to take it in .
41006053	After they had crossed the lake , they landed at Gennesaret . They brought the boat to shore
41006054	and climbed out . The people recognized Jesus at once ,
41006055	and they ran throughout the whole area , carrying sick people on mats to wherever they heard he was .
41006056	Wherever he wentin villages , cities , or the countrysidethey brought the sick out to the marketplaces . They begged him to let the sick touch at least the fringe of his robe , and all who touched him were healed .
41007001	One day some Pharisees and teachers of religious law arrived from Jerusalem to see Jesus .
41007002	They noticed that some of his disciples failed to follow the Jewish ritual of hand washing before eating .
41007003	( The Jews , especially the Pharisees , do not eat until they have poured water over their cupped hands , as required by their ancient traditions .
41007004	Similarly , they don’t eat anything from the market until they immerse their hands in water . This is but one of many traditions they have clung tosuch as their ceremonial washing of cups , pitchers , and kettles . )
41007005	So the Pharisees and teachers of religious law asked him , “ Why don’t your disciples follow our age-old tradition ? They eat without first performing the hand-washing ceremony . ”
41007006	Jesus replied , “ You hypocrites ! Isaiah was right when he prophesied about you , for he wrote , ‘ These people honor me with their lips , but their hearts are far from me .
41007007	Their worship is a farce , for they teach man-made ideas as commands from God . ’
41007008	For you ignore God’s law and substitute your own tradition . ”
41007009	Then he said , “ You skillfully sidestep God’s law in order to hold on to your own tradition .
41007010	For instance , Moses gave you this law from God : ‘ Honor your father and mother , ’ and ‘ Anyone who speaks disrespectfully of father or mother must be put to death . ’
41007011	But you say it is all right for people to say to their parents , ‘ Sorry , I can’t help you . For I have vowed to give to God what I would have given to you . ’
41007012	In this way , you let them disregard their needy parents .
41007013	And so you cancel the word of God in order to hand down your own tradition . And this is only one example among many others . ”
41007014	Then Jesus called to the crowd to come and hear . “ All of you listen , ” he said , “ and try to understand .
41007015	It’s not what goes into your body that defiles you ; you are defiled by what comes from your heart . ”
41007017	Then Jesus went into a house to get away from the crowd , and his disciples asked him what he meant by the parable he had just used .
41007018	“ Don’t you understand either ? ” he asked . “ Can’t you see that the food you put into your body cannot defile you ?
41007019	Food doesn’t go into your heart , but only passes through the stomach and then goes into the sewer . ” ( By saying this , he declared that every kind of food is acceptable in God’s eyes . )
41007020	And then he added , “ It is what comes from inside that defiles you .
41007021	For from within , out of a person’s heart , come evil thoughts , sexual immorality , theft , murder ,
41007022	adultery , greed , wickedness , deceit , lustful desires , envy , slander , pride , and foolishness .
41007023	All these vile things come from within ; they are what defile you . ”
41007024	Then Jesus left Galilee and went north to the region of Tyre . He didn’t want anyone to know which house he was staying in , but he couldn’t keep it a secret .
41007025	Right away a woman who had heard about him came and fell at his feet . Her little girl was possessed by an evil spirit ,
41007026	and she begged him to cast out the demon from her daughter . Since she was a Gentile , born in Syrian Phoenicia ,
41007027	Jesus told her , “ First I should feed the childrenmy own family , the Jews . It isn’t right to take food from the children and throw it to the dogs . ”
41007028	She replied , “ That’s true , Lord , but even the dogs under the table are allowed to eat the scraps from the children’s plates . ”
41007029	“ Good answer ! ” he said . “ Now go home , for the demon has left your daughter . ”
41007030	And when she arrived home , she found her little girl lying quietly in bed , and the demon was gone .
41007031	Jesus left Tyre and went up to Sidon before going back to the Sea of Galilee and the region of the Ten Towns .
41007032	A deaf man with a speech impediment was brought to him , and the people begged Jesus to lay his hands on the man to heal him .
41007033	Jesus led him away from the crowd so they could be alone . He put his fingers into the man’s ears . Then , spitting on his own fingers , he touched the man’s tongue .
41007034	Looking up to heaven , he sighed and said , “ Ephphatha , ” which means , “ Be opened ! ”
41007035	Instantly the man could hear perfectly , and his tongue was freed so he could speak plainly !
41007036	Jesus told the crowd not to tell anyone , but the more he told them not to , the more they spread the news .
41007037	They were completely amazed and said again and again , “ Everything he does is wonderful . He even makes the deaf to hear and gives speech to those who cannot speak . ”
41008001	About this time another large crowd had gathered , and the people ran out of food again . Jesus called his disciples and told them ,
41008002	“ I feel sorry for these people . They have been here with me for three days , and they have nothing left to eat .
41008003	If I send them home hungry , they will faint along the way . For some of them have come a long distance . ”
41008004	His disciples replied , “ How are we supposed to find enough food to feed them out here in the wilderness ? ”
41008005	Jesus asked , “ How much bread do you have ? ” “ Seven loaves , ” they replied .
41008006	So Jesus told all the people to sit down on the ground . Then he took the seven loaves , thanked God for them , and broke them into pieces . He gave them to his disciples , who distributed the bread to the crowd .
41008007	A few small fish were found , too , so Jesus also blessed these and told the disciples to distribute them .
41008008	They ate as much as they wanted . Afterward , the disciples picked up seven large baskets of leftover food .
41008009	There were about 4,000 people in the crowd that day , and Jesus sent them home after they had eaten .
41008010	Immediately after this , he got into a boat with his disciples and crossed over to the region of Dalmanutha .
41008011	When the Pharisees heard that Jesus had arrived , they came and started to argue with him . Testing him , they demanded that he show them a miraculous sign from heaven to prove his authority .
41008012	When he heard this , he sighed deeply in his spirit and said , “ Why do these people keep demanding a miraculous sign ? I tell you the truth , I will not give this generation any such sign . ”
41008013	So he got back into the boat and left them , and he crossed to the other side of the lake .
41008014	But the disciples had forgotten to bring any food . They had only one loaf of bread with them in the boat .
41008015	As they were crossing the lake , Jesus warned them , “ Watch out ! Beware of the yeast of the Pharisees and of Herod . ”
41008016	At this they began to argue with each other because they hadn’t brought any bread .
41008017	Jesus knew what they were saying , so he said , “ Why are you arguing about having no bread ? Don’t you know or understand even yet ? Are your hearts too hard to take it in ?
41008018	‘ You have eyescan’t you see ? You have earscan’t you hear ? ’ Don’t you remember anything at all ?
41008019	When I fed the 5,000 with five loaves of bread , how many baskets of leftovers did you pick up afterward ? ” “ Twelve , ” they said .
41008020	“ And when I fed the 4,000 with seven loaves , how many large baskets of leftovers did you pick up ? ” “ Seven , ” they said .
41008021	“ Don’t you understand yet ? ” he asked them .
41008022	When they arrived at Bethsaida , some people brought a blind man to Jesus , and they begged him to touch the man and heal him .
41008023	Jesus took the blind man by the hand and led him out of the village . Then , spitting on the man’s eyes , he laid his hands on him and asked , “ Can you see anything now ? ”
41008024	The man looked around . “ Yes , ” he said , “ I see people , but I can’t see them very clearly . They look like trees walking around . ”
41008025	Then Jesus placed his hands on the man’s eyes again , and his eyes were opened . His sight was completely restored , and he could see everything clearly .
41008026	Jesus sent him away , saying , “ Don’t go back into the village on your way home . ”
41008027	Jesus and his disciples left Galilee and went up to the villages near Caesarea Philippi . As they were walking along , he asked them , “ Who do people say I am ? ”
41008028	“ Well , ” they replied , “ some say John the Baptist , some say Elijah , and others say you are one of the other prophets . ”
41008029	Then he asked them , “ But who do you say I am ? ” Peter replied , “ You are the Messiah . ”
41008030	But Jesus warned them not to tell anyone about him .
41008031	Then Jesus began to tell them that the Son of Man must suffer many terrible things and be rejected by the elders , the leading priests , and the teachers of religious law . He would be killed , but three days later he would rise from the dead .
41008032	As he talked about this openly with his disciples , Peter took him aside and began to reprimand him for saying such things .
41008033	Jesus turned around and looked at his disciples , then reprimanded Peter . “ Get away from me , Satan ! ” he said . “ You are seeing things merely from a human point of view , not from God’s . ”
41008034	Then , calling the crowd to join his disciples , he said , “ If any of you wants to be my follower , you must turn from your selfish ways , take up your cross , and follow me .
41008035	If you try to hang on to your life , you will lose it . But if you give up your life for my sake and for the sake of the Good News , you will save it .
41008036	And what do you benefit if you gain the whole world but lose your own soul ?
41008037	Is anything worth more than your soul ?
41008038	If anyone is ashamed of me and my message in these adulterous and sinful days , the Son of Man will be ashamed of that person when he returns in the glory of his Father with the holy angels . ”
41009001	Jesus went on to say , “ I tell you the truth , some standing here right now will not die before they see the Kingdom of God arrive in great power ! ”
41009002	Six days later Jesus took Peter , James , and John , and led them up a high mountain to be alone . As the men watched , Jesus’ appearance was transformed ,
41009003	and his clothes became dazzling white , far whiter than any earthly bleach could ever make them .
41009004	Then Elijah and Moses appeared and began talking with Jesus .
41009005	Peter exclaimed , “ Rabbi , it’s wonderful for us to be here ! Let’s make three shelters as memorials one for you , one for Moses , and one for Elijah . ”
41009006	He said this because he didn’t really know what else to say , for they were all terrified .
41009007	Then a cloud overshadowed them , and a voice from the cloud said , “ This is my dearly loved Son . Listen to him . ”
41009008	Suddenly , when they looked around , Moses and Elijah were gone , and they saw only Jesus with them .
41009009	As they went back down the mountain , he told them not to tell anyone what they had seen until the Son of Man had risen from the dead .
41009010	So they kept it to themselves , but they often asked each other what he meant by “ rising from the dead . ”
41009011	Then they asked him , “ Why do the teachers of religious law insist that Elijah must return before the Messiah comes ? ”
41009012	Jesus responded , “ Elijah is indeed coming first to get everything ready . Yet why do the Scriptures say that the Son of Man must suffer greatly and be treated with utter contempt ?
41009013	But I tell you , Elijah has already come , and they chose to abuse him , just as the Scriptures predicted . ”
41009014	When they returned to the other disciples , they saw a large crowd surrounding them , and some teachers of religious law were arguing with them .
41009015	When the crowd saw Jesus , they were overwhelmed with awe , and they ran to greet him .
41009016	“ What is all this arguing about ? ” Jesus asked .
41009017	One of the men in the crowd spoke up and said , “ Teacher , I brought my son so you could heal him . He is possessed by an evil spirit that won’t let him talk .
41009018	And whenever this spirit seizes him , it throws him violently to the ground . Then he foams at the mouth and grinds his teeth and becomes rigid . So I asked your disciples to cast out the evil spirit , but they couldn’t do it . ”
41009019	Jesus said to them , “ You faithless people ! How long must I be with you ? How long must I put up with you ? Bring the boy to me . ”
41009020	So they brought the boy . But when the evil spirit saw Jesus , it threw the child into a violent convulsion , and he fell to the ground , writhing and foaming at the mouth .
41009021	“ How long has this been happening ? ” Jesus asked the boy’s father . He replied , “ Since he was a little boy .
41009022	The spirit often throws him into the fire or into water , trying to kill him . Have mercy on us and help us , if you can . ”
41009023	“ What do you mean , ‘ If I can ’ ? ” Jesus asked . “ Anything is possible if a person believes . ”
41009024	The father instantly cried out , “ I do believe , but help me overcome my unbelief ! ”
41009025	When Jesus saw that the crowd of onlookers was growing , he rebuked the evil spirit . “ Listen , you spirit that makes this boy unable to hear and speak , ” he said . “ I command you to come out of this child and never enter him again ! ”
41009026	Then the spirit screamed and threw the boy into another violent convulsion and left him . The boy appeared to be dead . A murmur ran through the crowd as people said , “ He’s dead . ”
41009027	But Jesus took him by the hand and helped him to his feet , and he stood up .
41009028	Afterward , when Jesus was alone in the house with his disciples , they asked him , “ Why couldn’t we cast out that evil spirit ? ”
41009029	Jesus replied , “ This kind can be cast out only by prayer . ”
41009030	Leaving that region , they traveled through Galilee . Jesus didn’t want anyone to know he was there ,
41009031	for he wanted to spend more time with his disciples and teach them . He said to them , “ The Son of Man is going to be betrayed into the hands of his enemies . He will be killed , but three days later he will rise from the dead . ”
41009032	They didn’t understand what he was saying , however , and they were afraid to ask him what he meant .
41009033	After they arrived at Capernaum and settled in a house , Jesus asked his disciples , “ What were you discussing out on the road ? ”
41009034	But they didn’t answer , because they had been arguing about which of them was the greatest .
41009035	He sat down , called the twelve disciples over to him , and said , “ Whoever wants to be first must take last place and be the servant of everyone else . ”
41009036	Then he put a little child among them . Taking the child in his arms , he said to them ,
41009037	“ Anyone who welcomes a little child like this on my behalf welcomes me , and anyone who welcomes me welcomes not only me but also my Father who sent me . ”
41009038	John said to Jesus , “ Teacher , we saw someone using your name to cast out demons , but we told him to stop because he wasn’t in our group . ”
41009039	“ Don’t stop him ! ” Jesus said . “ No one who performs a miracle in my name will soon be able to speak evil of me .
41009040	Anyone who is not against us is for us .
41009041	If anyone gives you even a cup of water because you belong to the Messiah , I tell you the truth , that person will surely be rewarded .
41009042	“ But if you cause one of these little ones who trusts in me to fall into sin , it would be better for you to be thrown into the sea with a large millstone hung around your neck .
41009043	If your hand causes you to sin , cut it off . It’s better to enter eternal life with only one hand than to go into the unquenchable fires of hell with two hands .
41009045	If your foot causes you to sin , cut it off . It’s better to enter eternal life with only one foot than to be thrown into hell with two feet .
41009047	And if your eye causes you to sin , gouge it out . It’s better to enter the Kingdom of God with only one eye than to have two eyes and be thrown into hell ,
41009048	‘ where the maggots never die and the fire never goes out . ’
41009049	“ For everyone will be tested with fire .
41009050	Salt is good for seasoning . But if it loses its flavor , how do you make it salty again ? You must have the qualities of salt among yourselves and live in peace with each other . ”
41010001	Then Jesus left Capernaum and went down to the region of Judea and into the area east of the Jordan River . Once again crowds gathered around him , and as usual he was teaching them .
41010002	Some Pharisees came and tried to trap him with this question : “ Should a man be allowed to divorce his wife ? ”
41010003	Jesus answered them with a question : “ What did Moses say in the law about divorce ? ”
41010004	“ Well , he permitted it , ” they replied . “ He said a man can give his wife a written notice of divorce and send her away . ”
41010005	But Jesus responded , “ He wrote this commandment only as a concession to your hard hearts .
41010006	But ‘ God made them male and female ’ from the beginning of creation .
41010007	‘ This explains why a man leaves his father and mother and is joined to his wife ,
41010008	and the two are united into one . ’ Since they are no longer two but one ,
41010009	let no one split apart what God has joined together . ”
41010010	Later , when he was alone with his disciples in the house , they brought up the subject again .
41010011	He told them , “ Whoever divorces his wife and marries someone else commits adultery against her .
41010012	And if a woman divorces her husband and marries someone else , she commits adultery . ”
41010013	One day some parents brought their children to Jesus so he could touch and bless them . But the disciples scolded the parents for bothering him .
41010014	When Jesus saw what was happening , he was angry with his disciples . He said to them , “ Let the children come to me . Don’t stop them ! For the Kingdom of God belongs to those who are like these children .
41010015	I tell you the truth , anyone who doesn’t receive the Kingdom of God like a child will never enter it . ”
41010016	Then he took the children in his arms and placed his hands on their heads and blessed them .
41010017	As Jesus was starting out on his way to Jerusalem , a man came running up to him , knelt down , and asked , “ Good Teacher , what must I do to inherit eternal life ? ”
41010018	“ Why do you call me good ? ” Jesus asked . “ Only God is truly good .
41010019	But to answer your question , you know the commandments : ‘ You must not murder . You must not commit adultery . You must not steal . You must not testify falsely . You must not cheat anyone . Honor your father and mother . ’ ”
41010020	“ Teacher , ” the man replied , “ I’ve obeyed all these commandments since I was young . ”
41010021	Looking at the man , Jesus felt genuine love for him . “ There is still one thing you haven’t done , ” he told him . “ Go and sell all your possessions and give the money to the poor , and you will have treasure in heaven . Then come , follow me . ”
41010022	At this the man’s face fell , and he went away sad , for he had many possessions .
41010023	Jesus looked around and said to his disciples , “ How hard it is for the rich to enter the Kingdom of God ! ”
41010024	This amazed them . But Jesus said again , “ Dear children , it is very hard to enter the Kingdom of God .
41010025	In fact , it is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle than for a rich person to enter the Kingdom of God ! ”
41010026	The disciples were astounded . “ Then who in the world can be saved ? ” they asked .
41010027	Jesus looked at them intently and said , “ Humanly speaking , it is impossible . But not with God . Everything is possible with God . ”
41010028	Then Peter began to speak up . “ We’ve given up everything to follow you , ” he said .
41010029	“ Yes , ” Jesus replied , “ and I assure you that everyone who has given up house or brothers or sisters or mother or father or children or property , for my sake and for the Good News ,
41010030	will receive now in return a hundred times as many houses , brothers , sisters , mothers , children , and propertyalong with persecution . And in the world to come that person will have eternal life .
41010031	But many who are the greatest now will be least important then , and those who seem least important now will be the greatest then . ”
41010032	They were now on the way up to Jerusalem , and Jesus was walking ahead of them . The disciples were filled with awe , and the people following behind were overwhelmed with fear . Taking the twelve disciples aside , Jesus once more began to describe everything that was about to happen to him .
41010033	“ Listen , ” he said , “ we’re going up to Jerusalem , where the Son of Man will be betrayed to the leading priests and the teachers of religious law . They will sentence him to die and hand him over to the Romans .
41010034	They will mock him , spit on him , flog him with a whip , and kill him , but after three days he will rise again . ”
41010035	Then James and John , the sons of Zebedee , came over and spoke to him . “ Teacher , ” they said , “ we want you to do us a favor . ”
41010036	“ What is your request ? ” he asked .
41010037	They replied , “ When you sit on your glorious throne , we want to sit in places of honor next to you , one on your right and the other on your left . ”
41010038	But Jesus said to them , “ You don’t know what you are asking ! Are you able to drink from the bitter cup of suffering I am about to drink ? Are you able to be baptized with the baptism of suffering I must be baptized with ? ”
41010039	“ Oh yes , ” they replied , “ we are able ! ” Then Jesus told them , “ You will indeed drink from my bitter cup and be baptized with my baptism of suffering .
41010040	But I have no right to say who will sit on my right or my left . God has prepared those places for the ones he has chosen . ”
41010041	When the ten other disciples heard what James and John had asked , they were indignant .
41010042	So Jesus called them together and said , “ You know that the rulers in this world lord it over their people , and officials flaunt their authority over those under them .
41010043	But among you it will be different . Whoever wants to be a leader among you must be your servant ,
41010044	and whoever wants to be first among you must be the slave of everyone else .
41010045	For even the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve others and to give his life as a ransom for many . ”
41010046	Then they reached Jericho , and as Jesus and his disciples left town , a large crowd followed him . A blind beggar named Bartimaeus ( son of Timaeus ) was sitting beside the road .
41010047	When Bartimaeus heard that Jesus of Nazareth was nearby , he began to shout , “ Jesus , Son of David , have mercy on me ! ”
41010048	“ Be quiet ! ” many of the people yelled at him . But he only shouted louder , “ Son of David , have mercy on me ! ”
41010049	When Jesus heard him , he stopped and said , “ Tell him to come here . ” So they called the blind man . “ Cheer up , ” they said . “ Come on , he’s calling you ! ”
41010050	Bartimaeus threw aside his coat , jumped up , and came to Jesus .
41010051	“ What do you want me to do for you ? ” Jesus asked . “ My rabbi , ” the blind man said , “ I want to see ! ”
41010052	And Jesus said to him , “ Go , for your faith has healed you . ” Instantly the man could see , and he followed Jesus down the road .
41011001	As Jesus and his disciples approached Jerusalem , they came to the towns of Bethphage and Bethany on the Mount of Olives . Jesus sent two of them on ahead .
41011002	“ Go into that village over there , ” he told them . “ As soon as you enter it , you will see a young donkey tied there that no one has ever ridden . Untie it and bring it here .
41011003	If anyone asks , ‘ What are you doing ? ’ just say , ‘ The Lord needs it and will return it soon . ’ ”
41011004	The two disciples left and found the colt standing in the street , tied outside the front door .
41011005	As they were untying it , some bystanders demanded , “ What are you doing , untying that colt ? ”
41011006	They said what Jesus had told them to say , and they were permitted to take it .
41011007	Then they brought the colt to Jesus and threw their garments over it , and he sat on it .
41011008	Many in the crowd spread their garments on the road ahead of him , and others spread leafy branches they had cut in the fields .
41011009	Jesus was in the center of the procession , and the people all around him were shouting , “ Praise God ! Blessings on the one who comes in the name of the L ord !
41011010	Blessings on the coming Kingdom of our ancestor David ! Praise God in highest heaven ! ”
41011011	So Jesus came to Jerusalem and went into the Temple . After looking around carefully at everything , he left because it was late in the afternoon . Then he returned to Bethany with the twelve disciples .
41011012	The next morning as they were leaving Bethany , Jesus was hungry .
41011013	He noticed a fig tree in full leaf a little way off , so he went over to see if he could find any figs . But there were only leaves because it was too early in the season for fruit .
41011014	Then Jesus said to the tree , “ May no one ever eat your fruit again ! ” And the disciples heard him say it .
41011015	When they arrived back in Jerusalem , Jesus entered the Temple and began to drive out the people buying and selling animals for sacrifices . He knocked over the tables of the money changers and the chairs of those selling doves ,
41011016	and he stopped everyone from using the Temple as a marketplace .
41011017	He said to them , “ The Scriptures declare , ‘ My Temple will be called a house of prayer for all nations , ’ but you have turned it into a den of thieves . ”
41011018	When the leading priests and teachers of religious law heard what Jesus had done , they began planning how to kill him . But they were afraid of him because the people were so amazed at his teaching .
41011019	That evening Jesus and the disciples left the city .
41011020	The next morning as they passed by the fig tree he had cursed , the disciples noticed it had withered from the roots up .
41011021	Peter remembered what Jesus had said to the tree on the previous day and exclaimed , “ Look , Rabbi ! The fig tree you cursed has withered and died ! ”
41011022	Then Jesus said to the disciples , “ Have faith in God .
41011023	I tell you the truth , you can say to this mountain , ‘ May you be lifted up and thrown into the sea , ’ and it will happen . But you must really believe it will happen and have no doubt in your heart .
41011024	I tell you , you can pray for anything , and if you believe that you’ve received it , it will be yours .
41011025	But when you are praying , first forgive anyone you are holding a grudge against , so that your Father in heaven will forgive your sins , too . ”
41011027	Again they entered Jerusalem . As Jesus was walking through the Temple area , the leading priests , the teachers of religious law , and the elders came up to him .
41011028	They demanded , “ By what authority are you doing all these things ? Who gave you the right to do them ? ”
41011029	“ I’ll tell you by what authority I do these things if you answer one question , ” Jesus replied .
41011030	“ Did John’s authority to baptize come from heaven , or was it merely human ? Answer me ! ”
41011031	They talked it over among themselves . “ If we say it was from heaven , he will ask why we didn’t believe John .
41011032	But do we dare say it was merely human ? ” For they were afraid of what the people would do , because everyone believed that John was a prophet .
41011033	So they finally replied , “ We don’t know . ” And Jesus responded , “ Then I won’t tell you by what authority I do these things . ”
41012001	Then Jesus began teaching them with stories : “ A man planted a vineyard . He built a wall around it , dug a pit for pressing out the grape juice , and built a lookout tower . Then he leased the vineyard to tenant farmers and moved to another country .
41012002	At the time of the grape harvest , he sent one of his servants to collect his share of the crop .
41012003	But the farmers grabbed the servant , beat him up , and sent him back empty-handed .
41012004	The owner then sent another servant , but they insulted him and beat him over the head .
41012005	The next servant he sent was killed . Others he sent were either beaten or killed ,
41012006	until there was only one lefthis son whom he loved dearly . The owner finally sent him , thinking , ‘ Surely they will respect my son . ’
41012007	“ But the tenant farmers said to one another , ‘ Here comes the heir to this estate . Let’s kill him and get the estate for ourselves ! ’
41012008	So they grabbed him and murdered him and threw his body out of the vineyard .
41012009	“ What do you suppose the owner of the vineyard will do ? ” Jesus asked . “ I’ll tell youhe will come and kill those farmers and lease the vineyard to others .
41012010	Didn’t you ever read this in the Scriptures ? ‘ The stone that the builders rejected has now become the cornerstone .
41012011	This is the Lord’s doing , and it is wonderful to see . ’ ”
41012012	The religious leaders wanted to arrest Jesus because they realized he was telling the story against themthey were the wicked farmers . But they were afraid of the crowd , so they left him and went away .
41012013	Later the leaders sent some Pharisees and supporters of Herod to trap Jesus into saying something for which he could be arrested .
41012014	“ Teacher , ” they said , “ we know how honest you are . You are impartial and don’t play favorites . You teach the way of God truthfully . Now tell usis it right to pay taxes to Caesar or not ?
41012015	Should we pay them , or shouldn’t we ? ” Jesus saw through their hypocrisy and said , “ Why are you trying to trap me ? Show me a Roman coin , and I’ll tell you . ”
41012016	When they handed it to him , he asked , “ Whose picture and title are stamped on it ? ” “ Caesar’s , ” they replied .
41012017	“ Well , then , ” Jesus said , “ give to Caesar what belongs to Caesar , and give to God what belongs to God . ” His reply completely amazed them .
41012018	Then Jesus was approached by some Sadduceesreligious leaders who say there is no resurrection from the dead . They posed this question :
41012019	“ Teacher , Moses gave us a law that if a man dies , leaving a wife without children , his brother should marry the widow and have a child who will carry on the brother’s name .
41012020	Well , suppose there were seven brothers . The oldest one married and then died without children .
41012021	So the second brother married the widow , but he also died without children . Then the third brother married her .
41012022	This continued with all seven of them , and still there were no children . Last of all , the woman also died .
41012023	So tell us , whose wife will she be in the resurrection ? For all seven were married to her . ”
41012024	Jesus replied , “ Your mistake is that you don’t know the Scriptures , and you don’t know the power of God .
41012025	For when the dead rise , they will neither marry nor be given in marriage . In this respect they will be like the angels in heaven .
41012026	“ But now , as to whether the dead will be raisedhaven’t you ever read about this in the writings of Moses , in the story of the burning bush ? Long after Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob had died , God said to Moses , ‘ I am the God of Abraham , the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . ’
41012027	So he is the God of the living , not the dead . You have made a serious error . ”
41012028	One of the teachers of religious law was standing there listening to the debate . He realized that Jesus had answered well , so he asked , “ Of all the commandments , which is the most important ? ”
41012029	Jesus replied , “ The most important commandment is this : ‘ Listen , O Israel ! The L ord our God is the one and only L ord .
41012030	And you must love the L ord your God with all your heart , all your soul , all your mind , and all your strength . ’
41012031	The second is equally important : ‘ Love your neighbor as yourself . ’ No other commandment is greater than these . ”
41012032	The teacher of religious law replied , “ Well said , Teacher . You have spoken the truth by saying that there is only one God and no other .
41012033	And I know it is important to love him with all my heart and all my understanding and all my strength , and to love my neighbor as myself . This is more important than to offer all of the burnt offerings and sacrifices required in the law . ”
41012034	Realizing how much the man understood , Jesus said to him , “ You are not far from the Kingdom of God . ” And after that , no one dared to ask him any more questions .
41012035	Later , as Jesus was teaching the people in the Temple , he asked , “ Why do the teachers of religious law claim that the Messiah is the son of David ?
41012036	For David himself , speaking under the inspiration of the Holy Spirit , said , ‘ The L ord said to my Lord , Sit in the place of honor at my right hand until I humble your enemies beneath your feet . ’
