41012037	Since David himself called the Messiah ‘ my Lord , ’ how can the Messiah be his son ? ” The large crowd listened to him with great delight .
41012038	Jesus also taught : “ Beware of these teachers of religious law ! For they like to parade around in flowing robes and receive respectful greetings as they walk in the marketplaces .
41012039	And how they love the seats of honor in the synagogues and the head table at banquets .
41012040	Yet they shamelessly cheat widows out of their property and then pretend to be pious by making long prayers in public . Because of this , they will be more severely punished . ”
41012041	Jesus sat down near the collection box in the Temple and watched as the crowds dropped in their money . Many rich people put in large amounts .
41012042	Then a poor widow came and dropped in two small coins .
41012043	Jesus called his disciples to him and said , “ I tell you the truth , this poor widow has given more than all the others who are making contributions .
41012044	For they gave a tiny part of their surplus , but she , poor as she is , has given everything she had to live on . ”
41013001	As Jesus was leaving the Temple that day , one of his disciples said , “ Teacher , look at these magnificent buildings ! Look at the impressive stones in the walls . ”
41013002	Jesus replied , “ Yes , look at these great buildings . But they will be completely demolished . Not one stone will be left on top of another ! ”
41013003	Later , Jesus sat on the Mount of Olives across the valley from the Temple . Peter , James , John , and Andrew came to him privately and asked him ,
41013004	“ Tell us , when will all this happen ? What sign will show us that these things are about to be fulfilled ? ”
41013005	Jesus replied , “ Don’t let anyone mislead you ,
41013006	for many will come in my name , claiming , ‘ I am the Messiah . ’ They will deceive many .
41013007	And you will hear of wars and threats of wars , but don’t panic . Yes , these things must take place , but the end won’t follow immediately .
41013008	Nation will go to war against nation , and kingdom against kingdom . There will be earthquakes in many parts of the world , as well as famines . But this is only the first of the birth pains , with more to come .
41013009	“ When these things begin to happen , watch out ! You will be handed over to the local councils and beaten in the synagogues . You will stand trial before governors and kings because you are my followers . But this will be your opportunity to tell them about me .
41013010	For the Good News must first be preached to all nations .
41013011	But when you are arrested and stand trial , don’t worry in advance about what to say . Just say what God tells you at that time , for it is not you who will be speaking , but the Holy Spirit .
41013012	“ A brother will betray his brother to death , a father will betray his own child , and children will rebel against their parents and cause them to be killed .
41013013	And everyone will hate you because you are my followers . But the one who endures to the end will be saved .
41013014	“ The day is coming when you will see the sacrilegious object that causes desecration standing where he should not be . ” ( Reader , pay attention ! ) “ Then those in Judea must flee to the hills .
41013015	A person out on the deck of a roof must not go down into the house to pack .
41013016	A person out in the field must not return even to get a coat .
41013017	How terrible it will be for pregnant women and for nursing mothers in those days .
41013018	And pray that your flight will not be in winter .
41013019	For there will be greater anguish in those days than at any time since God created the world . And it will never be so great again .
41013020	In fact , unless the Lord shortens that time of calamity , not a single person will survive . But for the sake of his chosen ones he has shortened those days .
41013021	“ Then if anyone tells you , ‘ Look , here is the Messiah , ’ or ‘ There he is , ’ don’t believe it .
41013022	For false messiahs and false prophets will rise up and perform signs and wonders so as to deceive , if possible , even God’s chosen ones .
41013023	Watch out ! I have warned you about this ahead of time !
41013024	“ At that time , after the anguish of those days , the sun will be darkened , the moon will give no light ,
41013025	the stars will fall from the sky , and the powers in the heavens will be shaken .
41013026	Then everyone will see the Son of Man coming on the clouds with great power and glory .
41013027	And he will send out his angels to gather his chosen ones from all over the world from the farthest ends of the earth and heaven .
41013028	“ Now learn a lesson from the fig tree . When its branches bud and its leaves begin to sprout , you know that summer is near .
41013029	In the same way , when you see all these things taking place , you can know that his return is very near , right at the door .
41013030	I tell you the truth , this generation will not pass from the scene before all these things take place .
41013031	Heaven and earth will disappear , but my words will never disappear .
41013032	“ However , no one knows the day or hour when these things will happen , not even the angels in heaven or the Son himself . Only the Father knows .
41013033	And since you don’t know when that time will come , be on guard ! Stay alert !
41013034	“ The coming of the Son of Man can be illustrated by the story of a man going on a long trip . When he left home , he gave each of his slaves instructions about the work they were to do , and he told the gatekeeper to watch for his return .
41013035	You , too , must keep watch ! For you don’t know when the master of the household will returnin the evening , at midnight , before dawn , or at daybreak .
41013036	Don’t let him find you sleeping when he arrives without warning .
41013037	I say to you what I say to everyone : Watch for him ! ”
41014001	It was now two days before Passover and the Festival of Unleavened Bread . The leading priests and the teachers of religious law were still looking for an opportunity to capture Jesus secretly and kill him .
41014002	“ But not during the Passover celebration , ” they agreed , “ or the people may riot . ”
41014003	Meanwhile , Jesus was in Bethany at the home of Simon , a man who had previously had leprosy . While he was eating , a woman came in with a beautiful alabaster jar of expensive perfume made from essence of nard . She broke open the jar and poured the perfume over his head .
41014004	Some of those at the table were indignant . “ Why waste such expensive perfume ? ” they asked .
41014005	“ It could have been sold for a year’s wages and the money given to the poor ! ” So they scolded her harshly .
41014006	But Jesus replied , “ Leave her alone . Why criticize her for doing such a good thing to me ?
41014007	You will always have the poor among you , and you can help them whenever you want to . But you will not always have me .
41014008	She has done what she could and has anointed my body for burial ahead of time .
41014009	I tell you the truth , wherever the Good News is preached throughout the world , this woman’s deed will be remembered and discussed . ”
41014010	Then Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve disciples , went to the leading priests to arrange to betray Jesus to them .
41014011	They were delighted when they heard why he had come , and they promised to give him money . So he began looking for an opportunity to betray Jesus .
41014012	On the first day of the Festival of Unleavened Bread , when the Passover lamb is sacrificed , Jesus’ disciples asked him , “ Where do you want us to go to prepare the Passover meal for you ? ”
41014013	So Jesus sent two of them into Jerusalem with these instructions : “ As you go into the city , a man carrying a pitcher of water will meet you . Follow him .
41014014	At the house he enters , say to the owner , ‘ The Teacher asks : Where is the guest room where I can eat the Passover meal with my disciples ? ’
41014015	He will take you upstairs to a large room that is already set up . That is where you should prepare our meal . ”
41014016	So the two disciples went into the city and found everything just as Jesus had said , and they prepared the Passover meal there .
41014017	In the evening Jesus arrived with the twelve disciples .
41014018	As they were at the table eating , Jesus said , “ I tell you the truth , one of you eating with me here will betray me . ”
41014019	Greatly distressed , each one asked in turn , “ Am I the one ? ”
41014020	He replied , “ It is one of you twelve who is eating from this bowl with me .
41014021	For the Son of Man must die , as the Scriptures declared long ago . But how terrible it will be for the one who betrays him . It would be far better for that man if he had never been born ! ”
41014022	As they were eating , Jesus took some bread and blessed it . Then he broke it in pieces and gave it to the disciples , saying , “ Take it , for this is my body . ”
41014023	And he took a cup of wine and gave thanks to God for it . He gave it to them , and they all drank from it .
41014024	And he said to them , “ This is my blood , which confirms the covenant between God and his people . It is poured out as a sacrifice for many .
41014025	I tell you the truth , I will not drink wine again until the day I drink it new in the Kingdom of God . ”
41014026	Then they sang a hymn and went out to the Mount of Olives .
41014027	On the way , Jesus told them , “ All of you will desert me . For the Scriptures say , ‘ God will strike the Shepherd , and the sheep will be scattered . ’
41014028	But after I am raised from the dead , I will go ahead of you to Galilee and meet you there . ”
41014029	Peter said to him , “ Even if everyone else deserts you , I never will . ”
41014030	Jesus replied , “ I tell you the truth , Peterthis very night , before the rooster crows twice , you will deny three times that you even know me . ”
41014031	“ No ! ” Peter declared emphatically . “ Even if I have to die with you , I will never deny you ! ” And all the others vowed the same .
41014032	They went to the olive grove called Gethsemane , and Jesus said , “ Sit here while I go and pray . ”
41014033	He took Peter , James , and John with him , and he became deeply troubled and distressed .
41014034	He told them , “ My soul is crushed with grief to the point of death . Stay here and keep watch with me . ”
41014035	He went on a little farther and fell to the ground . He prayed that , if it were possible , the awful hour awaiting him might pass him by .
41014036	“ Abba , Father , ” he cried out , “ everything is possible for you . Please take this cup of suffering away from me . Yet I want your will to be done , not mine . ”
41014037	Then he returned and found the disciples asleep . He said to Peter , “ Simon , are you asleep ? Couldn’t you watch with me even one hour ?
41014038	Keep watch and pray , so that you will not give in to temptation . For the spirit is willing , but the body is weak . ”
41014039	Then Jesus left them again and prayed the same prayer as before .
41014040	When he returned to them again , he found them sleeping , for they couldn’t keep their eyes open . And they didn’t know what to say .
41014041	When he returned to them the third time , he said , “ Go ahead and sleep . Have your rest . But nothe time has come . The Son of Man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
41014042	Up , let’s be going . Look , my betrayer is here ! ”
41014043	And immediately , even as Jesus said this , Judas , one of the twelve disciples , arrived with a crowd of men armed with swords and clubs . They had been sent by the leading priests , the teachers of religious law , and the elders .
41014044	The traitor , Judas , had given them a prearranged signal : “ You will know which one to arrest when I greet him with a kiss . Then you can take him away under guard . ”
41014045	As soon as they arrived , Judas walked up to Jesus . “ Rabbi ! ” he exclaimed , and gave him the kiss .
41014046	Then the others grabbed Jesus and arrested him .
41014047	But one of the men with Jesus pulled out his sword and struck the high priest’s slave , slashing off his ear .
41014048	Jesus asked them , “ Am I some dangerous revolutionary , that you come with swords and clubs to arrest me ?
41014049	Why didn’t you arrest me in the Temple ? I was there among you teaching every day . But these things are happening to fulfill what the Scriptures say about me . ”
41014050	Then all his disciples deserted him and ran away .
41014051	One young man following behind was clothed only in a long linen shirt . When the mob tried to grab him ,
41014052	he slipped out of his shirt and ran away naked .
41014053	They took Jesus to the high priest’s home where the leading priests , the elders , and the teachers of religious law had gathered .
41014054	Meanwhile , Peter followed him at a distance and went right into the high priest’s courtyard . There he sat with the guards , warming himself by the fire .
41014055	Inside , the leading priests and the entire high council were trying to find evidence against Jesus , so they could put him to death . But they couldn’t find any .
41014056	Many false witnesses spoke against him , but they contradicted each other .
41014057	Finally , some men stood up and gave this false testimony :
41014058	“ We heard him say , ‘ I will destroy this Temple made with human hands , and in three days I will build another , made without human hands . ’ ”
41014059	But even then they didn’t get their stories straight !
41014060	Then the high priest stood up before the others and asked Jesus , “ Well , aren’t you going to answer these charges ? What do you have to say for yourself ? ”
41014061	But Jesus was silent and made no reply . Then the high priest asked him , “ Are you the Messiah , the Son of the Blessed One ? ”
41014062	Jesus said , “ I A m . And you will see the Son of Man seated in the place of power at God’s right hand and coming on the clouds of heaven . ”
41014063	Then the high priest tore his clothing to show his horror and said , “ Why do we need other witnesses ?
41014064	You have all heard his blasphemy . What is your verdict ? ” “ Guilty ! ” they all cried . “ He deserves to die ! ”
41014065	Then some of them began to spit at him , and they blindfolded him and beat him with their fists . “ Prophesy to us , ” they jeered . And the guards slapped him as they took him away .
41014066	Meanwhile , Peter was in the courtyard below . One of the servant girls who worked for the high priest came by
41014067	and noticed Peter warming himself at the fire . She looked at him closely and said , “ You were one of those with Jesus of Nazareth . ”
41014068	But Peter denied it . “ I don’t know what you’re talking about , ” he said , and he went out into the entryway . Just then , a rooster crowed .
41014069	When the servant girl saw him standing there , she began telling the others , “ This man is definitely one of them ! ”
41014070	But Peter denied it again . A little later some of the other bystanders confronted Peter and said , “ You must be one of them , because you are a Galilean . ”
41014071	Peter swore , “ A curse on me if I’m lyingI don’t know this man you’re talking about ! ”
41014072	And immediately the rooster crowed the second time . Suddenly , Jesus’ words flashed through Peter’s mind : “ Before the rooster crows twice , you will deny three times that you even know me . ” And he broke down and wept .
41015001	Very early in the morning the leading priests , the elders , and the teachers of religious lawthe entire high council met to discuss their next step . They bound Jesus , led him away , and took him to Pilate , the Roman governor .
41015002	Pilate asked Jesus , “ Are you the king of the Jews ? ” Jesus replied , “ You have said it . ”
41015003	Then the leading priests kept accusing him of many crimes ,
41015004	and Pilate asked him , “ Aren’t you going to answer them ? What about all these charges they are bringing against you ? ”
41015005	But Jesus said nothing , much to Pilate’s surprise .
41015006	Now it was the governor’s custom each year during the Passover celebration to release one prisoneranyone the people requested .
41015007	One of the prisoners at that time was Barabbas , a revolutionary who had committed murder in an uprising .
41015008	The crowd went to Pilate and asked him to release a prisoner as usual .
41015009	“ Would you like me to release to you this ‘ King of the Jews’ ? ” Pilate asked .
41015010	( For he realized by now that the leading priests had arrested Jesus out of envy . )
41015011	But at this point the leading priests stirred up the crowd to demand the release of Barabbas instead of Jesus .
41015012	Pilate asked them , “ Then what should I do with this man you call the king of the Jews ? ”
41015013	They shouted back , “ Crucify him ! ”
41015014	“ Why ? ” Pilate demanded . “ What crime has he committed ? ” But the mob roared even louder , “ Crucify him ! ”
41015015	So to pacify the crowd , Pilate released Barabbas to them . He ordered Jesus flogged with a lead-tipped whip , then turned him over to the Roman soldiers to be crucified .
41015016	The soldiers took Jesus into the courtyard of the governor’s headquarters ( called the Praetorium ) and called out the entire regiment .
41015017	They dressed him in a purple robe , and they wove thorn branches into a crown and put it on his head .
41015018	Then they saluted him and taunted , “ Hail ! King of the Jews ! ”
41015019	And they struck him on the head with a reed stick , spit on him , and dropped to their knees in mock worship .
41015020	When they were finally tired of mocking him , they took off the purple robe and put his own clothes on him again . Then they led him away to be crucified .
41015021	A passerby named Simon , who was from Cyrene , was coming in from the countryside just then , and the soldiers forced him to carry Jesus’ cross . ( Simon was the father of Alexander and Rufus . )
41015022	And they brought Jesus to a place called Golgotha ( which means “ Place of the Skull ” ) .
41015023	They offered him wine drugged with myrrh , but he refused it .
41015024	Then the soldiers nailed him to the cross . They divided his clothes and threw dice to decide who would get each piece .
41015025	It was nine o’clock in the morning when they crucified him .
41015026	A sign announced the charge against him . It read , “ The King of the Jews . ”
41015027	Two revolutionaries were crucified with him , one on his right and one on his left .
41015029	The people passing by shouted abuse , shaking their heads in mockery . “ Ha ! Look at you now ! ” they yelled at him . “ You said you were going to destroy the Temple and rebuild it in three days .
41015030	Well then , save yourself and come down from the cross ! ”
41015031	The leading priests and teachers of religious law also mocked Jesus . “ He saved others , ” they scoffed , “ but he can’t save himself !
41015032	Let this Messiah , this King of Israel , come down from the cross so we can see it and believe him ! ” Even the men who were crucified with Jesus ridiculed him .
41015033	At noon , darkness fell across the whole land until three o’clock .
41015034	Then at three o’clock Jesus called out with a loud voice , “ Eloi , Eloi , lema sabachthani ? ” which means “ My God , my God , why have you abandoned me ? ”
41015035	Some of the bystanders misunderstood and thought he was calling for the prophet Elijah .
41015036	One of them ran and filled a sponge with sour wine , holding it up to him on a reed stick so he could drink . “ Wait ! ” he said . “ Let’s see whether Elijah comes to take him down ! ”
41015037	Then Jesus uttered another loud cry and breathed his last .
41015038	And the curtain in the sanctuary of the Temple was torn in two , from top to bottom .
41015039	When the Roman officer who stood facing him saw how he had died , he exclaimed , “ This man truly was the Son of God ! ”
41015040	Some women were there , watching from a distance , including Mary Magdalene , Mary ( the mother of James the younger and of Joseph ) , and Salome .
41015041	They had been followers of Jesus and had cared for him while he was in Galilee . Many other women who had come with him to Jerusalem were also there .
41015042	This all happened on Friday , the day of preparation , the day before the Sabbath . As evening approached ,
41015043	Joseph of Arimathea took a risk and went to Pilate and asked for Jesus’ body . ( Joseph was an honored member of the high council , and he was waiting for the Kingdom of God to come . )
41015044	Pilate couldn’t believe that Jesus was already dead , so he called for the Roman officer and asked if he had died yet .
41015045	The officer confirmed that Jesus was dead , so Pilate told Joseph he could have the body .
41015046	Joseph bought a long sheet of linen cloth . Then he took Jesus’ body down from the cross , wrapped it in the cloth , and laid it in a tomb that had been carved out of the rock . Then he rolled a stone in front of the entrance .
41015047	Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joseph saw where Jesus’ body was laid .
41016001	Saturday evening , when the Sabbath ended , Mary Magdalene , Mary the mother of James , and Salome went out and purchased burial spices so they could anoint Jesus’ body .
41016002	Very early on Sunday morning , just at sunrise , they went to the tomb .
41016003	On the way they were asking each other , “ Who will roll away the stone for us from the entrance to the tomb ? ”
41016004	But as they arrived , they looked up and saw that the stone , which was very large , had already been rolled aside .
41016005	When they entered the tomb , they saw a young man clothed in a white robe sitting on the right side . The women were shocked ,
41016006	but the angel said , “ Don’t be alarmed . You are looking for Jesus of Nazareth , who was crucified . He isn’t here ! He is risen from the dead ! Look , this is where they laid his body .
41016007	Now go and tell his disciples , including Peter , that Jesus is going ahead of you to Galilee . You will see him there , just as he told you before he died . ”
41016008	The women fled from the tomb , trembling and bewildered , and they said nothing to anyone because they were too frightened . [ Shorter Ending of Mark ] Then they briefly reported all this to Peter and his companions . Afterward Jesus himself sent them out from east to west with the sacred and unfailing message of salvation that gives eternal life . Amen . [ Longer Ending of Mark ]
41016009	After Jesus rose from the dead early on Sunday morning , the first person who saw him was Mary Magdalene , the woman from whom he had cast out seven demons .
41016010	She went to the disciples , who were grieving and weeping , and told them what had happened .
41016011	But when she told them that Jesus was alive and she had seen him , they didn’t believe her .
41016012	Afterward he appeared in a different form to two of his followers who were walking from Jerusalem into the country .
41016013	They rushed back to tell the others , but no one believed them .
41016014	Still later he appeared to the eleven disciples as they were eating together . He rebuked them for their stubborn unbelief because they refused to believe those who had seen him after he had been raised from the dead .
41016015	And then he told them , “ Go into all the world and preach the Good News to everyone .
41016016	Anyone who believes and is baptized will be saved . But anyone who refuses to believe will be condemned .
41016017	These miraculous signs will accompany those who believe : They will cast out demons in my name , and they will speak in new languages .
41016018	They will be able to handle snakes with safety , and if they drink anything poisonous , it won’t hurt them . They will be able to place their hands on the sick , and they will be healed . ”
41016019	When the Lord Jesus had finished talking with them , he was taken up into heaven and sat down in the place of honor at God’s right hand .
41016020	And the disciples went everywhere and preached , and the Lord worked through them , confirming what they said by many miraculous signs .
42001001	Many people have set out to write accounts about the events that have been fulfilled among us .
42001002	They used the eyewitness reports circulating among us from the early disciples .
42001003	Having carefully investigated everything from the beginning , I also have decided to write a careful account for you , most honorable Theophilus ,
42001004	so you can be certain of the truth of everything you were taught .
42001005	When Herod was king of Judea , there was a Jewish priest named Zechariah . He was a member of the priestly order of Abijah , and his wife , Elizabeth , was also from the priestly line of Aaron .
42001006	Zechariah and Elizabeth were righteous in God’s eyes , careful to obey all of the Lord’s commandments and regulations .
42001007	They had no children because Elizabeth was unable to conceive , and they were both very old .
42001008	One day Zechariah was serving God in the Temple , for his order was on duty that week .
42001009	As was the custom of the priests , he was chosen by lot to enter the sanctuary of the Lord and burn incense .
42001010	While the incense was being burned , a great crowd stood outside , praying .
42001011	While Zechariah was in the sanctuary , an angel of the Lord appeared to him , standing to the right of the incense altar .
42001012	Zechariah was shaken and overwhelmed with fear when he saw him .
42001013	But the angel said , “ Don’t be afraid , Zechariah ! God has heard your prayer . Your wife , Elizabeth , will give you a son , and you are to name him John .
42001014	You will have great joy and gladness , and many will rejoice at his birth ,
42001015	for he will be great in the eyes of the Lord . He must never touch wine or other alcoholic drinks . He will be filled with the Holy Spirit , even before his birth .
42001016	And he will turn many Israelites to the Lord their God .
42001017	He will be a man with the spirit and power of Elijah . He will prepare the people for the coming of the Lord . He will turn the hearts of the fathers to their children , and he will cause those who are rebellious to accept the wisdom of the godly . ”
42001018	Zechariah said to the angel , “ How can I be sure this will happen ? I’m an old man now , and my wife is also well along in years . ”
42001019	Then the angel said , “ I am Gabriel ! I stand in the very presence of God . It was he who sent me to bring you this good news !
42001020	But now , since you didn’t believe what I said , you will be silent and unable to speak until the child is born . For my words will certainly be fulfilled at the proper time . ”
42001021	Meanwhile , the people were waiting for Zechariah to come out of the sanctuary , wondering why he was taking so long .
42001022	When he finally did come out , he couldn’t speak to them . Then they realized from his gestures and his silence that he must have seen a vision in the sanctuary .
42001023	When Zechariah’s week of service in the Temple was over , he returned home .
42001024	Soon afterward his wife , Elizabeth , became pregnant and went into seclusion for five months .
42001025	“ How kind the Lord is ! ” she exclaimed . “ He has taken away my disgrace of having no children . ”
42001026	In the sixth month of Elizabeth’s pregnancy , God sent the angel Gabriel to Nazareth , a village in Galilee ,
42001027	to a virgin named Mary . She was engaged to be married to a man named Joseph , a descendant of King David .
42001028	Gabriel appeared to her and said , “ Greetings , favored woman ! The Lord is with you ! ”
42001029	Confused and disturbed , Mary tried to think what the angel could mean .
42001030	“ Don’t be afraid , Mary , ” the angel told her , “ for you have found favor with God !
42001031	You will conceive and give birth to a son , and you will name him Jesus .
42001032	He will be very great and will be called the Son of the Most High . The Lord God will give him the throne of his ancestor David .
42001033	And he will reign over Israel forever ; his Kingdom will never end ! ”
42001034	Mary asked the angel , “ But how can this happen ? I am a virgin . ”
42001035	The angel replied , “ The Holy Spirit will come upon you , and the power of the Most High will overshadow you . So the baby to be born will be holy , and he will be called the Son of God .
42001036	What’s more , your relative Elizabeth has become pregnant in her old age ! People used to say she was barren , but she has conceived a son and is now in her sixth month .
42001037	For nothing is impossible with God . ”
42001038	Mary responded , “ I am the Lord’s servant . May everything you have said about me come true . ” And then the angel left her .
42001039	A few days later Mary hurried to the hill country of Judea , to the town
42001040	where Zechariah lived . She entered the house and greeted Elizabeth .
42001041	At the sound of Mary’s greeting , Elizabeth’s child leaped within her , and Elizabeth was filled with the Holy Spirit .
42001042	Elizabeth gave a glad cry and exclaimed to Mary , “ God has blessed you above all women , and your child is blessed .
42001043	Why am I so honored , that the mother of my Lord should visit me ?
42001044	When I heard your greeting , the baby in my womb jumped for joy .
42001045	You are blessed because you believed that the Lord would do what he said . ”
42001046	Mary responded , “ Oh , how my soul praises the Lord .
42001047	How my spirit rejoices in God my Savior !
42001048	For he took notice of his lowly servant girl , and from now on all generations will call me blessed .
42001049	For the Mighty One is holy , and he has done great things for me .
42001050	He shows mercy from generation to generation to all who fear him .
42001051	His mighty arm has done tremendous things ! He has scattered the proud and haughty ones .
42001052	He has brought down princes from their thrones and exalted the humble .
42001053	He has filled the hungry with good things and sent the rich away with empty hands .
42001054	He has helped his servant Israel and remembered to be merciful .
42001055	For he made this promise to our ancestors , to Abraham and his children forever . ”
42001056	Mary stayed with Elizabeth about three months and then went back to her own home .
42001057	When it was time for Elizabeth’s baby to be born , she gave birth to a son .
42001058	And when her neighbors and relatives heard that the Lord had been very merciful to her , everyone rejoiced with her .
42001059	When the baby was eight days old , they all came for the circumcision ceremony . They wanted to name him Zechariah , after his father .
42001060	But Elizabeth said , “ No ! His name is John ! ”
42001061	“ What ? ” they exclaimed . “ There is no one in all your family by that name . ”
42001062	So they used gestures to ask the baby’s father what he wanted to name him .
42001063	He motioned for a writing tablet , and to everyone’s surprise he wrote , “ His name is John . ”
42001064	Instantly Zechariah could speak again , and he began praising God .
42001065	Awe fell upon the whole neighborhood , and the news of what had happened spread throughout the Judean hills .
42001066	Everyone who heard about it reflected on these events and asked , “ What will this child turn out to be ? ” For the hand of the Lord was surely upon him in a special way .
42001067	Then his father , Zechariah , was filled with the Holy Spirit and gave this prophecy :
42001068	“ Praise the Lord , the God of Israel , because he has visited and redeemed his people .
42001069	He has sent us a mighty Savior from the royal line of his servant David ,
42001070	just as he promised through his holy prophets long ago .
42001071	Now we will be saved from our enemies and from all who hate us .
42001072	He has been merciful to our ancestors by remembering his sacred covenant
42001073	the covenant he swore with an oath to our ancestor Abraham .
42001074	We have been rescued from our enemies so we can serve God without fear ,
42001075	in holiness and righteousness for as long as we live .
42001076	“ And you , my little son , will be called the prophet of the Most High , because you will prepare the way for the Lord .
42001077	You will tell his people how to find salvation through forgiveness of their sins .
42001078	Because of God’s tender mercy , the morning light from heaven is about to break upon us ,
42001079	to give light to those who sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , and to guide us to the path of peace . ”
42001080	John grew up and became strong in spirit . And he lived in the wilderness until he began his public ministry to Israel .
42002001	At that time the Roman emperor , Augustus , decreed that a census should be taken throughout the Roman Empire .
42002002	( This was the first census taken when Quirinius was governor of Syria . )
42002003	All returned to their own ancestral towns to register for this census .
42002004	And because Joseph was a descendant of King David , he had to go to Bethlehem in Judea , David’s ancient home . He traveled there from the village of Nazareth in Galilee .
42002005	He took with him Mary , his fiancée , who was now obviously pregnant .
42002006	And while they were there , the time came for her baby to be born .
42002007	She gave birth to her first child , a son . She wrapped him snugly in strips of cloth and laid him in a manger , because there was no lodging available for them .
42002008	That night there were shepherds staying in the fields nearby , guarding their flocks of sheep .
42002009	Suddenly , an angel of the Lord appeared among them , and the radiance of the Lord’s glory surrounded them . They were terrified ,
42002010	but the angel reassured them . “ Don’t be afraid ! ” he said . “ I bring you good news that will bring great joy to all people .
42002011	The Savioryes , the Messiah , the Lordhas been born today in Bethlehem , the city of David !
42002012	And you will recognize him by this sign : You will find a baby wrapped snugly in strips of cloth , lying in a manger . ”
42002013	Suddenly , the angel was joined by a vast host of othersthe armies of heavenpraising God and saying ,
42002014	“ Glory to God in highest heaven , and peace on earth to those with whom God is pleased . ”
42002015	When the angels had returned to heaven , the shepherds said to each other , “ Let’s go to Bethlehem ! Let’s see this thing that has happened , which the Lord has told us about . ”
42002016	They hurried to the village and found Mary and Joseph . And there was the baby , lying in the manger .
42002017	After seeing him , the shepherds told everyone what had happened and what the angel had said to them about this child .
42002018	All who heard the shepherds’ story were astonished ,
42002019	but Mary kept all these things in her heart and thought about them often .
42002020	The shepherds went back to their flocks , glorifying and praising God for all they had heard and seen . It was just as the angel had told them .
42002021	Eight days later , when the baby was circumcised , he was named Jesus , the name given him by the angel even before he was conceived .
42002022	Then it was time for their purification offering , as required by the law of Moses after the birth of a child ; so his parents took him to Jerusalem to present him to the Lord .
42002023	The law of the Lord says , “ If a woman’s first child is a boy , he must be dedicated to the L ord . ”
42002024	So they offered the sacrifice required in the law of the Lord “ either a pair of turtledoves or two young pigeons . ”
42002025	At that time there was a man in Jerusalem named Simeon . He was righteous and devout and was eagerly waiting for the Messiah to come and rescue Israel . The Holy Spirit was upon him
42002026	and had revealed to him that he would not die until he had seen the Lord’s Messiah .
42002027	That day the Spirit led him to the Temple . So when Mary and Joseph came to present the baby Jesus to the Lord as the law required ,
42002028	Simeon was there . He took the child in his arms and praised God , saying ,
42002029	“ Sovereign Lord , now let your servant die in peace , as you have promised .
42002030	I have seen your salvation ,
42002031	which you have prepared for all people .
42002032	He is a light to reveal God to the nations , and he is the glory of your people Israel ! ”
42002033	Jesus’ parents were amazed at what was being said about him .
42002034	Then Simeon blessed them , and he said to Mary , the baby’s mother , “ This child is destined to cause many in Israel to fall , but he will be a joy to many others . He has been sent as a sign from God , but many will oppose him .
42002035	As a result , the deepest thoughts of many hearts will be revealed . And a sword will pierce your very soul . ”
42002036	Anna , a prophet , was also there in the Temple . She was the daughter of Phanuel from the tribe of Asher , and she was very old . Her husband died when they had been married only seven years .
42002037	Then she lived as a widow to the age of eighty-four . She never left the Temple but stayed there day and night , worshiping God with fasting and prayer .
42002038	She came along just as Simeon was talking with Mary and Joseph , and she began praising God . She talked about the child to everyone who had been waiting expectantly for God to rescue Jerusalem .
42002039	When Jesus’ parents had fulfilled all the requirements of the law of the Lord , they returned home to Nazareth in Galilee .
42002040	There the child grew up healthy and strong . He was filled with wisdom , and God’s favor was on him .
42002041	Every year Jesus’ parents went to Jerusalem for the Passover festival .
42002042	When Jesus was twelve years old , they attended the festival as usual .
42002043	After the celebration was over , they started home to Nazareth , but Jesus stayed behind in Jerusalem . His parents didn’t miss him at first ,
42002044	because they assumed he was among the other travelers . But when he didn’t show up that evening , they started looking for him among their relatives and friends .
42002045	When they couldn’t find him , they went back to Jerusalem to search for him there .
42002046	Three days later they finally discovered him in the Temple , sitting among the religious teachers , listening to them and asking questions .
42002047	All who heard him were amazed at his understanding and his answers .
42002048	His parents didn’t know what to think . “ Son , ” his mother said to him , “ why have you done this to us ? Your father and I have been frantic , searching for you everywhere . ”
42002049	“ But why did you need to search ? ” he asked . “ Didn’t you know that I must be in my Father’s house ? ”
42002050	But they didn’t understand what he meant .
42002051	Then he returned to Nazareth with them and was obedient to them . And his mother stored all these things in her heart .
42002052	Jesus grew in wisdom and in stature and in favor with God and all the people .
42003001	It was now the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius , the Roman emperor . Pontius Pilate was governor over Judea ; Herod Antipas was ruler over Galilee ; his brother Philip was ruler over Iturea and Traconitis ; Lysanias was ruler over Abilene .
42003002	Annas and Caiaphas were the high priests . At this time a message from God came to John son of Zechariah , who was living in the wilderness .
42003003	Then John went from place to place on both sides of the Jordan River , preaching that people should be baptized to show that they had repented of their sins and turned to God to be forgiven .
42003004	Isaiah had spoken of John when he said , “ He is a voice shouting in the wilderness , ‘ Prepare the way for the Lord’s coming ! Clear the road for him !
42003005	The valleys will be filled , and the mountains and hills made level . The curves will be straightened , and the rough places made smooth .
42003006	And then all people will see the salvation sent from God . ’ ”
42003007	When the crowds came to John for baptism , he said , “ You brood of snakes ! Who warned you to flee God’s coming wrath ?
42003008	Prove by the way you live that you have repented of your sins and turned to God . Don’t just say to each other , ‘ We’re safe , for we are descendants of Abraham . ’ That means nothing , for I tell you , God can create children of Abraham from these very stones .
42003009	Even now the ax of God’s judgment is poised , ready to sever the roots of the trees . Yes , every tree that does not produce good fruit will be chopped down and thrown into the fire . ”
42003010	The crowds asked , “ What should we do ? ”
42003011	John replied , “ If you have two shirts , give one to the poor . If you have food , share it with those who are hungry . ”
42003012	Even corrupt tax collectors came to be baptized and asked , “ Teacher , what should we do ? ”
42003013	He replied , “ Collect no more taxes than the government requires . ”
42003014	“ What should we do ? ” asked some soldiers . John replied , “ Don’t extort money or make false accusations . And be content with your pay . ”
42003015	Everyone was expecting the Messiah to come soon , and they were eager to know whether John might be the Messiah .
42003016	John answered their questions by saying , “ I baptize you with water ; but someone is coming soon who is greater than I amso much greater that I’m not even worthy to be his slave and untie the straps of his sandals . He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and with fire .
42003017	He is ready to separate the chaff from the wheat with his winnowing fork . Then he will clean up the threshing area , gathering the wheat into his barn but burning the chaff with never-ending fire . ”
42003018	John used many such warnings as he announced the Good News to the people .
42003019	John also publicly criticized Herod Antipas , the ruler of Galilee , for marrying Herodias , his brother’s wife , and for many other wrongs he had done .
42003020	So Herod put John in prison , adding this sin to his many others .
42003021	One day when the crowds were being baptized , Jesus himself was baptized . As he was praying , the heavens opened ,
42003022	and the Holy Spirit , in bodily form , descended on him like a dove . And a voice from heaven said , “ You are my dearly loved Son , and you bring me great joy . ”
42003023	Jesus was about thirty years old when he began his public ministry . Jesus was known as the son of Joseph . Joseph was the son of Heli .
42003024	Heli was the son of Matthat . Matthat was the son of Levi . Levi was the son of Melki . Melki was the son of Jannai . Jannai was the son of Joseph .
42003025	Joseph was the son of Mattathias . Mattathias was the son of Amos . Amos was the son of Nahum . Nahum was the son of Esli . Esli was the son of Naggai .
42003026	Naggai was the son of Maath . Maath was the son of Mattathias . Mattathias was the son of Semein . Semein was the son of Josech . Josech was the son of Joda .
42003027	Joda was the son of Joanan . Joanan was the son of Rhesa . Rhesa was the son of Zerubbabel . Zerubbabel was the son of Shealtiel . Shealtiel was the son of Neri .
42003028	Neri was the son of Melki . Melki was the son of Addi . Addi was the son of Cosam . Cosam was the son of Elmadam . Elmadam was the son of Er .
42003029	Er was the son of Joshua . Joshua was the son of Eliezer . Eliezer was the son of Jorim . Jorim was the son of Matthat . Matthat was the son of Levi .
42003030	Levi was the son of Simeon . Simeon was the son of Judah . Judah was the son of Joseph . Joseph was the son of Jonam . Jonam was the son of Eliakim .
42003031	Eliakim was the son of Melea . Melea was the son of Menna . Menna was the son of Mattatha . Mattatha was the son of Nathan . Nathan was the son of David .
42003032	David was the son of Jesse . Jesse was the son of Obed . Obed was the son of Boaz . Boaz was the son of Salmon . Salmon was the son of Nahshon .
42003033	Nahshon was the son of Amminadab . Amminadab was the son of Admin . Admin was the son of Arni . Arni was the son of Hezron . Hezron was the son of Perez . Perez was the son of Judah .
42003034	Judah was the son of Jacob . Jacob was the son of Isaac . Isaac was the son of Abraham . Abraham was the son of Terah . Terah was the son of Nahor .
42003035	Nahor was the son of Serug . Serug was the son of Reu . Reu was the son of Peleg . Peleg was the son of Eber . Eber was the son of Shelah .
42003036	Shelah was the son of Cainan . Cainan was the son of Arphaxad . Arphaxad was the son of Shem . Shem was the son of Noah . Noah was the son of Lamech .
42003037	Lamech was the son of Methuselah . Methuselah was the son of Enoch . Enoch was the son of Jared . Jared was the son of Mahalalel . Mahalalel was the son of Kenan .
42003038	Kenan was the son of Enosh . Enosh was the son of Seth . Seth was the son of Adam . Adam was the son of God .
42004001	Then Jesus , full of the Holy Spirit , returned from the Jordan River . He was led by the Spirit in the wilderness ,
42004002	where he was tempted by the devil for forty days . Jesus ate nothing all that time and became very hungry .
42004003	Then the devil said to him , “ If you are the Son of God , tell this stone to become a loaf of bread . ”
42004004	But Jesus told him , “ No ! The Scriptures say , ‘ People do not live by bread alone . ’ ”
42004005	Then the devil took him up and revealed to him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time .
42004006	“ I will give you the glory of these kingdoms and authority over them , ” the devil said , “ because they are mine to give to anyone I please .
42004007	I will give it all to you if you will worship me . ”
42004008	Jesus replied , “ The Scriptures say , ‘ You must worship the L ord your God and serve only him . ’ ”
42004009	Then the devil took him to Jerusalem , to the highest point of the Temple , and said , “ If you are the Son of God , jump off !
42004010	For the Scriptures say , ‘ He will order his angels to protect and guard you .
42004011	And they will hold you up with their hands so you won’t even hurt your foot on a stone . ’ ”
42004012	Jesus responded , “ The Scriptures also say , ‘ You must not test the L ord your God . ’ ”
42004013	When the devil had finished tempting Jesus , he left him until the next opportunity came .
42004014	Then Jesus returned to Galilee , filled with the Holy Spirit’s power . Reports about him spread quickly through the whole region .
42004015	He taught regularly in their synagogues and was praised by everyone .
42004016	When he came to the village of Nazareth , his boyhood home , he went as usual to the synagogue on the Sabbath and stood up to read the Scriptures .
42004017	The scroll of Isaiah the prophet was handed to him . He unrolled the scroll and found the place where this was written :
42004018	“ The Spirit of the L ord is upon me , for he has anointed me to bring Good News to the poor . He has sent me to proclaim that captives will be released , that the blind will see , that the oppressed will be set free ,
42004019	and that the time of the Lord’s favor has come . ”
42004020	He rolled up the scroll , handed it back to the attendant , and sat down . All eyes in the synagogue looked at him intently .
42004021	Then he began to speak to them . “ The Scripture you’ve just heard has been fulfilled this very day ! ”
42004022	Everyone spoke well of him and was amazed by the gracious words that came from his lips . “ How can this be ? ” they asked . “ Isn’t this Joseph’s son ? ”
42004023	Then he said , “ You will undoubtedly quote me this proverb : ‘ Physician , heal yourself ’ meaning , ‘ Do miracles here in your hometown like those you did in Capernaum . ’
42004024	But I tell you the truth , no prophet is accepted in his own hometown .
42004025	“ Certainly there were many needy widows in Israel in Elijah’s time , when the heavens were closed for three and a half years , and a severe famine devastated the land .
42004026	Yet Elijah was not sent to any of them . He was sent instead to a foreignera widow of Zarephath in the land of Sidon .
42004027	And there were many lepers in Israel in the time of the prophet Elisha , but the only one healed was Naaman , a Syrian . ”
42004028	When they heard this , the people in the synagogue were furious .
42004029	Jumping up , they mobbed him and forced him to the edge of the hill on which the town was built . They intended to push him over the cliff ,
42004030	but he passed right through the crowd and went on his way .
42004031	Then Jesus went to Capernaum , a town in Galilee , and taught there in the synagogue every Sabbath day .
42004032	There , too , the people were amazed at his teaching , for he spoke with authority .
42004033	Once when he was in the synagogue , a man possessed by a demonan evil spiritbegan shouting at Jesus ,
42004034	“ Go away ! Why are you interfering with us , Jesus of Nazareth ? Have you come to destroy us ? I know who you arethe Holy One of God ! ”
42004035	Jesus cut him short . “ Be quiet ! Come out of the man , ” he ordered . At that , the demon threw the man to the floor as the crowd watched ; then it came out of him without hurting him further .
42004036	Amazed , the people exclaimed , “ What authority and power this man’s words possess ! Even evil spirits obey him , and they flee at his command ! ”
42004037	The news about Jesus spread through every village in the entire region .
42004038	After leaving the synagogue that day , Jesus went to Simon’s home , where he found Simon’s mother-in-law very sick with a high fever . “ Please heal her , ” everyone begged .
42004039	Standing at her bedside , he rebuked the fever , and it left her . And she got up at once and prepared a meal for them .
42004040	As the sun went down that evening , people throughout the village brought sick family members to Jesus . No matter what their diseases were , the touch of his hand healed every one .
42004041	Many were possessed by demons ; and the demons came out at his command , shouting , “ You are the Son of God ! ” But because they knew he was the Messiah , he rebuked them and refused to let them speak .
42004042	Early the next morning Jesus went out to an isolated place . The crowds searched everywhere for him , and when they finally found him , they begged him not to leave them .
42004043	But he replied , “ I must preach the Good News of the Kingdom of God in other towns , too , because that is why I was sent . ”
42004044	So he continued to travel around , preaching in synagogues throughout Judea .
42005001	One day as Jesus was preaching on the shore of the Sea of Galilee , great crowds pressed in on him to listen to the word of God .
42005002	He noticed two empty boats at the water’s edge , for the fishermen had left them and were washing their nets .
42005003	Stepping into one of the boats , Jesus asked Simon , its owner , to push it out into the water . So he sat in the boat and taught the crowds from there .
42005004	When he had finished speaking , he said to Simon , “ Now go out where it is deeper , and let down your nets to catch some fish . ”
42005005	“ Master , ” Simon replied , “ we worked hard all last night and didn’t catch a thing . But if you say so , I’ll let the nets down again . ”
42005006	And this time their nets were so full of fish they began to tear !
42005007	A shout for help brought their partners in the other boat , and soon both boats were filled with fish and on the verge of sinking .
42005008	When Simon Peter realized what had happened , he fell to his knees before Jesus and said , “ Oh , Lord , please leave meI’m too much of a sinner to be around you . ”
42005009	For he was awestruck by the number of fish they had caught , as were the others with him .
42005010	His partners , James and John , the sons of Zebedee , were also amazed . Jesus replied to Simon , “ Don’t be afraid ! From now on you’ll be fishing for people ! ”
42005011	And as soon as they landed , they left everything and followed Jesus .
42005012	In one of the villages , Jesus met a man with an advanced case of leprosy . When the man saw Jesus , he bowed with his face to the ground , begging to be healed . “ Lord , ” he said , “ if you are willing , you can heal me and make me clean . ”
42005013	Jesus reached out and touched him . “ I am willing , ” he said . “ Be healed ! ” And instantly the leprosy disappeared .
42005014	Then Jesus instructed him not to tell anyone what had happened . He said , “ Go to the priest and let him examine you . Take along the offering required in the law of Moses for those who have been healed of leprosy . This will be a public testimony that you have been cleansed . ”
42005015	But despite Jesus’ instructions , the report of his power spread even faster , and vast crowds came to hear him preach and to be healed of their diseases .
42005016	But Jesus often withdrew to the wilderness for prayer .
42005017	One day while Jesus was teaching , some Pharisees and teachers of religious law were sitting nearby . ( It seemed that these men showed up from every village in all Galilee and Judea , as well as from Jerusalem . ) And the Lord’s healing power was strongly with Jesus .
42005018	Some men came carrying a paralyzed man on a sleeping mat . They tried to take him inside to Jesus ,
42005019	but they couldn’t reach him because of the crowd . So they went up to the roof and took off some tiles . Then they lowered the sick man on his mat down into the crowd , right in front of Jesus .
42005020	Seeing their faith , Jesus said to the man , “ Young man , your sins are forgiven . ”
42005021	But the Pharisees and teachers of religious law said to themselves , “ Who does he think he is ? That’s blasphemy ! Only God can forgive sins ! ”
42005022	Jesus knew what they were thinking , so he asked them , “ Why do you question this in your hearts ?
42005023	Is it easier to say ‘ Your sins are forgiven , ’ or ‘ Stand up and walk ’ ?
42005024	So I will prove to you that the Son of Man has the authority on earth to forgive sins . ” Then Jesus turned to the paralyzed man and said , “ Stand up , pick up your mat , and go home ! ”
42005025	And immediately , as everyone watched , the man jumped up , picked up his mat , and went home praising God .
42005026	Everyone was gripped with great wonder and awe , and they praised God , exclaiming , “ We have seen amazing things today ! ”
42005027	Later , as Jesus left the town , he saw a tax collector named Levi sitting at his tax collector’s booth . “ Follow me and be my disciple , ” Jesus said to him .
42005028	So Levi got up , left everything , and followed him .
42005029	Later , Levi held a banquet in his home with Jesus as the guest of honor . Many of Levi’s fellow tax collectors and other guests also ate with them .
42005030	But the Pharisees and their teachers of religious law complained bitterly to Jesus’ disciples , “ Why do you eat and drink with such scum ? ”
42005031	Jesus answered them , “ Healthy people don’t need a doctorsick people do .
42005032	I have come to call not those who think they are righteous , but those who know they are sinners and need to repent . ”
42005033	One day some people said to Jesus , “ John the Baptist’s disciples fast and pray regularly , and so do the disciples of the Pharisees . Why are your disciples always eating and drinking ? ”
42005034	Jesus responded , “ Do wedding guests fast while celebrating with the groom ? Of course not .
42005035	But someday the groom will be taken away from them , and then they will fast . ”
42005036	Then Jesus gave them this illustration : “ No one tears a piece of cloth from a new garment and uses it to patch an old garment . For then the new garment would be ruined , and the new patch wouldn’t even match the old garment .
42005037	“ And no one puts new wine into old wineskins . For the new wine would burst the wineskins , spilling the wine and ruining the skins .
42005038	New wine must be stored in new wineskins .
42005039	But no one who drinks the old wine seems to want the new wine . ‘ The old is just fine , ’ they say . ”
42006001	One Sabbath day as Jesus was walking through some grainfields , his disciples broke off heads of grain , rubbed off the husks in their hands , and ate the grain .
42006002	But some Pharisees said , “ Why are you breaking the law by harvesting grain on the Sabbath ? ”
42006003	Jesus replied , “ Haven’t you read in the Scriptures what David did when he and his companions were hungry ?
42006004	He went into the house of God and broke the law by eating the sacred loaves of bread that only the priests can eat . He also gave some to his companions . ”
42006005	And Jesus added , “ The Son of Man is Lord , even over the Sabbath . ”
42006006	On another Sabbath day , a man with a deformed right hand was in the synagogue while Jesus was teaching .
42006007	The teachers of religious law and the Pharisees watched Jesus closely . If he healed the man’s hand , they planned to accuse him of working on the Sabbath .
42006008	But Jesus knew their thoughts . He said to the man with the deformed hand , “ Come and stand in front of everyone . ” So the man came forward .
42006009	Then Jesus said to his critics , “ I have a question for you . Does the law permit good deeds on the Sabbath , or is it a day for doing evil ? Is this a day to save life or to destroy it ? ”
42006010	He looked around at them one by one and then said to the man , “ Hold out your hand . ” So the man held out his hand , and it was restored !
42006011	At this , the enemies of Jesus were wild with rage and began to discuss what to do with him .
42006012	One day soon afterward Jesus went up on a mountain to pray , and he prayed to God all night .
42006013	At daybreak he called together all of his disciples and chose twelve of them to be apostles . Here are their names :
42006014	Simon ( whom he named Peter ) , Andrew ( Peter’s brother ) , James , John , Philip , Bartholomew ,
42006015	Matthew , Thomas , James ( son of Alphaeus ) , Simon ( who was called the zealot ) ,
42006016	Judas ( son of James ) , Judas Iscariot ( who later betrayed him ) .
42006017	When they came down from the mountain , the disciples stood with Jesus on a large , level area , surrounded by many of his followers and by the crowds . There were people from all over Judea and from Jerusalem and from as far north as the seacoasts of Tyre and Sidon .
42006018	They had come to hear him and to be healed of their diseases ; and those troubled by evil spirits were healed .
42006019	Everyone tried to touch him , because healing power went out from him , and he healed everyone .
42006020	Then Jesus turned to his disciples and said , “ God blesses you who are poor , for the Kingdom of God is yours .
42006021	God blesses you who are hungry now , for you will be satisfied . God blesses you who weep now , for in due time you will laugh .
42006022	What blessings await you when people hate you and exclude you and mock you and curse you as evil because you follow the Son of Man .
42006023	When that happens , be happy ! Yes , leap for joy ! For a great reward awaits you in heaven . And remember , their ancestors treated the ancient prophets that same way .
42006024	“ What sorrow awaits you who are rich , for you have your only happiness now .
42006025	What sorrow awaits you who are fat and prosperous now , for a time of awful hunger awaits you . What sorrow awaits you who laugh now , for your laughing will turn to mourning and sorrow .
42006026	What sorrow awaits you who are praised by the crowds , for their ancestors also praised false prophets .
42006027	“ But to you who are willing to listen , I say , love your enemies ! Do good to those who hate you .
42006028	Bless those who curse you . Pray for those who hurt you .
42006029	If someone slaps you on one cheek , offer the other cheek also . If someone demands your coat , offer your shirt also .
42006030	Give to anyone who asks ; and when things are taken away from you , don’t try to get them back .
42006031	Do to others as you would like them to do to you .
42006032	“ If you love only those who love you , why should you get credit for that ? Even sinners love those who love them !
42006033	And if you do good only to those who do good to you , why should you get credit ? Even sinners do that much !
42006034	And if you lend money only to those who can repay you , why should you get credit ? Even sinners will lend to other sinners for a full return .
42006035	“ Love your enemies ! Do good to them . Lend to them without expecting to be repaid . Then your reward from heaven will be very great , and you will truly be acting as children of the Most High , for he is kind to those who are unthankful and wicked .
42006036	You must be compassionate , just as your Father is compassionate .
42006037	“ Do not judge others , and you will not be judged . Do not condemn others , or it will all come back against you . Forgive others , and you will be forgiven .
42006038	Give , and you will receive . Your gift will return to you in fullpressed down , shaken together to make room for more , running over , and poured into your lap . The amount you give will determine the amount you get back . ”
42006039	Then Jesus gave the following illustration : “ Can one blind person lead another ? Won’t they both fall into a ditch ?
42006040	Students are not greater than their teacher . But the student who is fully trained will become like the teacher .
42006041	“ And why worry about a speck in your friend’s eye when you have a log in your own ?
42006042	How can you think of saying , ‘ Friend , let me help you get rid of that speck in your eye , ’ when you can’t see past the log in your own eye ? Hypocrite ! First get rid of the log in your own eye ; then you will see well enough to deal with the speck in your friend’s eye .
42006043	“ A good tree can’t produce bad fruit , and a bad tree can’t produce good fruit .
42006044	A tree is identified by its fruit . Figs are never gathered from thornbushes , and grapes are not picked from bramble bushes .
42006045	A good person produces good things from the treasury of a good heart , and an evil person produces evil things from the treasury of an evil heart . What you say flows from what is in your heart .
42006046	“ So why do you keep calling me ‘ Lord , Lord ! ’ when you don’t do what I say ?
42006047	I will show you what it’s like when someone comes to me , listens to my teaching , and then follows it .
42006048	It is like a person building a house who digs deep and lays the foundation on solid rock . When the floodwaters rise and break against that house , it stands firm because it is well built .
42006049	But anyone who hears and doesn’t obey is like a person who builds a house without a foundation . When the floods sweep down against that house , it will collapse into a heap of ruins . ”
42007001	When Jesus had finished saying all this to the people , he returned to Capernaum .
42007002	At that time the highly valued slave of a Roman officer was sick and near death .
42007003	When the officer heard about Jesus , he sent some respected Jewish elders to ask him to come and heal his slave .
42007004	So they earnestly begged Jesus to help the man . “ If anyone deserves your help , he does , ” they said ,
42007005	“ for he loves the Jewish people and even built a synagogue for us . ”
42007006	So Jesus went with them . But just before they arrived at the house , the officer sent some friends to say , “ Lord , don’t trouble yourself by coming to my home , for I am not worthy of such an honor .
42007007	I am not even worthy to come and meet you . Just say the word from where you are , and my servant will be healed .
42007008	I know this because I am under the authority of my superior officers , and I have authority over my soldiers . I only need to say , ‘ Go , ’ and they go , or ‘ Come , ’ and they come . And if I say to my slaves , ‘ Do this , ’ they do it . ”
42007009	When Jesus heard this , he was amazed . Turning to the crowd that was following him , he said , “ I tell you , I haven’t seen faith like this in all Israel ! ”
42007010	And when the officer’s friends returned to his house , they found the slave completely healed .
42007011	Soon afterward Jesus went with his disciples to the village of Nain , and a large crowd followed him .
42007012	A funeral procession was coming out as he approached the village gate . The young man who had died was a widow’s only son , and a large crowd from the village was with her .
42007013	When the Lord saw her , his heart overflowed with compassion . “ Don’t cry ! ” he said .
42007014	Then he walked over to the coffin and touched it , and the bearers stopped . “ Young man , ” he said , “ I tell you , get up . ”
42007015	Then the dead boy sat up and began to talk ! And Jesus gave him back to his mother .
42007016	Great fear swept the crowd , and they praised God , saying , “ A mighty prophet has risen among us , ” and “ God has visited his people today . ”
42007017	And the news about Jesus spread throughout Judea and the surrounding countryside .
42007018	The disciples of John the Baptist told John about everything Jesus was doing . So John called for two of his disciples ,
42007019	and he sent them to the Lord to ask him , “ Are you the Messiah we’ve been expecting , or should we keep looking for someone else ? ”
42007020	John’s two disciples found Jesus and said to him , “ John the Baptist sent us to ask , ‘ Are you the Messiah we’ve been expecting , or should we keep looking for someone else ? ’ ”
42007021	At that very time , Jesus cured many people of their diseases , illnesses , and evil spirits , and he restored sight to many who were blind .
42007022	Then he told John’s disciples , “ Go back to John and tell him what you have seen and heardthe blind see , the lame walk , the lepers are cured , the deaf hear , the dead are raised to life , and the Good News is being preached to the poor .
42007023	And tell him , ‘ God blesses those who do not turn away because of me . ’ ”
42007024	After John’s disciples left , Jesus began talking about him to the crowds . “ What kind of man did you go into the wilderness to see ? Was he a weak reed , swayed by every breath of wind ?
42007025	Or were you expecting to see a man dressed in expensive clothes ? No , people who wear beautiful clothes and live in luxury are found in palaces .
42007026	Were you looking for a prophet ? Yes , and he is more than a prophet .
42007027	John is the man to whom the Scriptures refer when they say , ‘ Look , I am sending my messenger ahead of you , and he will prepare your way before you . ’
42007028	I tell you , of all who have ever lived , none is greater than John . Yet even the least person in the Kingdom of God is greater than he is ! ”
42007029	When they heard this , all the peopleeven the tax collectorsagreed that God’s way was right , for they had been baptized by John .
42007030	But the Pharisees and experts in religious law rejected God’s plan for them , for they had refused John’s baptism .
42007031	“ To what can I compare the people of this generation ? ” Jesus asked . “ How can I describe them ?
42007032	They are like children playing a game in the public square . They complain to their friends , ‘ We played wedding songs , and you didn’t dance , so we played funeral songs , and you didn’t weep . ’
42007033	For John the Baptist didn’t spend his time eating bread or drinking wine , and you say , ‘ He’s possessed by a demon . ’
42007034	The Son of Man , on the other hand , feasts and drinks , and you say , ‘ He’s a glutton and a drunkard , and a friend of tax collectors and other sinners ! ’
42007035	But wisdom is shown to be right by the lives of those who follow it . ”
42007036	One of the Pharisees asked Jesus to have dinner with him , so Jesus went to his home and sat down to eat .
42007037	When a certain immoral woman from that city heard he was eating there , she brought a beautiful alabaster jar filled with expensive perfume .
42007038	Then she knelt behind him at his feet , weeping . Her tears fell on his feet , and she wiped them off with her hair . Then she kept kissing his feet and putting perfume on them .
42007039	When the Pharisee who had invited him saw this , he said to himself , “ If this man were a prophet , he would know what kind of woman is touching him . She’s a sinner ! ”
42007040	Then Jesus answered his thoughts . “ Simon , ” he said to the Pharisee , “ I have something to say to you . ” “ Go ahead , Teacher , ” Simon replied .
42007041	Then Jesus told him this story : “ A man loaned money to two people500 pieces of silver to one and 50 pieces to the other .
42007042	But neither of them could repay him , so he kindly forgave them both , canceling their debts . Who do you suppose loved him more after that ? ”
42007043	Simon answered , “ I suppose the one for whom he canceled the larger debt . ” “ That’s right , ” Jesus said .
42007044	Then he turned to the woman and said to Simon , “ Look at this woman kneeling here . When I entered your home , you didn’t offer me water to wash the dust from my feet , but she has washed them with her tears and wiped them with her hair .
42007045	You didn’t greet me with a kiss , but from the time I first came in , she has not stopped kissing my feet .
42007046	You neglected the courtesy of olive oil to anoint my head , but she has anointed my feet with rare perfume .
42007047	“ I tell you , her sinsand they are manyhave been forgiven , so she has shown me much love . But a person who is forgiven little shows only little love . ”
42007048	Then Jesus said to the woman , “ Your sins are forgiven . ”
42007049	The men at the table said among themselves , “ Who is this man , that he goes around forgiving sins ? ”
42007050	And Jesus said to the woman , “ Your faith has saved you ; go in peace . ”
42008001	Soon afterward Jesus began a tour of the nearby towns and villages , preaching and announcing the Good News about the Kingdom of God . He took his twelve disciples with him ,
42008002	along with some women who had been cured of evil spirits and diseases . Among them were Mary Magdalene , from whom he had cast out seven demons ;
42008003	Joanna , the wife of Chuza , Herod’s business manager ; Susanna ; and many others who were contributing from their own resources to support Jesus and his disciples .
42008004	One day Jesus told a story in the form of a parable to a large crowd that had gathered from many towns to hear him :
42008005	“ A farmer went out to plant his seed . As he scattered it across his field , some seed fell on a footpath , where it was stepped on , and the birds ate it .
42008006	Other seed fell among rocks . It began to grow , but the plant soon wilted and died for lack of moisture .
42008007	Other seed fell among thorns that grew up with it and choked out the tender plants .
42008008	Still other seed fell on fertile soil . This seed grew and produced a crop that was a hundred times as much as had been planted ! ” When he had said this , he called out , “ Anyone with ears to hear should listen and understand . ”
42008009	His disciples asked him what this parable meant .
42008010	He replied , “ You are permitted to understand the secrets of the Kingdom of God . But I use parables to teach the others so that the Scriptures might be fulfilled : ‘ When they look , they won’t really see . When they hear , they won’t understand . ’
42008011	“ This is the meaning of the parable : The seed is God’s word .
42008012	The seeds that fell on the footpath represent those who hear the message , only to have the devil come and take it away from their hearts and prevent them from believing and being saved .
42008013	The seeds on the rocky soil represent those who hear the message and receive it with joy . But since they don’t have deep roots , they believe for a while , then they fall away when they face temptation .
42008014	The seeds that fell among the thorns represent those who hear the message , but all too quickly the message is crowded out by the cares and riches and pleasures of this life . And so they never grow into maturity .
42008015	And the seeds that fell on the good soil represent honest , good-hearted people who hear God’s word , cling to it , and patiently produce a huge harvest .
42008016	“ No one lights a lamp and then covers it with a bowl or hides it under a bed . A lamp is placed on a stand , where its light can be seen by all who enter the house .
42008017	For all that is secret will eventually be brought into the open , and everything that is concealed will be brought to light and made known to all .
42008018	“ So pay attention to how you hear . To those who listen to my teaching , more understanding will be given . But for those who are not listening , even what they think they understand will be taken away from them . ”
42008019	Then Jesus’ mother and brothers came to see him , but they couldn’t get to him because of the crowd .
42008020	Someone told Jesus , “ Your mother and your brothers are outside , and they want to see you . ”
42008021	Jesus replied , “ My mother and my brothers are all those who hear God’s word and obey it . ”
42008022	One day Jesus said to his disciples , “ Let’s cross to the other side of the lake . ” So they got into a boat and started out .
42008023	As they sailed across , Jesus settled down for a nap . But soon a fierce storm came down on the lake . The boat was filling with water , and they were in real danger .
42008024	The disciples went and woke him up , shouting , “ Master , Master , we’re going to drown ! ” When Jesus woke up , he rebuked the wind and the raging waves . Suddenly the storm stopped and all was calm .
42008025	Then he asked them , “ Where is your faith ? ” The disciples were terrified and amazed . “ Who is this man ? ” they asked each other . “ When he gives a command , even the wind and waves obey him ! ”
42008026	So they arrived in the region of the Gerasenes , across the lake from Galilee .
42008027	As Jesus was climbing out of the boat , a man who was possessed by demons came out to meet him . For a long time he had been homeless and naked , living in a cemetery outside the town .
42008028	As soon as he saw Jesus , he shrieked and fell down in front of him . Then he screamed , “ Why are you interfering with me , Jesus , Son of the Most High God ? Please , I beg you , don’t torture me ! ”
42008029	For Jesus had already commanded the evil spirit to come out of him . This spirit had often taken control of the man . Even when he was placed under guard and put in chains and shackles , he simply broke them and rushed out into the wilderness , completely under the demon’s power .
42008030	Jesus demanded , “ What is your name ? ” “ Legion , ” he replied , for he was filled with many demons .
42008031	The demons kept begging Jesus not to send them into the bottomless pit .
42008032	There happened to be a large herd of pigs feeding on the hillside nearby , and the demons begged him to let them enter into the pigs . So Jesus gave them permission .
42008033	Then the demons came out of the man and entered the pigs , and the entire herd plunged down the steep hillside into the lake and drowned .
42008034	When the herdsmen saw it , they fled to the nearby town and the surrounding countryside , spreading the news as they ran .
42008035	People rushed out to see what had happened . A crowd soon gathered around Jesus , and they saw the man who had been freed from the demons . He was sitting at Jesus’ feet , fully clothed and perfectly sane , and they were all afraid .
42008036	Then those who had seen what happened told the others how the demon-possessed man had been healed .
42008037	And all the people in the region of the Gerasenes begged Jesus to go away and leave them alone , for a great wave of fear swept over them . So Jesus returned to the boat and left , crossing back to the other side of the lake .
42008038	The man who had been freed from the demons begged to go with him . But Jesus sent him home , saying ,
42008039	“ No , go back to your family , and tell them everything God has done for you . ” So he went all through the town proclaiming the great things Jesus had done for him .
42008040	On the other side of the lake the crowds welcomed Jesus , because they had been waiting for him .
42008041	Then a man named Jairus , a leader of the local synagogue , came and fell at Jesus’ feet , pleading with him to come home with him .
42008042	His only daughter , who was about twelve years old , was dying . As Jesus went with him , he was surrounded by the crowds .
42008043	A woman in the crowd had suffered for twelve years with constant bleeding , and she could find no cure .
42008044	Coming up behind Jesus , she touched the fringe of his robe . Immediately , the bleeding stopped .
42008045	“ Who touched me ? ” Jesus asked . Everyone denied it , and Peter said , “ Master , this whole crowd is pressing up against you . ”
42008046	But Jesus said , “ Someone deliberately touched me , for I felt healing power go out from me . ”
42008047	When the woman realized that she could not stay hidden , she began to tremble and fell to her knees in front of him . The whole crowd heard her explain why she had touched him and that she had been immediately healed .
42008048	“ Daughter , ” he said to her , “ your faith has made you well . Go in peace . ”
42008049	While he was still speaking to her , a messenger arrived from the home of Jairus , the leader of the synagogue . He told him , “ Your daughter is dead . There’s no use troubling the Teacher now . ”
42008050	But when Jesus heard what had happened , he said to Jairus , “ Don’t be afraid . Just have faith , and she will be healed . ”
42008051	When they arrived at the house , Jesus wouldn’t let anyone go in with him except Peter , John , James , and the little girl’s father and mother .
42008052	The house was filled with people weeping and wailing , but he said , “ Stop the weeping ! She isn’t dead ; she’s only asleep . ”
42008053	But the crowd laughed at him because they all knew she had died .
42008054	Then Jesus took her by the hand and said in a loud voice , “ My child , get up ! ”
42008055	And at that moment her life returned , and she immediately stood up ! Then Jesus told them to give her something to eat .
42008056	Her parents were overwhelmed , but Jesus insisted that they not tell anyone what had happened .
42009001	One day Jesus called together his twelve disciples and gave them power and authority to cast out all demons and to heal all diseases .
42009002	Then he sent them out to tell everyone about the Kingdom of God and to heal the sick .
42009003	“ Take nothing for your journey , ” he instructed them . “ Don’t take a walking stick , a traveler’s bag , food , money , or even a change of clothes .
42009004	Wherever you go , stay in the same house until you leave town .
42009005	And if a town refuses to welcome you , shake its dust from your feet as you leave to show that you have abandoned those people to their fate . ”
42009006	So they began their circuit of the villages , preaching the Good News and healing the sick .
42009007	When Herod Antipas , the ruler of Galilee , heard about everything Jesus was doing , he was puzzled . Some were saying that John the Baptist had been raised from the dead .
42009008	Others thought Jesus was Elijah or one of the other prophets risen from the dead .
42009009	“ I beheaded John , ” Herod said , “ so who is this man about whom I hear such stories ? ” And he kept trying to see him .
42009010	When the apostles returned , they told Jesus everything they had done . Then he slipped quietly away with them toward the town of Bethsaida .
