42009011	But the crowds found out where he was going , and they followed him . He welcomed them and taught them about the Kingdom of God , and he healed those who were sick .
42009012	Late in the afternoon the twelve disciples came to him and said , “ Send the crowds away to the nearby villages and farms , so they can find food and lodging for the night . There is nothing to eat here in this remote place . ”
42009013	But Jesus said , “ You feed them . ” “ But we have only five loaves of bread and two fish , ” they answered . “ Or are you expecting us to go and buy enough food for this whole crowd ? ”
42009014	For there were about 5,000 men there . Jesus replied , “ Tell them to sit down in groups of about fifty each . ”
42009015	So the people all sat down .
42009016	Jesus took the five loaves and two fish , looked up toward heaven , and blessed them . Then , breaking the loaves into pieces , he kept giving the bread and fish to the disciples so they could distribute it to the people .
42009017	They all ate as much as they wanted , and afterward , the disciples picked up twelve baskets of leftovers !
42009018	One day Jesus left the crowds to pray alone . Only his disciples were with him , and he asked them , “ Who do people say I am ? ”
42009019	“ Well , ” they replied , “ some say John the Baptist , some say Elijah , and others say you are one of the other ancient prophets risen from the dead . ”
42009020	Then he asked them , “ But who do you say I am ? ” Peter replied , “ You are the Messiah sent from God ! ”
42009021	Jesus warned his disciples not to tell anyone who he was .
42009022	“ The Son of Man must suffer many terrible things , ” he said . “ He will be rejected by the elders , the leading priests , and the teachers of religious law . He will be killed , but on the third day he will be raised from the dead . ”
42009023	Then he said to the crowd , “ If any of you wants to be my follower , you must turn from your selfish ways , take up your cross daily , and follow me .
42009024	If you try to hang on to your life , you will lose it . But if you give up your life for my sake , you will save it .
42009025	And what do you benefit if you gain the whole world but are yourself lost or destroyed ?
42009026	If anyone is ashamed of me and my message , the Son of Man will be ashamed of that person when he returns in his glory and in the glory of the Father and the holy angels .
42009027	I tell you the truth , some standing here right now will not die before they see the Kingdom of God . ”
42009028	About eight days later Jesus took Peter , John , and James up on a mountain to pray .
42009029	And as he was praying , the appearance of his face was transformed , and his clothes became dazzling white .
42009030	Suddenly , two men , Moses and Elijah , appeared and began talking with Jesus .
42009031	They were glorious to see . And they were speaking about his exodus from this world , which was about to be fulfilled in Jerusalem .
42009032	Peter and the others had fallen asleep . When they woke up , they saw Jesus’ glory and the two men standing with him .
42009033	As Moses and Elijah were starting to leave , Peter , not even knowing what he was saying , blurted out , “ Master , it’s wonderful for us to be here ! Let’s make three shelters as memorials one for you , one for Moses , and one for Elijah . ”
42009034	But even as he was saying this , a cloud overshadowed them , and terror gripped them as the cloud covered them .
42009035	Then a voice from the cloud said , “ This is my Son , my Chosen One . Listen to him . ”
42009036	When the voice finished , Jesus was there alone . They didn’t tell anyone at that time what they had seen .
42009037	The next day , after they had come down the mountain , a large crowd met Jesus .
42009038	A man in the crowd called out to him , “ Teacher , I beg you to look at my son , my only child .
42009039	An evil spirit keeps seizing him , making him scream . It throws him into convulsions so that he foams at the mouth . It batters him and hardly ever leaves him alone .
42009040	I begged your disciples to cast out the spirit , but they couldn’t do it . ”
42009041	Jesus said , “ You faithless and corrupt people ! How long must I be with you and put up with you ? ” Then he said to the man , “ Bring your son here . ”
42009042	As the boy came forward , the demon knocked him to the ground and threw him into a violent convulsion . But Jesus rebuked the evil spirit and healed the boy . Then he gave him back to his father .
42009043	Awe gripped the people as they saw this majestic display of God’s power . While everyone was marveling at everything he was doing , Jesus said to his disciples ,
42009044	“ Listen to me and remember what I say . The Son of Man is going to be betrayed into the hands of his enemies . ”
42009045	But they didn’t know what he meant . Its significance was hidden from them , so they couldn’t understand it , and they were afraid to ask him about it .
42009046	Then his disciples began arguing about which of them was the greatest .
42009047	But Jesus knew their thoughts , so he brought a little child to his side .
42009048	Then he said to them , “ Anyone who welcomes a little child like this on my behalf welcomes me , and anyone who welcomes me also welcomes my Father who sent me . Whoever is the least among you is the greatest . ”
42009049	John said to Jesus , “ Master , we saw someone using your name to cast out demons , but we told him to stop because he isn’t in our group . ”
42009050	But Jesus said , “ Don’t stop him ! Anyone who is not against you is for you . ”
42009051	As the time drew near for him to ascend to heaven , Jesus resolutely set out for Jerusalem .
42009052	He sent messengers ahead to a Samaritan village to prepare for his arrival .
42009053	But the people of the village did not welcome Jesus because he was on his way to Jerusalem .
42009054	When James and John saw this , they said to Jesus , “ Lord , should we call down fire from heaven to burn them up ? ”
42009055	But Jesus turned and rebuked them .
42009056	So they went on to another village .
42009057	As they were walking along , someone said to Jesus , “ I will follow you wherever you go . ”
42009058	But Jesus replied , “ Foxes have dens to live in , and birds have nests , but the Son of Man has no place even to lay his head . ”
42009059	He said to another person , “ Come , follow me . ” The man agreed , but he said , “ Lord , first let me return home and bury my father . ”
42009060	But Jesus told him , “ Let the spiritually dead bury their own dead ! Your duty is to go and preach about the Kingdom of God . ”
42009061	Another said , “ Yes , Lord , I will follow you , but first let me say good-bye to my family . ”
42009062	But Jesus told him , “ Anyone who puts a hand to the plow and then looks back is not fit for the Kingdom of God . ”
42010001	The Lord now chose seventy-two other disciples and sent them ahead in pairs to all the towns and places he planned to visit .
42010002	These were his instructions to them : “ The harvest is great , but the workers are few . So pray to the Lord who is in charge of the harvest ; ask him to send more workers into his fields .
42010003	Now go , and remember that I am sending you out as lambs among wolves .
42010004	Don’t take any money with you , nor a traveler’s bag , nor an extra pair of sandals . And don’t stop to greet anyone on the road .
42010005	“ Whenever you enter someone’s home , first say , ‘ May God’s peace be on this house . ’
42010006	If those who live there are peaceful , the blessing will stand ; if they are not , the blessing will return to you .
42010007	Don’t move around from home to home . Stay in one place , eating and drinking what they provide . Don’t hesitate to accept hospitality , because those who work deserve their pay .
42010008	“ If you enter a town and it welcomes you , eat whatever is set before you .
42010009	Heal the sick , and tell them , ‘ The Kingdom of God is near you now . ’
42010010	But if a town refuses to welcome you , go out into its streets and say ,
42010011	‘ We wipe even the dust of your town from our feet to show that we have abandoned you to your fate . And know thisthe Kingdom of God is near ! ’
42010012	I assure you , even wicked Sodom will be better off than such a town on judgment day .
42010013	“ What sorrow awaits you , Korazin and Bethsaida ! For if the miracles I did in you had been done in wicked Tyre and Sidon , their people would have repented of their sins long ago , clothing themselves in burlap and throwing ashes on their heads to show their remorse .
42010014	Yes , Tyre and Sidon will be better off on judgment day than you .
42010015	And you people of Capernaum , will you be honored in heaven ? No , you will go down to the place of the dead . ”
42010016	Then he said to the disciples , “ Anyone who accepts your message is also accepting me . And anyone who rejects you is rejecting me . And anyone who rejects me is rejecting God , who sent me . ”
42010017	When the seventy-two disciples returned , they joyfully reported to him , “ Lord , even the demons obey us when we use your name ! ”
42010018	“ Yes , ” he told them , “ I saw Satan fall from heaven like lightning !
42010019	Look , I have given you authority over all the power of the enemy , and you can walk among snakes and scorpions and crush them . Nothing will injure you .
42010020	But don’t rejoice because evil spirits obey you ; rejoice because your names are registered in heaven . ”
42010021	At that same time Jesus was filled with the joy of the Holy Spirit , and he said , “ O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , thank you for hiding these things from those who think themselves wise and clever , and for revealing them to the childlike . Yes , Father , it pleased you to do it this way .
42010022	“ My Father has entrusted everything to me . No one truly knows the Son except the Father , and no one truly knows the Father except the Son and those to whom the Son chooses to reveal him . ”
42010023	Then when they were alone , he turned to the disciples and said , “ Blessed are the eyes that see what you have seen .
42010024	I tell you , many prophets and kings longed to see what you see , but they didn’t see it . And they longed to hear what you hear , but they didn’t hear it . ”
42010025	One day an expert in religious law stood up to test Jesus by asking him this question : “ Teacher , what should I do to inherit eternal life ? ”
42010026	Jesus replied , “ What does the law of Moses say ? How do you read it ? ”
42010027	The man answered , “ ‘ You must love the L ord your God with all your heart , all your soul , all your strength , and all your mind . ’ And , ‘ Love your neighbor as yourself . ’ ”
42010028	“ Right ! ” Jesus told him . “ Do this and you will live ! ”
42010029	The man wanted to justify his actions , so he asked Jesus , “ And who is my neighbor ? ”
42010030	Jesus replied with a story : “ A Jewish man was traveling from Jerusalem down to Jericho , and he was attacked by bandits . They stripped him of his clothes , beat him up , and left him half dead beside the road .
42010031	“ By chance a priest came along . But when he saw the man lying there , he crossed to the other side of the road and passed him by .
42010032	A Temple assistant walked over and looked at him lying there , but he also passed by on the other side .
42010033	“ Then a despised Samaritan came along , and when he saw the man , he felt compassion for him .
42010034	Going over to him , the Samaritan soothed his wounds with olive oil and wine and bandaged them . Then he put the man on his own donkey and took him to an inn , where he took care of him .
42010035	The next day he handed the innkeeper two silver coins , telling him , ‘ Take care of this man . If his bill runs higher than this , I’ll pay you the next time I’m here . ’
42010036	“ Now which of these three would you say was a neighbor to the man who was attacked by bandits ? ” Jesus asked .
42010037	The man replied , “ The one who showed him mercy . ” Then Jesus said , “ Yes , now go and do the same . ”
42010038	As Jesus and the disciples continued on their way to Jerusalem , they came to a certain village where a woman named Martha welcomed him into her home .
42010039	Her sister , Mary , sat at the Lord’s feet , listening to what he taught .
42010040	But Martha was distracted by the big dinner she was preparing . She came to Jesus and said , “ Lord , doesn’t it seem unfair to you that my sister just sits here while I do all the work ? Tell her to come and help me . ”
42010041	But the Lord said to her , “ My dear Martha , you are worried and upset over all these details !
42010042	There is only one thing worth being concerned about . Mary has discovered it , and it will not be taken away from her . ”
42011001	Once Jesus was in a certain place praying . As he finished , one of his disciples came to him and said , “ Lord , teach us to pray , just as John taught his disciples . ”
42011002	Jesus said , “ This is how you should pray : “ Father , may your name be kept holy . May your Kingdom come soon .
42011003	Give us each day the food we need ,
42011004	and forgive us our sins , as we forgive those who sin against us . And don’t let us yield to temptation . ”
42011005	Then , teaching them more about prayer , he used this story : “ Suppose you went to a friend’s house at midnight , wanting to borrow three loaves of bread . You say to him ,
42011006	‘ A friend of mine has just arrived for a visit , and I have nothing for him to eat . ’
42011007	And suppose he calls out from his bedroom , ‘ Don’t bother me . The door is locked for the night , and my family and I are all in bed . I can’t help you . ’
42011008	But I tell you thisthough he won’t do it for friendship’s sake , if you keep knocking long enough , he will get up and give you whatever you need because of your shameless persistence .
42011009	“ And so I tell you , keep on asking , and you will receive what you ask for . Keep on seeking , and you will find . Keep on knocking , and the door will be opened to you .
42011010	For everyone who asks , receives . Everyone who seeks , finds . And to everyone who knocks , the door will be opened .
42011011	“ You fathersif your children ask for a fish , do you give them a snake instead ?
42011012	Or if they ask for an egg , do you give them a scorpion ? Of course not !
42011013	So if you sinful people know how to give good gifts to your children , how much more will your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to those who ask him . ”
42011014	One day Jesus cast out a demon from a man who couldn’t speak , and when the demon was gone , the man began to speak . The crowds were amazed ,
42011015	but some of them said , “ No wonder he can cast out demons . He gets his power from Satan , the prince of demons . ”
42011016	Others , trying to test Jesus , demanded that he show them a miraculous sign from heaven to prove his authority .
42011017	He knew their thoughts , so he said , “ Any kingdom divided by civil war is doomed . A family splintered by feuding will fall apart .
42011018	You say I am empowered by Satan . But if Satan is divided and fighting against himself , how can his kingdom survive ?
42011019	And if I am empowered by Satan , what about your own exorcists ? They cast out demons , too , so they will condemn you for what you have said .
42011020	But if I am casting out demons by the power of God , then the Kingdom of God has arrived among you .
42011021	For when a strong man like Satan is fully armed and guards his palace , his possessions are safe
42011022	until someone even stronger attacks and overpowers him , strips him of his weapons , and carries off his belongings .
42011023	“ Anyone who isn’t with me opposes me , and anyone who isn’t working with me is actually working against me .
42011024	“ When an evil spirit leaves a person , it goes into the desert , searching for rest . But when it finds none , it says , ‘ I will return to the person I came from . ’
42011025	So it returns and finds that its former home is all swept and in order .
42011026	Then the spirit finds seven other spirits more evil than itself , and they all enter the person and live there . And so that person is worse off than before . ”
42011027	As he was speaking , a woman in the crowd called out , “ God bless your motherthe womb from which you came , and the breasts that nursed you ! ”
42011028	Jesus replied , “ But even more blessed are all who hear the word of God and put it into practice . ”
42011029	As the crowd pressed in on Jesus , he said , “ This evil generation keeps asking me to show them a miraculous sign . But the only sign I will give them is the sign of Jonah .
42011030	What happened to him was a sign to the people of Nineveh that God had sent him . What happens to the Son of Man will be a sign to these people that he was sent by God .
42011031	“ The queen of Sheba will stand up against this generation on judgment day and condemn it , for she came from a distant land to hear the wisdom of Solomon . Now someone greater than Solomon is herebut you refuse to listen .
42011032	The people of Nineveh will also stand up against this generation on judgment day and condemn it , for they repented of their sins at the preaching of Jonah . Now someone greater than Jonah is herebut you refuse to repent .
42011033	“ No one lights a lamp and then hides it or puts it under a basket . Instead , a lamp is placed on a stand , where its light can be seen by all who enter the house .
42011034	“ Your eye is a lamp that provides light for your body . When your eye is good , your whole body is filled with light . But when it is bad , your body is filled with darkness .
42011035	Make sure that the light you think you have is not actually darkness .
42011036	If you are filled with light , with no dark corners , then your whole life will be radiant , as though a floodlight were filling you with light . ”
42011037	As Jesus was speaking , one of the Pharisees invited him home for a meal . So he went in and took his place at the table .
42011038	His host was amazed to see that he sat down to eat without first performing the hand-washing ceremony required by Jewish custom .
42011039	Then the Lord said to him , “ You Pharisees are so careful to clean the outside of the cup and the dish , but inside you are filthyfull of greed and wickedness !
42011040	Fools ! Didn’t God make the inside as well as the outside ?
42011041	So clean the inside by giving gifts to the poor , and you will be clean all over .
42011042	“ What sorrow awaits you Pharisees ! For you are careful to tithe even the tiniest income from your herb gardens , but you ignore justice and the love of God . You should tithe , yes , but do not neglect the more important things .
42011043	“ What sorrow awaits you Pharisees ! For you love to sit in the seats of honor in the synagogues and receive respectful greetings as you walk in the marketplaces .
42011044	Yes , what sorrow awaits you ! For you are like hidden graves in a field . People walk over them without knowing the corruption they are stepping on . ”
42011045	“ Teacher , ” said an expert in religious law , “ you have insulted us , too , in what you just said . ”
42011046	“ Yes , ” said Jesus , “ what sorrow also awaits you experts in religious law ! For you crush people with unbearable religious demands , and you never lift a finger to ease the burden .
42011047	What sorrow awaits you ! For you build monuments for the prophets your own ancestors killed long ago .
42011048	But in fact , you stand as witnesses who agree with what your ancestors did . They killed the prophets , and you join in their crime by building the monuments !
42011049	This is what God in his wisdom said about you : ‘ I will send prophets and apostles to them , but they will kill some and persecute the others . ’
42011050	“ As a result , this generation will be held responsible for the murder of all God’s prophets from the creation of the world
42011051	from the murder of Abel to the murder of Zechariah , who was killed between the altar and the sanctuary . Yes , it will certainly be charged against this generation .
42011052	“ What sorrow awaits you experts in religious law ! For you remove the key to knowledge from the people . You don’t enter the Kingdom yourselves , and you prevent others from entering . ”
42011053	As Jesus was leaving , the teachers of religious law and the Pharisees became hostile and tried to provoke him with many questions .
42011054	They wanted to trap him into saying something they could use against him .
42012001	Meanwhile , the crowds grew until thousands were milling about and stepping on each other . Jesus turned first to his disciples and warned them , “ Beware of the yeast of the Phariseestheir hypocrisy .
42012002	The time is coming when everything that is covered up will be revealed , and all that is secret will be made known to all .
42012003	Whatever you have said in the dark will be heard in the light , and what you have whispered behind closed doors will be shouted from the housetops for all to hear !
42012004	“ Dear friends , don’t be afraid of those who want to kill your body ; they cannot do any more to you after that .
42012005	But I’ll tell you whom to fear . Fear God , who has the power to kill you and then throw you into hell . Yes , he’s the one to fear .
42012006	“ What is the price of five sparrowstwo copper coins ? Yet God does not forget a single one of them .
42012007	And the very hairs on your head are all numbered . So don’t be afraid ; you are more valuable to God than a whole flock of sparrows .
42012008	“ I tell you the truth , everyone who acknowledges me publicly here on earth , the Son of Man will also acknowledge in the presence of God’s angels .
42012009	But anyone who denies me here on earth will be denied before God’s angels .

42014001	One Sabbath day Jesus went to eat dinner in the home of a leader of the Pharisees , and the people were watching him closely .

42016001	Jesus told this story to his disciples : “ There was a certain rich man who had a manager handling his affairs . One day a report came that the manager was wasting his employer’s money .
42016002	So the employer called him in and said , ‘ What’s this I hear about you ? Get your report in order , because you are going to be fired . ’
42016003	“ The manager thought to himself , ‘ Now what ? My boss has fired me . I don’t have the strength to dig ditches , and I’m too proud to beg .
42016004	Ah , I know how to ensure that I’ll have plenty of friends who will give me a home when I am fired . ’

42016007	“ ‘ And how much do you owe my employer ? ’ he asked the next man . ‘ I owe him 1,000 bushels of wheat , ’ was the reply . ‘ Here , ’ the manager said , ‘ take the bill and change it to 800 bushels . ’

42018009	Then Jesus told this story to some who had great confidence in their own righteousness and scorned everyone else :

42018011	The Pharisee stood by himself and prayed this prayer : ‘ I thank you , God , that I am not a sinner like everyone else . For I don’t cheat , I don’t sin , and I don’t commit adultery . I’m certainly not like that tax collector !
42018012	I fast twice a week , and I give you a tenth of my income . ’
42018013	“ But the tax collector stood at a distance and dared not even lift his eyes to heaven as he prayed . Instead , he beat his chest in sorrow , saying , ‘ O God , be merciful to me , for I am a sinner . ’
42018014	I tell you , this sinner , not the Pharisee , returned home justified before God . For those who exalt themselves will be humbled , and those who humble themselves will be exalted . ”
42018015	One day some parents brought their little children to Jesus so he could touch and bless them . But when the disciples saw this , they scolded the parents for bothering him .
42018016	Then Jesus called for the children and said to the disciples , “ Let the children come to me . Don’t stop them ! For the Kingdom of God belongs to those who are like these children .
42018017	I tell you the truth , anyone who doesn’t receive the Kingdom of God like a child will never enter it . ”
42018018	Once a religious leader asked Jesus this question : “ Good Teacher , what should I do to inherit eternal life ? ”
42018019	“ Why do you call me good ? ” Jesus asked him . “ Only God is truly good .
42018020	But to answer your question , you know the commandments : ‘ You must not commit adultery . You must not murder . You must not steal . You must not testify falsely . Honor your father and mother . ’ ”
42018021	The man replied , “ I’ve obeyed all these commandments since I was young . ”
42018022	When Jesus heard his answer , he said , “ There is still one thing you haven’t done . Sell all your possessions and give the money to the poor , and you will have treasure in heaven . Then come , follow me . ”
42018023	But when the man heard this he became very sad , for he was very rich .
42018024	When Jesus saw this , he said , “ How hard it is for the rich to enter the Kingdom of God !
42018025	In fact , it is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle than for a rich person to enter the Kingdom of God ! ”
42018026	Those who heard this said , “ Then who in the world can be saved ? ”
42018027	He replied , “ What is impossible for people is possible with God . ”
42018028	Peter said , “ We’ve left our homes to follow you . ”
42018029	“ Yes , ” Jesus replied , “ and I assure you that everyone who has given up house or wife or brothers or parents or children , for the sake of the Kingdom of God ,

42018031	Taking the twelve disciples aside , Jesus said , “ Listen , we’re going up to Jerusalem , where all the predictions of the prophets concerning the Son of Man will come true .
42018032	He will be handed over to the Romans , and he will be mocked , treated shamefully , and spit upon .
42018033	They will flog him with a whip and kill him , but on the third day he will rise again . ”
42018034	But they didn’t understand any of this . The significance of his words was hidden from them , and they failed to grasp what he was talking about .
42018035	As Jesus approached Jericho , a blind beggar was sitting beside the road .
42018036	When he heard the noise of a crowd going past , he asked what was happening .
42018037	They told him that Jesus the Nazarene was going by .
42018038	So he began shouting , “ Jesus , Son of David , have mercy on me ! ”
42018039	“ Be quiet ! ” the people in front yelled at him . But he only shouted louder , “ Son of David , have mercy on me ! ”
42018040	When Jesus heard him , he stopped and ordered that the man be brought to him . As the man came near , Jesus asked him ,
42018041	“ What do you want me to do for you ? ” “ Lord , ” he said , “ I want to see ! ”
42018042	And Jesus said , “ All right , receive your sight ! Your faith has healed you . ”
42018043	Instantly the man could see , and he followed Jesus , praising God . And all who saw it praised God , too .
42019001	Jesus entered Jericho and made his way through the town .
42019002	There was a man there named Zacchaeus . He was the chief tax collector in the region , and he had become very rich .
42019003	He tried to get a look at Jesus , but he was too short to see over the crowd .
42019004	So he ran ahead and climbed a sycamore-fig tree beside the road , for Jesus was going to pass that way .
42019005	When Jesus came by , he looked up at Zacchaeus and called him by name . “ Zacchaeus ! ” he said . “ Quick , come down ! I must be a guest in your home today . ”
42019006	Zacchaeus quickly climbed down and took Jesus to his house in great excitement and joy .
42019007	But the people were displeased . “ He has gone to be the guest of a notorious sinner , ” they grumbled .
42019008	Meanwhile , Zacchaeus stood before the Lord and said , “ I will give half my wealth to the poor , Lord , and if I have cheated people on their taxes , I will give them back four times as much ! ”

42019011	The crowd was listening to everything Jesus said . And because he was nearing Jerusalem , he told them a story to correct the impression that the Kingdom of God would begin right away .
42019012	He said , “ A nobleman was called away to a distant empire to be crowned king and then return .
42019013	Before he left , he called together ten of his servants and divided among them ten pounds of silver , saying , ‘ Invest this for me while I am gone . ’
42019014	But his people hated him and sent a delegation after him to say , ‘ We do not want him to be our king . ’
42019015	“ After he was crowned king , he returned and called in the servants to whom he had given the money . He wanted to find out what their profits were .
42019016	The first servant reported , ‘ Master , I invested your money and made ten times the original amount ! ’
42019017	“ ‘ Well done ! ’ the king exclaimed . ‘ You are a good servant . You have been faithful with the little I entrusted to you , so you will be governor of ten cities as your reward . ’
42019018	“ The next servant reported , ‘ Master , I invested your money and made five times the original amount . ’
42019019	“ ‘ Well done ! ’ the king said . ‘ You will be governor over five cities . ’
42019020	“ But the third servant brought back only the original amount of money and said , ‘ Master , I hid your money and kept it safe .
42019021	I was afraid because you are a hard man to deal with , taking what isn’t yours and harvesting crops you didn’t plant . ’
42019022	“ ‘ You wicked servant ! ’ the king roared . ‘ Your own words condemn you . If you knew that I’m a hard man who takes what isn’t mine and harvests crops I didn’t plant ,
42019023	why didn’t you deposit my money in the bank ? At least I could have gotten some interest on it . ’
42019024	“ Then , turning to the others standing nearby , the king ordered , ‘ Take the money from this servant , and give it to the one who has ten pounds . ’
42019025	“ ‘ But , master , ’ they said , ‘ he already has ten pounds ! ’
42019026	“ ‘ Yes , ’ the king replied , ‘ and to those who use well what they are given , even more will be given . But from those who do nothing , even what little they have will be taken away .
42019027	And as for these enemies of mine who didn’t want me to be their kingbring them in and execute them right here in front of me . ’ ”
42019028	After telling this story , Jesus went on toward Jerusalem , walking ahead of his disciples .
42019029	As he came to the towns of Bethphage and Bethany on the Mount of Olives , he sent two disciples ahead .
42019030	“ Go into that village over there , ” he told them . “ As you enter it , you will see a young donkey tied there that no one has ever ridden . Untie it and bring it here .
42019031	If anyone asks , ‘ Why are you untying that colt ? ’ just say , ‘ The Lord needs it . ’ ”
42019032	So they went and found the colt , just as Jesus had said .
42019033	And sure enough , as they were untying it , the owners asked them , “ Why are you untying that colt ? ”
42019034	And the disciples simply replied , “ The Lord needs it . ”
42019035	So they brought the colt to Jesus and threw their garments over it for him to ride on .
42019036	As he rode along , the crowds spread out their garments on the road ahead of him .
42019037	When he reached the place where the road started down the Mount of Olives , all of his followers began to shout and sing as they walked along , praising God for all the wonderful miracles they had seen .
42019038	“ Blessings on the King who comes in the name of the L ord ! Peace in heaven , and glory in highest heaven ! ”
42019039	But some of the Pharisees among the crowd said , “ Teacher , rebuke your followers for saying things like that ! ”
42019040	He replied , “ If they kept quiet , the stones along the road would burst into cheers ! ”
42019041	But as he came closer to Jerusalem and saw the city ahead , he began to weep .
42019042	“ How I wish today that you of all people would understand the way to peace . But now it is too late , and peace is hidden from your eyes .
42019043	Before long your enemies will build ramparts against your walls and encircle you and close in on you from every side .
42019044	They will crush you into the ground , and your children with you . Your enemies will not leave a single stone in place , because you did not accept your opportunity for salvation . ”
42019045	Then Jesus entered the Temple and began to drive out the people selling animals for sacrifices .
42019046	He said to them , “ The Scriptures declare , ‘ My Temple will be a house of prayer , ’ but you have turned it into a den of thieves . ”
42019047	After that , he taught daily in the Temple , but the leading priests , the teachers of religious law , and the other leaders of the people began planning how to kill him .
42019048	But they could think of nothing , because all the people hung on every word he said .
42020001	One day as Jesus was teaching the people and preaching the Good News in the Temple , the leading priests , the teachers of religious law , and the elders came up to him .
42020002	They demanded , “ By what authority are you doing all these things ? Who gave you the right ? ”
42020003	“ Let me ask you a question first , ” he replied .
42020004	“ Did John’s authority to baptize come from heaven , or was it merely human ? ”
42020005	They talked it over among themselves . “ If we say it was from heaven , he will ask why we didn’t believe John .
42020006	But if we say it was merely human , the people will stone us because they are convinced John was a prophet . ”
42020007	So they finally replied that they didn’t know .
42020008	And Jesus responded , “ Then I won’t tell you by what authority I do these things . ”
42020009	Now Jesus turned to the people again and told them this story : “ A man planted a vineyard , leased it to tenant farmers , and moved to another country to live for several years .
42020010	At the time of the grape harvest , he sent one of his servants to collect his share of the crop . But the farmers attacked the servant , beat him up , and sent him back empty-handed .
42020011	So the owner sent another servant , but they also insulted him , beat him up , and sent him away empty-handed .
42020012	A third man was sent , and they wounded him and chased him away .
42020013	“ ‘ What will I do ? ’ the owner asked himself . ‘ I know ! I’ll send my cherished son . Surely they will respect him . ’
42020014	“ But when the tenant farmers saw his son , they said to each other , ‘ Here comes the heir to this estate . Let’s kill him and get the estate for ourselves ! ’
42020015	So they dragged him out of the vineyard and murdered him . “ What do you suppose the owner of the vineyard will do to them ? ” Jesus asked .
42020016	“ I’ll tell youhe will come and kill those farmers and lease the vineyard to others . ” “ How terrible that such a thing should ever happen , ” his listeners protested .
42020017	Jesus looked at them and said , “ Then what does this Scripture mean ? ‘ The stone that the builders rejected has now become the cornerstone . ’
42020018	Everyone who stumbles over that stone will be broken to pieces , and it will crush anyone it falls on . ”
42020019	The teachers of religious law and the leading priests wanted to arrest Jesus immediately because they realized he was telling the story against themthey were the wicked farmers . But they were afraid of the people’s reaction .
42020020	Watching for their opportunity , the leaders sent spies pretending to be honest men . They tried to get Jesus to say something that could be reported to the Roman governor so he would arrest Jesus .
42020021	“ Teacher , ” they said , “ we know that you speak and teach what is right and are not influenced by what others think . You teach the way of God truthfully .
42020022	Now tell usis it right for us to pay taxes to Caesar or not ? ”
42020023	He saw through their trickery and said ,
42020024	“ Show me a Roman coin . Whose picture and title are stamped on it ? ” “ Caesar’s , ” they replied .
42020025	“ Well then , ” he said , “ give to Caesar what belongs to Caesar , and give to God what belongs to God . ”
42020026	So they failed to trap him by what he said in front of the people . Instead , they were amazed by his answer , and they became silent .
42020027	Then Jesus was approached by some Sadduceesreligious leaders who say there is no resurrection from the dead .
42020028	They posed this question : “ Teacher , Moses gave us a law that if a man dies , leaving a wife but no children , his brother should marry the widow and have a child who will carry on the brother’s name .
42020029	Well , suppose there were seven brothers . The oldest one married and then died without children .
42020030	So the second brother married the widow , but he also died .
42020031	Then the third brother married her . This continued with all seven of them , who died without children .
42020032	Finally , the woman also died .
42020033	So tell us , whose wife will she be in the resurrection ? For all seven were married to her ! ”
42020034	Jesus replied , “ Marriage is for people here on earth .
42020035	But in the age to come , those worthy of being raised from the dead will neither marry nor be given in marriage .
42020036	And they will never die again . In this respect they will be like angels . They are children of God and children of the resurrection .
42020037	“ But now , as to whether the dead will be raisedeven Moses proved this when he wrote about the burning bush . Long after Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob had died , he referred to the Lord as ‘ the God of Abraham , the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . ’
42020038	So he is the God of the living , not the dead , for they are all alive to him . ”
42020039	“ Well said , Teacher ! ” remarked some of the teachers of religious law who were standing there .
42020040	And then no one dared to ask him any more questions .
42020041	Then Jesus presented them with a question . “ Why is it , ” he asked , “ that the Messiah is said to be the son of David ?
42020042	For David himself wrote in the book of Psalms : ‘ The L ord said to my Lord , Sit in the place of honor at my right hand
42020043	until I humble your enemies , making them a footstool under your feet . ’
42020044	Since David called the Messiah ‘ Lord , ’ how can the Messiah be his son ? ”
42020045	Then , with the crowds listening , he turned to his disciples and said ,
42020046	“ Beware of these teachers of religious law ! For they like to parade around in flowing robes and love to receive respectful greetings as they walk in the marketplaces . And how they love the seats of honor in the synagogues and the head table at banquets .
42020047	Yet they shamelessly cheat widows out of their property and then pretend to be pious by making long prayers in public . Because of this , they will be severely punished . ”
42022001	The Festival of Unleavened Bread , which is also called Passover , was approaching .
42022002	The leading priests and teachers of religious law were plotting how to kill Jesus , but they were afraid of the people’s reaction .
42022003	Then Satan entered into Judas Iscariot , who was one of the twelve disciples ,
42022004	and he went to the leading priests and captains of the Temple guard to discuss the best way to betray Jesus to them .
42022005	They were delighted , and they promised to give him money .
42022006	So he agreed and began looking for an opportunity to betray Jesus so they could arrest him when the crowds weren’t around .
42022007	Now the Festival of Unleavened Bread arrived , when the Passover lamb is sacrificed .
42022008	Jesus sent Peter and John ahead and said , “ Go and prepare the Passover meal , so we can eat it together . ”
42022009	“ Where do you want us to prepare it ? ” they asked him .

42022035	Then Jesus asked them , “ When I sent you out to preach the Good News and you did not have money , a traveler’s bag , or an extra pair of sandals , did you need anything ? ” “ No , ” they replied .

42022042	“ Father , if you are willing , please take this cup of suffering away from me . Yet I want your will to be done , not mine . ”
42022043	Then an angel from heaven appeared and strengthened him .
42022044	He prayed more fervently , and he was in such agony of spirit that his sweat fell to the ground like great drops of blood .

42022047	But even as Jesus said this , a crowd approached , led by Judas , one of the twelve disciples . Judas walked over to Jesus to greet him with a kiss .

42023050	Now there was a good and righteous man named Joseph . He was a member of the Jewish high council ,
42023051	but he had not agreed with the decision and actions of the other religious leaders . He was from the town of Arimathea in Judea , and he was waiting for the Kingdom of God to come .
42023052	He went to Pilate and asked for Jesus’ body .
42023053	Then he took the body down from the cross and wrapped it in a long sheet of linen cloth and laid it in a new tomb that had been carved out of rock .
42023054	This was done late on Friday afternoon , the day of preparation , as the Sabbath was about to begin .
42023055	As his body was taken away , the women from Galilee followed and saw the tomb where his body was placed .
42023056	Then they went home and prepared spices and ointments to anoint his body . But by the time they were finished the Sabbath had begun , so they rested as required by the law .
42024001	But very early on Sunday morning the women went to the tomb , taking the spices they had prepared .
42024002	They found that the stone had been rolled away from the entrance .
42024003	So they went in , but they didn’t find the body of the Lord Jesus .
42024004	As they stood there puzzled , two men suddenly appeared to them , clothed in dazzling robes .
42024005	The women were terrified and bowed with their faces to the ground . Then the men asked , “ Why are you looking among the dead for someone who is alive ?
42024006	He isn’t here ! He is risen from the dead ! Remember what he told you back in Galilee ,
42024007	that the Son of Man must be betrayed into the hands of sinful men and be crucified , and that he would rise again on the third day . ”
42024008	Then they remembered that he had said this .
42024009	So they rushed back from the tomb to tell his eleven disciplesand everyone elsewhat had happened .
42024010	It was Mary Magdalene , Joanna , Mary the mother of James , and several other women who told the apostles what had happened .
42024011	But the story sounded like nonsense to the men , so they didn’t believe it .
42024012	However , Peter jumped up and ran to the tomb to look . Stooping , he peered in and saw the empty linen wrappings ; then he went home again , wondering what had happened .
42024013	That same day two of Jesus’ followers were walking to the village of Emmaus , seven miles from Jerusalem .
42024014	As they walked along they were talking about everything that had happened .
42024015	As they talked and discussed these things , Jesus himself suddenly came and began walking with them .
42024016	But God kept them from recognizing him .
42024017	He asked them , “ What are you discussing so intently as you walk along ? ” They stopped short , sadness written across their faces .
42024018	Then one of them , Cleopas , replied , “ You must be the only person in Jerusalem who hasn’t heard about all the things that have happened there the last few days . ”
42024019	“ What things ? ” Jesus asked . “ The things that happened to Jesus , the man from Nazareth , ” they said . “ He was a prophet who did powerful miracles , and he was a mighty teacher in the eyes of God and all the people .
42024020	But our leading priests and other religious leaders handed him over to be condemned to death , and they crucified him .
42024021	We had hoped he was the Messiah who had come to rescue Israel . This all happened three days ago .
42024022	“ Then some women from our group of his followers were at his tomb early this morning , and they came back with an amazing report .
42024023	They said his body was missing , and they had seen angels who told them Jesus is alive !
42024024	Some of our men ran out to see , and sure enough , his body was gone , just as the women had said . ”
42024025	Then Jesus said to them , “ You foolish people ! You find it so hard to believe all that the prophets wrote in the Scriptures .
42024026	Wasn’t it clearly predicted that the Messiah would have to suffer all these things before entering his glory ? ”
42024027	Then Jesus took them through the writings of Moses and all the prophets , explaining from all the Scriptures the things concerning himself .
42024028	By this time they were nearing Emmaus and the end of their journey . Jesus acted as if he were going on ,
42024029	but they begged him , “ Stay the night with us , since it is getting late . ” So he went home with them .
42024030	As they sat down to eat , he took the bread and blessed it . Then he broke it and gave it to them .
42024031	Suddenly , their eyes were opened , and they recognized him . And at that moment he disappeared !
42024032	They said to each other , “ Didn’t our hearts burn within us as he talked with us on the road and explained the Scriptures to us ? ”
42024033	And within the hour they were on their way back to Jerusalem . There they found the eleven disciples and the others who had gathered with them ,
42024034	who said , “ The Lord has really risen ! He appeared to Peter . ”
42024035	Then the two from Emmaus told their story of how Jesus had appeared to them as they were walking along the road , and how they had recognized him as he was breaking the bread .
42024036	And just as they were telling about it , Jesus himself was suddenly standing there among them . “ Peace be with you , ” he said .
42024037	But the whole group was startled and frightened , thinking they were seeing a ghost !
42024038	“ Why are you frightened ? ” he asked . “ Why are your hearts filled with doubt ?
42024039	Look at my hands . Look at my feet . You can see that it’s really me . Touch me and make sure that I am not a ghost , because ghosts don’t have bodies , as you see that I do . ”
42024040	As he spoke , he showed them his hands and his feet .
42024041	Still they stood there in disbelief , filled with joy and wonder . Then he asked them , “ Do you have anything here to eat ? ”
42024042	They gave him a piece of broiled fish ,
42024043	and he ate it as they watched .
42024044	Then he said , “ When I was with you before , I told you that everything written about me in the law of Moses and the prophets and in the Psalms must be fulfilled . ”
42024045	Then he opened their minds to understand the Scriptures .
42024046	And he said , “ Yes , it was written long ago that the Messiah would suffer and die and rise from the dead on the third day .
42024047	It was also written that this message would be proclaimed in the authority of his name to all the nations , beginning in Jerusalem : ‘ There is forgiveness of sins for all who repent . ’
42024048	You are witnesses of all these things .
42024049	“ And now I will send the Holy Spirit , just as my Father promised . But stay here in the city until the Holy Spirit comes and fills you with power from heaven . ”
42024050	Then Jesus led them to Bethany , and lifting his hands to heaven , he blessed them .
42024051	While he was blessing them , he left them and was taken up to heaven .
42024052	So they worshiped him and then returned to Jerusalem filled with great joy .
42024053	And they spent all of their time in the Temple , praising God .
43001001	In the beginning the Word already existed . The Word was with God , and the Word was God .
43001002	He existed in the beginning with God .
43001003	God created everything through him , and nothing was created except through him .
43001004	The Word gave life to everything that was created , and his life brought light to everyone .
43001005	The light shines in the darkness , and the darkness can never extinguish it .
43001006	God sent a man , John the Baptist ,
43001007	to tell about the light so that everyone might believe because of his testimony .
43001008	John himself was not the light ; he was simply a witness to tell about the light .
43001009	The one who is the true light , who gives light to everyone , was coming into the world .
43001010	He came into the very world he created , but the world didn’t recognize him .
43001011	He came to his own people , and even they rejected him .
43001012	But to all who believed him and accepted him , he gave the right to become children of God .
43001013	They are rebornnot with a physical birth resulting from human passion or plan , but a birth that comes from God .
43001014	So the Word became human and made his home among us . He was full of unfailing love and faithfulness . And we have seen his glory , the glory of the Father’s one and only Son .
43001015	John testified about him when he shouted to the crowds , “ This is the one I was talking about when I said , ‘ Someone is coming after me who is far greater than I am , for he existed long before me . ’ ”
43001016	From his abundance we have all received one gracious blessing after another .
43001017	For the law was given through Moses , but God’s unfailing love and faithfulness came through Jesus Christ .
43001018	No one has ever seen God . But the unique One , who is himself God , is near to the Father’s heart . He has revealed God to us .
43001019	This was John’s testimony when the Jewish leaders sent priests and Temple assistants from Jerusalem to ask John , “ Who are you ? ”
43001020	He came right out and said , “ I am not the Messiah . ”
43001021	“ Well then , who are you ? ” they asked . “ Are you Elijah ? ” “ No , ” he replied . “ Are you the Prophet we are expecting ? ” “ No . ”
43001022	“ Then who are you ? We need an answer for those who sent us . What do you have to say about yourself ? ”
43001023	John replied in the words of the prophet Isaiah : “ I am a voice shouting in the wilderness , ‘ Clear the way for the Lord’s coming ! ’ ”
43001024	Then the Pharisees who had been sent
43001025	asked him , “ If you aren’t the Messiah or Elijah or the Prophet , what right do you have to baptize ? ”
43001026	John told them , “ I baptize with water , but right here in the crowd is someone you do not recognize .
43001027	Though his ministry follows mine , I’m not even worthy to be his slave and untie the straps of his sandal . ”
43001028	This encounter took place in Bethany , an area east of the Jordan River , where John was baptizing .
43001029	The next day John saw Jesus coming toward him and said , “ Look ! The Lamb of God who takes away the sin of the world !
43001030	He is the one I was talking about when I said , ‘ A man is coming after me who is far greater than I am , for he existed long before me . ’
43001031	I did not recognize him as the Messiah , but I have been baptizing with water so that he might be revealed to Israel . ”
43001032	Then John testified , “ I saw the Holy Spirit descending like a dove from heaven and resting upon him .
43001033	I didn’t know he was the one , but when God sent me to baptize with water , he told me , ‘ The one on whom you see the Spirit descend and rest is the one who will baptize with the Holy Spirit . ’
43001034	I saw this happen to Jesus , so I testify that he is the Chosen One of God . ”
43001035	The following day John was again standing with two of his disciples .
43001036	As Jesus walked by , John looked at him and declared , “ Look ! There is the Lamb of God ! ”
43001037	When John’s two disciples heard this , they followed Jesus .
43001038	Jesus looked around and saw them following . “ What do you want ? ” he asked them . They replied , “ Rabbi ” ( which means “ Teacher ” ) , “ where are you staying ? ”
43001039	“ Come and see , ” he said . It was about four o’clock in the afternoon when they went with him to the place where he was staying , and they remained with him the rest of the day .
43001040	Andrew , Simon Peter’s brother , was one of these men who heard what John said and then followed Jesus .
43001041	Andrew went to find his brother , Simon , and told him , “ We have found the Messiah ” ( which means “ Christ ” ) .
43001042	Then Andrew brought Simon to meet Jesus . Looking intently at Simon , Jesus said , “ Your name is Simon , son of Johnbut you will be called Cephas ” ( which means “ Peter ” ) .
43001043	The next day Jesus decided to go to Galilee . He found Philip and said to him , “ Come , follow me . ”
43001044	Philip was from Bethsaida , Andrew and Peter’s hometown .
43001045	Philip went to look for Nathanael and told him , “ We have found the very person Moses and the prophets wrote about ! His name is Jesus , the son of Joseph from Nazareth . ”
43001046	“ Nazareth ! ” exclaimed Nathanael . “ Can anything good come from Nazareth ? ” “ Come and see for yourself , ” Philip replied .
43001047	As they approached , Jesus said , “ Now here is a genuine son of Israela man of complete integrity . ”
43001048	“ How do you know about me ? ” Nathanael asked . Jesus replied , “ I could see you under the fig tree before Philip found you . ”
43001049	Then Nathanael exclaimed , “ Rabbi , you are the Son of Godthe King of Israel ! ”
43001050	Jesus asked him , “ Do you believe this just because I told you I had seen you under the fig tree ? You will see greater things than this . ”
43001051	Then he said , “ I tell you the truth , you will all see heaven open and the angels of God going up and down on the Son of Man , the one who is the stairway between heaven and earth . ”
43002001	The next day there was a wedding celebration in the village of Cana in Galilee . Jesus’ mother was there ,
43002002	and Jesus and his disciples were also invited to the celebration .
43002003	The wine supply ran out during the festivities , so Jesus’ mother told him , “ They have no more wine . ”
43002004	“ Dear woman , that’s not our problem , ” Jesus replied . “ My time has not yet come . ”
43002005	But his mother told the servants , “ Do whatever he tells you . ”
43002006	Standing nearby were six stone water jars , used for Jewish ceremonial washing . Each could hold twenty to thirty gallons .
43002007	Jesus told the servants , “ Fill the jars with water . ” When the jars had been filled ,
43002008	he said , “ Now dip some out , and take it to the master of ceremonies . ” So the servants followed his instructions .
43002009	When the master of ceremonies tasted the water that was now wine , not knowing where it had come from ( though , of course , the servants knew ) , he called the bridegroom over .
43002010	“ A host always serves the best wine first , ” he said . “ Then , when everyone has had a lot to drink , he brings out the less expensive wine . But you have kept the best until now ! ”
43002011	This miraculous sign at Cana in Galilee was the first time Jesus revealed his glory . And his disciples believed in him .
43002012	After the wedding he went to Capernaum for a few days with his mother , his brothers , and his disciples .
43002013	It was nearly time for the Jewish Passover celebration , so Jesus went to Jerusalem .
43002014	In the Temple area he saw merchants selling cattle , sheep , and doves for sacrifices ; he also saw dealers at tables exchanging foreign money .
43002015	Jesus made a whip from some ropes and chased them all out of the Temple . He drove out the sheep and cattle , scattered the money changers’ coins over the floor , and turned over their tables .
43002016	Then , going over to the people who sold doves , he told them , “ Get these things out of here . Stop turning my Father’s house into a marketplace ! ”
43002017	Then his disciples remembered this prophecy from the Scriptures : “ Passion for God’s house will consume me . ”
43002018	But the Jewish leaders demanded , “ What are you doing ? If God gave you authority to do this , show us a miraculous sign to prove it . ”
43002019	“ All right , ” Jesus replied . “ Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up . ”
43002020	“ What ! ” they exclaimed . “ It has taken forty-six years to build this Temple , and you can rebuild it in three days ? ”
43002021	But when Jesus said “ this temple , ” he meant his own body .
43002022	After he was raised from the dead , his disciples remembered he had said this , and they believed both the Scriptures and what Jesus had said .
43002023	Because of the miraculous signs Jesus did in Jerusalem at the Passover celebration , many began to trust in him .
43002024	But Jesus didn’t trust them , because he knew human nature .
43002025	No one needed to tell him what mankind is really like .
43003001	There was a man named Nicodemus , a Jewish religious leader who was a Pharisee .
43003002	After dark one evening , he came to speak with Jesus . “ Rabbi , ” he said , “ we all know that God has sent you to teach us . Your miraculous signs are evidence that God is with you . ”
43003003	Jesus replied , “ I tell you the truth , unless you are born again , you cannot see the Kingdom of God . ”
43003004	“ What do you mean ? ” exclaimed Nicodemus . “ How can an old man go back into his mother’s womb and be born again ? ”
43003005	Jesus replied , “ I assure you , no one can enter the Kingdom of God without being born of water and the Spirit .
43003006	Humans can reproduce only human life , but the Holy Spirit gives birth to spiritual life .
43003007	So don’t be surprised when I say , ‘ You must be born again . ’
43003008	The wind blows wherever it wants . Just as you can hear the wind but can’t tell where it comes from or where it is going , so you can’t explain how people are born of the Spirit . ”
43003009	“ How are these things possible ? ” Nicodemus asked .
43003010	Jesus replied , “ You are a respected Jewish teacher , and yet you don’t understand these things ?
43003011	I assure you , we tell you what we know and have seen , and yet you won’t believe our testimony .
43003012	But if you don’t believe me when I tell you about earthly things , how can you possibly believe if I tell you about heavenly things ?
43003013	No one has ever gone to heaven and returned . But the Son of Man has come down from heaven .
43003014	And as Moses lifted up the bronze snake on a pole in the wilderness , so the Son of Man must be lifted up ,
43003015	so that everyone who believes in him will have eternal life .
43003016	“ For God loved the world so much that he gave his one and only Son , so that everyone who believes in him will not perish but have eternal life .
43003017	God sent his Son into the world not to judge the world , but to save the world through him .
43003018	“ There is no judgment against anyone who believes in him . But anyone who does not believe in him has already been judged for not believing in God’s one and only Son .
43003019	And the judgment is based on this fact : God’s light came into the world , but people loved the darkness more than the light , for their actions were evil .
43003020	All who do evil hate the light and refuse to go near it for fear their sins will be exposed .
43003021	But those who do what is right come to the light so others can see that they are doing what God wants . ”
43003022	Then Jesus and his disciples left Jerusalem and went into the Judean countryside . Jesus spent some time with them there , baptizing people .
43003023	At this time John the Baptist was baptizing at Aenon , near Salim , because there was plenty of water there ; and people kept coming to him for baptism .
43003024	( This was before John was thrown into prison . )
43003025	A debate broke out between John’s disciples and a certain Jew over ceremonial cleansing .
43003026	So John’s disciples came to him and said , “ Rabbi , the man you met on the other side of the Jordan River , the one you identified as the Messiah , is also baptizing people . And everybody is going to him instead of coming to us . ”
43003027	John replied , “ No one can receive anything unless God gives it from heaven .

43003029	It is the bridegroom who marries the bride , and the best man is simply glad to stand with him and hear his vows . Therefore , I am filled with joy at his success .
43003030	He must become greater and greater , and I must become less and less .

43003032	He testifies about what he has seen and heard , but how few believe what he tells them !
43003033	Anyone who accepts his testimony can affirm that God is true .

43004001	Jesus knew the Pharisees had heard that he was baptizing and making more disciples than John
43004002	( though Jesus himself didn’t baptize themhis disciples did ) .

43004004	He had to go through Samaria on the way .
43004005	Eventually he came to the Samaritan village of Sychar , near the field that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
43004006	Jacob’s well was there ; and Jesus , tired from the long walk , sat wearily beside the well about noontime .
43004007	Soon a Samaritan woman came to draw water , and Jesus said to her , “ Please give me a drink . ”
43004008	He was alone at the time because his disciples had gone into the village to buy some food .
43004009	The woman was surprised , for Jews refuse to have anything to do with Samaritans . She said to Jesus , “ You are a Jew , and I am a Samaritan woman . Why are you asking me for a drink ? ”
43004010	Jesus replied , “ If you only knew the gift God has for you and who you are speaking to , you would ask me , and I would give you living water . ”
43004011	“ But sir , you don’t have a rope or a bucket , ” she said , “ and this well is very deep . Where would you get this living water ?
43004012	And besides , do you think you’re greater than our ancestor Jacob , who gave us this well ? How can you offer better water than he and his sons and his animals enjoyed ? ”
43004013	Jesus replied , “ Anyone who drinks this water will soon become thirsty again .
43004014	But those who drink the water I give will never be thirsty again . It becomes a fresh , bubbling spring within them , giving them eternal life . ”
43004015	“ Please , sir , ” the woman said , “ give me this water ! Then I’ll never be thirsty again , and I won’t have to come here to get water . ”
43004016	“ Go and get your husband , ” Jesus told her .
43004017	“ I don’t have a husband , ” the woman replied . Jesus said , “ You’re right ! You don’t have a husband

43004027	Just then his disciples came back . They were shocked to find him talking to a woman , but none of them had the nerve to ask , “ What do you want with her ? ” or “ Why are you talking to her ? ”

43004037	You know the saying , ‘ One plants and another harvests . ’ And it’s true .
