43005001	Afterward Jesus returned to Jerusalem for one of the Jewish holy days .
43005002	Inside the city , near the Sheep Gate , was the pool of Bethesda , with five covered porches .
43005003	Crowds of sick peopleblind , lame , or paralyzedlay on the porches .
43005005	One of the men lying there had been sick for thirty-eight years .
43005006	When Jesus saw him and knew he had been ill for a long time , he asked him , “ Would you like to get well ? ”
43005007	“ I can’t , sir , ” the sick man said , “ for I have no one to put me into the pool when the water bubbles up . Someone else always gets there ahead of me . ”
43005008	Jesus told him , “ Stand up , pick up your mat , and walk ! ”
43005009	Instantly , the man was healed ! He rolled up his sleeping mat and began walking ! But this miracle happened on the Sabbath ,
43005010	so the Jewish leaders objected . They said to the man who was cured , “ You can’t work on the Sabbath ! The law doesn’t allow you to carry that sleeping mat ! ”
43005011	But he replied , “ The man who healed me told me , ‘ Pick up your mat and walk . ’ ”
43005012	“ Who said such a thing as that ? ” they demanded .
43005013	The man didn’t know , for Jesus had disappeared into the crowd .
43005014	But afterward Jesus found him in the Temple and told him , “ Now you are well ; so stop sinning , or something even worse may happen to you . ”
43005015	Then the man went and told the Jewish leaders that it was Jesus who had healed him .
43005016	So the Jewish leaders began harassing Jesus for breaking the Sabbath rules .
43005017	But Jesus replied , “ My Father is always working , and so am I . ”
43005018	So the Jewish leaders tried all the harder to find a way to kill him . For he not only broke the Sabbath , he called God his Father , thereby making himself equal with God .
43005019	So Jesus explained , “ I tell you the truth , the Son can do nothing by himself . He does only what he sees the Father doing . Whatever the Father does , the Son also does .
43005020	For the Father loves the Son and shows him everything he is doing . In fact , the Father will show him how to do even greater works than healing this man . Then you will truly be astonished .
43005021	For just as the Father gives life to those he raises from the dead , so the Son gives life to anyone he wants .
43005022	In addition , the Father judges no one . Instead , he has given the Son absolute authority to judge ,
43005023	so that everyone will honor the Son , just as they honor the Father . Anyone who does not honor the Son is certainly not honoring the Father who sent him .
43005024	“ I tell you the truth , those who listen to my message and believe in God who sent me have eternal life . They will never be condemned for their sins , but they have already passed from death into life .
43005025	“ And I assure you that the time is coming , indeed it’s here now , when the dead will hear my voicethe voice of the Son of God . And those who listen will live .
43005026	The Father has life in himself , and he has granted that same life-giving power to his Son .
43005027	And he has given him authority to judge everyone because he is the Son of Man .
43005028	Don’t be so surprised ! Indeed , the time is coming when all the dead in their graves will hear the voice of God’s Son ,
43005029	and they will rise again . Those who have done good will rise to experience eternal life , and those who have continued in evil will rise to experience judgment .
43005030	I can do nothing on my own . I judge as God tells me . Therefore , my judgment is just , because I carry out the will of the one who sent me , not my own will .
43005031	“ If I were to testify on my own behalf , my testimony would not be valid .
43005032	But someone else is also testifying about me , and I assure you that everything he says about me is true .
43005033	In fact , you sent investigators to listen to John the Baptist , and his testimony about me was true .
43005034	Of course , I have no need of human witnesses , but I say these things so you might be saved .
43005035	John was like a burning and shining lamp , and you were excited for a while about his message .
43005036	But I have a greater witness than Johnmy teachings and my miracles . The Father gave me these works to accomplish , and they prove that he sent me .
43005037	And the Father who sent me has testified about me himself . You have never heard his voice or seen him face to face ,
43005038	and you do not have his message in your hearts , because you do not believe methe one he sent to you .
43005039	“ You search the Scriptures because you think they give you eternal life . But the Scriptures point to me !
43005040	Yet you refuse to come to me to receive this life .
43005041	“ Your approval means nothing to me ,
43005042	because I know you don’t have God’s love within you .
43005043	For I have come to you in my Father’s name , and you have rejected me . Yet if others come in their own name , you gladly welcome them .
43005044	No wonder you can’t believe ! For you gladly honor each other , but you don’t care about the honor that comes from the one who alone is God .
43005045	“ Yet it isn’t I who will accuse you before the Father . Moses will accuse you ! Yes , Moses , in whom you put your hopes .
43005046	If you really believed Moses , you would believe me , because he wrote about me .
43005047	But since you don’t believe what he wrote , how will you believe what I say ? ”
43006001	After this , Jesus crossed over to the far side of the Sea of Galilee , also known as the Sea of Tiberias .
43006002	A huge crowd kept following him wherever he went , because they saw his miraculous signs as he healed the sick .
43006003	Then Jesus climbed a hill and sat down with his disciples around him .
43006004	( It was nearly time for the Jewish Passover celebration . )
43006005	Jesus soon saw a huge crowd of people coming to look for him . Turning to Philip , he asked , “ Where can we buy bread to feed all these people ? ”
43006006	He was testing Philip , for he already knew what he was going to do .
43006007	Philip replied , “ Even if we worked for months , we wouldn’t have enough money to feed them ! ”
43006008	Then Andrew , Simon Peter’s brother , spoke up .
43006009	“ There’s a young boy here with five barley loaves and two fish . But what good is that with this huge crowd ? ”
43006010	“ Tell everyone to sit down , ” Jesus said . So they all sat down on the grassy slopes . ( The men alone numbered about 5,000 . )
43006011	Then Jesus took the loaves , gave thanks to God , and distributed them to the people . Afterward he did the same with the fish . And they all ate as much as they wanted .
43006012	After everyone was full , Jesus told his disciples , “ Now gather the leftovers , so that nothing is wasted . ”
43006013	So they picked up the pieces and filled twelve baskets with scraps left by the people who had eaten from the five barley loaves .
43006014	When the people saw him do this miraculous sign , they exclaimed , “ Surely , he is the Prophet we have been expecting ! ”
43006015	When Jesus saw that they were ready to force him to be their king , he slipped away into the hills by himself .
43006016	That evening Jesus’ disciples went down to the shore to wait for him .
43006017	But as darkness fell and Jesus still hadn’t come back , they got into the boat and headed across the lake toward Capernaum .
43006018	Soon a gale swept down upon them , and the sea grew very rough .
43006019	They had rowed three or four miles when suddenly they saw Jesus walking on the water toward the boat . They were terrified ,
43006020	but he called out to them , “ Don’t be afraid . I am here ! ”
43006021	Then they were eager to let him in the boat , and immediately they arrived at their destination !
43006022	The next day the crowd that had stayed on the far shore saw that the disciples had taken the only boat , and they realized Jesus had not gone with them .
43006023	Several boats from Tiberias landed near the place where the Lord had blessed the bread and the people had eaten .
43006024	So when the crowd saw that neither Jesus nor his disciples were there , they got into the boats and went across to Capernaum to look for him .
43006025	They found him on the other side of the lake and asked , “ Rabbi , when did you get here ? ”
43006026	Jesus replied , “ I tell you the truth , you want to be with me because I fed you , not because you understood the miraculous signs .
43006027	But don’t be so concerned about perishable things like food . Spend your energy seeking the eternal life that the Son of Man can give you . For God the Father has given me the seal of his approval . ”
43006028	They replied , “ We want to perform God’s works , too . What should we do ? ”
43006029	Jesus told them , “ This is the only work God wants from you : Believe in the one he has sent . ”
43006030	They answered , “ Show us a miraculous sign if you want us to believe in you . What can you do ?
43006031	After all , our ancestors ate manna while they journeyed through the wilderness ! The Scriptures say , ‘ Moses gave them bread from heaven to eat . ’ ”
43006032	Jesus said , “ I tell you the truth , Moses didn’t give you bread from heaven . My Father did . And now he offers you the true bread from heaven .
43006033	The true bread of God is the one who comes down from heaven and gives life to the world . ”
43006034	“ Sir , ” they said , “ give us that bread every day . ”
43006035	Jesus replied , “ I am the bread of life . Whoever comes to me will never be hungry again . Whoever believes in me will never be thirsty .
43006036	But you haven’t believed in me even though you have seen me .
43006037	However , those the Father has given me will come to me , and I will never reject them .
43006038	For I have come down from heaven to do the will of God who sent me , not to do my own will .
43006039	And this is the will of God , that I should not lose even one of all those he has given me , but that I should raise them up at the last day .
43006040	For it is my Father’s will that all who see his Son and believe in him should have eternal life . I will raise them up at the last day . ”
43006041	Then the people began to murmur in disagreement because he had said , “ I am the bread that came down from heaven . ”
43006042	They said , “ Isn’t this Jesus , the son of Joseph ? We know his father and mother . How can he say , ‘ I came down from heaven ’ ? ”
43006043	But Jesus replied , “ Stop complaining about what I said .
43006044	For no one can come to me unless the Father who sent me draws them to me , and at the last day I will raise them up .
43006045	As it is written in the Scriptures , ‘ They will all be taught by God . ’ Everyone who listens to the Father and learns from him comes to me .
43006046	( Not that anyone has ever seen the Father ; only I , who was sent from God , have seen him . )
43006047	“ I tell you the truth , anyone who believes has eternal life .
43006048	Yes , I am the bread of life !
43006049	Your ancestors ate manna in the wilderness , but they all died .
43006050	Anyone who eats the bread from heaven , however , will never die .
43006051	I am the living bread that came down from heaven . Anyone who eats this bread will live forever ; and this bread , which I will offer so the world may live , is my flesh . ”
43006052	Then the people began arguing with each other about what he meant . “ How can this man give us his flesh to eat ? ” they asked .
43006053	So Jesus said again , “ I tell you the truth , unless you eat the flesh of the Son of Man and drink his blood , you cannot have eternal life within you .
43006054	But anyone who eats my flesh and drinks my blood has eternal life , and I will raise that person at the last day .
43006055	For my flesh is true food , and my blood is true drink .
43006056	Anyone who eats my flesh and drinks my blood remains in me , and I in him .
43006057	I live because of the living Father who sent me ; in the same way , anyone who feeds on me will live because of me .
43006058	I am the true bread that came down from heaven . Anyone who eats this bread will not die as your ancestors did ( even though they ate the manna ) but will live forever . ”
43006059	He said these things while he was teaching in the synagogue in Capernaum .
43006060	Many of his disciples said , “ This is very hard to understand . How can anyone accept it ? ”
43006061	Jesus was aware that his disciples were complaining , so he said to them , “ Does this offend you ?
43006062	Then what will you think if you see the Son of Man ascend to heaven again ?
43006063	The Spirit alone gives eternal life . Human effort accomplishes nothing . And the very words I have spoken to you are spirit and life .
43006064	But some of you do not believe me . ” ( For Jesus knew from the beginning which ones didn’t believe , and he knew who would betray him . )
43006065	Then he said , “ That is why I said that people can’t come to me unless the Father gives them to me . ”
43006066	At this point many of his disciples turned away and deserted him .
43006067	Then Jesus turned to the Twelve and asked , “ Are you also going to leave ? ”
43006068	Simon Peter replied , “ Lord , to whom would we go ? You have the words that give eternal life .
43006069	We believe , and we know you are the Holy One of God . ”
43006070	Then Jesus said , “ I chose the twelve of you , but one is a devil . ”
43006071	He was speaking of Judas , son of Simon Iscariot , one of the Twelve , who would later betray him .
43007001	After this , Jesus traveled around Galilee . He wanted to stay out of Judea , where the Jewish leaders were plotting his death .
43007002	But soon it was time for the Jewish Festival of Shelters ,
43007003	and Jesus’ brothers said to him , “ Leave here and go to Judea , where your followers can see your miracles !
43007004	You can’t become famous if you hide like this ! If you can do such wonderful things , show yourself to the world ! ”
43007005	For even his brothers didn’t believe in him .
43007006	Jesus replied , “ Now is not the right time for me to go , but you can go anytime .
43007007	The world can’t hate you , but it does hate me because I accuse it of doing evil .
43007008	You go on . I’m not going to this festival , because my time has not yet come . ”
43007009	After saying these things , Jesus remained in Galilee .
43007010	But after his brothers left for the festival , Jesus also went , though secretly , staying out of public view .
43007011	The Jewish leaders tried to find him at the festival and kept asking if anyone had seen him .
43007012	There was a lot of grumbling about him among the crowds . Some argued , “ He’s a good man , ” but others said , “ He’s nothing but a fraud who deceives the people . ”
43007013	But no one had the courage to speak favorably about him in public , for they were afraid of getting in trouble with the Jewish leaders .
43007014	Then , midway through the festival , Jesus went up to the Temple and began to teach .
43007015	The people were surprised when they heard him . “ How does he know so much when he hasn’t been trained ? ” they asked .
43007016	So Jesus told them , “ My message is not my own ; it comes from God who sent me .
43007017	Anyone who wants to do the will of God will know whether my teaching is from God or is merely my own .
43007018	Those who speak for themselves want glory only for themselves , but a person who seeks to honor the one who sent him speaks truth , not lies .
43007019	Moses gave you the law , but none of you obeys it ! In fact , you are trying to kill me . ”
43007020	The crowd replied , “ You’re demon possessed ! Who’s trying to kill you ? ”
43007021	Jesus replied , “ I did one miracle on the Sabbath , and you were amazed .
43007022	But you work on the Sabbath , too , when you obey Moses’ law of circumcision . ( Actually , this tradition of circumcision began with the patriarchs , long before the law of Moses . )
43007023	For if the correct time for circumcising your son falls on the Sabbath , you go ahead and do it so as not to break the law of Moses . So why should you be angry with me for healing a man on the Sabbath ?
43007024	Look beneath the surface so you can judge correctly . ”
43007025	Some of the people who lived in Jerusalem started to ask each other , “ Isn’t this the man they are trying to kill ?
43007026	But here he is , speaking in public , and they say nothing to him . Could our leaders possibly believe that he is the Messiah ?
43007027	But how could he be ? For we know where this man comes from . When the Messiah comes , he will simply appear ; no one will know where he comes from . ”
43007028	While Jesus was teaching in the Temple , he called out , “ Yes , you know me , and you know where I come from . But I’m not here on my own . The one who sent me is true , and you don’t know him .
43007029	But I know him because I come from him , and he sent me to you . ”
43007030	Then the leaders tried to arrest him ; but no one laid a hand on him , because his time had not yet come .
43007031	Many among the crowds at the Temple believed in him . “ After all , ” they said , “ would you expect the Messiah to do more miraculous signs than this man has done ? ”
43007032	When the Pharisees heard that the crowds were whispering such things , they and the leading priests sent Temple guards to arrest Jesus .
43007033	But Jesus told them , “ I will be with you only a little longer . Then I will return to the one who sent me .
43007034	You will search for me but not find me . And you cannot go where I am going . ”
43007035	The Jewish leaders were puzzled by this statement . “ Where is he planning to go ? ” they asked . “ Is he thinking of leaving the country and going to the Jews in other lands ? Maybe he will even teach the Greeks !
43007036	What does he mean when he says , ‘ You will search for me but not find me , ’ and ‘ You cannot go where I am going ’ ? ”
43007037	On the last day , the climax of the festival , Jesus stood and shouted to the crowds , “ Anyone who is thirsty may come to me !
43007038	Anyone who believes in me may come and drink ! For the Scriptures declare , ‘ Rivers of living water will flow from his heart . ’ ”
43007039	( When he said “ living water , ” he was speaking of the Spirit , who would be given to everyone believing in him . But the Spirit had not yet been given , because Jesus had not yet entered into his glory . )
43007040	When the crowds heard him say this , some of them declared , “ Surely this man is the Prophet we’ve been expecting . ”
43007041	Others said , “ He is the Messiah . ” Still others said , “ But he can’t be ! Will the Messiah come from Galilee ?
43007042	For the Scriptures clearly state that the Messiah will be born of the royal line of David , in Bethlehem , the village where King David was born . ”
43007043	So the crowd was divided about him .
43007044	Some even wanted him arrested , but no one laid a hand on him .
43007045	When the Temple guards returned without having arrested Jesus , the leading priests and Pharisees demanded , “ Why didn’t you bring him in ? ”
43007046	“ We have never heard anyone speak like this ! ” the guards responded .
43007047	“ Have you been led astray , too ? ” the Pharisees mocked .
43007048	“ Is there a single one of us rulers or Pharisees who believes in him ?
43007049	This foolish crowd follows him , but they are ignorant of the law . God’s curse is on them ! ”
43007050	Then Nicodemus , the leader who had met with Jesus earlier , spoke up .
43007051	“ Is it legal to convict a man before he is given a hearing ? ” he asked .
43007052	They replied , “ Are you from Galilee , too ? Search the Scriptures and see for yourself no prophet ever comes from Galilee ! ”
43007053	Then the meeting broke up , and everybody went home .
43008001	Jesus returned to the Mount of Olives ,
43008002	but early the next morning he was back again at the Temple . A crowd soon gathered , and he sat down and taught them .
43008003	As he was speaking , the teachers of religious law and the Pharisees brought a woman who had been caught in the act of adultery . They put her in front of the crowd .
43008004	“ Teacher , ” they said to Jesus , “ this woman was caught in the act of adultery .
43008005	The law of Moses says to stone her . What do you say ? ”
43008006	They were trying to trap him into saying something they could use against him , but Jesus stooped down and wrote in the dust with his finger .
43008007	They kept demanding an answer , so he stood up again and said , “ All right , but let the one who has never sinned throw the first stone ! ”
43008008	Then he stooped down again and wrote in the dust .
43008009	When the accusers heard this , they slipped away one by one , beginning with the oldest , until only Jesus was left in the middle of the crowd with the woman .
43008010	Then Jesus stood up again and said to the woman , “ Where are your accusers ? Didn’t even one of them condemn you ? ”
43008011	“ No , Lord , ” she said . And Jesus said , “ Neither do I . Go and sin no more . ”
43008012	Jesus spoke to the people once more and said , “ I am the light of the world . If you follow me , you won’t have to walk in darkness , because you will have the light that leads to life . ”
43008013	The Pharisees replied , “ You are making those claims about yourself ! Such testimony is not valid . ”
43008014	Jesus told them , “ These claims are valid even though I make them about myself . For I know where I came from and where I am going , but you don’t know this about me .
43008015	You judge me by human standards , but I do not judge anyone .
43008016	And if I did , my judgment would be correct in every respect because I am not alone . The Father who sent me is with me .
43008017	Your own law says that if two people agree about something , their witness is accepted as fact .
43008018	I am one witness , and my Father who sent me is the other . ”
43008019	“ Where is your father ? ” they asked . Jesus answered , “ Since you don’t know who I am , you don’t know who my Father is . If you knew me , you would also know my Father . ”
43008020	Jesus made these statements while he was teaching in the section of the Temple known as the Treasury . But he was not arrested , because his time had not yet come .
43008021	Later Jesus said to them again , “ I am going away . You will search for me but will die in your sin . You cannot come where I am going . ”
43008022	The people asked , “ Is he planning to commit suicide ? What does he mean , ‘ You cannot come where I am going ’ ? ”
43008023	Jesus continued , “ You are from below ; I am from above . You belong to this world ; I do not .
43008024	That is why I said that you will die in your sins ; for unless you believe that I A m who I claim to be , you will die in your sins . ”
43008025	“ Who are you ? ” they demanded . Jesus replied , “ The one I have always claimed to be .
43008026	I have much to say about you and much to condemn , but I won’t . For I say only what I have heard from the one who sent me , and he is completely truthful . ”
43008027	But they still didn’t understand that he was talking about his Father .
43008028	So Jesus said , “ When you have lifted up the Son of Man on the cross , then you will understand that I A m he . I do nothing on my own but say only what the Father taught me .
43008029	And the one who sent me is with mehe has not deserted me . For I always do what pleases him . ”
43008030	Then many who heard him say these things believed in him .
43008031	Jesus said to the people who believed in him , “ You are truly my disciples if you remain faithful to my teachings .
43008032	And you will know the truth , and the truth will set you free . ”
43008033	“ But we are descendants of Abraham , ” they said . “ We have never been slaves to anyone . What do you mean , ‘ You will be set free ’ ? ”
43008034	Jesus replied , “ I tell you the truth , everyone who sins is a slave of sin .
43008035	A slave is not a permanent member of the family , but a son is part of the family forever .
43008036	So if the Son sets you free , you are truly free .
43008037	Yes , I realize that you are descendants of Abraham . And yet some of you are trying to kill me because there’s no room in your hearts for my message .
43008038	I am telling you what I saw when I was with my Father . But you are following the advice of your father . ”
43008039	“ Our father is Abraham ! ” they declared . “ No , ” Jesus replied , “ for if you were really the children of Abraham , you would follow his example .
43008040	Instead , you are trying to kill me because I told you the truth , which I heard from God . Abraham never did such a thing .
43008041	No , you are imitating your real father . ” They replied , “ We aren’t illegitimate children ! God himself is our true Father . ”
43008042	Jesus told them , “ If God were your Father , you would love me , because I have come to you from God . I am not here on my own , but he sent me .
43008043	Why can’t you understand what I am saying ? It’s because you can’t even hear me !
43008044	For you are the children of your father the devil , and you love to do the evil things he does . He was a murderer from the beginning . He has always hated the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he lies , it is consistent with his character ; for he is a liar and the father of lies .
43008045	So when I tell the truth , you just naturally don’t believe me !
43008046	Which of you can truthfully accuse me of sin ? And since I am telling you the truth , why don’t you believe me ?
43008047	Anyone who belongs to God listens gladly to the words of God . But you don’t listen because you don’t belong to God . ”
43008048	The people retorted , “ You Samaritan devil ! Didn’t we say all along that you were possessed by a demon ? ”
43008049	“ No , ” Jesus said , “ I have no demon in me . For I honor my Fatherand you dishonor me .
43008050	And though I have no wish to glorify myself , God is going to glorify me . He is the true judge .
43008051	I tell you the truth , anyone who obeys my teaching will never die ! ”
43008052	The people said , “ Now we know you are possessed by a demon . Even Abraham and the prophets died , but you say , ‘ Anyone who obeys my teaching will never die ! ’
43008053	Are you greater than our father Abraham ? He died , and so did the prophets . Who do you think you are ? ”
43008054	Jesus answered , “ If I want glory for myself , it doesn’t count . But it is my Father who will glorify me . You say , ‘ He is our God , ’
43008055	but you don’t even know him . I know him . If I said otherwise , I would be as great a liar as you ! But I do know him and obey him .
43008056	Your father Abraham rejoiced as he looked forward to my coming . He saw it and was glad . ”
43008057	The people said , “ You aren’t even fifty years old . How can you say you have seen Abraham ? ”
43008058	Jesus answered , “ I tell you the truth , before Abraham was even born , I A m ! ”
43008059	At that point they picked up stones to throw at him . But Jesus was hidden from them and left the Temple .
43009001	As Jesus was walking along , he saw a man who had been blind from birth .
43009002	“ Rabbi , ” his disciples asked him , “ why was this man born blind ? Was it because of his own sins or his parents’ sins ? ”
43009003	“ It was not because of his sins or his parents’ sins , ” Jesus answered . “ This happened so the power of God could be seen in him .
43009004	We must quickly carry out the tasks assigned us by the one who sent us . The night is coming , and then no one can work .
43009005	But while I am here in the world , I am the light of the world . ”
43009006	Then he spit on the ground , made mud with the saliva , and spread the mud over the blind man’s eyes .
43009007	He told him , “ Go wash yourself in the pool of Siloam ” ( Siloam means “ sent ” ) . So the man went and washed and came back seeing !
43009008	His neighbors and others who knew him as a blind beggar asked each other , “ Isn’t this the man who used to sit and beg ? ”
43009009	Some said he was , and others said , “ No , he just looks like him ! ” But the beggar kept saying , “ Yes , I am the same one ! ”
43009010	They asked , “ Who healed you ? What happened ? ”
43009011	He told them , “ The man they call Jesus made mud and spread it over my eyes and told me , ‘ Go to the pool of Siloam and wash yourself . ’ So I went and washed , and now I can see ! ”
43009012	“ Where is he now ? ” they asked . “ I don’t know , ” he replied .
43009013	Then they took the man who had been blind to the Pharisees ,
43009014	because it was on the Sabbath that Jesus had made the mud and healed him .
43009015	The Pharisees asked the man all about it . So he told them , “ He put the mud over my eyes , and when I washed it away , I could see ! ”
43009016	Some of the Pharisees said , “ This man Jesus is not from God , for he is working on the Sabbath . ” Others said , “ But how could an ordinary sinner do such miraculous signs ? ” So there was a deep division of opinion among them .
43009017	Then the Pharisees again questioned the man who had been blind and demanded , “ What’s your opinion about this man who healed you ? ” The man replied , “ I think he must be a prophet . ”
43009018	The Jewish leaders still refused to believe the man had been blind and could now see , so they called in his parents .
43009019	They asked them , “ Is this your son ? Was he born blind ? If so , how can he now see ? ”
43009020	His parents replied , “ We know this is our son and that he was born blind ,
43009021	but we don’t know how he can see or who healed him . Ask him . He is old enough to speak for himself . ”
43009022	His parents said this because they were afraid of the Jewish leaders , who had announced that anyone saying Jesus was the Messiah would be expelled from the synagogue .
43009023	That’s why they said , “ He is old enough . Ask him . ”
43009024	So for the second time they called in the man who had been blind and told him , “ God should get the glory for this , because we know this man Jesus is a sinner . ”
43009025	“ I don’t know whether he is a sinner , ” the man replied . “ But I know this : I was blind , and now I can see ! ”
43009026	“ But what did he do ? ” they asked . “ How did he heal you ? ”
43009027	“ Look ! ” the man exclaimed . “ I told you once . Didn’t you listen ? Why do you want to hear it again ? Do you want to become his disciples , too ? ”
43009028	Then they cursed him and said , “ You are his disciple , but we are disciples of Moses !
43009029	We know God spoke to Moses , but we don’t even know where this man comes from . ”
43009030	“ Why , that’s very strange ! ” the man replied . “ He healed my eyes , and yet you don’t know where he comes from ?
43009031	We know that God doesn’t listen to sinners , but he is ready to hear those who worship him and do his will .
43009032	Ever since the world began , no one has been able to open the eyes of someone born blind .
43009033	If this man were not from God , he couldn’t have done it . ”
43009034	“ You were born a total sinner ! ” they answered . “ Are you trying to teach us ? ” And they threw him out of the synagogue .
43009035	When Jesus heard what had happened , he found the man and asked , “ Do you believe in the Son of Man ? ”
43009036	The man answered , “ Who is he , sir ? I want to believe in him . ”
43009037	“ You have seen him , ” Jesus said , “ and he is speaking to you ! ”
43009038	“ Yes , Lord , I believe ! ” the man said . And he worshiped Jesus .
43009039	Then Jesus told him , “ I entered this world to render judgmentto give sight to the blind and to show those who think they see that they are blind . ”
43009040	Some Pharisees who were standing nearby heard him and asked , “ Are you saying we’re blind ? ”
43009041	“ If you were blind , you wouldn’t be guilty , ” Jesus replied . “ But you remain guilty because you claim you can see .
43010001	“ I tell you the truth , anyone who sneaks over the wall of a sheepfold , rather than going through the gate , must surely be a thief and a robber !
43010002	But the one who enters through the gate is the shepherd of the sheep .
43010003	The gatekeeper opens the gate for him , and the sheep recognize his voice and come to him . He calls his own sheep by name and leads them out .
43010004	After he has gathered his own flock , he walks ahead of them , and they follow him because they know his voice .
43010005	They won’t follow a stranger ; they will run from him because they don’t know his voice . ”
43010006	Those who heard Jesus use this illustration didn’t understand what he meant ,
43010007	so he explained it to them : “ I tell you the truth , I am the gate for the sheep .
43010008	All who came before me were thieves and robbers . But the true sheep did not listen to them .
43010009	Yes , I am the gate . Those who come in through me will be saved . They will come and go freely and will find good pastures .
43010010	The thief’s purpose is to steal and kill and destroy . My purpose is to give them a rich and satisfying life .
43010011	“ I am the good shepherd . The good shepherd sacrifices his life for the sheep .
43010012	A hired hand will run when he sees a wolf coming . He will abandon the sheep because they don’t belong to him and he isn’t their shepherd . And so the wolf attacks them and scatters the flock .
43010013	The hired hand runs away because he’s working only for the money and doesn’t really care about the sheep .
43010014	“ I am the good shepherd ; I know my own sheep , and they know me ,
43010015	just as my Father knows me and I know the Father . So I sacrifice my life for the sheep .
43010016	I have other sheep , too , that are not in this sheepfold . I must bring them also . They will listen to my voice , and there will be one flock with one shepherd .
43010017	“ The Father loves me because I sacrifice my life so I may take it back again .
43010018	No one can take my life from me . I sacrifice it voluntarily . For I have the authority to lay it down when I want to and also to take it up again . For this is what my Father has commanded . ”
43010019	When he said these things , the people were again divided in their opinions about him .

43016020	I tell you the truth , you will weep and mourn over what is going to happen to me , but the world will rejoice . You will grieve , but your grief will suddenly turn to wonderful joy .
43016021	It will be like a woman suffering the pains of labor . When her child is born , her anguish gives way to joy because she has brought a new baby into the world .
43016022	So you have sorrow now , but I will see you again ; then you will rejoice , and no one can rob you of that joy .
43016023	At that time you won’t need to ask me for anything . I tell you the truth , you will ask the Father directly , and he will grant your request because you use my name .
43016024	You haven’t done this before . Ask , using my name , and you will receive , and you will have abundant joy .
43016025	“ I have spoken of these matters in figures of speech , but soon I will stop speaking figuratively and will tell you plainly all about the Father .
43016026	Then you will ask in my name . I’m not saying I will ask the Father on your behalf ,
43016027	for the Father himself loves you dearly because you love me and believe that I came from God .
43016028	Yes , I came from the Father into the world , and now I will leave the world and return to the Father . ”
43016029	Then his disciples said , “ At last you are speaking plainly and not figuratively .
43016030	Now we understand that you know everything , and there’s no need to question you . From this we believe that you came from God . ”
43016031	Jesus asked , “ Do you finally believe ?
43016032	But the time is comingindeed it’s here nowwhen you will be scattered , each one going his own way , leaving me alone . Yet I am not alone because the Father is with me .
43016033	I have told you all this so that you may have peace in me . Here on earth you will have many trials and sorrows . But take heart , because I have overcome the world . ”
43017001	After saying all these things , Jesus looked up to heaven and said , “ Father , the hour has come . Glorify your Son so he can give glory back to you .
43017002	For you have given him authority over everyone . He gives eternal life to each one you have given him .
43017003	And this is the way to have eternal lifeto know you , the only true God , and Jesus Christ , the one you sent to earth .
43017004	I brought glory to you here on earth by completing the work you gave me to do .
43017005	Now , Father , bring me into the glory we shared before the world began .
43017006	“ I have revealed you to the ones you gave me from this world . They were always yours . You gave them to me , and they have kept your word .
43017007	Now they know that everything I have is a gift from you ,
43017008	for I have passed on to them the message you gave me . They accepted it and know that I came from you , and they believe you sent me .
43017009	“ My prayer is not for the world , but for those you have given me , because they belong to you .
43017010	All who are mine belong to you , and you have given them to me , so they bring me glory .
43017011	Now I am departing from the world ; they are staying in this world , but I am coming to you . Holy Father , you have given me your name ; now protect them by the power of your name so that they will be united just as we are .
43017012	During my time here , I protected them by the power of the name you gave me . I guarded them so that not one was lost , except the one headed for destruction , as the Scriptures foretold .
43017013	“ Now I am coming to you . I told them many things while I was with them in this world so they would be filled with my joy .
43017014	I have given them your word . And the world hates them because they do not belong to the world , just as I do not belong to the world .
43017015	I’m not asking you to take them out of the world , but to keep them safe from the evil one .
43017016	They do not belong to this world any more than I do .
43017017	Make them holy by your truth ; teach them your word , which is truth .
43017018	Just as you sent me into the world , I am sending them into the world .
43017019	And I give myself as a holy sacrifice for them so they can be made holy by your truth .
43017020	“ I am praying not only for these disciples but also for all who will ever believe in me through their message .
43017021	I pray that they will all be one , just as you and I are oneas you are in me , Father , and I am in you . And may they be in us so that the world will believe you sent me .
43017022	“ I have given them the glory you gave me , so they may be one as we are one .
43017023	I am in them and you are in me . May they experience such perfect unity that the world will know that you sent me and that you love them as much as you love me .
43017024	Father , I want these whom you have given me to be with me where I am . Then they can see all the glory you gave me because you loved me even before the world began !
43017025	“ O righteous Father , the world doesn’t know you , but I do ; and these disciples know you sent me .
43017026	I have revealed you to them , and I will continue to do so . Then your love for me will be in them , and I will be in them . ”
43018001	After saying these things , Jesus crossed the Kidron Valley with his disciples and entered a grove of olive trees .
43018002	Judas , the betrayer , knew this place , because Jesus had often gone there with his disciples .
43018003	The leading priests and Pharisees had given Judas a contingent of Roman soldiers and Temple guards to accompany him . Now with blazing torches , lanterns , and weapons , they arrived at the olive grove .
43018004	Jesus fully realized all that was going to happen to him , so he stepped forward to meet them . “ Who are you looking for ? ” he asked .
43018005	“ Jesus the Nazarene , ” they replied . “ I A m he , ” Jesus said . ( Judas , who betrayed him , was standing with them . )
43018006	As Jesus said “ I A m he , ” they all drew back and fell to the ground !
43018007	Once more he asked them , “ Who are you looking for ? ” And again they replied , “ Jesus the Nazarene . ”
43018008	“ I told you that I A m he , ” Jesus said . “ And since I am the one you want , let these others go . ”
43018009	He did this to fulfill his own statement : “ I did not lose a single one of those you have given me . ”
43018010	Then Simon Peter drew a sword and slashed off the right ear of Malchus , the high priest’s slave .
43018011	But Jesus said to Peter , “ Put your sword back into its sheath . Shall I not drink from the cup of suffering the Father has given me ? ”
43018012	So the soldiers , their commanding officer , and the Temple guards arrested Jesus and tied him up .
43018013	First they took him to Annas , the father-in-law of Caiaphas , the high priest at that time .
43018014	Caiaphas was the one who had told the other Jewish leaders , “ It’s better that one man should die for the people . ”
43018015	Simon Peter followed Jesus , as did another of the disciples . That other disciple was acquainted with the high priest , so he was allowed to enter the high priest’s courtyard with Jesus .
43018016	Peter had to stay outside the gate . Then the disciple who knew the high priest spoke to the woman watching at the gate , and she let Peter in .
43018017	The woman asked Peter , “ You’re not one of that man’s disciples , are you ? ” “ No , ” he said , “ I am not . ”
43018018	Because it was cold , the household servants and the guards had made a charcoal fire . They stood around it , warming themselves , and Peter stood with them , warming himself .
43018019	Inside , the high priest began asking Jesus about his followers and what he had been teaching them .
43018020	Jesus replied , “ Everyone knows what I teach . I have preached regularly in the synagogues and the Temple , where the people gather . I have not spoken in secret .
43018021	Why are you asking me this question ? Ask those who heard me . They know what I said . ”
43018022	Then one of the Temple guards standing nearby slapped Jesus across the face . “ Is that the way to answer the high priest ? ” he demanded .
43018023	Jesus replied , “ If I said anything wrong , you must prove it . But if I’m speaking the truth , why are you beating me ? ”
43018024	Then Annas bound Jesus and sent him to Caiaphas , the high priest .
43018025	Meanwhile , as Simon Peter was standing by the fire warming himself , they asked him again , “ You’re not one of his disciples , are you ? ” He denied it , saying , “ No , I am not . ”
43018026	But one of the household slaves of the high priest , a relative of the man whose ear Peter had cut off , asked , “ Didn’t I see you out there in the olive grove with Jesus ? ”
43018027	Again Peter denied it . And immediately a rooster crowed .
43018028	Jesus’ trial before Caiaphas ended in the early hours of the morning . Then he was taken to the headquarters of the Roman governor . His accusers didn’t go inside because it would defile them , and they wouldn’t be allowed to celebrate the Passover .
43018029	So Pilate , the governor , went out to them and asked , “ What is your charge against this man ? ”
43018030	“ We wouldn’t have handed him over to you if he weren’t a criminal ! ” they retorted .
43018031	“ Then take him away and judge him by your own law , ” Pilate told them . “ Only the Romans are permitted to execute someone , ” the Jewish leaders replied .
43018032	( This fulfilled Jesus’ prediction about the way he would die . )
43018033	Then Pilate went back into his headquarters and called for Jesus to be brought to him . “ Are you the king of the Jews ? ” he asked him .
43018034	Jesus replied , “ Is this your own question , or did others tell you about me ? ”
43018035	“ Am I a Jew ? ” Pilate retorted . “ Your own people and their leading priests brought you to me for trial . Why ? What have you done ? ”
43018036	Jesus answered , “ My Kingdom is not an earthly kingdom . If it were , my followers would fight to keep me from being handed over to the Jewish leaders . But my Kingdom is not of this world . ”
43018037	Pilate said , “ So you are a king ? ” Jesus responded , “ You say I am a king . Actually , I was born and came into the world to testify to the truth . All who love the truth recognize that what I say is true . ”
43018038	“ What is truth ? ” Pilate asked . Then he went out again to the people and told them , “ He is not guilty of any crime .
43018039	But you have a custom of asking me to release one prisoner each year at Passover . Would you like me to release this ‘ King of the Jews’ ? ”
43018040	But they shouted back , “ No ! Not this man . We want Barabbas ! ” ( Barabbas was a revolutionary . )
43019001	Then Pilate had Jesus flogged with a lead-tipped whip .
43019002	The soldiers wove a crown of thorns and put it on his head , and they put a purple robe on him .
43019003	“ Hail ! King of the Jews ! ” they mocked , as they slapped him across the face .
43019004	Pilate went outside again and said to the people , “ I am going to bring him out to you now , but understand clearly that I find him not guilty . ”
43019005	Then Jesus came out wearing the crown of thorns and the purple robe . And Pilate said , “ Look , here is the man ! ”
43019006	When they saw him , the leading priests and Temple guards began shouting , “ Crucify him ! Crucify him ! ” “ Take him yourselves and crucify him , ” Pilate said . “ I find him not guilty . ”
43019007	The Jewish leaders replied , “ By our law he ought to die because he called himself the Son of God . ”
43019008	When Pilate heard this , he was more frightened than ever .
43019009	He took Jesus back into the headquarters again and asked him , “ Where are you from ? ” But Jesus gave no answer .
43019010	“ Why don’t you talk to me ? ” Pilate demanded . “ Don’t you realize that I have the power to release you or crucify you ? ”
43019011	Then Jesus said , “ You would have no power over me at all unless it were given to you from above . So the one who handed me over to you has the greater sin . ”
43019012	Then Pilate tried to release him , but the Jewish leaders shouted , “ If you release this man , you are no ‘ friend of Caesar . ’ Anyone who declares himself a king is a rebel against Caesar . ”
43019013	When they said this , Pilate brought Jesus out to them again . Then Pilate sat down on the judgment seat on the platform that is called the Stone Pavement ( in Hebrew , Gabbatha ) .
43019014	It was now about noon on the day of preparation for the Passover . And Pilate said to the people , “ Look , here is your king ! ”
43019015	“ Away with him , ” they yelled . “ Away with him ! Crucify him ! ” “ What ? Crucify your king ? ” Pilate asked . “ We have no king but Caesar , ” the leading priests shouted back .
43019016	Then Pilate turned Jesus over to them to be crucified . So they took Jesus away .
43019017	Carrying the cross by himself , he went to the place called Place of the Skull ( in Hebrew , Golgotha ) .
43019018	There they nailed him to the cross . Two others were crucified with him , one on either side , with Jesus between them .
43019019	And Pilate posted a sign on the cross that read , “ Jesus of Nazareth , the King of the Jews . ”
43019020	The place where Jesus was crucified was near the city , and the sign was written in Hebrew , Latin , and Greek , so that many people could read it .
43019021	Then the leading priests objected and said to Pilate , “ Change it from ‘ The King of the Jews’ to ‘ He said , I am King of the Jews . ’ ”
43019022	Pilate replied , “ No , what I have written , I have written . ”
43019023	When the soldiers had crucified Jesus , they divided his clothes among the four of them . They also took his robe , but it was seamless , woven in one piece from top to bottom .
43019024	So they said , “ Rather than tearing it apart , let’s throw dice for it . ” This fulfilled the Scripture that says , “ They divided my garments among themselves and threw dice for my clothing . ” So that is what they did .
43019025	Standing near the cross were Jesus’ mother , and his mother’s sister , Mary ( the wife of Clopas ) , and Mary Magdalene .
43019026	When Jesus saw his mother standing there beside the disciple he loved , he said to her , “ Dear woman , here is your son . ”
43019027	And he said to this disciple , “ Here is your mother . ” And from then on this disciple took her into his home .
43019028	Jesus knew that his mission was now finished , and to fulfill Scripture he said , “ I am thirsty . ”
43019029	A jar of sour wine was sitting there , so they soaked a sponge in it , put it on a hyssop branch , and held it up to his lips .
43019030	When Jesus had tasted it , he said , “ It is finished ! ” Then he bowed his head and released his spirit .
43019031	It was the day of preparation , and the Jewish leaders didn’t want the bodies hanging there the next day , which was the Sabbath ( and a very special Sabbath , because it was the Passover ) . So they asked Pilate to hasten their deaths by ordering that their legs be broken . Then their bodies could be taken down .
43019032	So the soldiers came and broke the legs of the two men crucified with Jesus .
43019033	But when they came to Jesus , they saw that he was already dead , so they didn’t break his legs .
43019034	One of the soldiers , however , pierced his side with a spear , and immediately blood and water flowed out .
43019035	( This report is from an eyewitness giving an accurate account . He speaks the truth so that you also can believe . )
43019036	These things happened in fulfillment of the Scriptures that say , “ Not one of his bones will be broken , ”
43019037	and “ They will look on the one they pierced . ”
43019038	Afterward Joseph of Arimathea , who had been a secret disciple of Jesus ( because he feared the Jewish leaders ) , asked Pilate for permission to take down Jesus’ body . When Pilate gave permission , Joseph came and took the body away .
43019039	With him came Nicodemus , the man who had come to Jesus at night . He brought about seventy-five pounds of perfumed ointment made from myrrh and aloes .
43019040	Following Jewish burial custom , they wrapped Jesus’ body with the spices in long sheets of linen cloth .
43019041	The place of crucifixion was near a garden , where there was a new tomb , never used before .
43019042	And so , because it was the day of preparation for the Jewish Passover and since the tomb was close at hand , they laid Jesus there .
43020001	Early on Sunday morning , while it was still dark , Mary Magdalene came to the tomb and found that the stone had been rolled away from the entrance .
43020002	She ran and found Simon Peter and the other disciple , the one whom Jesus loved . She said , “ They have taken the Lord’s body out of the tomb , and we don’t know where they have put him ! ”
43020003	Peter and the other disciple started out for the tomb .
43020004	They were both running , but the other disciple outran Peter and reached the tomb first .
43020005	He stooped and looked in and saw the linen wrappings lying there , but he didn’t go in .
43020006	Then Simon Peter arrived and went inside . He also noticed the linen wrappings lying there ,
43020007	while the cloth that had covered Jesus’ head was folded up and lying apart from the other wrappings .
43020008	Then the disciple who had reached the tomb first also went in , and he saw and believed
43020009	for until then they still hadn’t understood the Scriptures that said Jesus must rise from the dead .
43020010	Then they went home .
43020011	Mary was standing outside the tomb crying , and as she wept , she stooped and looked in .
43020012	She saw two white-robed angels , one sitting at the head and the other at the foot of the place where the body of Jesus had been lying .
43020013	“ Dear woman , why are you crying ? ” the angels asked her . “ Because they have taken away my Lord , ” she replied , “ and I don’t know where they have put him . ”
43020014	She turned to leave and saw someone standing there . It was Jesus , but she didn’t recognize him .
43020015	“ Dear woman , why are you crying ? ” Jesus asked her . “ Who are you looking for ? ” She thought he was the gardener . “ Sir , ” she said , “ if you have taken him away , tell me where you have put him , and I will go and get him . ”
43020016	“ Mary ! ” Jesus said . She turned to him and cried out , “ Rabboni ! ” ( which is Hebrew for “ Teacher ” ) .
43020017	“ Don’t cling to me , ” Jesus said , “ for I haven’t yet ascended to the Father . But go find my brothers and tell them , ‘ I am ascending to my Father and your Father , to my God and your God . ’ ”
43020018	Mary Magdalene found the disciples and told them , “ I have seen the Lord ! ” Then she gave them his message .
43020019	That Sunday evening the disciples were meeting behind locked doors because they were afraid of the Jewish leaders . Suddenly , Jesus was standing there among them ! “ Peace be with you , ” he said .
43020020	As he spoke , he showed them the wounds in his hands and his side . They were filled with joy when they saw the Lord !
43020021	Again he said , “ Peace be with you . As the Father has sent me , so I am sending you . ”
43020022	Then he breathed on them and said , “ Receive the Holy Spirit .
43020023	If you forgive anyone’s sins , they are forgiven . If you do not forgive them , they are not forgiven . ”
43020024	One of the twelve disciples , Thomas ( nicknamed the Twin ) , was not with the others when Jesus came .
43020025	They told him , “ We have seen the Lord ! ” But he replied , “ I won’t believe it unless I see the nail wounds in his hands , put my fingers into them , and place my hand into the wound in his side . ”
43020026	Eight days later the disciples were together again , and this time Thomas was with them . The doors were locked ; but suddenly , as before , Jesus was standing among them . “ Peace be with you , ” he said .
43020027	Then he said to Thomas , “ Put your finger here , and look at my hands . Put your hand into the wound in my side . Don’t be faithless any longer . Believe ! ”
43020028	“ My Lord and my God ! ” Thomas exclaimed .
43020029	Then Jesus told him , “ You believe because you have seen me . Blessed are those who believe without seeing me . ”
43020030	The disciples saw Jesus do many other miraculous signs in addition to the ones recorded in this book .
43020031	But these are written so that you may continue to believe that Jesus is the Messiah , the Son of God , and that by believing in him you will have life by the power of his name .
43021001	Later , Jesus appeared again to the disciples beside the Sea of Galilee . This is how it happened .
43021002	Several of the disciples were thereSimon Peter , Thomas ( nicknamed the Twin ) , Nathanael from Cana in Galilee , the sons of Zebedee , and two other disciples .
43021003	Simon Peter said , “ I’m going fishing . ” “ We’ll come , too , ” they all said . So they went out in the boat , but they caught nothing all night .
43021004	At dawn Jesus was standing on the beach , but the disciples couldn’t see who he was .
43021005	He called out , “ Fellows , have you caught any fish ? ” “ No , ” they replied .
43021006	Then he said , “ Throw out your net on the right-hand side of the boat , and you’ll get some ! ” So they did , and they couldn’t haul in the net because there were so many fish in it .
43021007	Then the disciple Jesus loved said to Peter , “ It’s the Lord ! ” When Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord , he put on his tunic ( for he had stripped for work ) , jumped into the water , and headed to shore .
43021008	The others stayed with the boat and pulled the loaded net to the shore , for they were only about a hundred yards from shore .
43021009	When they got there , they found breakfast waiting for themfish cooking over a charcoal fire , and some bread .
43021010	“ Bring some of the fish you’ve just caught , ” Jesus said .
43021011	So Simon Peter went aboard and dragged the net to the shore . There were 153 large fish , and yet the net hadn’t torn .
43021012	“ Now come and have some breakfast ! ” Jesus said . None of the disciples dared to ask him , “ Who are you ? ” They knew it was the Lord .
43021013	Then Jesus served them the bread and the fish .
43021014	This was the third time Jesus had appeared to his disciples since he had been raised from the dead .
43021015	After breakfast Jesus asked Simon Peter , “ Simon son of John , do you love me more than these ? ” “ Yes , Lord , ” Peter replied , “ you know I love you . ” “ Then feed my lambs , ” Jesus told him .
43021016	Jesus repeated the question : “ Simon son of John , do you love me ? ” “ Yes , Lord , ” Peter said , “ you know I love you . ” “ Then take care of my sheep , ” Jesus said .
43021017	A third time he asked him , “ Simon son of John , do you love me ? ” Peter was hurt that Jesus asked the question a third time . He said , “ Lord , you know everything . You know that I love you . ” Jesus said , “ Then feed my sheep .
43021018	“ I tell you the truth , when you were young , you were able to do as you liked ; you dressed yourself and went wherever you wanted to go . But when you are old , you will stretch out your hands , and others will dress you and take you where you don’t want to go . ”
43021019	Jesus said this to let him know by what kind of death he would glorify God . Then Jesus told him , “ Follow me . ”
43021020	Peter turned around and saw behind them the disciple Jesus lovedthe one who had leaned over to Jesus during supper and asked , “ Lord , who will betray you ? ”
43021021	Peter asked Jesus , “ What about him , Lord ? ”
43021022	Jesus replied , “ If I want him to remain alive until I return , what is that to you ? As for you , follow me . ”
43021023	So the rumor spread among the community of believers that this disciple wouldn’t die . But that isn’t what Jesus said at all . He only said , “ If I want him to remain alive until I return , what is that to you ? ”
43021024	This disciple is the one who testifies to these events and has recorded them here . And we know that his account of these things is accurate .
43021025	Jesus also did many other things . If they were all written down , I suppose the whole world could not contain the books that would be written .
44001001	In my first book I told you , Theophilus , about everything Jesus began to do and teach
44001002	until the day he was taken up to heaven after giving his chosen apostles further instructions through the Holy Spirit .
44001003	During the forty days after his crucifixion , he appeared to the apostles from time to time , and he proved to them in many ways that he was actually alive . And he talked to them about the Kingdom of God .
44001004	Once when he was eating with them , he commanded them , “ Do not leave Jerusalem until the Father sends you the gift he promised , as I told you before .
44001005	John baptized with water , but in just a few days you will be baptized with the Holy Spirit . ”
44001006	So when the apostles were with Jesus , they kept asking him , “ Lord , has the time come for you to free Israel and restore our kingdom ? ”
44001007	He replied , “ The Father alone has the authority to set those dates and times , and they are not for you to know .
44001008	But you will receive power when the Holy Spirit comes upon you . And you will be my witnesses , telling people about me everywherein Jerusalem , throughout Judea , in Samaria , and to the ends of the earth . ”
44001009	After saying this , he was taken up into a cloud while they were watching , and they could no longer see him .
44001010	As they strained to see him rising into heaven , two white-robed men suddenly stood among them .
44001011	“ Men of Galilee , ” they said , “ why are you standing here staring into heaven ? Jesus has been taken from you into heaven , but someday he will return from heaven in the same way you saw him go ! ”
44001012	Then the apostles returned to Jerusalem from the Mount of Olives , a distance of half a mile .
44001013	When they arrived , they went to the upstairs room of the house where they were staying . Here are the names of those who were present : Peter , John , James , Andrew , Philip , Thomas , Bartholomew , Matthew , James ( son of Alphaeus ) , Simon ( the Zealot ) , and Judas ( son of James ) .
44001014	They all met together and were constantly united in prayer , along with Mary the mother of Jesus , several other women , and the brothers of Jesus .
44001015	During this time , when about 120 believers were together in one place , Peter stood up and addressed them .
44001016	“ Brothers , ” he said , “ the Scriptures had to be fulfilled concerning Judas , who guided those who arrested Jesus . This was predicted long ago by the Holy Spirit , speaking through King David .
44001017	Judas was one of us and shared in the ministry with us . ”
44001018	( Judas had bought a field with the money he received for his treachery . Falling headfirst there , his body split open , spilling out all his intestines .
44001019	The news of his death spread to all the people of Jerusalem , and they gave the place the Aramaic name Akeldama , which means “ Field of Blood . ” )
44001020	Peter continued , “ This was written in the book of Psalms , where it says , ‘ Let his home become desolate , with no one living in it . ’ It also says , ‘ Let someone else take his position . ’
44001021	“ So now we must choose a replacement for Judas from among the men who were with us the entire time we were traveling with the Lord Jesus
44001022	from the time he was baptized by John until the day he was taken from us . Whoever is chosen will join us as a witness of Jesus’ resurrection . ”
44001023	So they nominated two men : Joseph called Barsabbas ( also known as Justus ) and Matthias .
44001024	Then they all prayed , “ O Lord , you know every heart . Show us which of these men you have chosen
44001025	as an apostle to replace Judas in this ministry , for he has deserted us and gone where he belongs . ”
44001026	Then they cast lots , and Matthias was selected to become an apostle with the other eleven .
44002001	On the day of Pentecost all the believers were meeting together in one place .
44002002	Suddenly , there was a sound from heaven like the roaring of a mighty windstorm , and it filled the house where they were sitting .
44002003	Then , what looked like flames or tongues of fire appeared and settled on each of them .
44002004	And everyone present was filled with the Holy Spirit and began speaking in other languages , as the Holy Spirit gave them this ability .
44002005	At that time there were devout Jews from every nation living in Jerusalem .
44002006	When they heard the loud noise , everyone came running , and they were bewildered to hear their own languages being spoken by the believers .
44002007	They were completely amazed . “ How can this be ? ” they exclaimed . “ These people are all from Galilee ,
44002008	and yet we hear them speaking in our own native languages !
44002009	Here we areParthians , Medes , Elamites , people from Mesopotamia , Judea , Cappadocia , Pontus , the province of Asia ,
44002010	Phrygia , Pamphylia , Egypt , and the areas of Libya around Cyrene , visitors from Rome
44002011	( both Jews and converts to Judaism ) , Cretans , and Arabs . And we all hear these people speaking in our own languages about the wonderful things God has done ! ”
44002012	They stood there amazed and perplexed . “ What can this mean ? ” they asked each other .
44002013	But others in the crowd ridiculed them , saying , “ They’re just drunk , that’s all ! ”
44002014	Then Peter stepped forward with the eleven other apostles and shouted to the crowd , “ Listen carefully , all of you , fellow Jews and residents of Jerusalem ! Make no mistake about this .
44002015	These people are not drunk , as some of you are assuming . Nine o’clock in the morning is much too early for that .
44002016	No , what you see was predicted long ago by the prophet Joel :
44002017	‘ In the last days , ’ God says , ‘ I will pour out my Spirit upon all people . Your sons and daughters will prophesy . Your young men will see visions , and your old men will dream dreams .
44002018	In those days I will pour out my Spirit even on my servantsmen and women alike and they will prophesy .
44002019	And I will cause wonders in the heavens above and signs on the earth below blood and fire and clouds of smoke .
44002020	The sun will become dark , and the moon will turn blood red before that great and glorious day of the L ord arrives .
44002021	But everyone who calls on the name of the L ord will be saved . ’
44002022	“ People of Israel , listen ! God publicly endorsed Jesus the Nazarene by doing powerful miracles , wonders , and signs through him , as you well know .
44002023	But God knew what would happen , and his prearranged plan was carried out when Jesus was betrayed . With the help of lawless Gentiles , you nailed him to a cross and killed him .
44002024	But God released him from the horrors of death and raised him back to life , for death could not keep him in its grip .
44002025	King David said this about him : ‘ I see that the L ord is always with me . I will not be shaken , for he is right beside me .
44002026	No wonder my heart is glad , and my tongue shouts his praises ! My body rests in hope .
44002027	For you will not leave my soul among the dead or allow your Holy One to rot in the grave .
44002028	You have shown me the way of life , and you will fill me with the joy of your presence . ’
44002029	“ Dear brothers , think about this ! You can be sure that the patriarch David wasn’t referring to himself , for he died and was buried , and his tomb is still here among us .
44002030	But he was a prophet , and he knew God had promised with an oath that one of David’s own descendants would sit on his throne .
44002031	David was looking into the future and speaking of the Messiah’s resurrection . He was saying that God would not leave him among the dead or allow his body to rot in the grave .
44002032	“ God raised Jesus from the dead , and we are all witnesses of this .
44002033	Now he is exalted to the place of highest honor in heaven , at God’s right hand . And the Father , as he had promised , gave him the Holy Spirit to pour out upon us , just as you see and hear today .
44002034	For David himself never ascended into heaven , yet he said , ‘ The L ord said to my Lord , “ Sit in the place of honor at my right hand
44002035	until I humble your enemies , making them a footstool under your feet . ” ’
44002036	“ So let everyone in Israel know for certain that God has made this Jesus , whom you crucified , to be both Lord and Messiah ! ”
44002037	Peter’s words pierced their hearts , and they said to him and to the other apostles , “ Brothers , what should we do ? ”
44002038	Peter replied , “ Each of you must repent of your sins and turn to God , and be baptized in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins . Then you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit .
44002039	This promise is to you , and to your children , and even to the Gentiles all who have been called by the Lord our God . ”
44002040	Then Peter continued preaching for a long time , strongly urging all his listeners , “ Save yourselves from this crooked generation ! ”
44002041	Those who believed what Peter said were baptized and added to the church that dayabout 3,000 in all .
44002042	All the believers devoted themselves to the apostles’ teaching , and to fellowship , and to sharing in meals ( including the Lord’s Supper ) , and to prayer .
44002043	A deep sense of awe came over them all , and the apostles performed many miraculous signs and wonders .
44002044	And all the believers met together in one place and shared everything they had .
44002045	They sold their property and possessions and shared the money with those in need .
44002046	They worshiped together at the Temple each day , met in homes for the Lord’s Supper , and shared their meals with great joy and generosity
44002047	all the while praising God and enjoying the goodwill of all the people . And each day the Lord added to their fellowship those who were being saved .
44003001	Peter and John went to the Temple one afternoon to take part in the three o’clock prayer service .
44003002	As they approached the Temple , a man lame from birth was being carried in . Each day he was put beside the Temple gate , the one called the Beautiful Gate , so he could beg from the people going into the Temple .
44003003	When he saw Peter and John about to enter , he asked them for some money .
44003004	Peter and John looked at him intently , and Peter said , “ Look at us ! ”
44003005	The lame man looked at them eagerly , expecting some money .
44003006	But Peter said , “ I don’t have any silver or gold for you . But I’ll give you what I have . In the name of Jesus Christ the Nazarene , get up and walk ! ”
44003007	Then Peter took the lame man by the right hand and helped him up . And as he did , the man’s feet and ankles were instantly healed and strengthened .
44003008	He jumped up , stood on his feet , and began to walk ! Then , walking , leaping , and praising God , he went into the Temple with them .
44003009	All the people saw him walking and heard him praising God .
44003010	When they realized he was the lame beggar they had seen so often at the Beautiful Gate , they were absolutely astounded !
44003011	They all rushed out in amazement to Solomon’s Colonnade , where the man was holding tightly to Peter and John .
44003012	Peter saw his opportunity and addressed the crowd . “ People of Israel , ” he said , “ what is so surprising about this ? And why stare at us as though we had made this man walk by our own power or godliness ?
44003013	For it is the God of Abraham , Isaac , and Jacobthe God of all our ancestorswho has brought glory to his servant Jesus by doing this . This is the same Jesus whom you handed over and rejected before Pilate , despite Pilate’s decision to release him .
44003014	You rejected this holy , righteous one and instead demanded the release of a murderer .
44003015	You killed the author of life , but God raised him from the dead . And we are witnesses of this fact !
44003016	“ Through faith in the name of Jesus , this man was healedand you know how crippled he was before . Faith in Jesus’ name has healed him before your very eyes .
44003017	“ Friends , I realize that what you and your leaders did to Jesus was done in ignorance .
44003018	But God was fulfilling what all the prophets had foretold about the Messiahthat he must suffer these things .
44003019	Now repent of your sins and turn to God , so that your sins may be wiped away .
44003020	Then times of refreshment will come from the presence of the Lord , and he will again send you Jesus , your appointed Messiah .
44003021	For he must remain in heaven until the time for the final restoration of all things , as God promised long ago through his holy prophets .
44003022	Moses said , ‘ The L ord your God will raise up for you a Prophet like me from among your own people . Listen carefully to everything he tells you . ’
44003023	Then Moses said , ‘ Anyone who will not listen to that Prophet will be completely cut off from God’s people . ’
44003024	“ Starting with Samuel , every prophet spoke about what is happening today .
44003025	You are the children of those prophets , and you are included in the covenant God promised to your ancestors . For God said to Abraham , ‘ Through your descendants all the families on earth will be blessed . ’
44003026	When God raised up his servant , Jesus , he sent him first to you people of Israel , to bless you by turning each of you back from your sinful ways . ”
44004001	While Peter and John were speaking to the people , they were confronted by the priests , the captain of the Temple guard , and some of the Sadducees .
44004002	These leaders were very disturbed that Peter and John were teaching the people that through Jesus there is a resurrection of the dead .
44004003	They arrested them and , since it was already evening , put them in jail until morning .
44004004	But many of the people who heard their message believed it , so the number of believers now totaled about 5,000 men , not counting women and children .
44004005	The next day the council of all the rulers and elders and teachers of religious law met in Jerusalem .
44004006	Annas the high priest was there , along with Caiaphas , John , Alexander , and other relatives of the high priest .
44004007	They brought in the two disciples and demanded , “ By what power , or in whose name , have you done this ? ”
44004008	Then Peter , filled with the Holy Spirit , said to them , “ Rulers and elders of our people ,
44004009	are we being questioned today because we’ve done a good deed for a crippled man ? Do you want to know how he was healed ?
44004010	Let me clearly state to all of you and to all the people of Israel that he was healed by the powerful name of Jesus Christ the Nazarene , the man you crucified but whom God raised from the dead .
44004011	For Jesus is the one referred to in the Scriptures , where it says , ‘ The stone that you builders rejected has now become the cornerstone . ’
44004012	There is salvation in no one else ! God has given no other name under heaven by which we must be saved . ”
44004013	The members of the council were amazed when they saw the boldness of Peter and John , for they could see that they were ordinary men with no special training in the Scriptures . They also recognized them as men who had been with Jesus .
44004014	But since they could see the man who had been healed standing right there among them , there was nothing the council could say .
44004015	So they ordered Peter and John out of the council chamber and conferred among themselves .
44004016	“ What should we do with these men ? ” they asked each other . “ We can’t deny that they have performed a miraculous sign , and everybody in Jerusalem knows about it .
44004017	But to keep them from spreading their propaganda any further , we must warn them not to speak to anyone in Jesus’ name again . ”
44004018	So they called the apostles back in and commanded them never again to speak or teach in the name of Jesus .
44004019	But Peter and John replied , “ Do you think God wants us to obey you rather than him ?
44004020	We cannot stop telling about everything we have seen and heard . ”
44004021	The council then threatened them further , but they finally let them go because they didn’t know how to punish them without starting a riot . For everyone was praising God
44004022	for this miraculous signthe healing of a man who had been lame for more than forty years .
44004023	As soon as they were freed , Peter and John returned to the other believers and told them what the leading priests and elders had said .
44004024	When they heard the report , all the believers lifted their voices together in prayer to God : “ O Sovereign Lord , Creator of heaven and earth , the sea , and everything in them
44004025	you spoke long ago by the Holy Spirit through our ancestor David , your servant , saying , ‘ Why were the nations so angry ? Why did they waste their time with futile plans ?
44004026	The kings of the earth prepared for battle ; the rulers gathered together against the L ord and against his Messiah . ’
44004027	“ In fact , this has happened here in this very city ! For Herod Antipas , Pontius Pilate the governor , the Gentiles , and the people of Israel were all united against Jesus , your holy servant , whom you anointed .
44004028	But everything they did was determined beforehand according to your will .
44004029	And now , O Lord , hear their threats , and give us , your servants , great boldness in preaching your word .
44004030	Stretch out your hand with healing power ; may miraculous signs and wonders be done through the name of your holy servant Jesus . ”
44004031	After this prayer , the meeting place shook , and they were all filled with the Holy Spirit . Then they preached the word of God with boldness .
44004032	All the believers were united in heart and mind . And they felt that what they owned was not their own , so they shared everything they had .
44004033	The apostles testified powerfully to the resurrection of the Lord Jesus , and God’s great blessing was upon them all .
44004034	There were no needy people among them , because those who owned land or houses would sell them
44004035	and bring the money to the apostles to give to those in need .
44004036	For instance , there was Joseph , the one the apostles nicknamed Barnabas ( which means “ Son of Encouragement ” ) . He was from the tribe of Levi and came from the island of Cyprus .
44004037	He sold a field he owned and brought the money to the apostles .
44005001	But there was a certain man named Ananias who , with his wife , Sapphira , sold some property .
44005002	He brought part of the money to the apostles , claiming it was the full amount . With his wife’s consent , he kept the rest .
44005003	Then Peter said , “ Ananias , why have you let Satan fill your heart ? You lied to the Holy Spirit , and you kept some of the money for yourself .
44005004	The property was yours to sell or not sell , as you wished . And after selling it , the money was also yours to give away . How could you do a thing like this ? You weren’t lying to us but to God ! ”
44005005	As soon as Ananias heard these words , he fell to the floor and died . Everyone who heard about it was terrified .
44005006	Then some young men got up , wrapped him in a sheet , and took him out and buried him .
44005007	About three hours later his wife came in , not knowing what had happened .
44005008	Peter asked her , “ Was this the price you and your husband received for your land ? ” “ Yes , ” she replied , “ that was the price . ”
44005009	And Peter said , “ How could the two of you even think of conspiring to test the Spirit of the Lord like this ? The young men who buried your husband are just outside the door , and they will carry you out , too . ”
44005010	Instantly , she fell to the floor and died . When the young men came in and saw that she was dead , they carried her out and buried her beside her husband .
44005011	Great fear gripped the entire church and everyone else who heard what had happened .
44005012	The apostles were performing many miraculous signs and wonders among the people . And all the believers were meeting regularly at the Temple in the area known as Solomon’s Colonnade .
44005013	But no one else dared to join them , even though all the people had high regard for them .
44005014	Yet more and more people believed and were brought to the Lordcrowds of both men and women .
44005015	As a result of the apostles’ work , sick people were brought out into the streets on beds and mats so that Peter’s shadow might fall across some of them as he went by .
44005016	Crowds came from the villages around Jerusalem , bringing their sick and those possessed by evil spirits , and they were all healed .
44005017	The high priest and his officials , who were Sadducees , were filled with jealousy .
44005018	They arrested the apostles and put them in the public jail .
44005019	But an angel of the Lord came at night , opened the gates of the jail , and brought them out . Then he told them ,
44005020	“ Go to the Temple and give the people this message of life ! ”
44005021	So at daybreak the apostles entered the Temple , as they were told , and immediately began teaching .
