45010017	So faith comes from hearing , that is , hearing the Good News about Christ .
45010018	But I ask , have the people of Israel actually heard the message ? Yes , they have : “ The message has gone throughout the earth , and the words to all the world . ”
45010019	But I ask , did the people of Israel really understand ? Yes , they did , for even in the time of Moses , God said , “ I will rouse your jealousy through people who are not even a nation . I will provoke your anger through the foolish Gentiles . ”
45010020	And later Isaiah spoke boldly for God , saying , “ I was found by people who were not looking for me . I showed myself to those who were not asking for me . ”
45010021	But regarding Israel , God said , “ All day long I opened my arms to them , but they were disobedient and rebellious . ”
45011001	I ask , then , has God rejected his own people , the nation of Israel ? Of course not ! I myself am an Israelite , a descendant of Abraham and a member of the tribe of Benjamin .
45011002	No , God has not rejected his own people , whom he chose from the very beginning . Do you realize what the Scriptures say about this ? Elijah the prophet complained to God about the people of Israel and said ,
45011003	“ L ord , they have killed your prophets and torn down your altars . I am the only one left , and now they are trying to kill me , too . ”
45011004	And do you remember God’s reply ? He said , “ No , I have 7,000 others who have never bowed down to Baal ! ”
45011005	It is the same today , for a few of the people of Israel have remained faithful because of God’s gracehis undeserved kindness in choosing them .
45011006	And since it is through God’s kindness , then it is not by their good works . For in that case , God’s grace would not be what it really isfree and undeserved .
45011007	So this is the situation : Most of the people of Israel have not found the favor of God they are looking for so earnestly . A few havethe ones God has chosenbut the hearts of the rest were hardened .
45011008	As the Scriptures say , “ God has put them into a deep sleep . To this day he has shut their eyes so they do not see , and closed their ears so they do not hear . ”
45011009	Likewise , David said , “ Let their bountiful table become a snare , a trap that makes them think all is well . Let their blessings cause them to stumble , and let them get what they deserve .
45011010	Let their eyes go blind so they cannot see , and let their backs be bent forever . ”
45011011	Did God’s people stumble and fall beyond recovery ? Of course not ! They were disobedient , so God made salvation available to the Gentiles . But he wanted his own people to become jealous and claim it for themselves .
45011012	Now if the Gentiles were enriched because the people of Israel turned down God’s offer of salvation , think how much greater a blessing the world will share when they finally accept it .
45011013	I am saying all this especially for you Gentiles . God has appointed me as the apostle to the Gentiles . I stress this ,
45011014	for I want somehow to make the people of Israel jealous of what you Gentiles have , so I might save some of them .
45011015	For since their rejection meant that God offered salvation to the rest of the world , their acceptance will be even more wonderful . It will be life for those who were dead !
45011016	And since Abraham and the other patriarchs were holy , their descendants will also be holyjust as the entire batch of dough is holy because the portion given as an offering is holy . For if the roots of the tree are holy , the branches will be , too .
45011017	But some of these branches from Abraham’s treesome of the people of Israelhave been broken off . And you Gentiles , who were branches from a wild olive tree , have been grafted in . So now you also receive the blessing God has promised Abraham and his children , sharing in the rich nourishment from the root of God’s special olive tree .
45011018	But you must not brag about being grafted in to replace the branches that were broken off . You are just a branch , not the root .
45011019	“ Well , ” you may say , “ those branches were broken off to make room for me . ”
45011020	Yes , but rememberthose branches were broken off because they didn’t believe in Christ , and you are there because you do believe . So don’t think highly of yourself , but fear what could happen .
45011021	For if God did not spare the original branches , he won’t spare you either .
45011022	Notice how God is both kind and severe . He is severe toward those who disobeyed , but kind to you if you continue to trust in his kindness . But if you stop trusting , you also will be cut off .
45011023	And if the people of Israel turn from their unbelief , they will be grafted in again , for God has the power to graft them back into the tree .
45011024	You , by nature , were a branch cut from a wild olive tree . So if God was willing to do something contrary to nature by grafting you into his cultivated tree , he will be far more eager to graft the original branches back into the tree where they belong .
45011025	I want you to understand this mystery , dear brothers and sisters , so that you will not feel proud about yourselves . Some of the people of Israel have hard hearts , but this will last only until the full number of Gentiles comes to Christ .
45011026	And so all Israel will be saved . As the Scriptures say , “ The one who rescues will come from Jerusalem , and he will turn Israel away from ungodliness .
45011027	And this is my covenant with them , that I will take away their sins . ”
45011028	Many of the people of Israel are now enemies of the Good News , and this benefits you Gentiles . Yet they are still the people he loves because he chose their ancestors Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob .
45011029	For God’s gifts and his call can never be withdrawn .
45011030	Once , you Gentiles were rebels against God , but when the people of Israel rebelled against him , God was merciful to you instead .
45011031	Now they are the rebels , and God’s mercy has come to you so that they , too , will share in God’s mercy .
45011032	For God has imprisoned everyone in disobedience so he could have mercy on everyone .
45011033	Oh , how great are God’s riches and wisdom and knowledge ! How impossible it is for us to understand his decisions and his ways !
45011034	For who can know the Lord’s thoughts ? Who knows enough to give him advice ?
45011035	And who has given him so much that he needs to pay it back ?
45011036	For everything comes from him and exists by his power and is intended for his glory . All glory to him forever ! Amen .
45012001	And so , dear brothers and sisters , I plead with you to give your bodies to God because of all he has done for you . Let them be a living and holy sacrificethe kind he will find acceptable . This is truly the way to worship him .
45012002	Don’t copy the behavior and customs of this world , but let God transform you into a new person by changing the way you think . Then you will learn to know God’s will for you , which is good and pleasing and perfect .
45012003	Because of the privilege and authority God has given me , I give each of you this warning : Don’t think you are better than you really are . Be honest in your evaluation of yourselves , measuring yourselves by the faith God has given us .
45012004	Just as our bodies have many parts and each part has a special function ,
45012005	so it is with Christ’s body . We are many parts of one body , and we all belong to each other .
45012006	In his grace , God has given us different gifts for doing certain things well . So if God has given you the ability to prophesy , speak out with as much faith as God has given you .
45012007	If your gift is serving others , serve them well . If you are a teacher , teach well .
45012008	If your gift is to encourage others , be encouraging . If it is giving , give generously . If God has given you leadership ability , take the responsibility seriously . And if you have a gift for showing kindness to others , do it gladly .
45012009	Don’t just pretend to love others . Really love them . Hate what is wrong . Hold tightly to what is good .
45012010	Love each other with genuine affection , and take delight in honoring each other .
45012011	Never be lazy , but work hard and serve the Lord enthusiastically .
45012012	Rejoice in our confident hope . Be patient in trouble , and keep on praying .
45012013	When God’s people are in need , be ready to help them . Always be eager to practice hospitality .
45012014	Bless those who persecute you . Don’t curse them ; pray that God will bless them .
45012015	Be happy with those who are happy , and weep with those who weep .
45012016	Live in harmony with each other . Don’t be too proud to enjoy the company of ordinary people . And don’t think you know it all !
45012017	Never pay back evil with more evil . Do things in such a way that everyone can see you are honorable .
45012018	Do all that you can to live in peace with everyone .
45012019	Dear friends , never take revenge . Leave that to the righteous anger of God . For the Scriptures say , “ I will take revenge ; I will pay them back , ” says the L ord .
45012020	Instead , “ If your enemies are hungry , feed them . If they are thirsty , give them something to drink . In doing this , you will heap burning coals of shame on their heads . ”
45012021	Don’t let evil conquer you , but conquer evil by doing good .
45013001	Everyone must submit to governing authorities . For all authority comes from God , and those in positions of authority have been placed there by God .
45013002	So anyone who rebels against authority is rebelling against what God has instituted , and they will be punished .
45013003	For the authorities do not strike fear in people who are doing right , but in those who are doing wrong . Would you like to live without fear of the authorities ? Do what is right , and they will honor you .
45013004	The authorities are God’s servants , sent for your good . But if you are doing wrong , of course you should be afraid , for they have the power to punish you . They are God’s servants , sent for the very purpose of punishing those who do what is wrong .
45013005	So you must submit to them , not only to avoid punishment , but also to keep a clear conscience .
45013006	Pay your taxes , too , for these same reasons . For government workers need to be paid . They are serving God in what they do .
45013007	Give to everyone what you owe them : Pay your taxes and government fees to those who collect them , and give respect and honor to those who are in authority .
45013008	Owe nothing to anyoneexcept for your obligation to love one another . If you love your neighbor , you will fulfill the requirements of God’s law .
45013009	For the commandments say , “ You must not commit adultery . You must not murder . You must not steal . You must not covet . ” Theseand other such commandmentsare summed up in this one commandment : “ Love your neighbor as yourself . ”
45013010	Love does no wrong to others , so love fulfills the requirements of God’s law .
45013011	This is all the more urgent , for you know how late it is ; time is running out . Wake up , for our salvation is nearer now than when we first believed .
45013012	The night is almost gone ; the day of salvation will soon be here . So remove your dark deeds like dirty clothes , and put on the shining armor of right living .
45013013	Because we belong to the day , we must live decent lives for all to see . Don’t participate in the darkness of wild parties and drunkenness , or in sexual promiscuity and immoral living , or in quarreling and jealousy .
45013014	Instead , clothe yourself with the presence of the Lord Jesus Christ . And don’t let yourself think about ways to indulge your evil desires .
45014001	Accept other believers who are weak in faith , and don’t argue with them about what they think is right or wrong .
45014002	For instance , one person believes it’s all right to eat anything . But another believer with a sensitive conscience will eat only vegetables .
45014003	Those who feel free to eat anything must not look down on those who don’t . And those who don’t eat certain foods must not condemn those who do , for God has accepted them .
45014004	Who are you to condemn someone else’s servants ? Their own master will judge whether they stand or fall . And with the Lord’s help , they will stand and receive his approval .
45014005	In the same way , some think one day is more holy than another day , while others think every day is alike . You should each be fully convinced that whichever day you choose is acceptable .
45014006	Those who worship the Lord on a special day do it to honor him . Those who eat any kind of food do so to honor the Lord , since they give thanks to God before eating . And those who refuse to eat certain foods also want to please the Lord and give thanks to God .
45014007	For we don’t live for ourselves or die for ourselves .
45014008	If we live , it’s to honor the Lord . And if we die , it’s to honor the Lord . So whether we live or die , we belong to the Lord .
45014009	Christ died and rose again for this very purposeto be Lord both of the living and of the dead .
45014010	So why do you condemn another believer ? Why do you look down on another believer ? Remember , we will all stand before the judgment seat of God .
45014011	For the Scriptures say , “ ‘ As surely as I live , ’ says the L ord , ‘ every knee will bend to me , and every tongue will confess and give praise to God . ’ ”
45014012	Yes , each of us will give a personal account to God .
45014013	So let’s stop condemning each other . Decide instead to live in such a way that you will not cause another believer to stumble and fall .
45014014	I know and am convinced on the authority of the Lord Jesus that no food , in and of itself , is wrong to eat . But if someone believes it is wrong , then for that person it is wrong .
45014015	And if another believer is distressed by what you eat , you are not acting in love if you eat it . Don’t let your eating ruin someone for whom Christ died .
45014016	Then you will not be criticized for doing something you believe is good .
45014017	For the Kingdom of God is not a matter of what we eat or drink , but of living a life of goodness and peace and joy in the Holy Spirit .
45014018	If you serve Christ with this attitude , you will please God , and others will approve of you , too .
45014019	So then , let us aim for harmony in the church and try to build each other up .
45014020	Don’t tear apart the work of God over what you eat . Remember , all foods are acceptable , but it is wrong to eat something if it makes another person stumble .
45014021	It is better not to eat meat or drink wine or do anything else if it might cause another believer to stumble .
45014022	You may believe there’s nothing wrong with what you are doing , but keep it between yourself and God . Blessed are those who don’t feel guilty for doing something they have decided is right .
45014023	But if you have doubts about whether or not you should eat something , you are sinning if you go ahead and do it . For you are not following your convictions . If you do anything you believe is not right , you are sinning .
45015001	We who are strong must be considerate of those who are sensitive about things like this . We must not just please ourselves .
45015002	We should help others do what is right and build them up in the Lord .
45015003	For even Christ didn’t live to please himself . As the Scriptures say , “ The insults of those who insult you , O God , have fallen on me . ”
45015004	Such things were written in the Scriptures long ago to teach us . And the Scriptures give us hope and encouragement as we wait patiently for God’s promises to be fulfilled .
45015005	May God , who gives this patience and encouragement , help you live in complete harmony with each other , as is fitting for followers of Christ Jesus .
45015006	Then all of you can join together with one voice , giving praise and glory to God , the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ .
45015007	Therefore , accept each other just as Christ has accepted you so that God will be given glory .
45015008	Remember that Christ came as a servant to the Jews to show that God is true to the promises he made to their ancestors .
45015009	He also came so that the Gentiles might give glory to God for his mercies to them . That is what the psalmist meant when he wrote : “ For this , I will praise you among the Gentiles ; I will sing praises to your name . ”
45015010	And in another place it is written , “ Rejoice with his people , you Gentiles . ”
45015011	And yet again , “ Praise the L ord , all you Gentiles . Praise him , all you people of the earth . ”
45015012	And in another place Isaiah said , “ The heir to David’s throne will come , and he will rule over the Gentiles . They will place their hope on him . ”
45015013	I pray that God , the source of hope , will fill you completely with joy and peace because you trust in him . Then you will overflow with confident hope through the power of the Holy Spirit .
45015014	I am fully convinced , my dear brothers and sisters , that you are full of goodness . You know these things so well you can teach each other all about them .
45015015	Even so , I have been bold enough to write about some of these points , knowing that all you need is this reminder . For by God’s grace ,
45015016	I am a special messenger from Christ Jesus to you Gentiles . I bring you the Good News so that I might present you as an acceptable offering to God , made holy by the Holy Spirit .
45015017	So I have reason to be enthusiastic about all Christ Jesus has done through me in my service to God .
45015018	Yet I dare not boast about anything except what Christ has done through me , bringing the Gentiles to God by my message and by the way I worked among them .
45015019	They were convinced by the power of miraculous signs and wonders and by the power of God’s Spirit . In this way , I have fully presented the Good News of Christ from Jerusalem all the way to Illyricum .
45015020	My ambition has always been to preach the Good News where the name of Christ has never been heard , rather than where a church has already been started by someone else .
45015021	I have been following the plan spoken of in the Scriptures , where it says , “ Those who have never been told about him will see , and those who have never heard of him will understand . ”
45015022	In fact , my visit to you has been delayed so long because I have been preaching in these places .
45015023	But now I have finished my work in these regions , and after all these long years of waiting , I am eager to visit you .
45015024	I am planning to go to Spain , and when I do , I will stop off in Rome . And after I have enjoyed your fellowship for a little while , you can provide for my journey .
45015025	But before I come , I must go to Jerusalem to take a gift to the believers there .
45015026	For you see , the believers in Macedonia and Achaia have eagerly taken up an offering for the poor among the believers in Jerusalem .
45015027	They were glad to do this because they feel they owe a real debt to them . Since the Gentiles received the spiritual blessings of the Good News from the believers in Jerusalem , they feel the least they can do in return is to help them financially .
45015028	As soon as I have delivered this money and completed this good deed of theirs , I will come to see you on my way to Spain .
45015029	And I am sure that when I come , Christ will richly bless our time together .
45015030	Dear brothers and sisters , I urge you in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ to join in my struggle by praying to God for me . Do this because of your love for me , given to you by the Holy Spirit .
45015031	Pray that I will be rescued from those in Judea who refuse to obey God . Pray also that the believers there will be willing to accept the donation I am taking to Jerusalem .
45015032	Then , by the will of God , I will be able to come to you with a joyful heart , and we will be an encouragement to each other .
45015033	And now may God , who gives us his peace , be with you all . Amen .
45016001	I commend to you our sister Phoebe , who is a deacon in the church in Cenchrea .
45016002	Welcome her in the Lord as one who is worthy of honor among God’s people . Help her in whatever she needs , for she has been helpful to many , and especially to me .
45016003	Give my greetings to Priscilla and Aquila , my co-workers in the ministry of Christ Jesus .
45016004	In fact , they once risked their lives for me . I am thankful to them , and so are all the Gentile churches .
45016005	Also give my greetings to the church that meets in their home . Greet my dear friend Epenetus . He was the first person from the province of Asia to become a follower of Christ .
45016006	Give my greetings to Mary , who has worked so hard for your benefit .
45016007	Greet Andronicus and Junia , my fellow Jews , who were in prison with me . They are highly respected among the apostles and became followers of Christ before I did .
45016008	Greet Ampliatus , my dear friend in the Lord .
45016009	Greet Urbanus , our co-worker in Christ , and my dear friend Stachys .
45016010	Greet Apelles , a good man whom Christ approves . And give my greetings to the believers from the household of Aristobulus .
45016011	Greet Herodion , my fellow Jew . Greet the Lord’s people from the household of Narcissus .
45016012	Give my greetings to Tryphena and Tryphosa , the Lord’s workers , and to dear Persis , who has worked so hard for the Lord .
45016013	Greet Rufus , whom the Lord picked out to be his very own ; and also his dear mother , who has been a mother to me .
45016014	Give my greetings to Asyncritus , Phlegon , Hermes , Patrobas , Hermas , and the brothers and sisters who meet with them .
45016015	Give my greetings to Philologus , Julia , Nereus and his sister , and to Olympas and all the believers who meet with them .
45016016	Greet each other in Christian love . All the churches of Christ send you their greetings .
45016017	And now I make one more appeal , my dear brothers and sisters . Watch out for people who cause divisions and upset people’s faith by teaching things contrary to what you have been taught . Stay away from them .
45016018	Such people are not serving Christ our Lord ; they are serving their own personal interests . By smooth talk and glowing words they deceive innocent people .
45016019	But everyone knows that you are obedient to the Lord . This makes me very happy . I want you to be wise in doing right and to stay innocent of any wrong .
45016020	The God of peace will soon crush Satan under your feet . May the grace of our Lord Jesus be with you .
45016021	Timothy , my fellow worker , sends you his greetings , as do Lucius , Jason , and Sosipater , my fellow Jews .
45016022	I , Tertius , the one writing this letter for Paul , send my greetings , too , as one of the Lord’s followers .
45016023	Gaius says hello to you . He is my host and also serves as host to the whole church . Erastus , the city treasurer , sends you his greetings , and so does our brother Quartus .
45016025	Now all glory to God , who is able to make you strong , just as my Good News says . This message about Jesus Christ has revealed his plan for you Gentiles , a plan kept secret from the beginning of time .
45016026	But now as the prophets foretold and as the eternal God has commanded , this message is made known to all Gentiles everywhere , so that they too might believe and obey him .
45016027	All glory to the only wise God , through Jesus Christ , forever . Amen .
46001001	This letter is from Paul , chosen by the will of God to be an apostle of Christ Jesus , and from our brother Sosthenes .
46001002	I am writing to God’s church in Corinth , to you who have been called by God to be his own holy people . He made you holy by means of Christ Jesus , just as he did for all people everywhere who call on the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , their Lord and ours .
46001003	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you grace and peace .
46001004	I always thank my God for you and for the gracious gifts he has given you , now that you belong to Christ Jesus .
46001005	Through him , God has enriched your church in every waywith all of your eloquent words and all of your knowledge .
46001006	This confirms that what I told you about Christ is true .
46001007	Now you have every spiritual gift you need as you eagerly wait for the return of our Lord Jesus Christ .
46001008	He will keep you strong to the end so that you will be free from all blame on the day when our Lord Jesus Christ returns .
46001009	God will do this , for he is faithful to do what he says , and he has invited you into partnership with his Son , Jesus Christ our Lord .
46001010	I appeal to you , dear brothers and sisters , by the authority of our Lord Jesus Christ , to live in harmony with each other . Let there be no divisions in the church . Rather , be of one mind , united in thought and purpose .
46001011	For some members of Chloe’s household have told me about your quarrels , my dear brothers and sisters .
46001012	Some of you are saying , “ I am a follower of Paul . ” Others are saying , “ I follow Apollos , ” or “ I follow Peter , ” or “ I follow only Christ . ”
46001013	Has Christ been divided into factions ? Was I , Paul , crucified for you ? Were any of you baptized in the name of Paul ? Of course not !
46001014	I thank God that I did not baptize any of you except Crispus and Gaius ,
46001015	for now no one can say they were baptized in my name .
46001016	( Oh yes , I also baptized the household of Stephanas , but I don’t remember baptizing anyone else . )
46001017	For Christ didn’t send me to baptize , but to preach the Good Newsand not with clever speech , for fear that the cross of Christ would lose its power .
46001018	The message of the cross is foolish to those who are headed for destruction ! But we who are being saved know it is the very power of God .
46001019	As the Scriptures say , “ I will destroy the wisdom of the wise and discard the intelligence of the intelligent . ”
46001020	So where does this leave the philosophers , the scholars , and the world’s brilliant debaters ? God has made the wisdom of this world look foolish .
46001021	Since God in his wisdom saw to it that the world would never know him through human wisdom , he has used our foolish preaching to save those who believe .
46001022	It is foolish to the Jews , who ask for signs from heaven . And it is foolish to the Greeks , who seek human wisdom .
46001023	So when we preach that Christ was crucified , the Jews are offended and the Gentiles say it’s all nonsense .
46001024	But to those called by God to salvation , both Jews and Gentiles , Christ is the power of God and the wisdom of God .
46001025	This foolish plan of God is wiser than the wisest of human plans , and God’s weakness is stronger than the greatest of human strength .
46001026	Remember , dear brothers and sisters , that few of you were wise in the world’s eyes or powerful or wealthy when God called you .
46001027	Instead , God chose things the world considers foolish in order to shame those who think they are wise . And he chose things that are powerless to shame those who are powerful .
46001028	God chose things despised by the world , things counted as nothing at all , and used them to bring to nothing what the world considers important .
46001029	As a result , no one can ever boast in the presence of God .
46001030	God has united you with Christ Jesus . For our benefit God made him to be wisdom itself . Christ made us right with God ; he made us pure and holy , and he freed us from sin .
46001031	Therefore , as the Scriptures say , “ If you want to boast , boast only about the L ord . ”
46002001	When I first came to you , dear brothers and sisters , I didn’t use lofty words and impressive wisdom to tell you God’s secret plan .
46002002	For I decided that while I was with you I would forget everything except Jesus Christ , the one who was crucified .
46002003	I came to you in weakness timid and trembling .
46002004	And my message and my preaching were very plain . Rather than using clever and persuasive speeches , I relied only on the power of the Holy Spirit .
46002005	I did this so you would trust not in human wisdom but in the power of God .
46002006	Yet when I am among mature believers , I do speak with words of wisdom , but not the kind of wisdom that belongs to this world or to the rulers of this world , who are soon forgotten .
46002007	No , the wisdom we speak of is the mystery of God his plan that was previously hidden , even though he made it for our ultimate glory before the world began .
46002008	But the rulers of this world have not understood it ; if they had , they would not have crucified our glorious Lord .
46002009	That is what the Scriptures mean when they say , “ No eye has seen , no ear has heard , and no mind has imagined what God has prepared for those who love him . ”
46002010	But it was to us that God revealed these things by his Spirit . For his Spirit searches out everything and shows us God’s deep secrets .
46002011	No one can know a person’s thoughts except that person’s own spirit , and no one can know God’s thoughts except God’s own Spirit .
46002012	And we have received God’s Spirit ( not the world’s spirit ) , so we can know the wonderful things God has freely given us .
46002013	When we tell you these things , we do not use words that come from human wisdom . Instead , we speak words given to us by the Spirit , using the Spirit’s words to explain spiritual truths .
46002014	But people who aren’t spiritual can’t receive these truths from God’s Spirit . It all sounds foolish to them and they can’t understand it , for only those who are spiritual can understand what the Spirit means .
46002015	Those who are spiritual can evaluate all things , but they themselves cannot be evaluated by others .
46002016	For , “ Who can know the Lord’s thoughts ? Who knows enough to teach him ? ” But we understand these things , for we have the mind of Christ .
46003001	Dear brothers and sisters , when I was with you I couldn’t talk to you as I would to spiritual people . I had to talk as though you belonged to this world or as though you were infants in the Christian life .
46003002	I had to feed you with milk , not with solid food , because you weren’t ready for anything stronger . And you still aren’t ready ,
46003003	for you are still controlled by your sinful nature . You are jealous of one another and quarrel with each other . Doesn’t that prove you are controlled by your sinful nature ? Aren’t you living like people of the world ?
46003004	When one of you says , “ I am a follower of Paul , ” and another says , “ I follow Apollos , ” aren’t you acting just like people of the world ?
46003005	After all , who is Apollos ? Who is Paul ? We are only God’s servants through whom you believed the Good News . Each of us did the work the Lord gave us .
46003006	I planted the seed in your hearts , and Apollos watered it , but it was God who made it grow .
46003007	It’s not important who does the planting , or who does the watering . What’s important is that God makes the seed grow .
46003008	The one who plants and the one who waters work together with the same purpose . And both will be rewarded for their own hard work .
46003009	For we are both God’s workers . And you are God’s field . You are God’s building .
46003010	Because of God’s grace to me , I have laid the foundation like an expert builder . Now others are building on it . But whoever is building on this foundation must be very careful .
46003011	For no one can lay any foundation other than the one we already haveJesus Christ .
46003012	Anyone who builds on that foundation may use a variety of materialsgold , silver , jewels , wood , hay , or straw .
46003013	But on the judgment day , fire will reveal what kind of work each builder has done . The fire will show if a person’s work has any value .
46003014	If the work survives , that builder will receive a reward .
46003015	But if the work is burned up , the builder will suffer great loss . The builder will be saved , but like someone barely escaping through a wall of flames .
46003016	Don’t you realize that all of you together are the temple of God and that the Spirit of God lives in you ?
46003017	God will destroy anyone who destroys this temple . For God’s temple is holy , and you are that temple .
46003018	Stop deceiving yourselves . If you think you are wise by this world’s standards , you need to become a fool to be truly wise .
46003019	For the wisdom of this world is foolishness to God . As the Scriptures say , “ He traps the wise in the snare of their own cleverness . ”
46003020	And again , “ The L ord knows the thoughts of the wise ; he knows they are worthless . ”
46003021	So don’t boast about following a particular human leader . For everything belongs to you
46003022	whether Paul or Apollos or Peter , or the world , or life and death , or the present and the future . Everything belongs to you ,
46003023	and you belong to Christ , and Christ belongs to God .
46004001	So look at Apollos and me as mere servants of Christ who have been put in charge of explaining God’s mysteries .
46004002	Now , a person who is put in charge as a manager must be faithful .
46004003	As for me , it matters very little how I might be evaluated by you or by any human authority . I don’t even trust my own judgment on this point .
46004004	My conscience is clear , but that doesn’t prove I’m right . It is the Lord himself who will examine me and decide .
46004005	So don’t make judgments about anyone ahead of timebefore the Lord returns . For he will bring our darkest secrets to light and will reveal our private motives . Then God will give to each one whatever praise is due .
46004006	Dear brothers and sisters , I have used Apollos and myself to illustrate what I’ve been saying . If you pay attention to what I have quoted from the Scriptures , you won’t be proud of one of your leaders at the expense of another .
46004007	For what gives you the right to make such a judgment ? What do you have that God hasn’t given you ? And if everything you have is from God , why boast as though it were not a gift ?
46004008	You think you already have everything you need . You think you are already rich . You have begun to reign in God’s kingdom without us ! I wish you really were reigning already , for then we would be reigning with you .
46004009	Instead , I sometimes think God has put us apostles on display , like prisoners of war at the end of a victor’s parade , condemned to die . We have become a spectacle to the entire world to people and angels alike .
46004010	Our dedication to Christ makes us look like fools , but you claim to be so wise in Christ ! We are weak , but you are so powerful ! You are honored , but we are ridiculed .
46004011	Even now we go hungry and thirsty , and we don’t have enough clothes to keep warm . We are often beaten and have no home .
46004012	We work wearily with our own hands to earn our living . We bless those who curse us . We are patient with those who abuse us .
46004013	We appeal gently when evil things are said about us . Yet we are treated like the world’s garbage , like everybody’s trashright up to the present moment .
46004014	I am not writing these things to shame you , but to warn you as my beloved children .
46004015	For even if you had ten thousand others to teach you about Christ , you have only one spiritual father . For I became your father in Christ Jesus when I preached the Good News to you .
46004016	So I urge you to imitate me .
46004017	That’s why I have sent Timothy , my beloved and faithful child in the Lord . He will remind you of how I follow Christ Jesus , just as I teach in all the churches wherever I go .
46004018	Some of you have become arrogant , thinking I will not visit you again .
46004019	But I will comeand soonif the Lord lets me , and then I’ll find out whether these arrogant people just give pretentious speeches or whether they really have God’s power .
46004020	For the Kingdom of God is not just a lot of talk ; it is living by God’s power .
46004021	Which do you choose ? Should I come with a rod to punish you , or should I come with love and a gentle spirit ?
46005001	I can hardly believe the report about the sexual immorality going on among yousomething that even pagans don’t do . I am told that a man in your church is living in sin with his stepmother .
46005002	You are so proud of yourselves , but you should be mourning in sorrow and shame . And you should remove this man from your fellowship .
46005003	Even though I am not with you in person , I am with you in the Spirit . And as though I were there , I have already passed judgment on this man
46005004	in the name of the Lord Jesus . You must call a meeting of the church . I will be present with you in spirit , and so will the power of our Lord Jesus .
46005005	Then you must throw this man out and hand him over to Satan so that his sinful nature will be destroyed and he himself will be saved on the day the Lord returns .
46005006	Your boasting about this is terrible . Don’t you realize that this sin is like a little yeast that spreads through the whole batch of dough ?
46005007	Get rid of the old “ yeast ” by removing this wicked person from among you . Then you will be like a fresh batch of dough made without yeast , which is what you really are . Christ , our Passover Lamb , has been sacrificed for us .
46005008	So let us celebrate the festival , not with the old bread of wickedness and evil , but with the new bread of sincerity and truth .
46005009	When I wrote to you before , I told you not to associate with people who indulge in sexual sin .
46005010	But I wasn’t talking about unbelievers who indulge in sexual sin , or are greedy , or cheat people , or worship idols . You would have to leave this world to avoid people like that .
46005011	I meant that you are not to associate with anyone who claims to be a believer yet indulges in sexual sin , or is greedy , or worships idols , or is abusive , or is a drunkard , or cheats people . Don’t even eat with such people .
46005012	It isn’t my responsibility to judge outsiders , but it certainly is your responsibility to judge those inside the church who are sinning .
46005013	God will judge those on the outside ; but as the Scriptures say , “ You must remove the evil person from among you . ”
46006001	When one of you has a dispute with another believer , how dare you file a lawsuit and ask a secular court to decide the matter instead of taking it to other believers !
46006002	Don’t you realize that someday we believers will judge the world ? And since you are going to judge the world , can’t you decide even these little things among yourselves ?
46006003	Don’t you realize that we will judge angels ? So you should surely be able to resolve ordinary disputes in this life .
46006004	If you have legal disputes about such matters , why go to outside judges who are not respected by the church ?
46006005	I am saying this to shame you . Isn’t there anyone in all the church who is wise enough to decide these issues ?
46006006	But instead , one believer sues anotherright in front of unbelievers !
46006007	Even to have such lawsuits with one another is a defeat for you . Why not just accept the injustice and leave it at that ? Why not let yourselves be cheated ?
46006008	Instead , you yourselves are the ones who do wrong and cheat even your fellow believers .
46006009	Don’t you realize that those who do wrong will not inherit the Kingdom of God ? Don’t fool yourselves . Those who indulge in sexual sin , or who worship idols , or commit adultery , or are male prostitutes , or practice homosexuality ,
46006010	or are thieves , or greedy people , or drunkards , or are abusive , or cheat peoplenone of these will inherit the Kingdom of God .
46006011	Some of you were once like that . But you were cleansed ; you were made holy ; you were made right with God by calling on the name of the Lord Jesus Christ and by the Spirit of our God .
46006012	You say , “ I am allowed to do anything ” but not everything is good for you . And even though “ I am allowed to do anything , ” I must not become a slave to anything .
46006013	You say , “ Food was made for the stomach , and the stomach for food . ” ( This is true , though someday God will do away with both of them . ) But you can’t say that our bodies were made for sexual immorality . They were made for the Lord , and the Lord cares about our bodies .
46006014	And God will raise us from the dead by his power , just as he raised our Lord from the dead .
46006015	Don’t you realize that your bodies are actually parts of Christ ? Should a man take his body , which is part of Christ , and join it to a prostitute ? Never !
46006016	And don’t you realize that if a man joins himself to a prostitute , he becomes one body with her ? For the Scriptures say , “ The two are united into one . ”
46006017	But the person who is joined to the Lord is one spirit with him .
46006018	Run from sexual sin ! No other sin so clearly affects the body as this one does . For sexual immorality is a sin against your own body .
46006019	Don’t you realize that your body is the temple of the Holy Spirit , who lives in you and was given to you by God ? You do not belong to yourself ,
46006020	for God bought you with a high price . So you must honor God with your body .
46007001	Now regarding the questions you asked in your letter . Yes , it is good to abstain from sexual relations .
46007002	But because there is so much sexual immorality , each man should have his own wife , and each woman should have her own husband .
46007003	The husband should fulfill his wife’s sexual needs , and the wife should fulfill her husband’s needs .
46007004	The wife gives authority over her body to her husband , and the husband gives authority over his body to his wife .
46007005	Do not deprive each other of sexual relations , unless you both agree to refrain from sexual intimacy for a limited time so you can give yourselves more completely to prayer . Afterward , you should come together again so that Satan won’t be able to tempt you because of your lack of self-control .
46007006	I say this as a concession , not as a command .
46007007	But I wish everyone were single , just as I am . Yet each person has a special gift from God , of one kind or another .
46007008	So I say to those who aren’t married and to widowsit’s better to stay unmarried , just as I am .
46007009	But if they can’t control themselves , they should go ahead and marry . It’s better to marry than to burn with lust .
46007010	But for those who are married , I have a command that comes not from me , but from the Lord . A wife must not leave her husband .
46007011	But if she does leave him , let her remain single or else be reconciled to him . And the husband must not leave his wife .
46007012	Now , I will speak to the rest of you , though I do not have a direct command from the Lord . If a Christian man has a wife who is not a believer and she is willing to continue living with him , he must not leave her .
46007013	And if a Christian woman has a husband who is not a believer and he is willing to continue living with her , she must not leave him .
46007014	For the Christian wife brings holiness to her marriage , and the Christian husband brings holiness to his marriage . Otherwise , your children would not be holy , but now they are holy .
46007015	( But if the husband or wife who isn’t a believer insists on leaving , let them go . In such cases the Christian husband or wife is no longer bound to the other , for God has called you to live in peace . )
46007016	Don’t you wives realize that your husbands might be saved because of you ? And don’t you husbands realize that your wives might be saved because of you ?
46007017	Each of you should continue to live in whatever situation the Lord has placed you , and remain as you were when God first called you . This is my rule for all the churches .
46007018	For instance , a man who was circumcised before he became a believer should not try to reverse it . And the man who was uncircumcised when he became a believer should not be circumcised now .
46007019	For it makes no difference whether or not a man has been circumcised . The important thing is to keep God’s commandments .
46007020	Yes , each of you should remain as you were when God called you .
46007021	Are you a slave ? Don’t let that worry youbut if you get a chance to be free , take it .
46007022	And remember , if you were a slave when the Lord called you , you are now free in the Lord . And if you were free when the Lord called you , you are now a slave of Christ .
46007023	God paid a high price for you , so don’t be enslaved by the world .
46007024	Each of you , dear brothers and sisters , should remain as you were when God first called you .
46007025	Now regarding your question about the young women who are not yet married . I do not have a command from the Lord for them . But the Lord in his mercy has given me wisdom that can be trusted , and I will share it with you .
46007026	Because of the present crisis , I think it is best to remain as you are .
46007027	If you have a wife , do not seek to end the marriage . If you do not have a wife , do not seek to get married .
46007028	But if you do get married , it is not a sin . And if a young woman gets married , it is not a sin . However , those who get married at this time will have troubles , and I am trying to spare you those problems .
46007029	But let me say this , dear brothers and sisters : The time that remains is very short . So from now on , those with wives should not focus only on their marriage .
46007030	Those who weep or who rejoice or who buy things should not be absorbed by their weeping or their joy or their possessions .
46007031	Those who use the things of the world should not become attached to them . For this world as we know it will soon pass away .
46007032	I want you to be free from the concerns of this life . An unmarried man can spend his time doing the Lord’s work and thinking how to please him .
46007033	But a married man has to think about his earthly responsibilities and how to please his wife .
46007034	His interests are divided . In the same way , a woman who is no longer married or has never been married can be devoted to the Lord and holy in body and in spirit . But a married woman has to think about her earthly responsibilities and how to please her husband .
46007035	I am saying this for your benefit , not to place restrictions on you . I want you to do whatever will help you serve the Lord best , with as few distractions as possible .
46007036	But if a man thinks that he’s treating his fiancée improperly and will inevitably give in to his passion , let him marry her as he wishes . It is not a sin .
46007037	But if he has decided firmly not to marry and there is no urgency and he can control his passion , he does well not to marry .
46007038	So the person who marries his fiancée does well , and the person who doesn’t marry does even better .
46007039	A wife is bound to her husband as long as he lives . If her husband dies , she is free to marry anyone she wishes , but only if he loves the Lord .
46007040	But in my opinion it would be better for her to stay single , and I think I am giving you counsel from God’s Spirit when I say this .
46008001	Now regarding your question about food that has been offered to idols . Yes , we know that “ we all have knowledge ” about this issue . But while knowledge makes us feel important , it is love that strengthens the church .
46008002	Anyone who claims to know all the answers doesn’t really know very much .
46008003	But the person who loves God is the one whom God recognizes .
46008004	So , what about eating meat that has been offered to idols ? Well , we all know that an idol is not really a god and that there is only one God .
46008005	There may be so-called gods both in heaven and on earth , and some people actually worship many gods and many lords .
46008006	But we know that there is only one God , the Father , who created everything , and we live for him . And there is only one Lord , Jesus Christ , through whom God made everything and through whom we have been given life .
46008007	However , not all believers know this . Some are accustomed to thinking of idols as being real , so when they eat food that has been offered to idols , they think of it as the worship of real gods , and their weak consciences are violated .
46008008	It’s true that we can’t win God’s approval by what we eat . We don’t lose anything if we don’t eat it , and we don’t gain anything if we do .
46008009	But you must be careful so that your freedom does not cause others with a weaker conscience to stumble .
46008010	For if others see youwith your “ superior knowledge ” eating in the temple of an idol , won’t they be encouraged to violate their conscience by eating food that has been offered to an idol ?
46008011	So because of your superior knowledge , a weak believer for whom Christ died will be destroyed .
46008012	And when you sin against other believers by encouraging them to do something they believe is wrong , you are sinning against Christ .
46008013	So if what I eat causes another believer to sin , I will never eat meat again as long as I livefor I don’t want to cause another believer to stumble .
46009001	Am I not as free as anyone else ? Am I not an apostle ? Haven’t I seen Jesus our Lord with my own eyes ? Isn’t it because of my work that you belong to the Lord ?
46009002	Even if others think I am not an apostle , I certainly am to you . You yourselves are proof that I am the Lord’s apostle .
46009003	This is my answer to those who question my authority .
46009004	Don’t we have the right to live in your homes and share your meals ?
46009005	Don’t we have the right to bring a Christian wife with us as the other apostles and the Lord’s brothers do , and as Peter does ?
46009006	Or is it only Barnabas and I who have to work to support ourselves ?
46009007	What soldier has to pay his own expenses ? What farmer plants a vineyard and doesn’t have the right to eat some of its fruit ? What shepherd cares for a flock of sheep and isn’t allowed to drink some of the milk ?
46009008	Am I expressing merely a human opinion , or does the law say the same thing ?
46009009	For the law of Moses says , “ You must not muzzle an ox to keep it from eating as it treads out the grain . ” Was God thinking only about oxen when he said this ?
46009010	Wasn’t he actually speaking to us ? Yes , it was written for us , so that the one who plows and the one who threshes the grain might both expect a share of the harvest .
46009011	Since we have planted spiritual seed among you , aren’t we entitled to a harvest of physical food and drink ?
46009012	If you support others who preach to you , shouldn’t we have an even greater right to be supported ? But we have never used this right . We would rather put up with anything than be an obstacle to the Good News about Christ .
46009013	Don’t you realize that those who work in the temple get their meals from the offerings brought to the temple ? And those who serve at the altar get a share of the sacrificial offerings .
46009014	In the same way , the Lord ordered that those who preach the Good News should be supported by those who benefit from it .
46009015	Yet I have never used any of these rights . And I am not writing this to suggest that I want to start now . In fact , I would rather die than lose my right to boast about preaching without charge .
46009016	Yet preaching the Good News is not something I can boast about . I am compelled by God to do it . How terrible for me if I didn’t preach the Good News !
46009017	If I were doing this on my own initiative , I would deserve payment . But I have no choice , for God has given me this sacred trust .
46009018	What then is my pay ? It is the opportunity to preach the Good News without charging anyone . That’s why I never demand my rights when I preach the Good News .
46009019	Even though I am a free man with no master , I have become a slave to all people to bring many to Christ .
46009020	When I was with the Jews , I lived like a Jew to bring the Jews to Christ . When I was with those who follow the Jewish law , I too lived under that law . Even though I am not subject to the law , I did this so I could bring to Christ those who are under the law .
46009021	When I am with the Gentiles who do not follow the Jewish law , I too live apart from that law so I can bring them to Christ . But I do not ignore the law of God ; I obey the law of Christ .
46009022	When I am with those who are weak , I share their weakness , for I want to bring the weak to Christ . Yes , I try to find common ground with everyone , doing everything I can to save some .
46009023	I do everything to spread the Good News and share in its blessings .
46009024	Don’t you realize that in a race everyone runs , but only one person gets the prize ? So run to win !
46009025	All athletes are disciplined in their training . They do it to win a prize that will fade away , but we do it for an eternal prize .
46009026	So I run with purpose in every step . I am not just shadowboxing .
46009027	I discipline my body like an athlete , training it to do what it should . Otherwise , I fear that after preaching to others I myself might be disqualified .
46010001	I don’t want you to forget , dear brothers and sisters , about our ancestors in the wilderness long ago . All of them were guided by a cloud that moved ahead of them , and all of them walked through the sea on dry ground .
46010002	In the cloud and in the sea , all of them were baptized as followers of Moses .
46010003	All of them ate the same spiritual food ,
46010004	and all of them drank the same spiritual water . For they drank from the spiritual rock that traveled with them , and that rock was Christ .
46010005	Yet God was not pleased with most of them , and their bodies were scattered in the wilderness .
46010006	These things happened as a warning to us , so that we would not crave evil things as they did ,
46010007	or worship idols as some of them did . As the Scriptures say , “ The people celebrated with feasting and drinking , and they indulged in pagan revelry . ”
46010008	And we must not engage in sexual immorality as some of them did , causing 23,000 of them to die in one day .
46010009	Nor should we put Christ to the test , as some of them did and then died from snakebites .
46010010	And don’t grumble as some of them did , and then were destroyed by the angel of death .
46010011	These things happened to them as examples for us . They were written down to warn us who live at the end of the age .
46010012	If you think you are standing strong , be careful not to fall .
46010013	The temptations in your life are no different from what others experience . And God is faithful . He will not allow the temptation to be more than you can stand . When you are tempted , he will show you a way out so that you can endure .
46010014	So , my dear friends , flee from the worship of idols .
46010015	You are reasonable people . Decide for yourselves if what I am saying is true .
46010016	When we bless the cup at the Lord’s Table , aren’t we sharing in the blood of Christ ? And when we break the bread , aren’t we sharing in the body of Christ ?
46010017	And though we are many , we all eat from one loaf of bread , showing that we are one body .
46010018	Think about the people of Israel . Weren’t they united by eating the sacrifices at the altar ?
46010019	What am I trying to say ? Am I saying that food offered to idols has some significance , or that idols are real gods ?
46010020	No , not at all . I am saying that these sacrifices are offered to demons , not to God . And I don’t want you to participate with demons .
46010021	You cannot drink from the cup of the Lord and from the cup of demons , too . You cannot eat at the Lord’s Table and at the table of demons , too .
46010022	What ? Do we dare to rouse the Lord’s jealousy ? Do you think we are stronger than he is ?
46010023	You say , “ I am allowed to do anything ” but not everything is good for you . You say , “ I am allowed to do anything ” but not everything is beneficial .
46010024	Don’t be concerned for your own good but for the good of others .
46010025	So you may eat any meat that is sold in the marketplace without raising questions of conscience .
46010026	For “ the earth is the Lord’s , and everything in it . ”
46010027	If someone who isn’t a believer asks you home for dinner , accept the invitation if you want to . Eat whatever is offered to you without raising questions of conscience .
46010028	( But suppose someone tells you , “ This meat was offered to an idol . ” Don’t eat it , out of consideration for the conscience of the one who told you .
46010029	It might not be a matter of conscience for you , but it is for the other person . ) For why should my freedom be limited by what someone else thinks ?
46010030	If I can thank God for the food and enjoy it , why should I be condemned for eating it ?
46010031	So whether you eat or drink , or whatever you do , do it all for the glory of God .
46010032	Don’t give offense to Jews or Gentiles or the church of God .
46010033	I , too , try to please everyone in everything I do . I don’t just do what is best for me ; I do what is best for others so that many may be saved .
46011001	And you should imitate me , just as I imitate Christ .
46011002	I am so glad that you always keep me in your thoughts , and that you are following the teachings I passed on to you .
46011003	But there is one thing I want you to know : The head of every man is Christ , the head of woman is man , and the head of Christ is God .
46011004	A man dishonors his head if he covers his head while praying or prophesying .
46011005	But a woman dishonors her head if she prays or prophesies without a covering on her head , for this is the same as shaving her head .
46011006	Yes , if she refuses to wear a head covering , she should cut off all her hair ! But since it is shameful for a woman to have her hair cut or her head shaved , she should wear a covering .
46011007	A man should not wear anything on his head when worshiping , for man is made in God’s image and reflects God’s glory . And woman reflects man’s glory .
46011008	For the first man didn’t come from woman , but the first woman came from man .
46011009	And man was not made for woman , but woman was made for man .
46011010	For this reason , and because the angels are watching , a woman should wear a covering on her head to show she is under authority .
46011011	But among the Lord’s people , women are not independent of men , and men are not independent of women .
46011012	For although the first woman came from man , every other man was born from a woman , and everything comes from God .
46011013	Judge for yourselves . Is it right for a woman to pray to God in public without covering her head ?
46011014	Isn’t it obvious that it’s disgraceful for a man to have long hair ?
46011015	And isn’t long hair a woman’s pride and joy ? For it has been given to her as a covering .
46011016	But if anyone wants to argue about this , I simply say that we have no other custom than this , and neither do God’s other churches .
46011017	But in the following instructions , I cannot praise you . For it sounds as if more harm than good is done when you meet together .
46011018	First , I hear that there are divisions among you when you meet as a church , and to some extent I believe it .
46011019	But , of course , there must be divisions among you so that you who have God’s approval will be recognized !
46011020	When you meet together , you are not really interested in the Lord’s Supper .
46011021	For some of you hurry to eat your own meal without sharing with others . As a result , some go hungry while others get drunk .
46011022	What ? Don’t you have your own homes for eating and drinking ? Or do you really want to disgrace God’s church and shame the poor ? What am I supposed to say ? Do you want me to praise you ? Well , I certainly will not praise you for this !
46011023	For I pass on to you what I received from the Lord himself . On the night when he was betrayed , the Lord Jesus took some bread
46011024	and gave thanks to God for it . Then he broke it in pieces and said , “ This is my body , which is given for you . Do this to remember me . ”
46011025	In the same way , he took the cup of wine after supper , saying , “ This cup is the new covenant between God and his peoplean agreement confirmed with my blood . Do this to remember me as often as you drink it . ”
46011026	For every time you eat this bread and drink this cup , you are announcing the Lord’s death until he comes again .
46011027	So anyone who eats this bread or drinks this cup of the Lord unworthily is guilty of sinning against the body and blood of the Lord .
46011028	That is why you should examine yourself before eating the bread and drinking the cup .
46011029	For if you eat the bread or drink the cup without honoring the body of Christ , you are eating and drinking God’s judgment upon yourself .
46011030	That is why many of you are weak and sick and some have even died .
46011031	But if we would examine ourselves , we would not be judged by God in this way .
46011032	Yet when we are judged by the Lord , we are being disciplined so that we will not be condemned along with the world .
46011033	So , my dear brothers and sisters , when you gather for the Lord’s Supper , wait for each other .
46011034	If you are really hungry , eat at home so you won’t bring judgment upon yourselves when you meet together . I’ll give you instructions about the other matters after I arrive .
46012001	Now , dear brothers and sisters , regarding your question about the special abilities the Spirit gives us . I don’t want you to misunderstand this .
46012002	You know that when you were still pagans , you were led astray and swept along in worshiping speechless idols .
46012003	So I want you to know that no one speaking by the Spirit of God will curse Jesus , and no one can say Jesus is Lord , except by the Holy Spirit .
46012004	There are different kinds of spiritual gifts , but the same Spirit is the source of them all .
46012005	There are different kinds of service , but we serve the same Lord .
46012006	God works in different ways , but it is the same God who does the work in all of us .
46012007	A spiritual gift is given to each of us so we can help each other .
46012008	To one person the Spirit gives the ability to give wise advice ; to another the same Spirit gives a message of special knowledge .
46012009	The same Spirit gives great faith to another , and to someone else the one Spirit gives the gift of healing .
46012010	He gives one person the power to perform miracles , and another the ability to prophesy . He gives someone else the ability to discern whether a message is from the Spirit of God or from another spirit . Still another person is given the ability to speak in unknown languages , while another is given the ability to interpret what is being said .
46012011	It is the one and only Spirit who distributes all these gifts . He alone decides which gift each person should have .
46012012	The human body has many parts , but the many parts make up one whole body . So it is with the body of Christ .
46012013	Some of us are Jews , some are Gentiles , some are slaves , and some are free . But we have all been baptized into one body by one Spirit , and we all share the same Spirit .
46012014	Yes , the body has many different parts , not just one part .
46012015	If the foot says , “ I am not a part of the body because I am not a hand , ” that does not make it any less a part of the body .
46012016	And if the ear says , “ I am not part of the body because I am not an eye , ” would that make it any less a part of the body ?
46012017	If the whole body were an eye , how would you hear ? Or if your whole body were an ear , how would you smell anything ?
46012018	But our bodies have many parts , and God has put each part just where he wants it .
46012019	How strange a body would be if it had only one part !
46012020	Yes , there are many parts , but only one body .
46012021	The eye can never say to the hand , “ I don’t need you . ” The head can’t say to the feet , “ I don’t need you . ”
46012022	In fact , some parts of the body that seem weakest and least important are actually the most necessary .
46012023	And the parts we regard as less honorable are those we clothe with the greatest care . So we carefully protect those parts that should not be seen ,
46012024	while the more honorable parts do not require this special care . So God has put the body together such that extra honor and care are given to those parts that have less dignity .
46012025	This makes for harmony among the members , so that all the members care for each other .
46012026	If one part suffers , all the parts suffer with it , and if one part is honored , all the parts are glad .
46012027	All of you together are Christ’s body , and each of you is a part of it .
46012028	Here are some of the parts God has appointed for the church : first are apostles , second are prophets , third are teachers , then those who do miracles , those who have the gift of healing , those who can help others , those who have the gift of leadership , those who speak in unknown languages .
46012029	Are we all apostles ? Are we all prophets ? Are we all teachers ? Do we all have the power to do miracles ?
46012030	Do we all have the gift of healing ? Do we all have the ability to speak in unknown languages ? Do we all have the ability to interpret unknown languages ? Of course not !
46012031	So you should earnestly desire the most helpful gifts . But now let me show you a way of life that is best of all .
46013001	If I could speak all the languages of earth and of angels , but didn’t love others , I would only be a noisy gong or a clanging cymbal .
46013002	If I had the gift of prophecy , and if I understood all of God’s secret plans and possessed all knowledge , and if I had such faith that I could move mountains , but didn’t love others , I would be nothing .
46013003	If I gave everything I have to the poor and even sacrificed my body , I could boast about it ; but if I didn’t love others , I would have gained nothing .
46013004	Love is patient and kind . Love is not jealous or boastful or proud
46013005	or rude . It does not demand its own way . It is not irritable , and it keeps no record of being wronged .
46013006	It does not rejoice about injustice but rejoices whenever the truth wins out .
46013007	Love never gives up , never loses faith , is always hopeful , and endures through every circumstance .
46013008	Prophecy and speaking in unknown languages and special knowledge will become useless . But love will last forever !
46013009	Now our knowledge is partial and incomplete , and even the gift of prophecy reveals only part of the whole picture !
46013010	But when the time of perfection comes , these partial things will become useless .
46013011	When I was a child , I spoke and thought and reasoned as a child . But when I grew up , I put away childish things .
46013012	Now we see things imperfectly , like puzzling reflections in a mirror , but then we will see everything with perfect clarity . All that I know now is partial and incomplete , but then I will know everything completely , just as God now knows me completely .
46013013	Three things will last foreverfaith , hope , and loveand the greatest of these is love .
46014001	Let love be your highest goal ! But you should also desire the special abilities the Spirit givesespecially the ability to prophesy .
46014002	For if you have the ability to speak in tongues , you will be talking only to God , since people won’t be able to understand you . You will be speaking by the power of the Spirit , but it will all be mysterious .
46014003	But one who prophesies strengthens others , encourages them , and comforts them .
46014004	A person who speaks in tongues is strengthened personally , but one who speaks a word of prophecy strengthens the entire church .
46014005	I wish you could all speak in tongues , but even more I wish you could all prophesy . For prophecy is greater than speaking in tongues , unless someone interprets what you are saying so that the whole church will be strengthened .
46014006	Dear brothers and sisters , if I should come to you speaking in an unknown language , how would that help you ? But if I bring you a revelation or some special knowledge or prophecy or teaching , that will be helpful .
46014007	Even lifeless instruments like the flute or the harp must play the notes clearly , or no one will recognize the melody .
46014008	And if the bugler doesn’t sound a clear call , how will the soldiers know they are being called to battle ?
46014009	It’s the same for you . If you speak to people in words they don’t understand , how will they know what you are saying ? You might as well be talking into empty space .
46014010	There are many different languages in the world , and every language has meaning .
46014011	But if I don’t understand a language , I will be a foreigner to someone who speaks it , and the one who speaks it will be a foreigner to me .
46014012	And the same is true for you . Since you are so eager to have the special abilities the Spirit gives , seek those that will strengthen the whole church .
46014013	So anyone who speaks in tongues should pray also for the ability to interpret what has been said .
46014014	For if I pray in tongues , my spirit is praying , but I don’t understand what I am saying .
46014015	Well then , what shall I do ? I will pray in the spirit , and I will also pray in words I understand . I will sing in the spirit , and I will also sing in words I understand .
46014016	For if you praise God only in the spirit , how can those who don’t understand you praise God along with you ? How can they join you in giving thanks when they don’t understand what you are saying ?
46014017	You will be giving thanks very well , but it won’t strengthen the people who hear you .
46014018	I thank God that I speak in tongues more than any of you .
46014019	But in a church meeting I would rather speak five understandable words to help others than ten thousand words in an unknown language .
46014020	Dear brothers and sisters , don’t be childish in your understanding of these things . Be innocent as babies when it comes to evil , but be mature in understanding matters of this kind .
46014021	It is written in the Scriptures : “ I will speak to my own people through strange languages and through the lips of foreigners . But even then , they will not listen to me , ” says the L ord .
46014022	So you see that speaking in tongues is a sign , not for believers , but for unbelievers . Prophecy , however , is for the benefit of believers , not unbelievers .
46014023	Even so , if unbelievers or people who don’t understand these things come into your church meeting and hear everyone speaking in an unknown language , they will think you are crazy .
46014024	But if all of you are prophesying , and unbelievers or people who don’t understand these things come into your meeting , they will be convicted of sin and judged by what you say .
46014025	As they listen , their secret thoughts will be exposed , and they will fall to their knees and worship God , declaring , “ God is truly here among you . ”
46014026	Well , my brothers and sisters , let’s summarize . When you meet together , one will sing , another will teach , another will tell some special revelation God has given , one will speak in tongues , and another will interpret what is said . But everything that is done must strengthen all of you .
46014027	No more than two or three should speak in tongues . They must speak one at a time , and someone must interpret what they say .
46014028	But if no one is present who can interpret , they must be silent in your church meeting and speak in tongues to God privately .
46014029	Let two or three people prophesy , and let the others evaluate what is said .
46014030	But if someone is prophesying and another person receives a revelation from the Lord , the one who is speaking must stop .
46014031	In this way , all who prophesy will have a turn to speak , one after the other , so that everyone will learn and be encouraged .
46014032	Remember that people who prophesy are in control of their spirit and can take turns .
46014033	For God is not a God of disorder but of peace , as in all the meetings of God’s holy people .
46014034	Women should be silent during the church meetings . It is not proper for them to speak . They should be submissive , just as the law says .
46014035	If they have any questions , they should ask their husbands at home , for it is improper for women to speak in church meetings .
46014036	Or do you think God’s word originated with you Corinthians ? Are you the only ones to whom it was given ?
46014037	If you claim to be a prophet or think you are spiritual , you should recognize that what I am saying is a command from the Lord himself .
46014038	But if you do not recognize this , you yourself will not be recognized .
46014039	So , my dear brothers and sisters , be eager to prophesy , and don’t forbid speaking in tongues .
46014040	But be sure that everything is done properly and in order .
46015001	Let me now remind you , dear brothers and sisters , of the Good News I preached to you before . You welcomed it then , and you still stand firm in it .
46015002	It is this Good News that saves you if you continue to believe the message I told youunless , of course , you believed something that was never true in the first place .
46015003	I passed on to you what was most important and what had also been passed on to me . Christ died for our sins , just as the Scriptures said .
46015004	He was buried , and he was raised from the dead on the third day , just as the Scriptures said .
46015005	He was seen by Peter and then by the Twelve .
46015006	After that , he was seen by more than 500 of his followers at one time , most of whom are still alive , though some have died .
46015007	Then he was seen by James and later by all the apostles .
46015008	Last of all , as though I had been born at the wrong time , I also saw him .
46015009	For I am the least of all the apostles . In fact , I’m not even worthy to be called an apostle after the way I persecuted God’s church .
46015010	But whatever I am now , it is all because God poured out his special favor on meand not without results . For I have worked harder than any of the other apostles ; yet it was not I but God who was working through me by his grace .
46015011	So it makes no difference whether I preach or they preach , for we all preach the same message you have already believed .
46015012	But tell me thissince we preach that Christ rose from the dead , why are some of you saying there will be no resurrection of the dead ?
46015013	For if there is no resurrection of the dead , then Christ has not been raised either .
46015014	And if Christ has not been raised , then all our preaching is useless , and your faith is useless .
46015015	And we apostles would all be lying about Godfor we have said that God raised Christ from the grave . But that can’t be true if there is no resurrection of the dead .
46015016	And if there is no resurrection of the dead , then Christ has not been raised .
46015017	And if Christ has not been raised , then your faith is useless and you are still guilty of your sins .
46015018	In that case , all who have died believing in Christ are lost !
46015019	And if our hope in Christ is only for this life , we are more to be pitied than anyone in the world .
46015020	But in fact , Christ has been raised from the dead . He is the first of a great harvest of all who have died .
46015021	So you see , just as death came into the world through a man , now the resurrection from the dead has begun through another man .
46015022	Just as everyone dies because we all belong to Adam , everyone who belongs to Christ will be given new life .
46015023	But there is an order to this resurrection : Christ was raised as the first of the harvest ; then all who belong to Christ will be raised when he comes back .
46015024	After that the end will come , when he will turn the Kingdom over to God the Father , having destroyed every ruler and authority and power .
46015025	For Christ must reign until he humbles all his enemies beneath his feet .
46015026	And the last enemy to be destroyed is death .
46015027	For the Scriptures say , “ God has put all things under his authority . ” ( Of course , when it says “ all things are under his authority , ” that does not include God himself , who gave Christ his authority . )
46015028	Then , when all things are under his authority , the Son will put himself under God’s authority , so that God , who gave his Son authority over all things , will be utterly supreme over everything everywhere .
46015029	If the dead will not be raised , what point is there in people being baptized for those who are dead ? Why do it unless the dead will someday rise again ?
46015030	And why should we ourselves risk our lives hour by hour ?
46015031	For I swear , dear brothers and sisters , that I face death daily . This is as certain as my pride in what Christ Jesus our Lord has done in you .
46015032	And what value was there in fighting wild beaststhose people of Ephesus if there will be no resurrection from the dead ? And if there is no resurrection , “ Let’s feast and drink , for tomorrow we die ! ”
46015033	Don’t be fooled by those who say such things , for “ bad company corrupts good character . ”
46015034	Think carefully about what is right , and stop sinning . For to your shame I say that some of you don’t know God at all .
46015035	But someone may ask , “ How will the dead be raised ? What kind of bodies will they have ? ”
46015036	What a foolish question ! When you put a seed into the ground , it doesn’t grow into a plant unless it dies first .
46015037	And what you put in the ground is not the plant that will grow , but only a bare seed of wheat or whatever you are planting .
46015038	Then God gives it the new body he wants it to have . A different plant grows from each kind of seed .
46015039	Similarly there are different kinds of fleshone kind for humans , another for animals , another for birds , and another for fish .
46015040	There are also bodies in the heavens and bodies on the earth . The glory of the heavenly bodies is different from the glory of the earthly bodies .
46015041	The sun has one kind of glory , while the moon and stars each have another kind . And even the stars differ from each other in their glory .
46015042	It is the same way with the resurrection of the dead . Our earthly bodies are planted in the ground when we die , but they will be raised to live forever .
46015043	Our bodies are buried in brokenness , but they will be raised in glory . They are buried in weakness , but they will be raised in strength .
46015044	They are buried as natural human bodies , but they will be raised as spiritual bodies . For just as there are natural bodies , there are also spiritual bodies .
