46015045	The Scriptures tell us , “ The first man , Adam , became a living person . ” But the last Adamthat is , Christis a life-giving Spirit .
46015046	What comes first is the natural body , then the spiritual body comes later .
46015047	Adam , the first man , was made from the dust of the earth , while Christ , the second man , came from heaven .
46015048	Earthly people are like the earthly man , and heavenly people are like the heavenly man .
46015049	Just as we are now like the earthly man , we will someday be like the heavenly man .
46015050	What I am saying , dear brothers and sisters , is that our physical bodies cannot inherit the Kingdom of God . These dying bodies cannot inherit what will last forever .
46015051	But let me reveal to you a wonderful secret . We will not all die , but we will all be transformed !
46015052	It will happen in a moment , in the blink of an eye , when the last trumpet is blown . For when the trumpet sounds , those who have died will be raised to live forever . And we who are living will also be transformed .
46015053	For our dying bodies must be transformed into bodies that will never die ; our mortal bodies must be transformed into immortal bodies .
46015054	Then , when our dying bodies have been transformed into bodies that will never die , this Scripture will be fulfilled : “ Death is swallowed up in victory .
46015055	O death , where is your victory ? O death , where is your sting ? ”
46015056	For sin is the sting that results in death , and the law gives sin its power .
46015057	But thank God ! He gives us victory over sin and death through our Lord Jesus Christ .
46015058	So , my dear brothers and sisters , be strong and immovable . Always work enthusiastically for the Lord , for you know that nothing you do for the Lord is ever useless .
46016001	Now regarding your question about the money being collected for God’s people in Jerusalem . You should follow the same procedure I gave to the churches in Galatia .
46016002	On the first day of each week , you should each put aside a portion of the money you have earned . Don’t wait until I get there and then try to collect it all at once .
46016003	When I come , I will write letters of recommendation for the messengers you choose to deliver your gift to Jerusalem .
46016004	And if it seems appropriate for me to go along , they can travel with me .
46016005	I am coming to visit you after I have been to Macedonia , for I am planning to travel through Macedonia .
46016006	Perhaps I will stay awhile with you , possibly all winter , and then you can send me on my way to my next destination .
46016007	This time I don’t want to make just a short visit and then go right on . I want to come and stay awhile , if the Lord will let me .
46016008	In the meantime , I will be staying here at Ephesus until the Festival of Pentecost .
46016009	There is a wide-open door for a great work here , although many oppose me .
46016010	When Timothy comes , don’t intimidate him . He is doing the Lord’s work , just as I am .
46016011	Don’t let anyone treat him with contempt . Send him on his way with your blessing when he returns to me . I expect him to come with the other believers .
46016012	Now about our brother ApollosI urged him to visit you with the other believers , but he was not willing to go right now . He will see you later when he has the opportunity .
46016013	Be on guard . Stand firm in the faith . Be courageous . Be strong .
46016014	And do everything with love .
46016015	You know that Stephanas and his household were the first of the harvest of believers in Greece , and they are spending their lives in service to God’s people . I urge you , dear brothers and sisters ,
46016016	to submit to them and others like them who serve with such devotion .
46016017	I am very glad that Stephanas , Fortunatus , and Achaicus have come here . They have been providing the help you weren’t here to give me .
46016018	They have been a wonderful encouragement to me , as they have been to you . You must show your appreciation to all who serve so well .
46016019	The churches here in the province of Asia send greetings in the Lord , as do Aquila and Priscilla and all the others who gather in their home for church meetings .
46016020	All the brothers and sisters here send greetings to you . Greet each other with Christian love .
46016021	H ere is my greeting in my own handwriting P aul .
46016022	If anyone does not love the Lord , that person is cursed . Our Lord , come !
46016023	May the grace of the Lord Jesus be with you .
46016024	My love to all of you in Christ Jesus .
47001001	This letter is from Paul , chosen by the will of God to be an apostle of Christ Jesus , and from our brother Timothy . I am writing to God’s church in Corinth and to all of his holy people throughout Greece .
47001002	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you grace and peace .
47001003	All praise to God , the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ . God is our merciful Father and the source of all comfort .
47001004	He comforts us in all our troubles so that we can comfort others . When they are troubled , we will be able to give them the same comfort God has given us .
47001005	For the more we suffer for Christ , the more God will shower us with his comfort through Christ .
47001006	Even when we are weighed down with troubles , it is for your comfort and salvation ! For when we ourselves are comforted , we will certainly comfort you . Then you can patiently endure the same things we suffer .
47001007	We are confident that as you share in our sufferings , you will also share in the comfort God gives us .
47001008	We think you ought to know , dear brothers and sisters , about the trouble we went through in the province of Asia . We were crushed and overwhelmed beyond our ability to endure , and we thought we would never live through it .
47001009	In fact , we expected to die . But as a result , we stopped relying on ourselves and learned to rely only on God , who raises the dead .
47001010	And he did rescue us from mortal danger , and he will rescue us again . We have placed our confidence in him , and he will continue to rescue us .
47001011	And you are helping us by praying for us . Then many people will give thanks because God has graciously answered so many prayers for our safety .
47001012	We can say with confidence and a clear conscience that we have lived with a God-given holiness and sincerity in all our dealings . We have depended on God’s grace , not on our own human wisdom . That is how we have conducted ourselves before the world , and especially toward you .
47001013	Our letters have been straightforward , and there is nothing written between the lines and nothing you can’t understand . I hope someday you will fully understand us ,
47001014	even if you don’t understand us now . Then on the day when the Lord Jesus returns , you will be proud of us in the same way we are proud of you .
47001015	Since I was so sure of your understanding and trust , I wanted to give you a double blessing by visiting you twice
47001016	first on my way to Macedonia and again when I returned from Macedonia . Then you could send me on my way to Judea .
47001017	You may be asking why I changed my plan . Do you think I make my plans carelessly ? Do you think I am like people of the world who say “ Yes ” when they really mean “ No ” ?
47001018	As surely as God is faithful , our word to you does not waver between “ Yes ” and “ No . ”
47001019	For Jesus Christ , the Son of God , does not waver between “ Yes ” and “ No . ” He is the one whom Silas , Timothy , and I preached to you , and as God’s ultimate “ Yes , ” he always does what he says .
47001020	For all of God’s promises have been fulfilled in Christ with a resounding “ Yes ! ” And through Christ , our “ Amen ” ( which means “ Yes ” ) ascends to God for his glory .
47001021	It is God who enables us , along with you , to stand firm for Christ . He has commissioned us ,
47001022	and he has identified us as his own by placing the Holy Spirit in our hearts as the first installment that guarantees everything he has promised us .
47001023	Now I call upon God as my witness that I am telling the truth . The reason I didn’t return to Corinth was to spare you from a severe rebuke .
47001024	But that does not mean we want to dominate you by telling you how to put your faith into practice . We want to work together with you so you will be full of joy , for it is by your own faith that you stand firm .
47002001	So I decided that I would not bring you grief with another painful visit .
47002002	For if I cause you grief , who will make me glad ? Certainly not someone I have grieved .
47002003	That is why I wrote to you as I did , so that when I do come , I won’t be grieved by the very ones who ought to give me the greatest joy . Surely you all know that my joy comes from your being joyful .
47002004	I wrote that letter in great anguish , with a troubled heart and many tears . I didn’t want to grieve you , but I wanted to let you know how much love I have for you .
47002005	I am not overstating it when I say that the man who caused all the trouble hurt all of you more than he hurt me .
47002006	Most of you opposed him , and that was punishment enough .
47002007	Now , however , it is time to forgive and comfort him . Otherwise he may be overcome by discouragement .
47002008	So I urge you now to reaffirm your love for him .
47002009	I wrote to you as I did to test you and see if you would fully comply with my instructions .
47002010	When you forgive this man , I forgive him , too . And when I forgive whatever needs to be forgiven , I do so with Christ’s authority for your benefit ,
47002011	so that Satan will not outsmart us . For we are familiar with his evil schemes .
47002012	When I came to the city of Troas to preach the Good News of Christ , the Lord opened a door of opportunity for me .
47002013	But I had no peace of mind because my dear brother Titus hadn’t yet arrived with a report from you . So I said good-bye and went on to Macedonia to find him .
47002014	But thank God ! He has made us his captives and continues to lead us along in Christ’s triumphal procession . Now he uses us to spread the knowledge of Christ everywhere , like a sweet perfume .
47002015	Our lives are a Christ-like fragrance rising up to God . But this fragrance is perceived differently by those who are being saved and by those who are perishing .
47002016	To those who are perishing , we are a dreadful smell of death and doom . But to those who are being saved , we are a life-giving perfume . And who is adequate for such a task as this ?
47002017	You see , we are not like the many hucksters who preach for personal profit . We preach the word of God with sincerity and with Christ’s authority , knowing that God is watching us .
47003001	Are we beginning to praise ourselves again ? Are we like others , who need to bring you letters of recommendation , or who ask you to write such letters on their behalf ? Surely not !
47003002	The only letter of recommendation we need is you yourselves . Your lives are a letter written in our hearts ; everyone can read it and recognize our good work among you .
47003003	Clearly , you are a letter from Christ showing the result of our ministry among you . This “ letter ” is written not with pen and ink , but with the Spirit of the living God . It is carved not on tablets of stone , but on human hearts .
47003004	We are confident of all this because of our great trust in God through Christ .
47003005	It is not that we think we are qualified to do anything on our own . Our qualification comes from God .
47003006	He has enabled us to be ministers of his new covenant . This is a covenant not of written laws , but of the Spirit . The old written covenant ends in death ; but under the new covenant , the Spirit gives life .
47003007	The old way , with laws etched in stone , led to death , though it began with such glory that the people of Israel could not bear to look at Moses’ face . For his face shone with the glory of God , even though the brightness was already fading away .
47003008	Shouldn’t we expect far greater glory under the new way , now that the Holy Spirit is giving life ?
47003009	If the old way , which brings condemnation , was glorious , how much more glorious is the new way , which makes us right with God !
47003010	In fact , that first glory was not glorious at all compared with the overwhelming glory of the new way .
47003011	So if the old way , which has been replaced , was glorious , how much more glorious is the new , which remains forever !
47003012	Since this new way gives us such confidence , we can be very bold .
47003013	We are not like Moses , who put a veil over his face so the people of Israel would not see the glory , even though it was destined to fade away .
47003014	But the people’s minds were hardened , and to this day whenever the old covenant is being read , the same veil covers their minds so they cannot understand the truth . And this veil can be removed only by believing in Christ .
47003015	Yes , even today when they read Moses’ writings , their hearts are covered with that veil , and they do not understand .
47003016	But whenever someone turns to the Lord , the veil is taken away .
47003017	For the Lord is the Spirit , and wherever the Spirit of the Lord is , there is freedom .
47003018	So all of us who have had that veil removed can see and reflect the glory of the Lord . And the Lordwho is the Spiritmakes us more and more like him as we are changed into his glorious image .
47004001	Therefore , since God in his mercy has given us this new way , we never give up .
47004002	We reject all shameful deeds and underhanded methods . We don’t try to trick anyone or distort the word of God . We tell the truth before God , and all who are honest know this .
47004003	If the Good News we preach is hidden behind a veil , it is hidden only from people who are perishing .
47004004	Satan , who is the god of this world , has blinded the minds of those who don’t believe . They are unable to see the glorious light of the Good News . They don’t understand this message about the glory of Christ , who is the exact likeness of God .
47004005	You see , we don’t go around preaching about ourselves . We preach that Jesus Christ is Lord , and we ourselves are your servants for Jesus’ sake .
47004006	For God , who said , “ Let there be light in the darkness , ” has made this light shine in our hearts so we could know the glory of God that is seen in the face of Jesus Christ .
47004007	We now have this light shining in our hearts , but we ourselves are like fragile clay jars containing this great treasure . This makes it clear that our great power is from God , not from ourselves .
47004008	We are pressed on every side by troubles , but we are not crushed . We are perplexed , but not driven to despair .
47004009	We are hunted down , but never abandoned by God . We get knocked down , but we are not destroyed .
47004010	Through suffering , our bodies continue to share in the death of Jesus so that the life of Jesus may also be seen in our bodies .
47004011	Yes , we live under constant danger of death because we serve Jesus , so that the life of Jesus will be evident in our dying bodies .
47004012	So we live in the face of death , but this has resulted in eternal life for you .
47004013	But we continue to preach because we have the same kind of faith the psalmist had when he said , “ I believed in God , so I spoke . ”
47004014	We know that God , who raised the Lord Jesus , will also raise us with Jesus and present us to himself together with you .
47004015	All of this is for your benefit . And as God’s grace reaches more and more people , there will be great thanksgiving , and God will receive more and more glory .
47004016	That is why we never give up . Though our bodies are dying , our spirits are being renewed every day .
47004017	For our present troubles are small and won’t last very long . Yet they produce for us a glory that vastly outweighs them and will last forever !
47004018	So we don’t look at the troubles we can see now ; rather , we fix our gaze on things that cannot be seen . For the things we see now will soon be gone , but the things we cannot see will last forever .
47005001	For we know that when this earthly tent we live in is taken down ( that is , when we die and leave this earthly body ) , we will have a house in heaven , an eternal body made for us by God himself and not by human hands .
47005002	We grow weary in our present bodies , and we long to put on our heavenly bodies like new clothing .
47005003	For we will put on heavenly bodies ; we will not be spirits without bodies .
47005004	While we live in these earthly bodies , we groan and sigh , but it’s not that we want to die and get rid of these bodies that clothe us . Rather , we want to put on our new bodies so that these dying bodies will be swallowed up by life .
47005005	God himself has prepared us for this , and as a guarantee he has given us his Holy Spirit .
47005006	So we are always confident , even though we know that as long as we live in these bodies we are not at home with the Lord .
47005007	For we live by believing and not by seeing .
47005008	Yes , we are fully confident , and we would rather be away from these earthly bodies , for then we will be at home with the Lord .
47005009	So whether we are here in this body or away from this body , our goal is to please him .
47005010	For we must all stand before Christ to be judged . We will each receive whatever we deserve for the good or evil we have done in this earthly body .
47005011	Because we understand our fearful responsibility to the Lord , we work hard to persuade others . God knows we are sincere , and I hope you know this , too .
47005012	Are we commending ourselves to you again ? No , we are giving you a reason to be proud of us , so you can answer those who brag about having a spectacular ministry rather than having a sincere heart .
47005013	If it seems we are crazy , it is to bring glory to God . And if we are in our right minds , it is for your benefit .
47005014	Either way , Christ’s love controls us . Since we believe that Christ died for all , we also believe that we have all died to our old life .
47005015	He died for everyone so that those who receive his new life will no longer live for themselves . Instead , they will live for Christ , who died and was raised for them .
47005016	So we have stopped evaluating others from a human point of view . At one time we thought of Christ merely from a human point of view . How differently we know him now !
47005017	This means that anyone who belongs to Christ has become a new person . The old life is gone ; a new life has begun !
47005018	And all of this is a gift from God , who brought us back to himself through Christ . And God has given us this task of reconciling people to him .
47005019	For God was in Christ , reconciling the world to himself , no longer counting people’s sins against them . And he gave us this wonderful message of reconciliation .
47005020	So we are Christ’s ambassadors ; God is making his appeal through us . We speak for Christ when we plead , “ Come back to God ! ”
47005021	For God made Christ , who never sinned , to be the offering for our sin , so that we could be made right with God through Christ .
47006001	As God’s partners , we beg you not to accept this marvelous gift of God’s kindness and then ignore it .
47006002	For God says , “ At just the right time , I heard you . On the day of salvation , I helped you . ” Indeed , the “ right time ” is now . Today is the day of salvation .
47006003	We live in such a way that no one will stumble because of us , and no one will find fault with our ministry .
47006004	In everything we do , we show that we are true ministers of God . We patiently endure troubles and hardships and calamities of every kind .
47006005	We have been beaten , been put in prison , faced angry mobs , worked to exhaustion , endured sleepless nights , and gone without food .
47006006	We prove ourselves by our purity , our understanding , our patience , our kindness , by the Holy Spirit within us , and by our sincere love .
47006007	We faithfully preach the truth . God’s power is working in us . We use the weapons of righteousness in the right hand for attack and the left hand for defense .
47006008	We serve God whether people honor us or despise us , whether they slander us or praise us . We are honest , but they call us impostors .
47006009	We are ignored , even though we are well known . We live close to death , but we are still alive . We have been beaten , but we have not been killed .
47006010	Our hearts ache , but we always have joy . We are poor , but we give spiritual riches to others . We own nothing , and yet we have everything .
47006011	Oh , dear Corinthian friends ! We have spoken honestly with you , and our hearts are open to you .
47006012	There is no lack of love on our part , but you have withheld your love from us .
47006013	I am asking you to respond as if you were my own children . Open your hearts to us !
47006014	Don’t team up with those who are unbelievers . How can righteousness be a partner with wickedness ? How can light live with darkness ?
47006015	What harmony can there be between Christ and the devil ? How can a believer be a partner with an unbeliever ?
47006016	And what union can there be between God’s temple and idols ? For we are the temple of the living God . As God said : “ I will live in them and walk among them . I will be their God , and they will be my people .
47006017	Therefore , come out from among unbelievers , and separate yourselves from them , says the L ord . Don’t touch their filthy things , and I will welcome you .
47006018	And I will be your Father , and you will be my sons and daughters , says the L ord Almighty . ”
47007001	Because we have these promises , dear friends , let us cleanse ourselves from everything that can defile our body or spirit . And let us work toward complete holiness because we fear God .
47007002	Please open your hearts to us . We have not done wrong to anyone , nor led anyone astray , nor taken advantage of anyone .
47007003	I’m not saying this to condemn you . I said before that you are in our hearts , and we live or die together with you .
47007004	I have the highest confidence in you , and I take great pride in you . You have greatly encouraged me and made me happy despite all our troubles .
47007005	When we arrived in Macedonia , there was no rest for us . We faced conflict from every direction , with battles on the outside and fear on the inside .
47007006	But God , who encourages those who are discouraged , encouraged us by the arrival of Titus .
47007007	His presence was a joy , but so was the news he brought of the encouragement he received from you . When he told us how much you long to see me , and how sorry you are for what happened , and how loyal you are to me , I was filled with joy !
47007008	I am not sorry that I sent that severe letter to you , though I was sorry at first , for I know it was painful to you for a little while .
47007009	Now I am glad I sent it , not because it hurt you , but because the pain caused you to repent and change your ways . It was the kind of sorrow God wants his people to have , so you were not harmed by us in any way .
47007010	For the kind of sorrow God wants us to experience leads us away from sin and results in salvation . There’s no regret for that kind of sorrow . But worldly sorrow , which lacks repentance , results in spiritual death .
47007011	Just see what this godly sorrow produced in you ! Such earnestness , such concern to clear yourselves , such indignation , such alarm , such longing to see me , such zeal , and such a readiness to punish wrong . You showed that you have done everything necessary to make things right .
47007012	My purpose , then , was not to write about who did the wrong or who was wronged . I wrote to you so that in the sight of God you could see for yourselves how loyal you are to us .
47007013	We have been greatly encouraged by this . In addition to our own encouragement , we were especially delighted to see how happy Titus was about the way all of you welcomed him and set his mind at ease .
47007014	I had told him how proud I was of youand you didn’t disappoint me . I have always told you the truth , and now my boasting to Titus has also proved true !
47007015	Now he cares for you more than ever when he remembers the way all of you obeyed him and welcomed him with such fear and deep respect .
47007016	I am very happy now because I have complete confidence in you .
47008001	Now I want you to know , dear brothers and sisters , what God in his kindness has done through the churches in Macedonia .
47008002	They are being tested by many troubles , and they are very poor . But they are also filled with abundant joy , which has overflowed in rich generosity .
47008003	For I can testify that they gave not only what they could afford , but far more . And they did it of their own free will .
47008004	They begged us again and again for the privilege of sharing in the gift for the believers in Jerusalem .
47008005	They even did more than we had hoped , for their first action was to give themselves to the Lord and to us , just as God wanted them to do .
47008006	So we have urged Titus , who encouraged your giving in the first place , to return to you and encourage you to finish this ministry of giving .
47008007	Since you excel in so many waysin your faith , your gifted speakers , your knowledge , your enthusiasm , and your love from us I want you to excel also in this gracious act of giving .
47008008	I am not commanding you to do this . But I am testing how genuine your love is by comparing it with the eagerness of the other churches .
47008009	You know the generous grace of our Lord Jesus Christ . Though he was rich , yet for your sakes he became poor , so that by his poverty he could make you rich .
47008010	Here is my advice : It would be good for you to finish what you started a year ago . Last year you were the first who wanted to give , and you were the first to begin doing it .
47008011	Now you should finish what you started . Let the eagerness you showed in the beginning be matched now by your giving . Give in proportion to what you have .
47008012	Whatever you give is acceptable if you give it eagerly . And give according to what you have , not what you don’t have .
47008013	Of course , I don’t mean your giving should make life easy for others and hard for yourselves . I only mean that there should be some equality .
47008014	Right now you have plenty and can help those who are in need . Later , they will have plenty and can share with you when you need it . In this way , things will be equal .
47008015	As the Scriptures say , “ Those who gathered a lot had nothing left over , and those who gathered only a little had enough . ”
47008016	But thank God ! He has given Titus the same enthusiasm for you that I have .
47008017	Titus welcomed our request that he visit you again . In fact , he himself was very eager to go and see you .
47008018	We are also sending another brother with Titus . All the churches praise him as a preacher of the Good News .
47008019	He was appointed by the churches to accompany us as we take the offering to Jerusalem a service that glorifies the Lord and shows our eagerness to help .
47008020	We are traveling together to guard against any criticism for the way we are handling this generous gift .
47008021	We are careful to be honorable before the Lord , but we also want everyone else to see that we are honorable .
47008022	We are also sending with them another of our brothers who has proven himself many times and has shown on many occasions how eager he is . He is now even more enthusiastic because of his great confidence in you .
47008023	If anyone asks about Titus , say that he is my partner who works with me to help you . And the brothers with him have been sent by the churches , and they bring honor to Christ .
47008024	So show them your love , and prove to all the churches that our boasting about you is justified .
47009001	I really don’t need to write to you about this ministry of giving for the believers in Jerusalem .
47009002	For I know how eager you are to help , and I have been boasting to the churches in Macedonia that you in Greece were ready to send an offering a year ago . In fact , it was your enthusiasm that stirred up many of the Macedonian believers to begin giving .
47009003	But I am sending these brothers to be sure you really are ready , as I have been telling them , and that your money is all collected . I don’t want to be wrong in my boasting about you .
47009004	We would be embarrassednot to mention your own embarrassmentif some Macedonian believers came with me and found that you weren’t ready after all I had told them !
47009005	So I thought I should send these brothers ahead of me to make sure the gift you promised is ready . But I want it to be a willing gift , not one given grudgingly .
47009006	Remember thisa farmer who plants only a few seeds will get a small crop . But the one who plants generously will get a generous crop .
47009007	You must each decide in your heart how much to give . And don’t give reluctantly or in response to pressure . “ For God loves a person who gives cheerfully . ”
47009008	And God will generously provide all you need . Then you will always have everything you need and plenty left over to share with others .
47009009	As the Scriptures say , “ They share freely and give generously to the poor . Their good deeds will be remembered forever . ”
47009010	For God is the one who provides seed for the farmer and then bread to eat . In the same way , he will provide and increase your resources and then produce a great harvest of generosity in you .
47009011	Yes , you will be enriched in every way so that you can always be generous . And when we take your gifts to those who need them , they will thank God .
47009012	So two good things will result from this ministry of givingthe needs of the believers in Jerusalem will be met , and they will joyfully express their thanks to God .
47009013	As a result of your ministry , they will give glory to God . For your generosity to them and to all believers will prove that you are obedient to the Good News of Christ .
47009014	And they will pray for you with deep affection because of the overflowing grace God has given to you .
47009015	Thank God for this gift too wonderful for words !
47010001	Now I , Paul , appeal to you with the gentleness and kindness of Christthough I realize you think I am timid in person and bold only when I write from far away .
47010002	Well , I am begging you now so that when I come I won’t have to be bold with those who think we act from human motives .
47010003	We are human , but we don’t wage war as humans do .
47010004	We use God’s mighty weapons , not worldly weapons , to knock down the strongholds of human reasoning and to destroy false arguments .
47010005	We destroy every proud obstacle that keeps people from knowing God . We capture their rebellious thoughts and teach them to obey Christ .
47010006	And after you have become fully obedient , we will punish everyone who remains disobedient .
47010007	Look at the obvious facts . Those who say they belong to Christ must recognize that we belong to Christ as much as they do .
47010008	I may seem to be boasting too much about the authority given to us by the Lord . But our authority builds you up ; it doesn’t tear you down . So I will not be ashamed of using my authority .
47010009	I’m not trying to frighten you by my letters .
47010010	For some say , “ Paul’s letters are demanding and forceful , but in person he is weak , and his speeches are worthless ! ”
47010011	Those people should realize that our actions when we arrive in person will be as forceful as what we say in our letters from far away .
47010012	Oh , don’t worry ; we wouldn’t dare say that we are as wonderful as these other men who tell you how important they are ! But they are only comparing themselves with each other , using themselves as the standard of measurement . How ignorant !
47010013	We will not boast about things done outside our area of authority . We will boast only about what has happened within the boundaries of the work God has given us , which includes our working with you .
47010014	We are not reaching beyond these boundaries when we claim authority over you , as if we had never visited you . For we were the first to travel all the way to Corinth with the Good News of Christ .
47010015	Nor do we boast and claim credit for the work someone else has done . Instead , we hope that your faith will grow so that the boundaries of our work among you will be extended .
47010016	Then we will be able to go and preach the Good News in other places far beyond you , where no one else is working . Then there will be no question of our boasting about work done in someone else’s territory .
47010017	As the Scriptures say , “ If you want to boast , boast only about the L ord . ”
47010018	When people commend themselves , it doesn’t count for much . The important thing is for the Lord to commend them .
47011001	I hope you will put up with a little more of my foolishness . Please bear with me .
47011002	For I am jealous for you with the jealousy of God himself . I promised you as a pure bride to one husbandChrist .
47011003	But I fear that somehow your pure and undivided devotion to Christ will be corrupted , just as Eve was deceived by the cunning ways of the serpent .
47011004	You happily put up with whatever anyone tells you , even if they preach a different Jesus than the one we preach , or a different kind of Spirit than the one you received , or a different kind of gospel than the one you believed .
47011005	But I don’t consider myself inferior in any way to these “ super apostles ” who teach such things .
47011006	I may be unskilled as a speaker , but I’m not lacking in knowledge . We have made this clear to you in every possible way .
47011007	Was I wrong when I humbled myself and honored you by preaching God’s Good News to you without expecting anything in return ?
47011008	I “ robbed ” other churches by accepting their contributions so I could serve you at no cost .
47011009	And when I was with you and didn’t have enough to live on , I did not become a financial burden to anyone . For the brothers who came from Macedonia brought me all that I needed . I have never been a burden to you , and I never will be .
47011010	As surely as the truth of Christ is in me , no one in all of Greece will ever stop me from boasting about this .
47011011	Why ? Because I don’t love you ? God knows that I do .
47011012	But I will continue doing what I have always done . This will undercut those who are looking for an opportunity to boast that their work is just like ours .
47011013	These people are false apostles . They are deceitful workers who disguise themselves as apostles of Christ .
47011014	But I am not surprised ! Even Satan disguises himself as an angel of light .
47011015	So it is no wonder that his servants also disguise themselves as servants of righteousness . In the end they will get the punishment their wicked deeds deserve .
47011016	Again I say , don’t think that I am a fool to talk like this . But even if you do , listen to me , as you would to a foolish person , while I also boast a little .
47011017	Such boasting is not from the Lord , but I am acting like a fool .
47011018	And since others boast about their human achievements , I will , too .
47011019	After all , you think you are so wise , but you enjoy putting up with fools !
47011020	You put up with it when someone enslaves you , takes everything you have , takes advantage of you , takes control of everything , and slaps you in the face .
47011021	I’m ashamed to say that we’ve been too “ weak ” to do that ! But whatever they dare to boast aboutI’m talking like a fool againI dare to boast about it , too .
47011022	Are they Hebrews ? So am I . Are they Israelites ? So am I . Are they descendants of Abraham ? So am I .
47011023	Are they servants of Christ ? I know I sound like a madman , but I have served him far more ! I have worked harder , been put in prison more often , been whipped times without number , and faced death again and again .
47011024	Five different times the Jewish leaders gave me thirty-nine lashes .
47011025	Three times I was beaten with rods . Once I was stoned . Three times I was shipwrecked . Once I spent a whole night and a day adrift at sea .
47011026	I have traveled on many long journeys . I have faced danger from rivers and from robbers . I have faced danger from my own people , the Jews , as well as from the Gentiles . I have faced danger in the cities , in the deserts , and on the seas . And I have faced danger from men who claim to be believers but are not .
47011027	I have worked hard and long , enduring many sleepless nights . I have been hungry and thirsty and have often gone without food . I have shivered in the cold , without enough clothing to keep me warm .
47011028	Then , besides all this , I have the daily burden of my concern for all the churches .
47011029	Who is weak without my feeling that weakness ? Who is led astray , and I do not burn with anger ?
47011030	If I must boast , I would rather boast about the things that show how weak I am .
47011031	God , the Father of our Lord Jesus , who is worthy of eternal praise , knows I am not lying .
47011032	When I was in Damascus , the governor under King Aretas kept guards at the city gates to catch me .
47011033	I had to be lowered in a basket through a window in the city wall to escape from him .
47012001	This boasting will do no good , but I must go on . I will reluctantly tell about visions and revelations from the Lord .
47012002	I was caught up to the third heaven fourteen years ago . Whether I was in my body or out of my body , I don’t knowonly God knows .
47012003	Yes , only God knows whether I was in my body or outside my body . But I do know
47012004	that I was caught up to paradise and heard things so astounding that they cannot be expressed in words , things no human is allowed to tell .
47012005	That experience is worth boasting about , but I’m not going to do it . I will boast only about my weaknesses .
47012006	If I wanted to boast , I would be no fool in doing so , because I would be telling the truth . But I won’t do it , because I don’t want anyone to give me credit beyond what they can see in my life or hear in my message ,
47012007	even though I have received such wonderful revelations from God . So to keep me from becoming proud , I was given a thorn in my flesh , a messenger from Satan to torment me and keep me from becoming proud .
47012008	Three different times I begged the Lord to take it away .
47012009	Each time he said , “ My grace is all you need . My power works best in weakness . ” So now I am glad to boast about my weaknesses , so that the power of Christ can work through me .
47012010	That’s why I take pleasure in my weaknesses , and in the insults , hardships , persecutions , and troubles that I suffer for Christ . For when I am weak , then I am strong .
47012011	You have made me act like a foolboasting like this . You ought to be writing commendations for me , for I am not at all inferior to these “ super apostles , ” even though I am nothing at all .
47012012	When I was with you , I certainly gave you proof that I am an apostle . For I patiently did many signs and wonders and miracles among you .
47012013	The only thing I failed to do , which I do in the other churches , was to become a financial burden to you . Please forgive me for this wrong !
47012014	Now I am coming to you for the third time , and I will not be a burden to you . I don’t want what you haveI want you . After all , children don’t provide for their parents . Rather , parents provide for their children .
47012015	I will gladly spend myself and all I have for you , even though it seems that the more I love you , the less you love me .
47012016	Some of you admit I was not a burden to you . But others still think I was sneaky and took advantage of you by trickery .
47012017	But how ? Did any of the men I sent to you take advantage of you ?
47012018	When I urged Titus to visit you and sent our other brother with him , did Titus take advantage of you ? No ! For we have the same spirit and walk in each other’s steps , doing things the same way .
47012019	Perhaps you think we’re saying these things just to defend ourselves . No , we tell you this as Christ’s servants , and with God as our witness . Everything we do , dear friends , is to strengthen you .
47012020	For I am afraid that when I come I won’t like what I find , and you won’t like my response . I am afraid that I will find quarreling , jealousy , anger , selfishness , slander , gossip , arrogance , and disorderly behavior .
47012021	Yes , I am afraid that when I come again , God will humble me in your presence . And I will be grieved because many of you have not given up your old sins . You have not repented of your impurity , sexual immorality , and eagerness for lustful pleasure .
47013001	This is the third time I am coming to visit you ( and as the Scriptures say , “ The facts of every case must be established by the testimony of two or three witnesses ” ) .
47013002	I have already warned those who had been sinning when I was there on my second visit . Now I again warn them and all others , just as I did before , that next time I will not spare them .
47013003	I will give you all the proof you want that Christ speaks through me . Christ is not weak when he deals with you ; he is powerful among you .
47013004	Although he was crucified in weakness , he now lives by the power of God . We , too , are weak , just as Christ was , but when we deal with you we will be alive with him and will have God’s power .
47013005	Examine yourselves to see if your faith is genuine . Test yourselves . Surely you know that Jesus Christ is among you ; if not , you have failed the test of genuine faith .
47013006	As you test yourselves , I hope you will recognize that we have not failed the test of apostolic authority .
47013007	We pray to God that you will not do what is wrong by refusing our correction . I hope we won’t need to demonstrate our authority when we arrive . Do the right thing before we comeeven if that makes it look like we have failed to demonstrate our authority .
47013008	For we cannot oppose the truth , but must always stand for the truth .
47013009	We are glad to seem weak if it helps show that you are actually strong . We pray that you will become mature .
47013010	I am writing this to you before I come , hoping that I won’t need to deal severely with you when I do come . For I want to use the authority the Lord has given me to strengthen you , not to tear you down .
47013011	Dear brothers and sisters , I close my letter with these last words : Be joyful . Grow to maturity . Encourage each other . Live in harmony and peace . Then the God of love and peace will be with you .
47013012	Greet each other with Christian love .
47013013	All of God’s people here send you their greetings .
47013014	May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ , the love of God , and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit be with you all .
48001001	This letter is from Paul , an apostle . I was not appointed by any group of people or any human authority , but by Jesus Christ himself and by God the Father , who raised Jesus from the dead .
48001002	All the brothers and sisters here join me in sending this letter to the churches of Galatia .
48001003	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you grace and peace .
48001004	Jesus gave his life for our sins , just as God our Father planned , in order to rescue us from this evil world in which we live .
48001005	All glory to God forever and ever ! Amen .
48001006	I am shocked that you are turning away so soon from God , who called you to himself through the loving mercy of Christ . You are following a different way that pretends to be the Good News
48001007	but is not the Good News at all . You are being fooled by those who deliberately twist the truth concerning Christ .
48001008	Let God’s curse fall on anyone , including us or even an angel from heaven , who preaches a different kind of Good News than the one we preached to you .
48001009	I say again what we have said before : If anyone preaches any other Good News than the one you welcomed , let that person be cursed .
48001010	Obviously , I’m not trying to win the approval of people , but of God . If pleasing people were my goal , I would not be Christ’s servant .
48001011	Dear brothers and sisters , I want you to understand that the gospel message I preach is not based on mere human reasoning .
48001012	I received my message from no human source , and no one taught me . Instead , I received it by direct revelation from Jesus Christ .
48001013	You know what I was like when I followed the Jewish religionhow I violently persecuted God’s church . I did my best to destroy it .
48001014	I was far ahead of my fellow Jews in my zeal for the traditions of my ancestors .
48001015	But even before I was born , God chose me and called me by his marvelous grace . Then it pleased him
48001016	to reveal his Son to me so that I would proclaim the Good News about Jesus to the Gentiles . When this happened , I did not rush out to consult with any human being .
48001017	Nor did I go up to Jerusalem to consult with those who were apostles before I was . Instead , I went away into Arabia , and later I returned to the city of Damascus .
48001018	Then three years later I went to Jerusalem to get to know Peter , and I stayed with him for fifteen days .
48001019	The only other apostle I met at that time was James , the Lord’s brother .
48001020	I declare before God that what I am writing to you is not a lie .
48001021	After that visit I went north into the provinces of Syria and Cilicia .
48001022	And still the Christians in the churches in Judea didn’t know me personally .
48001023	All they knew was that people were saying , “ The one who used to persecute us is now preaching the very faith he tried to destroy ! ”
48001024	And they praised God because of me .
48002001	Then fourteen years later I went back to Jerusalem again , this time with Barnabas ; and Titus came along , too .
48002002	I went there because God revealed to me that I should go . While I was there I met privately with those considered to be leaders of the church and shared with them the message I had been preaching to the Gentiles . I wanted to make sure that we were in agreement , for fear that all my efforts had been wasted and I was running the race for nothing .
48002003	And they supported me and did not even demand that my companion Titus be circumcised , though he was a Gentile .
48002004	Even that question came up only because of some so-called Christians therefalse ones , really who were secretly brought in . They sneaked in to spy on us and take away the freedom we have in Christ Jesus . They wanted to enslave us and force us to follow their Jewish regulations .
48002005	But we refused to give in to them for a single moment . We wanted to preserve the truth of the gospel message for you .
48002006	And the leaders of the church had nothing to add to what I was preaching . ( By the way , their reputation as great leaders made no difference to me , for God has no favorites . )
48002007	Instead , they saw that God had given me the responsibility of preaching the gospel to the Gentiles , just as he had given Peter the responsibility of preaching to the Jews .
48002008	For the same God who worked through Peter as the apostle to the Jews also worked through me as the apostle to the Gentiles .
48002009	In fact , James , Peter , and John , who were known as pillars of the church , recognized the gift God had given me , and they accepted Barnabas and me as their co-workers . They encouraged us to keep preaching to the Gentiles , while they continued their work with the Jews .
48002010	Their only suggestion was that we keep on helping the poor , which I have always been eager to do .
48002011	But when Peter came to Antioch , I had to oppose him to his face , for what he did was very wrong .
48002012	When he first arrived , he ate with the Gentile Christians , who were not circumcised . But afterward , when some friends of James came , Peter wouldn’t eat with the Gentiles anymore . He was afraid of criticism from these people who insisted on the necessity of circumcision .
48002013	As a result , other Jewish Christians followed Peter’s hypocrisy , and even Barnabas was led astray by their hypocrisy .
48002014	When I saw that they were not following the truth of the gospel message , I said to Peter in front of all the others , “ Since you , a Jew by birth , have discarded the Jewish laws and are living like a Gentile , why are you now trying to make these Gentiles follow the Jewish traditions ?
48002015	“ You and I are Jews by birth , not ‘ sinners’ like the Gentiles .
48002016	Yet we know that a person is made right with God by faith in Jesus Christ , not by obeying the law . And we have believed in Christ Jesus , so that we might be made right with God because of our faith in Christ , not because we have obeyed the law . For no one will ever be made right with God by obeying the law . ”
48002017	But suppose we seek to be made right with God through faith in Christ and then we are found guilty because we have abandoned the law . Would that mean Christ has led us into sin ? Absolutely not !
48002018	Rather , I am a sinner if I rebuild the old system of law I already tore down .
48002019	For when I tried to keep the law , it condemned me . So I died to the lawI stopped trying to meet all its requirementsso that I might live for God .
48002020	My old self has been crucified with Christ . It is no longer I who live , but Christ lives in me . So I live in this earthly body by trusting in the Son of God , who loved me and gave himself for me .
48002021	I do not treat the grace of God as meaningless . For if keeping the law could make us right with God , then there was no need for Christ to die .
48003001	Oh , foolish Galatians ! Who has cast an evil spell on you ? For the meaning of Jesus Christ’s death was made as clear to you as if you had seen a picture of his death on the cross .
48003002	Let me ask you this one question : Did you receive the Holy Spirit by obeying the law of Moses ? Of course not ! You received the Spirit because you believed the message you heard about Christ .
48003003	How foolish can you be ? After starting your Christian lives in the Spirit , why are you now trying to become perfect by your own human effort ?
48003004	Have you experienced so much for nothing ? Surely it was not in vain , was it ?
48003005	I ask you again , does God give you the Holy Spirit and work miracles among you because you obey the law ? Of course not ! It is because you believe the message you heard about Christ .
48003006	In the same way , “ Abraham believed God , and God counted him as righteous because of his faith . ”
48003007	The real children of Abraham , then , are those who put their faith in God .
48003008	What’s more , the Scriptures looked forward to this time when God would declare the Gentiles to be righteous because of their faith . God proclaimed this good news to Abraham long ago when he said , “ All nations will be blessed through you . ”
48003009	So all who put their faith in Christ share the same blessing Abraham received because of his faith .
48003010	But those who depend on the law to make them right with God are under his curse , for the Scriptures say , “ Cursed is everyone who does not observe and obey all the commands that are written in God’s Book of the Law . ”
48003011	So it is clear that no one can be made right with God by trying to keep the law . For the Scriptures say , “ It is through faith that a righteous person has life . ”
48003012	This way of faith is very different from the way of law , which says , “ It is through obeying the law that a person has life . ”
48003013	But Christ has rescued us from the curse pronounced by the law . When he was hung on the cross , he took upon himself the curse for our wrongdoing . For it is written in the Scriptures , “ Cursed is everyone who is hung on a tree . ”
48003014	Through Christ Jesus , God has blessed the Gentiles with the same blessing he promised to Abraham , so that we who are believers might receive the promised Holy Spirit through faith .
48003015	Dear brothers and sisters , here’s an example from everyday life . Just as no one can set aside or amend an irrevocable agreement , so it is in this case .
48003016	God gave the promises to Abraham and his child . And notice that the Scripture doesn’t say “ to his children , ” as if it meant many descendants . Rather , it says “ to his child ” and that , of course , means Christ .
48003017	This is what I am trying to say : The agreement God made with Abraham could not be canceled 430 years later when God gave the law to Moses . God would be breaking his promise .
48003018	For if the inheritance could be received by keeping the law , then it would not be the result of accepting God’s promise . But God graciously gave it to Abraham as a promise .
48003019	Why , then , was the law given ? It was given alongside the promise to show people their sins . But the law was designed to last only until the coming of the child who was promised . God gave his law through angels to Moses , who was the mediator between God and the people .
48003020	Now a mediator is helpful if more than one party must reach an agreement . But God , who is one , did not use a mediator when he gave his promise to Abraham .
48003021	Is there a conflict , then , between God’s law and God’s promises ? Absolutely not ! If the law could give us new life , we could be made right with God by obeying it .
48003022	But the Scriptures declare that we are all prisoners of sin , so we receive God’s promise of freedom only by believing in Jesus Christ .
48003023	Before the way of faith in Christ was available to us , we were placed under guard by the law . We were kept in protective custody , so to speak , until the way of faith was revealed .
48003024	Let me put it another way . The law was our guardian until Christ came ; it protected us until we could be made right with God through faith .
48003025	And now that the way of faith has come , we no longer need the law as our guardian .
48003026	For you are all children of God through faith in Christ Jesus .
48003027	And all who have been united with Christ in baptism have put on Christ , like putting on new clothes .
48003028	There is no longer Jew or Gentile , slave or free , male and female . For you are all one in Christ Jesus .
48003029	And now that you belong to Christ , you are the true children of Abraham . You are his heirs , and God’s promise to Abraham belongs to you .
48004001	Think of it this way . If a father dies and leaves an inheritance for his young children , those children are not much better off than slaves until they grow up , even though they actually own everything their father had .
48004002	They have to obey their guardians until they reach whatever age their father set .
48004003	And that’s the way it was with us before Christ came . We were like children ; we were slaves to the basic spiritual principles of this world .
48004004	But when the right time came , God sent his Son , born of a woman , subject to the law .
48004005	God sent him to buy freedom for us who were slaves to the law , so that he could adopt us as his very own children .
48004006	And because we are his children , God has sent the Spirit of his Son into our hearts , prompting us to call out , “ Abba , Father . ”
48004007	Now you are no longer a slave but God’s own child . And since you are his child , God has made you his heir .
48004008	Before you Gentiles knew God , you were slaves to so-called gods that do not even exist .
48004009	So now that you know God ( or should I say , now that God knows you ) , why do you want to go back again and become slaves once more to the weak and useless spiritual principles of this world ?
48004010	You are trying to earn favor with God by observing certain days or months or seasons or years .
48004011	I fear for you . Perhaps all my hard work with you was for nothing .
48004012	Dear brothers and sisters , I plead with you to live as I do in freedom from these things , for I have become like you Gentilesfree from those laws . You did not mistreat me when I first preached to you .
48004013	Surely you remember that I was sick when I first brought you the Good News .
48004014	But even though my condition tempted you to reject me , you did not despise me or turn me away . No , you took me in and cared for me as though I were an angel from God or even Christ Jesus himself .
48004015	Where is that joyful and grateful spirit you felt then ? I am sure you would have taken out your own eyes and given them to me if it had been possible .
48004016	Have I now become your enemy because I am telling you the truth ?
48004017	Those false teachers are so eager to win your favor , but their intentions are not good . They are trying to shut you off from me so that you will pay attention only to them .
48004018	If someone is eager to do good things for you , that’s all right ; but let them do it all the time , not just when I’m with you .
48004019	Oh , my dear children ! I feel as if I’m going through labor pains for you again , and they will continue until Christ is fully developed in your lives .
48004020	I wish I were with you right now so I could change my tone . But at this distance I don’t know how else to help you .
48004021	Tell me , you who want to live under the law , do you know what the law actually says ?
48004022	The Scriptures say that Abraham had two sons , one from his slave wife and one from his freeborn wife .
48004023	The son of the slave wife was born in a human attempt to bring about the fulfillment of God’s promise . But the son of the freeborn wife was born as God’s own fulfillment of his promise .
48004024	These two women serve as an illustration of God’s two covenants . The first woman , Hagar , represents Mount Sinai where people received the law that enslaved them .
48004025	And now Jerusalem is just like Mount Sinai in Arabia , because she and her children live in slavery to the law .
48004026	But the other woman , Sarah , represents the heavenly Jerusalem . She is the free woman , and she is our mother .
48004027	As Isaiah said , “ Rejoice , O childless woman , you who have never given birth ! Break into a joyful shout , you who have never been in labor ! For the desolate woman now has more children than the woman who lives with her husband ! ”
48004028	And you , dear brothers and sisters , are children of the promise , just like Isaac .
48004029	But you are now being persecuted by those who want you to keep the law , just as Ishmael , the child born by human effort , persecuted Isaac , the child born by the power of the Spirit .
48004030	But what do the Scriptures say about that ? “ Get rid of the slave and her son , for the son of the slave woman will not share the inheritance with the free woman’s son . ”
48004031	So , dear brothers and sisters , we are not children of the slave woman ; we are children of the free woman .
48005001	So Christ has truly set us free . Now make sure that you stay free , and don’t get tied up again in slavery to the law .
48005002	Listen ! I , Paul , tell you this : If you are counting on circumcision to make you right with God , then Christ will be of no benefit to you .
48005003	I’ll say it again . If you are trying to find favor with God by being circumcised , you must obey every regulation in the whole law of Moses .
48005004	For if you are trying to make yourselves right with God by keeping the law , you have been cut off from Christ ! You have fallen away from God’s grace .
48005005	But we who live by the Spirit eagerly wait to receive by faith the righteousness God has promised to us .
48005006	For when we place our faith in Christ Jesus , there is no benefit in being circumcised or being uncircumcised . What is important is faith expressing itself in love .
48005007	You were running the race so well . Who has held you back from following the truth ?
48005008	It certainly isn’t God , for he is the one who called you to freedom .
48005009	This false teaching is like a little yeast that spreads through the whole batch of dough !
48005010	I am trusting the Lord to keep you from believing false teachings . God will judge that person , whoever he is , who has been confusing you .
48005011	Dear brothers and sisters , if I were still preaching that you must be circumcisedas some say I dowhy am I still being persecuted ? If I were no longer preaching salvation through the cross of Christ , no one would be offended .
48005012	I just wish that those troublemakers who want to mutilate you by circumcision would mutilate themselves .
48005013	For you have been called to live in freedom , my brothers and sisters . But don’t use your freedom to satisfy your sinful nature . Instead , use your freedom to serve one another in love .
48005014	For the whole law can be summed up in this one command : “ Love your neighbor as yourself . ”
48005015	But if you are always biting and devouring one another , watch out ! Beware of destroying one another .
48005016	So I say , let the Holy Spirit guide your lives . Then you won’t be doing what your sinful nature craves .
48005017	The sinful nature wants to do evil , which is just the opposite of what the Spirit wants . And the Spirit gives us desires that are the opposite of what the sinful nature desires . These two forces are constantly fighting each other , so you are not free to carry out your good intentions .
48005018	But when you are directed by the Spirit , you are not under obligation to the law of Moses .
48005019	When you follow the desires of your sinful nature , the results are very clear : sexual immorality , impurity , lustful pleasures ,
48005020	idolatry , sorcery , hostility , quarreling , jealousy , outbursts of anger , selfish ambition , dissension , division ,
48005021	envy , drunkenness , wild parties , and other sins like these . Let me tell you again , as I have before , that anyone living that sort of life will not inherit the Kingdom of God .
48005022	But the Holy Spirit produces this kind of fruit in our lives : love , joy , peace , patience , kindness , goodness , faithfulness ,
48005023	gentleness , and self-control . There is no law against these things !
48005024	Those who belong to Christ Jesus have nailed the passions and desires of their sinful nature to his cross and crucified them there .
48005025	Since we are living by the Spirit , let us follow the Spirit’s leading in every part of our lives .
48005026	Let us not become conceited , or provoke one another , or be jealous of one another .
48006001	Dear brothers and sisters , if another believer is overcome by some sin , you who are godly should gently and humbly help that person back onto the right path . And be careful not to fall into the same temptation yourself .
48006002	Share each other’s burdens , and in this way obey the law of Christ .
48006003	If you think you are too important to help someone , you are only fooling yourself . You are not that important .
48006004	Pay careful attention to your own work , for then you will get the satisfaction of a job well done , and you won’t need to compare yourself to anyone else .
48006005	For we are each responsible for our own conduct .
48006006	Those who are taught the word of God should provide for their teachers , sharing all good things with them .
48006007	Don’t be misledyou cannot mock the justice of God . You will always harvest what you plant .
48006008	Those who live only to satisfy their own sinful nature will harvest decay and death from that sinful nature . But those who live to please the Spirit will harvest everlasting life from the Spirit .
48006009	So let’s not get tired of doing what is good . At just the right time we will reap a harvest of blessing if we don’t give up .
48006010	Therefore , whenever we have the opportunity , we should do good to everyoneespecially to those in the family of faith .
48006011	N otice what large letters I use as I write these closing words in my own handwriting .
48006012	Those who are trying to force you to be circumcised want to look good to others . They don’t want to be persecuted for teaching that the cross of Christ alone can save .
48006013	And even those who advocate circumcision don’t keep the whole law themselves . They only want you to be circumcised so they can boast about it and claim you as their disciples .
48006014	As for me , may I never boast about anything except the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ . Because of that cross , my interest in this world has been crucified , and the world’s interest in me has also died .
48006015	It doesn’t matter whether we have been circumcised or not . What counts is whether we have been transformed into a new creation .
48006016	May God’s peace and mercy be upon all who live by this principle ; they are the new people of God .
48006017	From now on , don’t let anyone trouble me with these things . For I bear on my body the scars that show I belong to Jesus .
48006018	Dear brothers and sisters , may the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
49001001	This letter is from Paul , chosen by the will of God to be an apostle of Christ Jesus . I am writing to God’s holy people in Ephesus , who are faithful followers of Christ Jesus .
49001002	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you grace and peace .
49001003	All praise to God , the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly realms because we are united with Christ .
49001004	Even before he made the world , God loved us and chose us in Christ to be holy and without fault in his eyes .
49001005	God decided in advance to adopt us into his own family by bringing us to himself through Jesus Christ . This is what he wanted to do , and it gave him great pleasure .
49001006	So we praise God for the glorious grace he has poured out on us who belong to his dear Son .
49001007	He is so rich in kindness and grace that he purchased our freedom with the blood of his Son and forgave our sins .
49001008	He has showered his kindness on us , along with all wisdom and understanding .
49001009	God has now revealed to us his mysterious plan regarding Christ , a plan to fulfill his own good pleasure .
49001010	And this is the plan : At the right time he will bring everything together under the authority of Christeverything in heaven and on earth .
49001011	Furthermore , because we are united with Christ , we have received an inheritance from God , for he chose us in advance , and he makes everything work out according to his plan .
49001012	God’s purpose was that we Jews who were the first to trust in Christ would bring praise and glory to God .
49001013	And now you Gentiles have also heard the truth , the Good News that God saves you . And when you believed in Christ , he identified you as his own by giving you the Holy Spirit , whom he promised long ago .
49001014	The Spirit is God’s guarantee that he will give us the inheritance he promised and that he has purchased us to be his own people . He did this so we would praise and glorify him .
49001015	Ever since I first heard of your strong faith in the Lord Jesus and your love for God’s people everywhere ,
49001016	I have not stopped thanking God for you . I pray for you constantly ,
49001017	asking God , the glorious Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , to give you spiritual wisdom and insight so that you might grow in your knowledge of God .
49001018	I pray that your hearts will be flooded with light so that you can understand the confident hope he has given to those he calledhis holy people who are his rich and glorious inheritance .
49001019	I also pray that you will understand the incredible greatness of God’s power for us who believe him . This is the same mighty power
49001020	that raised Christ from the dead and seated him in the place of honor at God’s right hand in the heavenly realms .
49001021	Now he is far above any ruler or authority or power or leader or anything elsenot only in this world but also in the world to come .
49001022	God has put all things under the authority of Christ and has made him head over all things for the benefit of the church .
49001023	And the church is his body ; it is made full and complete by Christ , who fills all things everywhere with himself .
49002001	Once you were dead because of your disobedience and your many sins .
49002002	You used to live in sin , just like the rest of the world , obeying the devilthe commander of the powers in the unseen world . He is the spirit at work in the hearts of those who refuse to obey God .
49002003	All of us used to live that way , following the passionate desires and inclinations of our sinful nature . By our very nature we were subject to God’s anger , just like everyone else .
49002004	But God is so rich in mercy , and he loved us so much ,
49002005	that even though we were dead because of our sins , he gave us life when he raised Christ from the dead . ( It is only by God’s grace that you have been saved ! )
49002006	For he raised us from the dead along with Christ and seated us with him in the heavenly realms because we are united with Christ Jesus .
49002007	So God can point to us in all future ages as examples of the incredible wealth of his grace and kindness toward us , as shown in all he has done for us who are united with Christ Jesus .
49002008	God saved you by his grace when you believed . And you can’t take credit for this ; it is a gift from God .
49002009	Salvation is not a reward for the good things we have done , so none of us can boast about it .
49002010	For we are God’s masterpiece . He has created us anew in Christ Jesus , so we can do the good things he planned for us long ago .
49002011	Don’t forget that you Gentiles used to be outsiders . You were called “ uncircumcised heathens ” by the Jews , who were proud of their circumcision , even though it affected only their bodies and not their hearts .
49002012	In those days you were living apart from Christ . You were excluded from citizenship among the people of Israel , and you did not know the covenant promises God had made to them . You lived in this world without God and without hope .
49002013	But now you have been united with Christ Jesus . Once you were far away from God , but now you have been brought near to him through the blood of Christ .
49002014	For Christ himself has brought peace to us . He united Jews and Gentiles into one people when , in his own body on the cross , he broke down the wall of hostility that separated us .
49002015	He did this by ending the system of law with its commandments and regulations . He made peace between Jews and Gentiles by creating in himself one new people from the two groups .
49002016	Together as one body , Christ reconciled both groups to God by means of his death on the cross , and our hostility toward each other was put to death .
49002017	He brought this Good News of peace to you Gentiles who were far away from him , and peace to the Jews who were near .
49002018	Now all of us can come to the Father through the same Holy Spirit because of what Christ has done for us .
49002019	So now you Gentiles are no longer strangers and foreigners . You are citizens along with all of God’s holy people . You are members of God’s family .
49002020	Together , we are his house , built on the foundation of the apostles and the prophets . And the cornerstone is Christ Jesus himself .
49002021	We are carefully joined together in him , becoming a holy temple for the Lord .
49002022	Through him you Gentiles are also being made part of this dwelling where God lives by his Spirit .
49003001	When I think of all this , I , Paul , a prisoner of Christ Jesus for the benefit of you Gentiles . . .
49003002	assuming , by the way , that you know God gave me the special responsibility of extending his grace to you Gentiles .
49003003	As I briefly wrote earlier , God himself revealed his mysterious plan to me .
49003004	As you read what I have written , you will understand my insight into this plan regarding Christ .
49003005	God did not reveal it to previous generations , but now by his Spirit he has revealed it to his holy apostles and prophets .
49003006	And this is God’s plan : Both Gentiles and Jews who believe the Good News share equally in the riches inherited by God’s children . Both are part of the same body , and both enjoy the promise of blessings because they belong to Christ Jesus .
49003007	By God’s grace and mighty power , I have been given the privilege of serving him by spreading this Good News .
49003008	Though I am the least deserving of all God’s people , he graciously gave me the privilege of telling the Gentiles about the endless treasures available to them in Christ .
49003009	I was chosen to explain to everyone this mysterious plan that God , the Creator of all things , had kept secret from the beginning .
49003010	God’s purpose in all this was to use the church to display his wisdom in its rich variety to all the unseen rulers and authorities in the heavenly places .
49003011	This was his eternal plan , which he carried out through Christ Jesus our Lord .
49003012	Because of Christ and our faith in him , we can now come boldly and confidently into God’s presence .
49003013	So please don’t lose heart because of my trials here . I am suffering for you , so you should feel honored .
49003014	When I think of all this , I fall to my knees and pray to the Father ,
49003015	the Creator of everything in heaven and on earth .
49003016	I pray that from his glorious , unlimited resources he will empower you with inner strength through his Spirit .
49003017	Then Christ will make his home in your hearts as you trust in him . Your roots will grow down into God’s love and keep you strong .
49003018	And may you have the power to understand , as all God’s people should , how wide , how long , how high , and how deep his love is .
49003019	May you experience the love of Christ , though it is too great to understand fully . Then you will be made complete with all the fullness of life and power that comes from God .
49003020	Now all glory to God , who is able , through his mighty power at work within us , to accomplish infinitely more than we might ask or think .
49003021	Glory to him in the church and in Christ Jesus through all generations forever and ever ! Amen .
49004001	Therefore I , a prisoner for serving the Lord , beg you to lead a life worthy of your calling , for you have been called by God .
49004002	Always be humble and gentle . Be patient with each other , making allowance for each other’s faults because of your love .
49004003	Make every effort to keep yourselves united in the Spirit , binding yourselves together with peace .
49004004	For there is one body and one Spirit , just as you have been called to one glorious hope for the future .
49004005	There is one Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
49004006	and one God and Father , who is over all and in all and living through all .
49004007	However , he has given each one of us a special gift through the generosity of Christ .
49004008	That is why the Scriptures say , “ When he ascended to the heights , he led a crowd of captives and gave gifts to his people . ”
49004009	Notice that it says “ he ascended . ” This clearly means that Christ also descended to our lowly world .
49004010	And the same one who descended is the one who ascended higher than all the heavens , so that he might fill the entire universe with himself .
49004011	Now these are the gifts Christ gave to the church : the apostles , the prophets , the evangelists , and the pastors and teachers .
49004012	Their responsibility is to equip God’s people to do his work and build up the church , the body of Christ .
49004013	This will continue until we all come to such unity in our faith and knowledge of God’s Son that we will be mature in the Lord , measuring up to the full and complete standard of Christ .
49004014	Then we will no longer be immature like children . We won’t be tossed and blown about by every wind of new teaching . We will not be influenced when people try to trick us with lies so clever they sound like the truth .
49004015	Instead , we will speak the truth in love , growing in every way more and more like Christ , who is the head of his body , the church .
49004016	He makes the whole body fit together perfectly . As each part does its own special work , it helps the other parts grow , so that the whole body is healthy and growing and full of love .
49004017	With the Lord’s authority I say this : Live no longer as the Gentiles do , for they are hopelessly confused .
49004018	Their minds are full of darkness ; they wander far from the life God gives because they have closed their minds and hardened their hearts against him .
49004019	They have no sense of shame . They live for lustful pleasure and eagerly practice every kind of impurity .
49004020	But that isn’t what you learned about Christ .
49004021	Since you have heard about Jesus and have learned the truth that comes from him ,
49004022	throw off your old sinful nature and your former way of life , which is corrupted by lust and deception .
49004023	Instead , let the Spirit renew your thoughts and attitudes .
49004024	Put on your new nature , created to be like Godtruly righteous and holy .
49004025	So stop telling lies . Let us tell our neighbors the truth , for we are all parts of the same body .
49004026	And “ don’t sin by letting anger control you . ” Don’t let the sun go down while you are still angry ,
49004027	for anger gives a foothold to the devil .
49004028	If you are a thief , quit stealing . Instead , use your hands for good hard work , and then give generously to others in need .
49004029	Don’t use foul or abusive language . Let everything you say be good and helpful , so that your words will be an encouragement to those who hear them .
49004030	And do not bring sorrow to God’s Holy Spirit by the way you live . Remember , he has identified you as his own , guaranteeing that you will be saved on the day of redemption .
49004031	Get rid of all bitterness , rage , anger , harsh words , and slander , as well as all types of evil behavior .
49004032	Instead , be kind to each other , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , just as God through Christ has forgiven you .
49005001	Imitate God , therefore , in everything you do , because you are his dear children .
49005002	Live a life filled with love , following the example of Christ . He loved us and offered himself as a sacrifice for us , a pleasing aroma to God .
49005003	Let there be no sexual immorality , impurity , or greed among you . Such sins have no place among God’s people .
49005004	Obscene stories , foolish talk , and coarse jokesthese are not for you . Instead , let there be thankfulness to God .
49005005	You can be sure that no immoral , impure , or greedy person will inherit the Kingdom of Christ and of God . For a greedy person is an idolater , worshiping the things of this world .
