49005006	Don’t be fooled by those who try to excuse these sins , for the anger of God will fall on all who disobey him .
49005007	Don’t participate in the things these people do .
49005008	For once you were full of darkness , but now you have light from the Lord . So live as people of light !
49005009	For this light within you produces only what is good and right and true .
49005010	Carefully determine what pleases the Lord .
49005011	Take no part in the worthless deeds of evil and darkness ; instead , expose them .
49005012	It is shameful even to talk about the things that ungodly people do in secret .
49005013	But their evil intentions will be exposed when the light shines on them ,
49005014	for the light makes everything visible . This is why it is said , “ Awake , O sleeper , rise up from the dead , and Christ will give you light . ”
49005015	So be careful how you live . Don’t live like fools , but like those who are wise .
49005016	Make the most of every opportunity in these evil days .
49005017	Don’t act thoughtlessly , but understand what the Lord wants you to do .
49005018	Don’t be drunk with wine , because that will ruin your life . Instead , be filled with the Holy Spirit ,
49005019	singing psalms and hymns and spiritual songs among yourselves , and making music to the Lord in your hearts .
49005020	And give thanks for everything to God the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ .
49005021	And further , submit to one another out of reverence for Christ .
49005022	For wives , this means submit to your husbands as to the Lord .
49005023	For a husband is the head of his wife as Christ is the head of the church . He is the Savior of his body , the church .
49005024	As the church submits to Christ , so you wives should submit to your husbands in everything .
49005025	For husbands , this means love your wives , just as Christ loved the church . He gave up his life for her
49005026	to make her holy and clean , washed by the cleansing of God’s word .
49005027	He did this to present her to himself as a glorious church without a spot or wrinkle or any other blemish . Instead , she will be holy and without fault .
49005028	In the same way , husbands ought to love their wives as they love their own bodies . For a man who loves his wife actually shows love for himself .
49005029	No one hates his own body but feeds and cares for it , just as Christ cares for the church .
49005030	And we are members of his body .
49005031	As the Scriptures say , “ A man leaves his father and mother and is joined to his wife , and the two are united into one . ”
49005032	This is a great mystery , but it is an illustration of the way Christ and the church are one .
49005033	So again I say , each man must love his wife as he loves himself , and the wife must respect her husband .
49006001	Children , obey your parents because you belong to the Lord , for this is the right thing to do .
49006002	“ Honor your father and mother . ” This is the first commandment with a promise :
49006003	If you honor your father and mother , “ things will go well for you , and you will have a long life on the earth . ”
49006004	Fathers , do not provoke your children to anger by the way you treat them . Rather , bring them up with the discipline and instruction that comes from the Lord .
49006005	Slaves , obey your earthly masters with deep respect and fear . Serve them sincerely as you would serve Christ .
49006006	Try to please them all the time , not just when they are watching you . As slaves of Christ , do the will of God with all your heart .
49006007	Work with enthusiasm , as though you were working for the Lord rather than for people .
49006008	Remember that the Lord will reward each one of us for the good we do , whether we are slaves or free .
49006009	Masters , treat your slaves in the same way . Don’t threaten them ; remember , you both have the same Master in heaven , and he has no favorites .
49006010	A final word : Be strong in the Lord and in his mighty power .
49006011	Put on all of God’s armor so that you will be able to stand firm against all strategies of the devil .
49006012	For we are not fighting against flesh-and-blood enemies , but against evil rulers and authorities of the unseen world , against mighty powers in this dark world , and against evil spirits in the heavenly places .
49006013	Therefore , put on every piece of God’s armor so you will be able to resist the enemy in the time of evil . Then after the battle you will still be standing firm .
49006014	Stand your ground , putting on the belt of truth and the body armor of God’s righteousness .
49006015	For shoes , put on the peace that comes from the Good News so that you will be fully prepared .
49006016	In addition to all of these , hold up the shield of faith to stop the fiery arrows of the devil .
49006017	Put on salvation as your helmet , and take the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God .
49006018	Pray in the Spirit at all times and on every occasion . Stay alert and be persistent in your prayers for all believers everywhere .
49006019	And pray for me , too . Ask God to give me the right words so I can boldly explain God’s mysterious plan that the Good News is for Jews and Gentiles alike .
49006020	I am in chains now , still preaching this message as God’s ambassador . So pray that I will keep on speaking boldly for him , as I should .
49006021	To bring you up to date , Tychicus will give you a full report about what I am doing and how I am getting along . He is a beloved brother and faithful helper in the Lord’s work .
49006022	I have sent him to you for this very purposeto let you know how we are doing and to encourage you .
49006023	Peace be with you , dear brothers and sisters , and may God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you love with faithfulness .
49006024	May God’s grace be eternally upon all who love our Lord Jesus Christ .
50001001	This letter is from Paul and Timothy , slaves of Christ Jesus . I am writing to all of God’s holy people in Philippi who belong to Christ Jesus , including the elders and deacons .
50001002	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you grace and peace .
50001003	Every time I think of you , I give thanks to my God .
50001004	Whenever I pray , I make my requests for all of you with joy ,
50001005	for you have been my partners in spreading the Good News about Christ from the time you first heard it until now .
50001006	And I am certain that God , who began the good work within you , will continue his work until it is finally finished on the day when Christ Jesus returns .
50001007	So it is right that I should feel as I do about all of you , for you have a special place in my heart . You share with me the special favor of God , both in my imprisonment and in defending and confirming the truth of the Good News .
50001008	God knows how much I love you and long for you with the tender compassion of Christ Jesus .
50001009	I pray that your love will overflow more and more , and that you will keep on growing in knowledge and understanding .
50001010	For I want you to understand what really matters , so that you may live pure and blameless lives until the day of Christ’s return .
50001011	May you always be filled with the fruit of your salvationthe righteous character produced in your life by Jesus Christ for this will bring much glory and praise to God .
50001012	And I want you to know , my dear brothers and sisters , that everything that has happened to me here has helped to spread the Good News .
50001013	For everyone here , including the whole palace guard , knows that I am in chains because of Christ .
50001014	And because of my imprisonment , most of the believers here have gained confidence and boldly speak God’s message without fear .
50001015	It’s true that some are preaching out of jealousy and rivalry . But others preach about Christ with pure motives .
50001016	They preach because they love me , for they know I have been appointed to defend the Good News .
50001017	Those others do not have pure motives as they preach about Christ . They preach with selfish ambition , not sincerely , intending to make my chains more painful to me .
50001018	But that doesn’t matter . Whether their motives are false or genuine , the message about Christ is being preached either way , so I rejoice . And I will continue to rejoice .
50001019	For I know that as you pray for me and the Spirit of Jesus Christ helps me , this will lead to my deliverance .
50001020	For I fully expect and hope that I will never be ashamed , but that I will continue to be bold for Christ , as I have been in the past . And I trust that my life will bring honor to Christ , whether I live or die .
50001021	For to me , living means living for Christ , and dying is even better .
50001022	But if I live , I can do more fruitful work for Christ . So I really don’t know which is better .
50001023	I’m torn between two desires : I long to go and be with Christ , which would be far better for me .
50001024	But for your sakes , it is better that I continue to live .
50001025	Knowing this , I am convinced that I will remain alive so I can continue to help all of you grow and experience the joy of your faith .
50001026	And when I come to you again , you will have even more reason to take pride in Christ Jesus because of what he is doing through me .
50001027	Above all , you must live as citizens of heaven , conducting yourselves in a manner worthy of the Good News about Christ . Then , whether I come and see you again or only hear about you , I will know that you are standing together with one spirit and one purpose , fighting together for the faith , which is the Good News .
50001028	Don’t be intimidated in any way by your enemies . This will be a sign to them that they are going to be destroyed , but that you are going to be saved , even by God himself .
50001029	For you have been given not only the privilege of trusting in Christ but also the privilege of suffering for him .
50001030	We are in this struggle together . You have seen my struggle in the past , and you know that I am still in the midst of it .
50002001	Is there any encouragement from belonging to Christ ? Any comfort from his love ? Any fellowship together in the Spirit ? Are your hearts tender and compassionate ?
50002002	Then make me truly happy by agreeing wholeheartedly with each other , loving one another , and working together with one mind and purpose .
50002003	Don’t be selfish ; don’t try to impress others . Be humble , thinking of others as better than yourselves .
50002004	Don’t look out only for your own interests , but take an interest in others , too .
50002005	You must have the same attitude that Christ Jesus had .
50002006	Though he was God , he did not think of equality with God as something to cling to .
50002007	Instead , he gave up his divine privileges ; he took the humble position of a slave and was born as a human being . When he appeared in human form ,
50002008	he humbled himself in obedience to God and died a criminal’s death on a cross .
50002009	Therefore , God elevated him to the place of highest honor and gave him the name above all other names ,
50002010	that at the name of Jesus every knee should bow , in heaven and on earth and under the earth ,
50002011	and every tongue confess that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
50002012	Dear friends , you always followed my instructions when I was with you . And now that I am away , it is even more important . Work hard to show the results of your salvation , obeying God with deep reverence and fear .
50002013	For God is working in you , giving you the desire and the power to do what pleases him .
50002014	Do everything without complaining and arguing ,
50002015	so that no one can criticize you . Live clean , innocent lives as children of God , shining like bright lights in a world full of crooked and perverse people .
50002016	Hold firmly to the word of life ; then , on the day of Christ’s return , I will be proud that I did not run the race in vain and that my work was not useless .
50002017	But I will rejoice even if I lose my life , pouring it out like a liquid offering to God , just like your faithful service is an offering to God . And I want all of you to share that joy .
50002018	Yes , you should rejoice , and I will share your joy .
50002019	If the Lord Jesus is willing , I hope to send Timothy to you soon for a visit . Then he can cheer me up by telling me how you are getting along .
50002020	I have no one else like Timothy , who genuinely cares about your welfare .
50002021	All the others care only for themselves and not for what matters to Jesus Christ .
50002022	But you know how Timothy has proved himself . Like a son with his father , he has served with me in preaching the Good News .
50002023	I hope to send him to you just as soon as I find out what is going to happen to me here .
50002024	And I have confidence from the Lord that I myself will come to see you soon .
50002025	Meanwhile , I thought I should send Epaphroditus back to you . He is a true brother , co-worker , and fellow soldier . And he was your messenger to help me in my need .
50002026	I am sending him because he has been longing to see you , and he was very distressed that you heard he was ill .
50002027	And he certainly was ill ; in fact , he almost died . But God had mercy on himand also on me , so that I would not have one sorrow after another .
50002028	So I am all the more anxious to send him back to you , for I know you will be glad to see him , and then I will not be so worried about you .
50002029	Welcome him with Christian love and with great joy , and give him the honor that people like him deserve .
50002030	For he risked his life for the work of Christ , and he was at the point of death while doing for me what you couldn’t do from far away .
50003001	Whatever happens , my dear brothers and sisters , rejoice in the Lord . I never get tired of telling you these things , and I do it to safeguard your faith .
50003002	Watch out for those dogs , those people who do evil , those mutilators who say you must be circumcised to be saved .
50003003	For we who worship by the Spirit of God are the ones who are truly circumcised . We rely on what Christ Jesus has done for us . We put no confidence in human effort ,
50003004	though I could have confidence in my own effort if anyone could . Indeed , if others have reason for confidence in their own efforts , I have even more !
50003005	I was circumcised when I was eight days old . I am a pure-blooded citizen of Israel and a member of the tribe of Benjamina real Hebrew if there ever was one ! I was a member of the Pharisees , who demand the strictest obedience to the Jewish law .
50003006	I was so zealous that I harshly persecuted the church . And as for righteousness , I obeyed the law without fault .
50003007	I once thought these things were valuable , but now I consider them worthless because of what Christ has done .
50003008	Yes , everything else is worthless when compared with the infinite value of knowing Christ Jesus my Lord . For his sake I have discarded everything else , counting it all as garbage , so that I could gain Christ
50003009	and become one with him . I no longer count on my own righteousness through obeying the law ; rather , I become righteous through faith in Christ . For God’s way of making us right with himself depends on faith .
50003010	I want to know Christ and experience the mighty power that raised him from the dead . I want to suffer with him , sharing in his death ,
50003011	so that one way or another I will experience the resurrection from the dead !
50003012	I don’t mean to say that I have already achieved these things or that I have already reached perfection . But I press on to possess that perfection for which Christ Jesus first possessed me .
50003013	No , dear brothers and sisters , I have not achieved it , but I focus on this one thing : Forgetting the past and looking forward to what lies ahead ,
50003014	I press on to reach the end of the race and receive the heavenly prize for which God , through Christ Jesus , is calling us .
50003015	Let all who are spiritually mature agree on these things . If you disagree on some point , I believe God will make it plain to you .
50003016	But we must hold on to the progress we have already made .
50003017	Dear brothers and sisters , pattern your lives after mine , and learn from those who follow our example .
50003018	For I have told you often before , and I say it again with tears in my eyes , that there are many whose conduct shows they are really enemies of the cross of Christ .
50003019	They are headed for destruction . Their god is their appetite , they brag about shameful things , and they think only about this life here on earth .
50003020	But we are citizens of heaven , where the Lord Jesus Christ lives . And we are eagerly waiting for him to return as our Savior .
50003021	He will take our weak mortal bodies and change them into glorious bodies like his own , using the same power with which he will bring everything under his control .
50004001	Therefore , my dear brothers and sisters , stay true to the Lord . I love you and long to see you , dear friends , for you are my joy and the crown I receive for my work .
50004002	Now I appeal to Euodia and Syntyche . Please , because you belong to the Lord , settle your disagreement .
50004003	And I ask you , my true partner , to help these two women , for they worked hard with me in telling others the Good News . They worked along with Clement and the rest of my co-workers , whose names are written in the Book of Life .
50004004	Always be full of joy in the Lord . I say it againrejoice !
50004005	Let everyone see that you are considerate in all you do . Remember , the Lord is coming soon .
50004006	Don’t worry about anything ; instead , pray about everything . Tell God what you need , and thank him for all he has done .
50004007	Then you will experience God’s peace , which exceeds anything we can understand . His peace will guard your hearts and minds as you live in Christ Jesus .
50004008	And now , dear brothers and sisters , one final thing . Fix your thoughts on what is true , and honorable , and right , and pure , and lovely , and admirable . Think about things that are excellent and worthy of praise .
50004009	Keep putting into practice all you learned and received from meeverything you heard from me and saw me doing . Then the God of peace will be with you .
50004010	How I praise the Lord that you are concerned about me again . I know you have always been concerned for me , but you didn’t have the chance to help me .
50004011	Not that I was ever in need , for I have learned how to be content with whatever I have .
50004012	I know how to live on almost nothing or with everything . I have learned the secret of living in every situation , whether it is with a full stomach or empty , with plenty or little .
50004013	For I can do everything through Christ , who gives me strength .
50004014	Even so , you have done well to share with me in my present difficulty .
50004015	As you know , you Philippians were the only ones who gave me financial help when I first brought you the Good News and then traveled on from Macedonia . No other church did this .
50004016	Even when I was in Thessalonica you sent help more than once .
50004017	I don’t say this because I want a gift from you . Rather , I want you to receive a reward for your kindness .
50004018	At the moment I have all I needand more ! I am generously supplied with the gifts you sent me with Epaphroditus . They are a sweet-smelling sacrifice that is acceptable and pleasing to God .
50004019	And this same God who takes care of me will supply all your needs from his glorious riches , which have been given to us in Christ Jesus .
50004020	Now all glory to God our Father forever and ever ! Amen .
50004021	Give my greetings to each of God’s holy peopleall who belong to Christ Jesus . The brothers who are with me send you their greetings .
50004022	And all the rest of God’s people send you greetings , too , especially those in Caesar’s household .
50004023	May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit .
51001001	This letter is from Paul , chosen by the will of God to be an apostle of Christ Jesus , and from our brother Timothy .
51001002	We are writing to God’s holy people in the city of Colosse , who are faithful brothers and sisters in Christ . May God our Father give you grace and peace .
51001003	We always pray for you , and we give thanks to God , the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ .
51001004	For we have heard of your faith in Christ Jesus and your love for all of God’s people ,
51001005	which come from your confident hope of what God has reserved for you in heaven . You have had this expectation ever since you first heard the truth of the Good News .
51001006	This same Good News that came to you is going out all over the world . It is bearing fruit everywhere by changing lives , just as it changed your lives from the day you first heard and understood the truth about God’s wonderful grace .
51001007	You learned about the Good News from Epaphras , our beloved co-worker . He is Christ’s faithful servant , and he is helping us on your behalf .
51001008	He has told us about the love for others that the Holy Spirit has given you .
51001009	So we have not stopped praying for you since we first heard about you . We ask God to give you complete knowledge of his will and to give you spiritual wisdom and understanding .
51001010	Then the way you live will always honor and please the Lord , and your lives will produce every kind of good fruit . All the while , you will grow as you learn to know God better and better .
51001011	We also pray that you will be strengthened with all his glorious power so you will have all the endurance and patience you need . May you be filled with joy ,
51001012	always thanking the Father . He has enabled you to share in the inheritance that belongs to his people , who live in the light .
51001013	For he has rescued us from the kingdom of darkness and transferred us into the Kingdom of his dear Son ,
51001014	who purchased our freedom and forgave our sins .
51001015	Christ is the visible image of the invisible God . He existed before anything was created and is supreme over all creation ,
51001016	for through him God created everything in the heavenly realms and on earth . He made the things we can see and the things we can’t see such as thrones , kingdoms , rulers , and authorities in the unseen world . Everything was created through him and for him .
51001017	He existed before anything else , and he holds all creation together .
51001018	Christ is also the head of the church , which is his body . He is the beginning , supreme over all who rise from the dead . So he is first in everything .
51001019	For God in all his fullness was pleased to live in Christ ,
51001020	and through him God reconciled everything to himself . He made peace with everything in heaven and on earth by means of Christ’s blood on the cross .
51001021	This includes you who were once far away from God . You were his enemies , separated from him by your evil thoughts and actions .
51001022	Yet now he has reconciled you to himself through the death of Christ in his physical body . As a result , he has brought you into his own presence , and you are holy and blameless as you stand before him without a single fault .
51001023	But you must continue to believe this truth and stand firmly in it . Don’t drift away from the assurance you received when you heard the Good News . The Good News has been preached all over the world , and I , Paul , have been appointed as God’s servant to proclaim it .
51001024	I am glad when I suffer for you in my body , for I am participating in the sufferings of Christ that continue for his body , the church .
51001025	God has given me the responsibility of serving his church by proclaiming his entire message to you .
51001026	This message was kept secret for centuries and generations past , but now it has been revealed to God’s people .
51001027	For God wanted them to know that the riches and glory of Christ are for you Gentiles , too . And this is the secret : Christ lives in you . This gives you assurance of sharing his glory .
51001028	So we tell others about Christ , warning everyone and teaching everyone with all the wisdom God has given us . We want to present them to God , perfect in their relationship to Christ .
51001029	That’s why I work and struggle so hard , depending on Christ’s mighty power that works within me .
51002001	I want you to know how much I have agonized for you and for the church at Laodicea , and for many other believers who have never met me personally .
51002002	I want them to be encouraged and knit together by strong ties of love . I want them to have complete confidence that they understand God’s mysterious plan , which is Christ himself .
51002003	In him lie hidden all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
51002004	I am telling you this so no one will deceive you with well-crafted arguments .
51002005	For though I am far away from you , my heart is with you . And I rejoice that you are living as you should and that your faith in Christ is strong .
51002006	And now , just as you accepted Christ Jesus as your Lord , you must continue to follow him .
51002007	Let your roots grow down into him , and let your lives be built on him . Then your faith will grow strong in the truth you were taught , and you will overflow with thankfulness .
51002008	Don’t let anyone capture you with empty philosophies and high-sounding nonsense that come from human thinking and from the spiritual powers of this world , rather than from Christ .
51002009	For in Christ lives all the fullness of God in a human body .
51002010	So you also are complete through your union with Christ , who is the head over every ruler and authority .
51002011	When you came to Christ , you were “ circumcised , ” but not by a physical procedure . Christ performed a spiritual circumcisionthe cutting away of your sinful nature .
51002012	For you were buried with Christ when you were baptized . And with him you were raised to new life because you trusted the mighty power of God , who raised Christ from the dead .
51002013	You were dead because of your sins and because your sinful nature was not yet cut away . Then God made you alive with Christ , for he forgave all our sins .
51002014	He canceled the record of the charges against us and took it away by nailing it to the cross .
51002015	In this way , he disarmed the spiritual rulers and authorities . He shamed them publicly by his victory over them on the cross .
51002016	So don’t let anyone condemn you for what you eat or drink , or for not celebrating certain holy days or new moon ceremonies or Sabbaths .
51002017	For these rules are only shadows of the reality yet to come . And Christ himself is that reality .
51002018	Don’t let anyone condemn you by insisting on pious self-denial or the worship of angels , saying they have had visions about these things . Their sinful minds have made them proud ,
51002019	and they are not connected to Christ , the head of the body . For he holds the whole body together with its joints and ligaments , and it grows as God nourishes it .
51002020	You have died with Christ , and he has set you free from the spiritual powers of this world . So why do you keep on following the rules of the world , such as ,
51002021	“ Don’t handle ! Don’t taste ! Don’t touch ! ” ?
51002022	Such rules are mere human teachings about things that deteriorate as we use them .
51002023	These rules may seem wise because they require strong devotion , pious self-denial , and severe bodily discipline . But they provide no help in conquering a person’s evil desires .
51003001	Since you have been raised to new life with Christ , set your sights on the realities of heaven , where Christ sits in the place of honor at God’s right hand .
51003002	Think about the things of heaven , not the things of earth .
51003003	For you died to this life , and your real life is hidden with Christ in God .
51003004	And when Christ , who is your life , is revealed to the whole world , you will share in all his glory .
51003005	So put to death the sinful , earthly things lurking within you . Have nothing to do with sexual immorality , impurity , lust , and evil desires . Don’t be greedy , for a greedy person is an idolater , worshiping the things of this world .
51003006	Because of these sins , the anger of God is coming .
51003007	You used to do these things when your life was still part of this world .
51003008	But now is the time to get rid of anger , rage , malicious behavior , slander , and dirty language .
51003009	Don’t lie to each other , for you have stripped off your old sinful nature and all its wicked deeds .
51003010	Put on your new nature , and be renewed as you learn to know your Creator and become like him .
51003011	In this new life , it doesn’t matter if you are a Jew or a Gentile , circumcised or uncircumcised , barbaric , uncivilized , slave , or free . Christ is all that matters , and he lives in all of us .
51003012	Since God chose you to be the holy people he loves , you must clothe yourselves with tenderhearted mercy , kindness , humility , gentleness , and patience .
51003013	Make allowance for each other’s faults , and forgive anyone who offends you . Remember , the Lord forgave you , so you must forgive others .
51003014	Above all , clothe yourselves with love , which binds us all together in perfect harmony .
51003015	And let the peace that comes from Christ rule in your hearts . For as members of one body you are called to live in peace . And always be thankful .
51003016	Let the message about Christ , in all its richness , fill your lives . Teach and counsel each other with all the wisdom he gives . Sing psalms and hymns and spiritual songs to God with thankful hearts .
51003017	And whatever you do or say , do it as a representative of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks through him to God the Father .
51003018	Wives , submit to your husbands , as is fitting for those who belong to the Lord .
51003019	Husbands , love your wives and never treat them harshly .
51003020	Children , always obey your parents , for this pleases the Lord .
51003021	Fathers , do not aggravate your children , or they will become discouraged .
51003022	Slaves , obey your earthly masters in everything you do . Try to please them all the time , not just when they are watching you . Serve them sincerely because of your reverent fear of the Lord .
51003023	Work willingly at whatever you do , as though you were working for the Lord rather than for people .
51003024	Remember that the Lord will give you an inheritance as your reward , and that the Master you are serving is Christ .
51003025	But if you do what is wrong , you will be paid back for the wrong you have done . For God has no favorites .
51004001	Masters , be just and fair to your slaves . Remember that you also have a Masterin heaven .
51004002	Devote yourselves to prayer with an alert mind and a thankful heart .
51004003	Pray for us , too , that God will give us many opportunities to speak about his mysterious plan concerning Christ . That is why I am here in chains .
51004004	Pray that I will proclaim this message as clearly as I should .
51004005	Live wisely among those who are not believers , and make the most of every opportunity .
51004006	Let your conversation be gracious and attractive so that you will have the right response for everyone .
51004007	Tychicus will give you a full report about how I am getting along . He is a beloved brother and faithful helper who serves with me in the Lord’s work .
51004008	I have sent him to you for this very purposeto let you know how we are doing and to encourage you .
51004009	I am also sending Onesimus , a faithful and beloved brother , one of your own people . He and Tychicus will tell you everything that’s happening here .
51004010	Aristarchus , who is in prison with me , sends you his greetings , and so does Mark , Barnabas’s cousin . As you were instructed before , make Mark welcome if he comes your way .
51004011	Jesus ( the one we call Justus ) also sends his greetings . These are the only Jewish believers among my co-workers ; they are working with me here for the Kingdom of God . And what a comfort they have been !
51004012	Epaphras , a member of your own fellowship and a servant of Christ Jesus , sends you his greetings . He always prays earnestly for you , asking God to make you strong and perfect , fully confident that you are following the whole will of God .
51004013	I can assure you that he prays hard for you and also for the believers in Laodicea and Hierapolis .
51004014	Luke , the beloved doctor , sends his greetings , and so does Demas .
51004015	Please give my greetings to our brothers and sisters at Laodicea , and to Nympha and the church that meets in her house .
51004016	After you have read this letter , pass it on to the church at Laodicea so they can read it , too . And you should read the letter I wrote to them .
51004017	And say to Archippus , “ Be sure to carry out the ministry the Lord gave you . ”
51004018	H ere is my greeting in my own handwriting P aul . Remember my chains . May God’s grace be with you .
52001001	This letter is from Paul , Silas , and Timothy . We are writing to the church in Thessalonica , to you who belong to God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ . May God give you grace and peace .
52001002	We always thank God for all of you and pray for you constantly .
52001003	As we pray to our God and Father about you , we think of your faithful work , your loving deeds , and the enduring hope you have because of our Lord Jesus Christ .
52001004	We know , dear brothers and sisters , that God loves you and has chosen you to be his own people .
52001005	For when we brought you the Good News , it was not only with words but also with power , for the Holy Spirit gave you full assurance that what we said was true . And you know of our concern for you from the way we lived when we were with you .
52001006	So you received the message with joy from the Holy Spirit in spite of the severe suffering it brought you . In this way , you imitated both us and the Lord .
52001007	As a result , you have become an example to all the believers in Greecethroughout both Macedonia and Achaia .
52001008	And now the word of the Lord is ringing out from you to people everywhere , even beyond Macedonia and Achaia , for wherever we go we find people telling us about your faith in God . We don’t need to tell them about it ,
52001009	for they keep talking about the wonderful welcome you gave us and how you turned away from idols to serve the living and true God .
52001010	And they speak of how you are looking forward to the coming of God’s Son from heavenJesus , whom God raised from the dead . He is the one who has rescued us from the terrors of the coming judgment .
52002001	You yourselves know , dear brothers and sisters , that our visit to you was not a failure .
52002002	You know how badly we had been treated at Philippi just before we came to you and how much we suffered there . Yet our God gave us the courage to declare his Good News to you boldly , in spite of great opposition .
52002003	So you can see we were not preaching with any deceit or impure motives or trickery .
52002004	For we speak as messengers approved by God to be entrusted with the Good News . Our purpose is to please God , not people . He alone examines the motives of our hearts .
52002005	Never once did we try to win you with flattery , as you well know . And God is our witness that we were not pretending to be your friends just to get your money !
52002006	As for human praise , we have never sought it from you or anyone else .
52002007	As apostles of Christ we certainly had a right to make some demands of you , but instead we were like children among you . Or we were like a mother feeding and caring for her own children .
52002008	We loved you so much that we shared with you not only God’s Good News but our own lives , too .
52002009	Don’t you remember , dear brothers and sisters , how hard we worked among you ? Night and day we toiled to earn a living so that we would not be a burden to any of you as we preached God’s Good News to you .
52002010	You yourselves are our witnesses and so is Godthat we were devout and honest and faultless toward all of you believers .
52002011	And you know that we treated each of you as a father treats his own children .
52002012	We pleaded with you , encouraged you , and urged you to live your lives in a way that God would consider worthy . For he called you to share in his Kingdom and glory .
52002013	Therefore , we never stop thanking God that when you received his message from us , you didn’t think of our words as mere human ideas . You accepted what we said as the very word of Godwhich , of course , it is . And this word continues to work in you who believe .
52002014	And then , dear brothers and sisters , you suffered persecution from your own countrymen . In this way , you imitated the believers in God’s churches in Judea who , because of their belief in Christ Jesus , suffered from their own people , the Jews .
52002015	For some of the Jews killed the prophets , and some even killed the Lord Jesus . Now they have persecuted us , too . They fail to please God and work against all humanity
52002016	as they try to keep us from preaching the Good News of salvation to the Gentiles . By doing this , they continue to pile up their sins . But the anger of God has caught up with them at last .
52002017	Dear brothers and sisters , after we were separated from you for a little while ( though our hearts never left you ) , we tried very hard to come back because of our intense longing to see you again .
52002018	We wanted very much to come to you , and I , Paul , tried again and again , but Satan prevented us .
52002019	After all , what gives us hope and joy , and what will be our proud reward and crown as we stand before our Lord Jesus when he returns ? It is you !
52002020	Yes , you are our pride and joy .
52003001	Finally , when we could stand it no longer , we decided to stay alone in Athens ,
52003002	and we sent Timothy to visit you . He is our brother and God’s co-worker in proclaiming the Good News of Christ . We sent him to strengthen you , to encourage you in your faith ,
52003003	and to keep you from being shaken by the troubles you were going through . But you know that we are destined for such troubles .
52003004	Even while we were with you , we warned you that troubles would soon comeand they did , as you well know .
52003005	That is why , when I could bear it no longer , I sent Timothy to find out whether your faith was still strong . I was afraid that the tempter had gotten the best of you and that our work had been useless .
52003006	But now Timothy has just returned , bringing us good news about your faith and love . He reports that you always remember our visit with joy and that you want to see us as much as we want to see you .
52003007	So we have been greatly encouraged in the midst of our troubles and suffering , dear brothers and sisters , because you have remained strong in your faith .
52003008	It gives us new life to know that you are standing firm in the Lord .
52003009	How we thank God for you ! Because of you we have great joy as we enter God’s presence .
52003010	Night and day we pray earnestly for you , asking God to let us see you again to fill the gaps in your faith .
52003011	May God our Father and our Lord Jesus bring us to you very soon .
52003012	And may the Lord make your love for one another and for all people grow and overflow , just as our love for you overflows .
52003013	May he , as a result , make your hearts strong , blameless , and holy as you stand before God our Father when our Lord Jesus comes again with all his holy people . Amen .
52004001	Finally , dear brothers and sisters , we urge you in the name of the Lord Jesus to live in a way that pleases God , as we have taught you . You live this way already , and we encourage you to do so even more .
52004002	For you remember what we taught you by the authority of the Lord Jesus .
52004003	God’s will is for you to be holy , so stay away from all sexual sin .
52004004	Then each of you will control his own body and live in holiness and honor
52004005	not in lustful passion like the pagans who do not know God and his ways .
52004006	Never harm or cheat a Christian brother in this matter by violating his wife , for the Lord avenges all such sins , as we have solemnly warned you before .
52004007	God has called us to live holy lives , not impure lives .
52004008	Therefore , anyone who refuses to live by these rules is not disobeying human teaching but is rejecting God , who gives his Holy Spirit to you .
52004009	But we don’t need to write to you about the importance of loving each other , for God himself has taught you to love one another .
52004010	Indeed , you already show your love for all the believers throughout Macedonia . Even so , dear brothers and sisters , we urge you to love them even more .
52004011	Make it your goal to live a quiet life , minding your own business and working with your hands , just as we instructed you before .
52004012	Then people who are not Christians will respect the way you live , and you will not need to depend on others .
52004013	And now , dear brothers and sisters , we want you to know what will happen to the believers who have died so you will not grieve like people who have no hope .
52004014	For since we believe that Jesus died and was raised to life again , we also believe that when Jesus returns , God will bring back with him the believers who have died .
52004015	We tell you this directly from the Lord : We who are still living when the Lord returns will not meet him ahead of those who have died .
52004016	For the Lord himself will come down from heaven with a commanding shout , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trumpet call of God . First , the Christians who have died will rise from their graves .
52004017	Then , together with them , we who are still alive and remain on the earth will be caught up in the clouds to meet the Lord in the air . Then we will be with the Lord forever .
52004018	So encourage each other with these words .
52005001	Now concerning how and when all this will happen , dear brothers and sisters , we don’t really need to write you .
52005002	For you know quite well that the day of the Lord’s return will come unexpectedly , like a thief in the night .
52005003	When people are saying , “ Everything is peaceful and secure , ” then disaster will fall on them as suddenly as a pregnant woman’s labor pains begin . And there will be no escape .
52005004	But you aren’t in the dark about these things , dear brothers and sisters , and you won’t be surprised when the day of the Lord comes like a thief .
52005005	For you are all children of the light and of the day ; we don’t belong to darkness and night .
52005006	So be on your guard , not asleep like the others . Stay alert and be clearheaded .
52005007	Night is the time when people sleep and drinkers get drunk .
52005008	But let us who live in the light be clearheaded , protected by the armor of faith and love , and wearing as our helmet the confidence of our salvation .
52005009	For God chose to save us through our Lord Jesus Christ , not to pour out his anger on us .
52005010	Christ died for us so that , whether we are dead or alive when he returns , we can live with him forever .
52005011	So encourage each other and build each other up , just as you are already doing .
52005012	Dear brothers and sisters , honor those who are your leaders in the Lord’s work . They work hard among you and give you spiritual guidance .
52005013	Show them great respect and wholehearted love because of their work . And live peacefully with each other .
52005014	Brothers and sisters , we urge you to warn those who are lazy . Encourage those who are timid . Take tender care of those who are weak . Be patient with everyone .
52005015	See that no one pays back evil for evil , but always try to do good to each other and to all people .
52005016	Always be joyful .
52005017	Never stop praying .
52005018	Be thankful in all circumstances , for this is God’s will for you who belong to Christ Jesus .
52005019	Do not stifle the Holy Spirit .
52005020	Do not scoff at prophecies ,
52005021	but test everything that is said . Hold on to what is good .
52005022	Stay away from every kind of evil .
52005023	Now may the God of peace make you holy in every way , and may your whole spirit and soul and body be kept blameless until our Lord Jesus Christ comes again .
52005024	God will make this happen , for he who calls you is faithful .
52005025	Dear brothers and sisters , pray for us .
52005026	Greet all the brothers and sisters with Christian love .
52005027	I command you in the name of the Lord to read this letter to all the brothers and sisters .
52005028	May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
53001001	This letter is from Paul , Silas , and Timothy . We are writing to the church in Thessalonica , to you who belong to God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
53001002	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you grace and peace .
53001003	Dear brothers and sisters , we can’t help but thank God for you , because your faith is flourishing and your love for one another is growing .
53001004	We proudly tell God’s other churches about your endurance and faithfulness in all the persecutions and hardships you are suffering .
53001005	And God will use this persecution to show his justice and to make you worthy of his Kingdom , for which you are suffering .
53001006	In his justice he will pay back those who persecute you .
53001007	And God will provide rest for you who are being persecuted and also for us when the Lord Jesus appears from heaven . He will come with his mighty angels ,
53001008	in flaming fire , bringing judgment on those who don’t know God and on those who refuse to obey the Good News of our Lord Jesus .
53001009	They will be punished with eternal destruction , forever separated from the Lord and from his glorious power .
53001010	When he comes on that day , he will receive glory from his holy peoplepraise from all who believe . And this includes you , for you believed what we told you about him .
53001011	So we keep on praying for you , asking our God to enable you to live a life worthy of his call . May he give you the power to accomplish all the good things your faith prompts you to do .
53001012	Then the name of our Lord Jesus will be honored because of the way you live , and you will be honored along with him . This is all made possible because of the grace of our God and Lord , Jesus Christ .
53002001	Now , dear brothers and sisters , let us clarify some things about the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ and how we will be gathered to meet him .
53002002	Don’t be so easily shaken or alarmed by those who say that the day of the Lord has already begun . Don’t believe them , even if they claim to have had a spiritual vision , a revelation , or a letter supposedly from us .
53002003	Don’t be fooled by what they say . For that day will not come until there is a great rebellion against God and the man of lawlessness is revealedthe one who brings destruction .
53002004	He will exalt himself and defy everything that people call god and every object of worship . He will even sit in the temple of God , claiming that he himself is God .
53002005	Don’t you remember that I told you about all this when I was with you ?
53002006	And you know what is holding him back , for he can be revealed only when his time comes .
53002007	For this lawlessness is already at work secretly , and it will remain secret until the one who is holding it back steps out of the way .
53002008	Then the man of lawlessness will be revealed , but the Lord Jesus will kill him with the breath of his mouth and destroy him by the splendor of his coming .
53002009	This man will come to do the work of Satan with counterfeit power and signs and miracles .
53002010	He will use every kind of evil deception to fool those on their way to destruction , because they refuse to love and accept the truth that would save them .
53002011	So God will cause them to be greatly deceived , and they will believe these lies .
53002012	Then they will be condemned for enjoying evil rather than believing the truth .
53002013	As for us , we can’t help but thank God for you , dear brothers and sisters loved by the Lord . We are always thankful that God chose you to be among the first to experience salvationa salvation that came through the Spirit who makes you holy and through your belief in the truth .
53002014	He called you to salvation when we told you the Good News ; now you can share in the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
53002015	With all these things in mind , dear brothers and sisters , stand firm and keep a strong grip on the teaching we passed on to you both in person and by letter .
53002016	Now may our Lord Jesus Christ himself and God our Father , who loved us and by his grace gave us eternal comfort and a wonderful hope ,
53002017	comfort you and strengthen you in every good thing you do and say .
53003001	Finally , dear brothers and sisters , we ask you to pray for us . Pray that the Lord’s message will spread rapidly and be honored wherever it goes , just as when it came to you .
53003002	Pray , too , that we will be rescued from wicked and evil people , for not everyone is a believer .
53003003	But the Lord is faithful ; he will strengthen you and guard you from the evil one .
53003004	And we are confident in the Lord that you are doing and will continue to do the things we commanded you .
53003005	May the Lord lead your hearts into a full understanding and expression of the love of God and the patient endurance that comes from Christ .
53003006	And now , dear brothers and sisters , we give you this command in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ : Stay away from all believers who live idle lives and don’t follow the tradition they received from us .
53003007	For you know that you ought to imitate us . We were not idle when we were with you .
53003008	We never accepted food from anyone without paying for it . We worked hard day and night so we would not be a burden to any of you .
53003009	We certainly had the right to ask you to feed us , but we wanted to give you an example to follow .
53003010	Even while we were with you , we gave you this command : “ Those unwilling to work will not get to eat . ”
53003011	Yet we hear that some of you are living idle lives , refusing to work and meddling in other people’s business .
53003012	We command such people and urge them in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ to settle down and work to earn their own living .
53003013	As for the rest of you , dear brothers and sisters , never get tired of doing good .
53003014	Take note of those who refuse to obey what we say in this letter . Stay away from them so they will be ashamed .
53003015	Don’t think of them as enemies , but warn them as you would a brother or sister .
53003016	Now may the Lord of peace himself give you his peace at all times and in every situation . The Lord be with you all .
53003017	H ere is my greeting in my own handwriting P aul . I do this in all my letters to prove they are from me .
53003018	May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all .
54001001	This letter is from Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus , appointed by the command of God our Savior and Christ Jesus , who gives us hope .
54001002	I am writing to Timothy , my true son in the faith . May God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord give you grace , mercy , and peace .
54001003	When I left for Macedonia , I urged you to stay there in Ephesus and stop those whose teaching is contrary to the truth .
54001004	Don’t let them waste their time in endless discussion of myths and spiritual pedigrees . These things only lead to meaningless speculations , which don’t help people live a life of faith in God .
54001005	The purpose of my instruction is that all believers would be filled with love that comes from a pure heart , a clear conscience , and genuine faith .
54001006	But some people have missed this whole point . They have turned away from these things and spend their time in meaningless discussions .
54001007	They want to be known as teachers of the law of Moses , but they don’t know what they are talking about , even though they speak so confidently .
54001008	We know that the law is good when used correctly .
54001009	For the law was not intended for people who do what is right . It is for people who are lawless and rebellious , who are ungodly and sinful , who consider nothing sacred and defile what is holy , who kill their father or mother or commit other murders .
54001010	The law is for people who are sexually immoral , or who practice homosexuality , or are slave traders , liars , promise breakers , or who do anything else that contradicts the wholesome teaching
54001011	that comes from the glorious Good News entrusted to me by our blessed God .
54001012	I thank Christ Jesus our Lord , who has given me strength to do his work . He considered me trustworthy and appointed me to serve him ,
54001013	even though I used to blaspheme the name of Christ . In my insolence , I persecuted his people . But God had mercy on me because I did it in ignorance and unbelief .
54001014	Oh , how generous and gracious our Lord was ! He filled me with the faith and love that come from Christ Jesus .
54001015	This is a trustworthy saying , and everyone should accept it : “ Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners ” and I am the worst of them all .
54001016	But God had mercy on me so that Christ Jesus could use me as a prime example of his great patience with even the worst sinners . Then others will realize that they , too , can believe in him and receive eternal life .
54001017	All honor and glory to God forever and ever ! He is the eternal King , the unseen one who never dies ; he alone is God . Amen .
54001018	Timothy , my son , here are my instructions for you , based on the prophetic words spoken about you earlier . May they help you fight well in the Lord’s battles .
54001019	Cling to your faith in Christ , and keep your conscience clear . For some people have deliberately violated their consciences ; as a result , their faith has been shipwrecked .
54001020	Hymenaeus and Alexander are two examples . I threw them out and handed them over to Satan so they might learn not to blaspheme God .
54002001	I urge you , first of all , to pray for all people . Ask God to help them ; intercede on their behalf , and give thanks for them .
54002002	Pray this way for kings and all who are in authority so that we can live peaceful and quiet lives marked by godliness and dignity .
54002003	This is good and pleases God our Savior ,
54002004	who wants everyone to be saved and to understand the truth .
54002005	For there is only one God and one Mediator who can reconcile God and humanitythe man Christ Jesus .
54002006	He gave his life to purchase freedom for everyone . This is the message God gave to the world at just the right time .
54002007	And I have been chosen as a preacher and apostle to teach the Gentiles this message about faith and truth . I’m not exaggeratingjust telling the truth .
54002008	In every place of worship , I want men to pray with holy hands lifted up to God , free from anger and controversy .
54002009	And I want women to be modest in their appearance . They should wear decent and appropriate clothing and not draw attention to themselves by the way they fix their hair or by wearing gold or pearls or expensive clothes .
54002010	For women who claim to be devoted to God should make themselves attractive by the good things they do .
54002011	Women should learn quietly and submissively .
54002012	I do not let women teach men or have authority over them . Let them listen quietly .
54002013	For God made Adam first , and afterward he made Eve .
54002014	And it was not Adam who was deceived by Satan . The woman was deceived , and sin was the result .
54002015	But women will be saved through childbearing , assuming they continue to live in faith , love , holiness , and modesty .
54003001	This is a trustworthy saying : “ If someone aspires to be an elder , he desires an honorable position . ”
54003002	So an elder must be a man whose life is above reproach . He must be faithful to his wife . He must exercise self-control , live wisely , and have a good reputation . He must enjoy having guests in his home , and he must be able to teach .
54003003	He must not be a heavy drinker or be violent . He must be gentle , not quarrelsome , and not love money .
54003004	He must manage his own family well , having children who respect and obey him .
54003005	For if a man cannot manage his own household , how can he take care of God’s church ?
54003006	An elder must not be a new believer , because he might become proud , and the devil would cause him to fall .
54003007	Also , people outside the church must speak well of him so that he will not be disgraced and fall into the devil’s trap .
54003008	In the same way , deacons must be well respected and have integrity . They must not be heavy drinkers or dishonest with money .
54003009	They must be committed to the mystery of the faith now revealed and must live with a clear conscience .
54003010	Before they are appointed as deacons , let them be closely examined . If they pass the test , then let them serve as deacons .
54003011	In the same way , their wives must be respected and must not slander others . They must exercise self-control and be faithful in everything they do .
54003012	A deacon must be faithful to his wife , and he must manage his children and household well .
54003013	Those who do well as deacons will be rewarded with respect from others and will have increased confidence in their faith in Christ Jesus .
54003014	I am writing these things to you now , even though I hope to be with you soon ,
54003015	so that if I am delayed , you will know how people must conduct themselves in the household of God . This is the church of the living God , which is the pillar and foundation of the truth .
54003016	Without question , this is the great mystery of our faith : Christ was revealed in a human body and vindicated by the Spirit . He was seen by angels and announced to the nations . He was believed in throughout the world and taken to heaven in glory .
54004001	Now the Holy Spirit tells us clearly that in the last times some will turn away from the true faith ; they will follow deceptive spirits and teachings that come from demons .
54004002	These people are hypocrites and liars , and their consciences are dead .
54004003	They will say it is wrong to be married and wrong to eat certain foods . But God created those foods to be eaten with thanks by faithful people who know the truth .
54004004	Since everything God created is good , we should not reject any of it but receive it with thanks .
54004005	For we know it is made acceptable by the word of God and prayer .
54004006	If you explain these things to the brothers and sisters , Timothy , you will be a worthy servant of Christ Jesus , one who is nourished by the message of faith and the good teaching you have followed .
54004007	Do not waste time arguing over godless ideas and old wives’ tales . Instead , train yourself to be godly .
54004008	“ Physical training is good , but training for godliness is much better , promising benefits in this life and in the life to come . ”
54004009	This is a trustworthy saying , and everyone should accept it .
54004010	This is why we work hard and continue to struggle , for our hope is in the living God , who is the Savior of all people and particularly of all believers .
54004011	Teach these things and insist that everyone learn them .
54004012	Don’t let anyone think less of you because you are young . Be an example to all believers in what you say , in the way you live , in your love , your faith , and your purity .
54004013	Until I get there , focus on reading the Scriptures to the church , encouraging the believers , and teaching them .
54004014	Do not neglect the spiritual gift you received through the prophecy spoken over you when the elders of the church laid their hands on you .
54004015	Give your complete attention to these matters . Throw yourself into your tasks so that everyone will see your progress .
54004016	Keep a close watch on how you live and on your teaching . Stay true to what is right for the sake of your own salvation and the salvation of those who hear you .
54005001	Never speak harshly to an older man , but appeal to him respectfully as you would to your own father . Talk to younger men as you would to your own brothers .
54005002	Treat older women as you would your mother , and treat younger women with all purity as you would your own sisters .
54005003	Take care of any widow who has no one else to care for her .
54005004	But if she has children or grandchildren , their first responsibility is to show godliness at home and repay their parents by taking care of them . This is something that pleases God .
54005005	Now a true widow , a woman who is truly alone in this world , has placed her hope in God . She prays night and day , asking God for his help .
54005006	But the widow who lives only for pleasure is spiritually dead even while she lives .
54005007	Give these instructions to the church so that no one will be open to criticism .
54005008	But those who won’t care for their relatives , especially those in their own household , have denied the true faith . Such people are worse than unbelievers .
54005009	A widow who is put on the list for support must be a woman who is at least sixty years old and was faithful to her husband .
54005010	She must be well respected by everyone because of the good she has done . Has she brought up her children well ? Has she been kind to strangers and served other believers humbly ? Has she helped those who are in trouble ? Has she always been ready to do good ?
54005011	The younger widows should not be on the list , because their physical desires will overpower their devotion to Christ and they will want to remarry .
54005012	Then they would be guilty of breaking their previous pledge .
54005013	And if they are on the list , they will learn to be lazy and will spend their time gossiping from house to house , meddling in other people’s business and talking about things they shouldn’t .
54005014	So I advise these younger widows to marry again , have children , and take care of their own homes . Then the enemy will not be able to say anything against them .
54005015	For I am afraid that some of them have already gone astray and now follow Satan .
54005016	If a woman who is a believer has relatives who are widows , she must take care of them and not put the responsibility on the church . Then the church can care for the widows who are truly alone .
54005017	Elders who do their work well should be respected and paid well , especially those who work hard at both preaching and teaching .
54005018	For the Scripture says , “ You must not muzzle an ox to keep it from eating as it treads out the grain . ” And in another place , “ Those who work deserve their pay ! ”
54005019	Do not listen to an accusation against an elder unless it is confirmed by two or three witnesses .
54005020	Those who sin should be reprimanded in front of the whole church ; this will serve as a strong warning to others .
54005021	I solemnly command you in the presence of God and Christ Jesus and the highest angels to obey these instructions without taking sides or showing favoritism to anyone .
54005022	Never be in a hurry about appointing a church leader . Do not share in the sins of others . Keep yourself pure .
54005023	Don’t drink only water . You ought to drink a little wine for the sake of your stomach because you are sick so often .
54005024	Remember , the sins of some people are obvious , leading them to certain judgment . But there are others whose sins will not be revealed until later .
54005025	In the same way , the good deeds of some people are obvious . And the good deeds done in secret will someday come to light .
54006001	All slaves should show full respect for their masters so they will not bring shame on the name of God and his teaching .
54006002	If the masters are believers , that is no excuse for being disrespectful . Those slaves should work all the harder because their efforts are helping other believers who are well loved . Teach these things , Timothy , and encourage everyone to obey them .
54006003	Some people may contradict our teaching , but these are the wholesome teachings of the Lord Jesus Christ . These teachings promote a godly life .
54006004	Anyone who teaches something different is arrogant and lacks understanding . Such a person has an unhealthy desire to quibble over the meaning of words . This stirs up arguments ending in jealousy , division , slander , and evil suspicions .
54006005	These people always cause trouble . Their minds are corrupt , and they have turned their backs on the truth . To them , a show of godliness is just a way to become wealthy .
54006006	Yet true godliness with contentment is itself great wealth .
54006007	After all , we brought nothing with us when we came into the world , and we can’t take anything with us when we leave it .
54006008	So if we have enough food and clothing , let us be content .
54006009	But people who long to be rich fall into temptation and are trapped by many foolish and harmful desires that plunge them into ruin and destruction .
54006010	For the love of money is the root of all kinds of evil . And some people , craving money , have wandered from the true faith and pierced themselves with many sorrows .
54006011	But you , Timothy , are a man of God ; so run from all these evil things . Pursue righteousness and a godly life , along with faith , love , perseverance , and gentleness .
54006012	Fight the good fight for the true faith . Hold tightly to the eternal life to which God has called you , which you have confessed so well before many witnesses .
54006013	And I charge you before God , who gives life to all , and before Christ Jesus , who gave a good testimony before Pontius Pilate ,
54006014	that you obey this command without wavering . Then no one can find fault with you from now until our Lord Jesus Christ comes again .
54006015	For at just the right time Christ will be revealed from heaven by the blessed and only almighty God , the King of all kings and Lord of all lords .
54006016	He alone can never die , and he lives in light so brilliant that no human can approach him . No human eye has ever seen him , nor ever will . All honor and power to him forever ! Amen .
54006017	Teach those who are rich in this world not to be proud and not to trust in their money , which is so unreliable . Their trust should be in God , who richly gives us all we need for our enjoyment .
54006018	Tell them to use their money to do good . They should be rich in good works and generous to those in need , always being ready to share with others .
54006019	By doing this they will be storing up their treasure as a good foundation for the future so that they may experience true life .
54006020	Timothy , guard what God has entrusted to you . Avoid godless , foolish discussions with those who oppose you with their so-called knowledge .
54006021	Some people have wandered from the faith by following such foolishness . May God’s grace be with you all .
55001001	This letter is from Paul , chosen by the will of God to be an apostle of Christ Jesus . I have been sent out to tell others about the life he has promised through faith in Christ Jesus .
55001002	I am writing to Timothy , my dear son . May God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord give you grace , mercy , and peace .
55001003	Timothy , I thank God for youthe God I serve with a clear conscience , just as my ancestors did . Night and day I constantly remember you in my prayers .
55001004	I long to see you again , for I remember your tears as we parted . And I will be filled with joy when we are together again .
55001005	I remember your genuine faith , for you share the faith that first filled your grandmother Lois and your mother , Eunice . And I know that same faith continues strong in you .
55001006	This is why I remind you to fan into flames the spiritual gift God gave you when I laid my hands on you .
55001007	For God has not given us a spirit of fear and timidity , but of power , love , and self-discipline .
55001008	So never be ashamed to tell others about our Lord . And don’t be ashamed of me , either , even though I’m in prison for him . With the strength God gives you , be ready to suffer with me for the sake of the Good News .
55001009	For God saved us and called us to live a holy life . He did this , not because we deserved it , but because that was his plan from before the beginning of timeto show us his grace through Christ Jesus .
55001010	And now he has made all of this plain to us by the appearing of Christ Jesus , our Savior . He broke the power of death and illuminated the way to life and immortality through the Good News .
55001011	And God chose me to be a preacher , an apostle , and a teacher of this Good News .
55001012	That is why I am suffering here in prison . But I am not ashamed of it , for I know the one in whom I trust , and I am sure that he is able to guard what I have entrusted to him until the day of his return .
55001013	Hold on to the pattern of wholesome teaching you learned from mea pattern shaped by the faith and love that you have in Christ Jesus .
55001014	Through the power of the Holy Spirit who lives within us , carefully guard the precious truth that has been entrusted to you .
55001015	As you know , everyone from the province of Asia has deserted meeven Phygelus and Hermogenes .
55001016	May the Lord show special kindness to Onesiphorus and all his family because he often visited and encouraged me . He was never ashamed of me because I was in chains .
55001017	When he came to Rome , he searched everywhere until he found me .
55001018	May the Lord show him special kindness on the day of Christ’s return . And you know very well how helpful he was in Ephesus .
55002001	Timothy , my dear son , be strong through the grace that God gives you in Christ Jesus .
55002002	You have heard me teach things that have been confirmed by many reliable witnesses . Now teach these truths to other trustworthy people who will be able to pass them on to others .
55002003	Endure suffering along with me , as a good soldier of Christ Jesus .
55002004	Soldiers don’t get tied up in the affairs of civilian life , for then they cannot please the officer who enlisted them .
55002005	And athletes cannot win the prize unless they follow the rules .
55002006	And hardworking farmers should be the first to enjoy the fruit of their labor .
55002007	Think about what I am saying . The Lord will help you understand all these things .
55002008	Always remember that Jesus Christ , a descendant of King David , was raised from the dead . This is the Good News I preach .
55002009	And because I preach this Good News , I am suffering and have been chained like a criminal . But the word of God cannot be chained .
55002010	So I am willing to endure anything if it will bring salvation and eternal glory in Christ Jesus to those God has chosen .
55002011	This is a trustworthy saying : If we die with him , we will also live with him .
55002012	If we endure hardship , we will reign with him . If we deny him , he will deny us .
55002013	If we are unfaithful , he remains faithful , for he cannot deny who he is .
55002014	Remind everyone about these things , and command them in God’s presence to stop fighting over words . Such arguments are useless , and they can ruin those who hear them .
55002015	Work hard so you can present yourself to God and receive his approval . Be a good worker , one who does not need to be ashamed and who correctly explains the word of truth .
55002016	Avoid worthless , foolish talk that only leads to more godless behavior .
55002017	This kind of talk spreads like cancer , as in the case of Hymenaeus and Philetus .
55002018	They have left the path of truth , claiming that the resurrection of the dead has already occurred ; in this way , they have turned some people away from the faith .
55002019	But God’s truth stands firm like a foundation stone with this inscription : “ The L ord knows those who are his , ” and “ All who belong to the L ord must turn away from evil . ”
55002020	In a wealthy home some utensils are made of gold and silver , and some are made of wood and clay . The expensive utensils are used for special occasions , and the cheap ones are for everyday use .
55002021	If you keep yourself pure , you will be a special utensil for honorable use . Your life will be clean , and you will be ready for the Master to use you for every good work .
55002022	Run from anything that stimulates youthful lusts . Instead , pursue righteous living , faithfulness , love , and peace . Enjoy the companionship of those who call on the Lord with pure hearts .
55002023	Again I say , don’t get involved in foolish , ignorant arguments that only start fights .
55002024	A servant of the Lord must not quarrel but must be kind to everyone , be able to teach , and be patient with difficult people .
55002025	Gently instruct those who oppose the truth . Perhaps God will change those people’s hearts , and they will learn the truth .
55002026	Then they will come to their senses and escape from the devil’s trap . For they have been held captive by him to do whatever he wants .
55003001	You should know this , Timothy , that in the last days there will be very difficult times .
55003002	For people will love only themselves and their money . They will be boastful and proud , scoffing at God , disobedient to their parents , and ungrateful . They will consider nothing sacred .
55003003	They will be unloving and unforgiving ; they will slander others and have no self-control . They will be cruel and hate what is good .
55003004	They will betray their friends , be reckless , be puffed up with pride , and love pleasure rather than God .
55003005	They will act religious , but they will reject the power that could make them godly . Stay away from people like that !
55003006	They are the kind who work their way into people’s homes and win the confidence of vulnerable women who are burdened with the guilt of sin and controlled by various desires .
55003007	( Such women are forever following new teachings , but they are never able to understand the truth . )
55003008	These teachers oppose the truth just as Jannes and Jambres opposed Moses . They have depraved minds and a counterfeit faith .
55003009	But they won’t get away with this for long . Someday everyone will recognize what fools they are , just as with Jannes and Jambres .
55003010	But you , Timothy , certainly know what I teach , and how I live , and what my purpose in life is . You know my faith , my patience , my love , and my endurance .
55003011	You know how much persecution and suffering I have endured . You know all about how I was persecuted in Antioch , Iconium , and Lystrabut the Lord rescued me from all of it .
55003012	Yes , and everyone who wants to live a godly life in Christ Jesus will suffer persecution .
55003013	But evil people and impostors will flourish . They will deceive others and will themselves be deceived .
55003014	But you must remain faithful to the things you have been taught . You know they are true , for you know you can trust those who taught you .
55003015	You have been taught the holy Scriptures from childhood , and they have given you the wisdom to receive the salvation that comes by trusting in Christ Jesus .
55003016	All Scripture is inspired by God and is useful to teach us what is true and to make us realize what is wrong in our lives . It corrects us when we are wrong and teaches us to do what is right .
55003017	God uses it to prepare and equip his people to do every good work .
55004001	I solemnly urge you in the presence of God and Christ Jesus , who will someday judge the living and the dead when he appears to set up his Kingdom :
55004002	Preach the word of God . Be prepared , whether the time is favorable or not . Patiently correct , rebuke , and encourage your people with good teaching .
55004003	For a time is coming when people will no longer listen to sound and wholesome teaching . They will follow their own desires and will look for teachers who will tell them whatever their itching ears want to hear .
55004004	They will reject the truth and chase after myths .
55004005	But you should keep a clear mind in every situation . Don’t be afraid of suffering for the Lord . Work at telling others the Good News , and fully carry out the ministry God has given you .
55004006	As for me , my life has already been poured out as an offering to God . The time of my death is near .
55004007	I have fought the good fight , I have finished the race , and I have remained faithful .
55004008	And now the prize awaits methe crown of righteousness , which the Lord , the righteous Judge , will give me on the day of his return . And the prize is not just for me but for all who eagerly look forward to his appearing .
55004009	Timothy , please come as soon as you can .
55004010	Demas has deserted me because he loves the things of this life and has gone to Thessalonica . Crescens has gone to Galatia , and Titus has gone to Dalmatia .
55004011	Only Luke is with me . Bring Mark with you when you come , for he will be helpful to me in my ministry .
55004012	I sent Tychicus to Ephesus .
55004013	When you come , be sure to bring the coat I left with Carpus at Troas . Also bring my books , and especially my papers .
55004014	Alexander the coppersmith did me much harm , but the Lord will judge him for what he has done .
55004015	Be careful of him , for he fought against everything we said .
55004016	The first time I was brought before the judge , no one came with me . Everyone abandoned me . May it not be counted against them .
55004017	But the Lord stood with me and gave me strength so that I might preach the Good News in its entirety for all the Gentiles to hear . And he rescued me from certain death .
55004018	Yes , and the Lord will deliver me from every evil attack and will bring me safely into his heavenly Kingdom . All glory to God forever and ever ! Amen .
55004019	Give my greetings to Priscilla and Aquila and those living in the household of Onesiphorus .
55004020	Erastus stayed at Corinth , and I left Trophimus sick at Miletus .
55004021	Do your best to get here before winter . Eubulus sends you greetings , and so do Pudens , Linus , Claudia , and all the brothers and sisters .
55004022	May the Lord be with your spirit . And may his grace be with all of you .
56001001	This letter is from Paul , a slave of God and an apostle of Jesus Christ . I have been sent to proclaim faith to those God has chosen and to teach them to know the truth that shows them how to live godly lives .
56001002	This truth gives them confidence that they have eternal life , which Godwho does not liepromised them before the world began .
