56001003	And now at just the right time he has revealed this message , which we announce to everyone . It is by the command of God our Savior that I have been entrusted with this work for him .
56001004	I am writing to Titus , my true son in the faith that we share . May God the Father and Christ Jesus our Savior give you grace and peace .
56001005	I left you on the island of Crete so you could complete our work there and appoint elders in each town as I instructed you .
56001006	An elder must live a blameless life . He must be faithful to his wife , and his children must be believers who don’t have a reputation for being wild or rebellious .
56001007	An elder is a manager of God’s household , so he must live a blameless life . He must not be arrogant or quick-tempered ; he must not be a heavy drinker , violent , or dishonest with money .
56001008	Rather , he must enjoy having guests in his home , and he must love what is good . He must live wisely and be just . He must live a devout and disciplined life .
56001009	He must have a strong belief in the trustworthy message he was taught ; then he will be able to encourage others with wholesome teaching and show those who oppose it where they are wrong .
56001010	For there are many rebellious people who engage in useless talk and deceive others . This is especially true of those who insist on circumcision for salvation .
56001011	They must be silenced , because they are turning whole families away from the truth by their false teaching . And they do it only for money .
56001012	Even one of their own men , a prophet from Crete , has said about them , “ The people of Crete are all liars , cruel animals , and lazy gluttons . ”
56001013	This is true . So reprimand them sternly to make them strong in the faith .
56001014	They must stop listening to Jewish myths and the commands of people who have turned away from the truth .
56001015	Everything is pure to those whose hearts are pure . But nothing is pure to those who are corrupt and unbelieving , because their minds and consciences are corrupted .
56001016	Such people claim they know God , but they deny him by the way they live . They are detestable and disobedient , worthless for doing anything good .
56002001	As for you , Titus , promote the kind of living that reflects wholesome teaching .
56002002	Teach the older men to exercise self-control , to be worthy of respect , and to live wisely . They must have sound faith and be filled with love and patience .
56002003	Similarly , teach the older women to live in a way that honors God . They must not slander others or be heavy drinkers . Instead , they should teach others what is good .
56002004	These older women must train the younger women to love their husbands and their children ,
56002005	to live wisely and be pure , to work in their homes , to do good , and to be submissive to their husbands . Then they will not bring shame on the word of God .
56002006	In the same way , encourage the young men to live wisely .
56002007	And you yourself must be an example to them by doing good works of every kind . Let everything you do reflect the integrity and seriousness of your teaching .
56002008	Teach the truth so that your teaching can’t be criticized . Then those who oppose us will be ashamed and have nothing bad to say about us .
56002009	Slaves must always obey their masters and do their best to please them . They must not talk back
56002010	or steal , but must show themselves to be entirely trustworthy and good . Then they will make the teaching about God our Savior attractive in every way .
56002011	For the grace of God has been revealed , bringing salvation to all people .
56002012	And we are instructed to turn from godless living and sinful pleasures . We should live in this evil world with wisdom , righteousness , and devotion to God ,
56002013	while we look forward with hope to that wonderful day when the glory of our great God and Savior , Jesus Christ , will be revealed .
56002014	He gave his life to free us from every kind of sin , to cleanse us , and to make us his very own people , totally committed to doing good deeds .
56002015	You must teach these things and encourage the believers to do them . You have the authority to correct them when necessary , so don’t let anyone disregard what you say .
56003001	Remind the believers to submit to the government and its officers . They should be obedient , always ready to do what is good .
56003002	They must not slander anyone and must avoid quarreling . Instead , they should be gentle and show true humility to everyone .
56003003	Once we , too , were foolish and disobedient . We were misled and became slaves to many lusts and pleasures . Our lives were full of evil and envy , and we hated each other .
56003004	But “ When God our Savior revealed his kindness and love ,
56003005	he saved us , not because of the righteous things we had done , but because of his mercy . He washed away our sins , giving us a new birth and new life through the Holy Spirit .
56003006	He generously poured out the Spirit upon us through Jesus Christ our Savior .
56003007	Because of his grace he declared us righteous and gave us confidence that we will inherit eternal life . ”
56003008	This is a trustworthy saying , and I want you to insist on these teachings so that all who trust in God will devote themselves to doing good . These teachings are good and beneficial for everyone .
56003009	Do not get involved in foolish discussions about spiritual pedigrees or in quarrels and fights about obedience to Jewish laws . These things are useless and a waste of time .
56003010	If people are causing divisions among you , give a first and second warning . After that , have nothing more to do with them .
56003011	For people like that have turned away from the truth , and their own sins condemn them .
56003012	I am planning to send either Artemas or Tychicus to you . As soon as one of them arrives , do your best to meet me at Nicopolis , for I have decided to stay there for the winter .
56003013	Do everything you can to help Zenas the lawyer and Apollos with their trip . See that they are given everything they need .
56003014	Our people must learn to do good by meeting the urgent needs of others ; then they will not be unproductive .
56003015	Everybody here sends greetings . Please give my greetings to the believersall who love us . May God’s grace be with you all .
57001001	This letter is from Paul , a prisoner for preaching the Good News about Christ Jesus , and from our brother Timothy . I am writing to Philemon , our beloved co-worker ,
57001002	and to our sister Apphia , and to our fellow soldier Archippus , and to the church that meets in your house .
57001003	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you grace and peace .
57001004	I always thank my God when I pray for you , Philemon ,
57001005	because I keep hearing about your faith in the Lord Jesus and your love for all of God’s people .
57001006	And I am praying that you will put into action the generosity that comes from your faith as you understand and experience all the good things we have in Christ .
57001007	Your love has given me much joy and comfort , my brother , for your kindness has often refreshed the hearts of God’s people .
57001008	That is why I am boldly asking a favor of you . I could demand it in the name of Christ because it is the right thing for you to do .
57001009	But because of our love , I prefer simply to ask you . Consider this as a request from mePaul , an old man and now also a prisoner for the sake of Christ Jesus .
57001010	I appeal to you to show kindness to my child , Onesimus . I became his father in the faith while here in prison .
57001011	Onesimus hasn’t been of much use to you in the past , but now he is very useful to both of us .
57001012	I am sending him back to you , and with him comes my own heart .
57001013	I wanted to keep him here with me while I am in these chains for preaching the Good News , and he would have helped me on your behalf .
57001014	But I didn’t want to do anything without your consent . I wanted you to help because you were willing , not because you were forced .
57001015	It seems you lost Onesimus for a little while so that you could have him back forever .
57001016	He is no longer like a slave to you . He is more than a slave , for he is a beloved brother , especially to me . Now he will mean much more to you , both as a man and as a brother in the Lord .
57001017	So if you consider me your partner , welcome him as you would welcome me .
57001018	If he has wronged you in any way or owes you anything , charge it to me .
57001019	I , P aul , write this with my own hand : I will repay it . A nd I wont mention that you owe me your very soul !
57001020	Yes , my brother , please do me this favor for the Lord’s sake . Give me this encouragement in Christ .
57001021	I am confident as I write this letter that you will do what I ask and even more !
57001022	One more thingplease prepare a guest room for me , for I am hoping that God will answer your prayers and let me return to you soon .
57001023	Epaphras , my fellow prisoner in Christ Jesus , sends you his greetings .
57001024	So do Mark , Aristarchus , Demas , and Luke , my co-workers .
57001025	May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit .
58001001	Long ago God spoke many times and in many ways to our ancestors through the prophets .
58001002	And now in these final days , he has spoken to us through his Son . God promised everything to the Son as an inheritance , and through the Son he created the universe .
58001003	The Son radiates God’s own glory and expresses the very character of God , and he sustains everything by the mighty power of his command . When he had cleansed us from our sins , he sat down in the place of honor at the right hand of the majestic God in heaven .
58001004	This shows that the Son is far greater than the angels , just as the name God gave him is greater than their names .
58001005	For God never said to any angel what he said to Jesus : “ You are my Son . Today I have become your Father . ” God also said , “ I will be his Father , and he will be my Son . ”
58001006	And when he brought his supreme Son into the world , God said , “ Let all of God’s angels worship him . ”
58001007	Regarding the angels , he says , “ He sends his angels like the winds , his servants like flames of fire . ”
58001008	But to the Son he says , “ Your throne , O God , endures forever and ever . You rule with a scepter of justice .
58001009	You love justice and hate evil . Therefore , O God , your God has anointed you , pouring out the oil of joy on you more than on anyone else . ”
58001010	He also says to the Son , “ In the beginning , Lord , you laid the foundation of the earth and made the heavens with your hands .
58001011	They will perish , but you remain forever . They will wear out like old clothing .
58001012	You will fold them up like a cloak and discard them like old clothing . But you are always the same ; you will live forever . ”
58001013	And God never said to any of the angels , “ Sit in the place of honor at my right hand until I humble your enemies , making them a footstool under your feet . ”
58001014	Therefore , angels are only servantsspirits sent to care for people who will inherit salvation .
58002001	So we must listen very carefully to the truth we have heard , or we may drift away from it .
58002002	For the message God delivered through angels has always stood firm , and every violation of the law and every act of disobedience was punished .
58002003	So what makes us think we can escape if we ignore this great salvation that was first announced by the Lord Jesus himself and then delivered to us by those who heard him speak ?
58002004	And God confirmed the message by giving signs and wonders and various miracles and gifts of the Holy Spirit whenever he chose .
58002005	And furthermore , it is not angels who will control the future world we are talking about .
58002006	For in one place the Scriptures say , “ What are mere mortals that you should think about them , or a son of man that you should care for him ?
58002007	Yet you made them only a little lower than the angels and crowned them with glory and honor .
58002008	You gave them authority over all things . ” Now when it says “ all things , ” it means nothing is left out . But we have not yet seen all things put under their authority .
58002009	What we do see is Jesus , who was given a position “ a little lower than the angels ” ; and because he suffered death for us , he is now “ crowned with glory and honor . ” Yes , by God’s grace , Jesus tasted death for everyone .
58002010	God , for whom and through whom everything was made , chose to bring many children into glory . And it was only right that he should make Jesus , through his suffering , a perfect leader , fit to bring them into their salvation .
58002011	So now Jesus and the ones he makes holy have the same Father . That is why Jesus is not ashamed to call them his brothers and sisters .
58002012	For he said to God , “ I will proclaim your name to my brothers and sisters . I will praise you among your assembled people . ”
58002013	He also said , “ I will put my trust in him , ” that is , “ I and the children God has given me . ”
58002014	Because God’s children are human beingsmade of flesh and bloodthe Son also became flesh and blood . For only as a human being could he die , and only by dying could he break the power of the devil , who had the power of death .
58002015	Only in this way could he set free all who have lived their lives as slaves to the fear of dying .
58002016	We also know that the Son did not come to help angels ; he came to help the descendants of Abraham .
58002017	Therefore , it was necessary for him to be made in every respect like us , his brothers and sisters , so that he could be our merciful and faithful High Priest before God . Then he could offer a sacrifice that would take away the sins of the people .
58002018	Since he himself has gone through suffering and testing , he is able to help us when we are being tested .
58003001	And so , dear brothers and sisters who belong to God and are partners with those called to heaven , think carefully about this Jesus whom we declare to be God’s messenger and High Priest .
58003002	For he was faithful to God , who appointed him , just as Moses served faithfully when he was entrusted with God’s entire house .
58003003	But Jesus deserves far more glory than Moses , just as a person who builds a house deserves more praise than the house itself .
58003004	For every house has a builder , but the one who built everything is God .
58003005	Moses was certainly faithful in God’s house as a servant . His work was an illustration of the truths God would reveal later .
58003006	But Christ , as the Son , is in charge of God’s entire house . And we are God’s house , if we keep our courage and remain confident in our hope in Christ .
58003007	That is why the Holy Spirit says , “ Today when you hear his voice ,
58003008	don’t harden your hearts as Israel did when they rebelled , when they tested me in the wilderness .
58003009	There your ancestors tested and tried my patience , even though they saw my miracles for forty years .
58003010	So I was angry with them , and I said , ‘ Their hearts always turn away from me . They refuse to do what I tell them . ’
58003011	So in my anger I took an oath : ‘ They will never enter my place of rest . ’ ”
58003012	Be careful then , dear brothers and sisters . Make sure that your own hearts are not evil and unbelieving , turning you away from the living God .
58003013	You must warn each other every day , while it is still “ today , ” so that none of you will be deceived by sin and hardened against God .
58003014	For if we are faithful to the end , trusting God just as firmly as when we first believed , we will share in all that belongs to Christ .
58003015	Remember what it says : “ Today when you hear his voice , don’t harden your hearts as Israel did when they rebelled . ”
58003016	And who was it who rebelled against God , even though they heard his voice ? Wasn’t it the people Moses led out of Egypt ?
58003017	And who made God angry for forty years ? Wasn’t it the people who sinned , whose corpses lay in the wilderness ?
58003018	And to whom was God speaking when he took an oath that they would never enter his rest ? Wasn’t it the people who disobeyed him ?
58003019	So we see that because of their unbelief they were not able to enter his rest .
58004001	God’s promise of entering his rest still stands , so we ought to tremble with fear that some of you might fail to experience it .
58004002	For this good newsthat God has prepared this resthas been announced to us just as it was to them . But it did them no good because they didn’t share the faith of those who listened to God .
58004003	For only we who believe can enter his rest . As for the others , God said , “ In my anger I took an oath : ‘ They will never enter my place of rest , ’ ” even though this rest has been ready since he made the world .
58004004	We know it is ready because of the place in the Scriptures where it mentions the seventh day : “ On the seventh day God rested from all his work . ”
58004005	But in the other passage God said , “ They will never enter my place of rest . ”
58004006	So God’s rest is there for people to enter , but those who first heard this good news failed to enter because they disobeyed God .
58004007	So God set another time for entering his rest , and that time is today . God announced this through David much later in the words already quoted : “ Today when you hear his voice , don’t harden your hearts . ”
58004008	Now if Joshua had succeeded in giving them this rest , God would not have spoken about another day of rest still to come .
58004009	So there is a special rest still waiting for the people of God .
58004010	For all who have entered into God’s rest have rested from their labors , just as God did after creating the world .
58004011	So let us do our best to enter that rest . But if we disobey God , as the people of Israel did , we will fall .
58004012	For the word of God is alive and powerful . It is sharper than the sharpest two-edged sword , cutting between soul and spirit , between joint and marrow . It exposes our innermost thoughts and desires .
58004013	Nothing in all creation is hidden from God . Everything is naked and exposed before his eyes , and he is the one to whom we are accountable .
58004014	So then , since we have a great High Priest who has entered heaven , Jesus the Son of God , let us hold firmly to what we believe .
58004015	This High Priest of ours understands our weaknesses , for he faced all of the same testings we do , yet he did not sin .
58004016	So let us come boldly to the throne of our gracious God . There we will receive his mercy , and we will find grace to help us when we need it most .
58005001	Every high priest is a man chosen to represent other people in their dealings with God . He presents their gifts to God and offers sacrifices for their sins .
58005002	And he is able to deal gently with ignorant and wayward people because he himself is subject to the same weaknesses .
58005003	That is why he must offer sacrifices for his own sins as well as theirs .
58005004	And no one can become a high priest simply because he wants such an honor . He must be called by God for this work , just as Aaron was .
58005005	That is why Christ did not honor himself by assuming he could become High Priest . No , he was chosen by God , who said to him , “ You are my Son . Today I have become your Father . ”
58005006	And in another passage God said to him , “ You are a priest forever in the order of Melchizedek . ”
58005007	While Jesus was here on earth , he offered prayers and pleadings , with a loud cry and tears , to the one who could rescue him from death . And God heard his prayers because of his deep reverence for God .
58005008	Even though Jesus was God’s Son , he learned obedience from the things he suffered .
58005009	In this way , God qualified him as a perfect High Priest , and he became the source of eternal salvation for all those who obey him .
58005010	And God designated him to be a High Priest in the order of Melchizedek .
58005011	There is much more we would like to say about this , but it is difficult to explain , especially since you are spiritually dull and don’t seem to listen .
58005012	You have been believers so long now that you ought to be teaching others . Instead , you need someone to teach you again the basic things about God’s word . You are like babies who need milk and cannot eat solid food .
58005013	For someone who lives on milk is still an infant and doesn’t know how to do what is right .
58005014	Solid food is for those who are mature , who through training have the skill to recognize the difference between right and wrong .
58006001	So let us stop going over the basic teachings about Christ again and again . Let us go on instead and become mature in our understanding . Surely we don’t need to start again with the fundamental importance of repenting from evil deeds and placing our faith in God .
58006002	You don’t need further instruction about baptisms , the laying on of hands , the resurrection of the dead , and eternal judgment .
58006003	And so , God willing , we will move forward to further understanding .
58006004	For it is impossible to bring back to repentance those who were once enlightenedthose who have experienced the good things of heaven and shared in the Holy Spirit ,
58006005	who have tasted the goodness of the word of God and the power of the age to come
58006006	and who then turn away from God . It is impossible to bring such people back to repentance ; by rejecting the Son of God , they themselves are nailing him to the cross once again and holding him up to public shame .
58006007	When the ground soaks up the falling rain and bears a good crop for the farmer , it has God’s blessing .
58006008	But if a field bears thorns and thistles , it is useless . The farmer will soon condemn that field and burn it .
58006009	Dear friends , even though we are talking this way , we really don’t believe it applies to you . We are confident that you are meant for better things , things that come with salvation .
58006010	For God is not unjust . He will not forget how hard you have worked for him and how you have shown your love to him by caring for other believers , as you still do .
58006011	Our great desire is that you will keep on loving others as long as life lasts , in order to make certain that what you hope for will come true .
58006012	Then you will not become spiritually dull and indifferent . Instead , you will follow the example of those who are going to inherit God’s promises because of their faith and endurance .
58006013	For example , there was God’s promise to Abraham . Since there was no one greater to swear by , God took an oath in his own name , saying :
58006014	“ I will certainly bless you , and I will multiply your descendants beyond number . ”
58006015	Then Abraham waited patiently , and he received what God had promised .
58006016	Now when people take an oath , they call on someone greater than themselves to hold them to it . And without any question that oath is binding .
58006017	God also bound himself with an oath , so that those who received the promise could be perfectly sure that he would never change his mind .
58006018	So God has given both his promise and his oath . These two things are unchangeable because it is impossible for God to lie . Therefore , we who have fled to him for refuge can have great confidence as we hold to the hope that lies before us .
58006019	This hope is a strong and trustworthy anchor for our souls . It leads us through the curtain into God’s inner sanctuary .
58006020	Jesus has already gone in there for us . He has become our eternal High Priest in the order of Melchizedek .
58007001	This Melchizedek was king of the city of Salem and also a priest of God Most High . When Abraham was returning home after winning a great battle against the kings , Melchizedek met him and blessed him .
58007002	Then Abraham took a tenth of all he had captured in battle and gave it to Melchizedek . The name Melchizedek means “ king of justice , ” and king of Salem means “ king of peace . ”
58007003	There is no record of his father or mother or any of his ancestorsno beginning or end to his life . He remains a priest forever , resembling the Son of God .
58007004	Consider then how great this Melchizedek was . Even Abraham , the great patriarch of Israel , recognized this by giving him a tenth of what he had taken in battle .
58007005	Now the law of Moses required that the priests , who are descendants of Levi , must collect a tithe from the rest of the people of Israel , who are also descendants of Abraham .
58007006	But Melchizedek , who was not a descendant of Levi , collected a tenth from Abraham . And Melchizedek placed a blessing upon Abraham , the one who had already received the promises of God .
58007007	And without question , the person who has the power to give a blessing is greater than the one who is blessed .
58007008	The priests who collect tithes are men who die , so Melchizedek is greater than they are , because we are told that he lives on .
58007009	In addition , we might even say that these Levitesthe ones who collect the tithepaid a tithe to Melchizedek when their ancestor Abraham paid a tithe to him .
58007010	For although Levi wasn’t born yet , the seed from which he came was in Abraham’s body when Melchizedek collected the tithe from him .
58007011	So if the priesthood of Levi , on which the law was based , could have achieved the perfection God intended , why did God need to establish a different priesthood , with a priest in the order of Melchizedek instead of the order of Levi and Aaron ?
58007012	And if the priesthood is changed , the law must also be changed to permit it .
58007013	For the priest we are talking about belongs to a different tribe , whose members have never served at the altar as priests .
58007014	What I mean is , our Lord came from the tribe of Judah , and Moses never mentioned priests coming from that tribe .
58007015	This change has been made very clear since a different priest , who is like Melchizedek , has appeared .
58007016	Jesus became a priest , not by meeting the physical requirement of belonging to the tribe of Levi , but by the power of a life that cannot be destroyed .
58007017	And the psalmist pointed this out when he prophesied , “ You are a priest forever in the order of Melchizedek . ”
58007018	Yes , the old requirement about the priesthood was set aside because it was weak and useless .
58007019	For the law never made anything perfect . But now we have confidence in a better hope , through which we draw near to God .
58007020	This new system was established with a solemn oath . Aaron’s descendants became priests without such an oath ,
58007021	but there was an oath regarding Jesus . For God said to him , “ The L ord has taken an oath and will not break his vow : ‘ You are a priest forever . ’ ”
58007022	Because of this oath , Jesus is the one who guarantees this better covenant with God .
58007023	There were many priests under the old system , for death prevented them from remaining in office .
58007024	But because Jesus lives forever , his priesthood lasts forever .
58007025	Therefore he is able , once and forever , to save those who come to God through him . He lives forever to intercede with God on their behalf .
58007026	He is the kind of high priest we need because he is holy and blameless , unstained by sin . He has been set apart from sinners and has been given the highest place of honor in heaven .
58007027	Unlike those other high priests , he does not need to offer sacrifices every day . They did this for their own sins first and then for the sins of the people . But Jesus did this once for all when he offered himself as the sacrifice for the people’s sins .
58007028	The law appointed high priests who were limited by human weakness . But after the law was given , God appointed his Son with an oath , and his Son has been made the perfect High Priest forever .
58008001	Here is the main point : We have a High Priest who sat down in the place of honor beside the throne of the majestic God in heaven .
58008002	There he ministers in the heavenly Tabernacle , the true place of worship that was built by the Lord and not by human hands .
58008003	And since every high priest is required to offer gifts and sacrifices , our High Priest must make an offering , too .
58008004	If he were here on earth , he would not even be a priest , since there already are priests who offer the gifts required by the law .
58008005	They serve in a system of worship that is only a copy , a shadow of the real one in heaven . For when Moses was getting ready to build the Tabernacle , God gave him this warning : “ Be sure that you make everything according to the pattern I have shown you here on the mountain . ”
58008006	But now Jesus , our High Priest , has been given a ministry that is far superior to the old priesthood , for he is the one who mediates for us a far better covenant with God , based on better promises .
58008007	If the first covenant had been faultless , there would have been no need for a second covenant to replace it .
58008008	But when God found fault with the people , he said : “ The day is coming , says the L ord , when I will make a new covenant with the people of Israel and Judah .
58008009	This covenant will not be like the one I made with their ancestors when I took them by the hand and led them out of the land of Egypt . They did not remain faithful to my covenant , so I turned my back on them , says the L ord .
58008010	But this is the new covenant I will make with the people of Israel on that day , says the L ord : I will put my laws in their minds , and I will write them on their hearts . I will be their God , and they will be my people .
58008011	And they will not need to teach their neighbors , nor will they need to teach their relatives , saying , ‘ You should know the L ord . ’ For everyone , from the least to the greatest , will know me already .
58008012	And I will forgive their wickedness , and I will never again remember their sins . ”
58008013	When God speaks of a “ new ” covenant , it means he has made the first one obsolete . It is now out of date and will soon disappear .
58009001	That first covenant between God and Israel had regulations for worship and a place of worship here on earth .
58009002	There were two rooms in that Tabernacle . In the first room were a lampstand , a table , and sacred loaves of bread on the table . This room was called the Holy Place .
58009003	Then there was a curtain , and behind the curtain was the second room called the Most Holy Place .
58009004	In that room were a gold incense altar and a wooden chest called the Ark of the Covenant , which was covered with gold on all sides . Inside the Ark were a gold jar containing manna , Aaron’s staff that sprouted leaves , and the stone tablets of the covenant .
58009005	Above the Ark were the cherubim of divine glory , whose wings stretched out over the Ark’s cover , the place of atonement . But we cannot explain these things in detail now .
58009006	When these things were all in place , the priests regularly entered the first room as they performed their religious duties .
58009007	But only the high priest ever entered the Most Holy Place , and only once a year . And he always offered blood for his own sins and for the sins the people had committed in ignorance .
58009008	By these regulations the Holy Spirit revealed that the entrance to the Most Holy Place was not freely open as long as the Tabernacle and the system it represented were still in use .
58009009	This is an illustration pointing to the present time . For the gifts and sacrifices that the priests offer are not able to cleanse the consciences of the people who bring them .
58009010	For that old system deals only with food and drink and various cleansing ceremoniesphysical regulations that were in effect only until a better system could be established .
58009011	So Christ has now become the High Priest over all the good things that have come . He has entered that greater , more perfect Tabernacle in heaven , which was not made by human hands and is not part of this created world .
58009012	With his own bloodnot the blood of goats and calveshe entered the Most Holy Place once for all time and secured our redemption forever .
58009013	Under the old system , the blood of goats and bulls and the ashes of a young cow could cleanse people’s bodies from ceremonial impurity .
58009014	Just think how much more the blood of Christ will purify our consciences from sinful deeds so that we can worship the living God . For by the power of the eternal Spirit , Christ offered himself to God as a perfect sacrifice for our sins .
58009015	That is why he is the one who mediates a new covenant between God and people , so that all who are called can receive the eternal inheritance God has promised them . For Christ died to set them free from the penalty of the sins they had committed under that first covenant .
58009016	Now when someone leaves a will , it is necessary to prove that the person who made it is dead .
58009017	The will goes into effect only after the person’s death . While the person who made it is still alive , the will cannot be put into effect .
58009018	That is why even the first covenant was put into effect with the blood of an animal .
58009019	For after Moses had read each of God’s commandments to all the people , he took the blood of calves and goats , along with water , and sprinkled both the book of God’s law and all the people , using hyssop branches and scarlet wool .
58009020	Then he said , “ This blood confirms the covenant God has made with you . ”
58009021	And in the same way , he sprinkled blood on the Tabernacle and on everything used for worship .
58009022	In fact , according to the law of Moses , nearly everything was purified with blood . For without the shedding of blood , there is no forgiveness .
58009023	That is why the Tabernacle and everything in it , which were copies of things in heaven , had to be purified by the blood of animals . But the real things in heaven had to be purified with far better sacrifices than the blood of animals .
58009024	For Christ did not enter into a holy place made with human hands , which was only a copy of the true one in heaven . He entered into heaven itself to appear now before God on our behalf .
58009025	And he did not enter heaven to offer himself again and again , like the high priest here on earth who enters the Most Holy Place year after year with the blood of an animal .
58009026	If that had been necessary , Christ would have had to die again and again , ever since the world began . But now , once for all time , he has appeared at the end of the age to remove sin by his own death as a sacrifice .
58009027	And just as each person is destined to die once and after that comes judgment ,
58009028	so also Christ died once for all time as a sacrifice to take away the sins of many people . He will come again , not to deal with our sins , but to bring salvation to all who are eagerly waiting for him .
58010001	The old system under the law of Moses was only a shadow , a dim preview of the good things to come , not the good things themselves . The sacrifices under that system were repeated again and again , year after year , but they were never able to provide perfect cleansing for those who came to worship .
58010002	If they could have provided perfect cleansing , the sacrifices would have stopped , for the worshipers would have been purified once for all time , and their feelings of guilt would have disappeared .
58010003	But instead , those sacrifices actually reminded them of their sins year after year .
58010004	For it is not possible for the blood of bulls and goats to take away sins .
58010005	That is why , when Christ came into the world , he said to God , “ You did not want animal sacrifices or sin offerings . But you have given me a body to offer .
58010006	You were not pleased with burnt offerings or other offerings for sin .
58010007	Then I said , ‘ Look , I have come to do your will , O God as is written about me in the Scriptures . ’ ”
58010008	First , Christ said , “ You did not want animal sacrifices or sin offerings or burnt offerings or other offerings for sin , nor were you pleased with them ” ( though they are required by the law of Moses ) .
58010009	Then he said , “ Look , I have come to do your will . ” He cancels the first covenant in order to put the second into effect .
58010010	For God’s will was for us to be made holy by the sacrifice of the body of Jesus Christ , once for all time .
58010011	Under the old covenant , the priest stands and ministers before the altar day after day , offering the same sacrifices again and again , which can never take away sins .
58010012	But our High Priest offered himself to God as a single sacrifice for sins , good for all time . Then he sat down in the place of honor at God’s right hand .
58010013	There he waits until his enemies are humbled and made a footstool under his feet .
58010014	For by that one offering he forever made perfect those who are being made holy .
58010015	And the Holy Spirit also testifies that this is so . For he says ,
58010016	“ This is the new covenant I will make with my people on that day , says the L ord : I will put my laws in their hearts , and I will write them on their minds . ”
58010017	Then he says , “ I will never again remember their sins and lawless deeds . ”
58010018	And when sins have been forgiven , there is no need to offer any more sacrifices .
58010019	And so , dear brothers and sisters , we can boldly enter heaven’s Most Holy Place because of the blood of Jesus .
58010020	By his death , Jesus opened a new and life-giving way through the curtain into the Most Holy Place .
58010021	And since we have a great High Priest who rules over God’s house ,
58010022	let us go right into the presence of God with sincere hearts fully trusting him . For our guilty consciences have been sprinkled with Christ’s blood to make us clean , and our bodies have been washed with pure water .
58010023	Let us hold tightly without wavering to the hope we affirm , for God can be trusted to keep his promise .
58010024	Let us think of ways to motivate one another to acts of love and good works .
58010025	And let us not neglect our meeting together , as some people do , but encourage one another , especially now that the day of his return is drawing near .
58010026	Dear friends , if we deliberately continue sinning after we have received knowledge of the truth , there is no longer any sacrifice that will cover these sins .
58010027	There is only the terrible expectation of God’s judgment and the raging fire that will consume his enemies .
58010028	For anyone who refused to obey the law of Moses was put to death without mercy on the testimony of two or three witnesses .
58010029	Just think how much worse the punishment will be for those who have trampled on the Son of God , and have treated the blood of the covenant , which made us holy , as if it were common and unholy , and have insulted and disdained the Holy Spirit who brings God’s mercy to us .
58010030	For we know the one who said , “ I will take revenge . I will pay them back . ” He also said , “ The L ord will judge his own people . ”
58010031	It is a terrible thing to fall into the hands of the living God .
58010032	Think back on those early days when you first learned about Christ . Remember how you remained faithful even though it meant terrible suffering .
58010033	Sometimes you were exposed to public ridicule and were beaten , and sometimes you helped others who were suffering the same things .
58010034	You suffered along with those who were thrown into jail , and when all you owned was taken from you , you accepted it with joy . You knew there were better things waiting for you that will last forever .
58010035	So do not throw away this confident trust in the Lord . Remember the great reward it brings you !
58010036	Patient endurance is what you need now , so that you will continue to do God’s will . Then you will receive all that he has promised .
58010037	“ For in just a little while , the Coming One will come and not delay .
58010038	And my righteous ones will live by faith . But I will take no pleasure in anyone who turns away . ”
58010039	But we are not like those who turn away from God to their own destruction . We are the faithful ones , whose souls will be saved .
58011001	Faith is the confidence that what we hope for will actually happen ; it gives us assurance about things we cannot see .
58011002	Through their faith , the people in days of old earned a good reputation .
58011003	By faith we understand that the entire universe was formed at God’s command , that what we now see did not come from anything that can be seen .
58011004	It was by faith that Abel brought a more acceptable offering to God than Cain did . Abel’s offering gave evidence that he was a righteous man , and God showed his approval of his gifts . Although Abel is long dead , he still speaks to us by his example of faith .
58011005	It was by faith that Enoch was taken up to heaven without dying “ he disappeared , because God took him . ” For before he was taken up , he was known as a person who pleased God .
58011006	And it is impossible to please God without faith . Anyone who wants to come to him must believe that God exists and that he rewards those who sincerely seek him .
58011007	It was by faith that Noah built a large boat to save his family from the flood . He obeyed God , who warned him about things that had never happened before . By his faith Noah condemned the rest of the world , and he received the righteousness that comes by faith .
58011008	It was by faith that Abraham obeyed when God called him to leave home and go to another land that God would give him as his inheritance . He went without knowing where he was going .
58011009	And even when he reached the land God promised him , he lived there by faithfor he was like a foreigner , living in tents . And so did Isaac and Jacob , who inherited the same promise .
58011010	Abraham was confidently looking forward to a city with eternal foundations , a city designed and built by God .
58011011	It was by faith that even Sarah was able to have a child , though she was barren and was too old . She believed that God would keep his promise .
58011012	And so a whole nation came from this one man who was as good as deada nation with so many people that , like the stars in the sky and the sand on the seashore , there is no way to count them .
58011013	All these people died still believing what God had promised them . They did not receive what was promised , but they saw it all from a distance and welcomed it . They agreed that they were foreigners and nomads here on earth .
58011014	Obviously people who say such things are looking forward to a country they can call their own .
58011015	If they had longed for the country they came from , they could have gone back .
58011016	But they were looking for a better place , a heavenly homeland . That is why God is not ashamed to be called their God , for he has prepared a city for them .
58011017	It was by faith that Abraham offered Isaac as a sacrifice when God was testing him . Abraham , who had received God’s promises , was ready to sacrifice his only son , Isaac ,
58011018	even though God had told him , “ Isaac is the son through whom your descendants will be counted . ”
58011019	Abraham reasoned that if Isaac died , God was able to bring him back to life again . And in a sense , Abraham did receive his son back from the dead .
58011020	It was by faith that Isaac promised blessings for the future to his sons , Jacob and Esau .
58011021	It was by faith that Jacob , when he was old and dying , blessed each of Joseph’s sons and bowed in worship as he leaned on his staff .
58011022	It was by faith that Joseph , when he was about to die , said confidently that the people of Israel would leave Egypt . He even commanded them to take his bones with them when they left .
58011023	It was by faith that Moses’ parents hid him for three months when he was born . They saw that God had given them an unusual child , and they were not afraid to disobey the king’s command .
58011024	It was by faith that Moses , when he grew up , refused to be called the son of Pharaoh’s daughter .
58011025	He chose to share the oppression of God’s people instead of enjoying the fleeting pleasures of sin .
58011026	He thought it was better to suffer for the sake of Christ than to own the treasures of Egypt , for he was looking ahead to his great reward .
58011027	It was by faith that Moses left the land of Egypt , not fearing the king’s anger . He kept right on going because he kept his eyes on the one who is invisible .
58011028	It was by faith that Moses commanded the people of Israel to keep the Passover and to sprinkle blood on the doorposts so that the angel of death would not kill their firstborn sons .
58011029	It was by faith that the people of Israel went right through the Red Sea as though they were on dry ground . But when the Egyptians tried to follow , they were all drowned .
58011030	It was by faith that the people of Israel marched around Jericho for seven days , and the walls came crashing down .
58011031	It was by faith that Rahab the prostitute was not destroyed with the people in her city who refused to obey God . For she had given a friendly welcome to the spies .
58011032	How much more do I need to say ? It would take too long to recount the stories of the faith of Gideon , Barak , Samson , Jephthah , David , Samuel , and all the prophets .
58011033	By faith these people overthrew kingdoms , ruled with justice , and received what God had promised them . They shut the mouths of lions ,
58011034	quenched the flames of fire , and escaped death by the edge of the sword . Their weakness was turned to strength . They became strong in battle and put whole armies to flight .
58011035	Women received their loved ones back again from death . But others were tortured , refusing to turn from God in order to be set free . They placed their hope in a better life after the resurrection .
58011036	Some were jeered at , and their backs were cut open with whips . Others were chained in prisons .
58011037	Some died by stoning , some were sawed in half , and others were killed with the sword . Some went about wearing skins of sheep and goats , destitute and oppressed and mistreated .
58011038	They were too good for this world , wandering over deserts and mountains , hiding in caves and holes in the ground .
58011039	All these people earned a good reputation because of their faith , yet none of them received all that God had promised .
58011040	For God had something better in mind for us , so that they would not reach perfection without us .
58012001	Therefore , since we are surrounded by such a huge crowd of witnesses to the life of faith , let us strip off every weight that slows us down , especially the sin that so easily trips us up . And let us run with endurance the race God has set before us .
58012002	We do this by keeping our eyes on Jesus , the champion who initiates and perfects our faith . Because of the joy awaiting him , he endured the cross , disregarding its shame . Now he is seated in the place of honor beside God’s throne .
58012003	Think of all the hostility he endured from sinful people ; then you won’t become weary and give up .
58012004	After all , you have not yet given your lives in your struggle against sin .
58012005	And have you forgotten the encouraging words God spoke to you as his children ? He said , “ My child , don’t make light of the Lord’s discipline , and don’t give up when he corrects you .
58012006	For the L ord disciplines those he loves , and he punishes each one he accepts as his child . ”
58012007	As you endure this divine discipline , remember that God is treating you as his own children . Who ever heard of a child who is never disciplined by its father ?
58012008	If God doesn’t discipline you as he does all of his children , it means that you are illegitimate and are not really his children at all .
58012009	Since we respected our earthly fathers who disciplined us , shouldn’t we submit even more to the discipline of the Father of our spirits , and live forever ?
58012010	For our earthly fathers disciplined us for a few years , doing the best they knew how . But God’s discipline is always good for us , so that we might share in his holiness .
58012011	No discipline is enjoyable while it is happeningit’s painful ! But afterward there will be a peaceful harvest of right living for those who are trained in this way .
58012012	So take a new grip with your tired hands and strengthen your weak knees .
58012013	Mark out a straight path for your feet so that those who are weak and lame will not fall but become strong .
58012014	Work at living in peace with everyone , and work at living a holy life , for those who are not holy will not see the Lord .
58012015	Look after each other so that none of you fails to receive the grace of God . Watch out that no poisonous root of bitterness grows up to trouble you , corrupting many .
58012016	Make sure that no one is immoral or godless like Esau , who traded his birthright as the firstborn son for a single meal .
58012017	You know that afterward , when he wanted his father’s blessing , he was rejected . It was too late for repentance , even though he begged with bitter tears .
58012018	You have not come to a physical mountain , to a place of flaming fire , darkness , gloom , and whirlwind , as the Israelites did at Mount Sinai .
58012019	For they heard an awesome trumpet blast and a voice so terrible that they begged God to stop speaking .
58012020	They staggered back under God’s command : “ If even an animal touches the mountain , it must be stoned to death . ”
58012021	Moses himself was so frightened at the sight that he said , “ I am terrified and trembling . ”
58012022	No , you have come to Mount Zion , to the city of the living God , the heavenly Jerusalem , and to countless thousands of angels in a joyful gathering .
58012023	You have come to the assembly of God’s firstborn children , whose names are written in heaven . You have come to God himself , who is the judge over all things . You have come to the spirits of the righteous ones in heaven who have now been made perfect .
58012024	You have come to Jesus , the one who mediates the new covenant between God and people , and to the sprinkled blood , which speaks of forgiveness instead of crying out for vengeance like the blood of Abel .
58012025	Be careful that you do not refuse to listen to the One who is speaking . For if the people of Israel did not escape when they refused to listen to Moses , the earthly messenger , we will certainly not escape if we reject the One who speaks to us from heaven !
58012026	When God spoke from Mount Sinai his voice shook the earth , but now he makes another promise : “ Once again I will shake not only the earth but the heavens also . ”
58012027	This means that all of creation will be shaken and removed , so that only unshakable things will remain .
58012028	Since we are receiving a Kingdom that is unshakable , let us be thankful and please God by worshiping him with holy fear and awe .
58012029	For our God is a devouring fire .
58013001	Keep on loving each other as brothers and sisters .
58013002	Don’t forget to show hospitality to strangers , for some who have done this have entertained angels without realizing it !
58013003	Remember those in prison , as if you were there yourself . Remember also those being mistreated , as if you felt their pain in your own bodies .
58013004	Give honor to marriage , and remain faithful to one another in marriage . God will surely judge people who are immoral and those who commit adultery .
58013005	Don’t love money ; be satisfied with what you have . For God has said , “ I will never fail you . I will never abandon you . ”
58013006	So we can say with confidence , “ The L ord is my helper , so I will have no fear . What can mere people do to me ? ”
58013007	Remember your leaders who taught you the word of God . Think of all the good that has come from their lives , and follow the example of their faith .
58013008	Jesus Christ is the same yesterday , today , and forever .
58013009	So do not be attracted by strange , new ideas . Your strength comes from God’s grace , not from rules about food , which don’t help those who follow them .
58013010	We have an altar from which the priests in the Tabernacle have no right to eat .
58013011	Under the old system , the high priest brought the blood of animals into the Holy Place as a sacrifice for sin , and the bodies of the animals were burned outside the camp .
58013012	So also Jesus suffered and died outside the city gates to make his people holy by means of his own blood .
58013013	So let us go out to him , outside the camp , and bear the disgrace he bore .
58013014	For this world is not our permanent home ; we are looking forward to a home yet to come .
58013015	Therefore , let us offer through Jesus a continual sacrifice of praise to God , proclaiming our allegiance to his name .
58013016	And don’t forget to do good and to share with those in need . These are the sacrifices that please God .
58013017	Obey your spiritual leaders , and do what they say . Their work is to watch over your souls , and they are accountable to God . Give them reason to do this with joy and not with sorrow . That would certainly not be for your benefit .
58013018	Pray for us , for our conscience is clear and we want to live honorably in everything we do .
58013019	And especially pray that I will be able to come back to you soon .
58013020	Now may the God of peace who brought up from the dead our Lord Jesus , the great Shepherd of the sheep , and ratified an eternal covenant with his blood
58013021	may he equip you with all you need for doing his will . May he produce in you , through the power of Jesus Christ , every good thing that is pleasing to him . All glory to him forever and ever ! Amen .
58013022	I urge you , dear brothers and sisters , to pay attention to what I have written in this brief exhortation .
58013023	I want you to know that our brother Timothy has been released from jail . If he comes here soon , I will bring him with me to see you .
58013024	Greet all your leaders and all the believers there . The believers from Italy send you their greetings .
58013025	May God’s grace be with you all .
59001001	This letter is from James , a slave of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ . I am writing to the “ twelve tribes ” Jewish believers scattered abroad . Greetings !
59001002	Dear brothers and sisters , when troubles come your way , consider it an opportunity for great joy .
59001003	For you know that when your faith is tested , your endurance has a chance to grow .
59001004	So let it grow , for when your endurance is fully developed , you will be perfect and complete , needing nothing .
59001005	If you need wisdom , ask our generous God , and he will give it to you . He will not rebuke you for asking .
59001006	But when you ask him , be sure that your faith is in God alone . Do not waver , for a person with divided loyalty is as unsettled as a wave of the sea that is blown and tossed by the wind .
59001007	Such people should not expect to receive anything from the Lord .
59001008	Their loyalty is divided between God and the world , and they are unstable in everything they do .
59001009	Believers who are poor have something to boast about , for God has honored them .
59001010	And those who are rich should boast that God has humbled them . They will fade away like a little flower in the field .
59001011	The hot sun rises and the grass withers ; the little flower droops and falls , and its beauty fades away . In the same way , the rich will fade away with all of their achievements .
59001012	God blesses those who patiently endure testing and temptation . Afterward they will receive the crown of life that God has promised to those who love him .
59001013	And remember , when you are being tempted , do not say , “ God is tempting me . ” God is never tempted to do wrong , and he never tempts anyone else .
59001014	Temptation comes from our own desires , which entice us and drag us away .
59001015	These desires give birth to sinful actions . And when sin is allowed to grow , it gives birth to death .
59001016	So don’t be misled , my dear brothers and sisters .
59001017	Whatever is good and perfect comes down to us from God our Father , who created all the lights in the heavens . He never changes or casts a shifting shadow .
59001018	He chose to give birth to us by giving us his true word . And we , out of all creation , became his prized possession .
59001019	Understand this , my dear brothers and sisters : You must all be quick to listen , slow to speak , and slow to get angry .
59001020	Human anger does not produce the righteousness God desires .
59001021	So get rid of all the filth and evil in your lives , and humbly accept the word God has planted in your hearts , for it has the power to save your souls .
59001022	But don’t just listen to God’s word . You must do what it says . Otherwise , you are only fooling yourselves .
59001023	For if you listen to the word and don’t obey , it is like glancing at your face in a mirror .
59001024	You see yourself , walk away , and forget what you look like .
59001025	But if you look carefully into the perfect law that sets you free , and if you do what it says and don’t forget what you heard , then God will bless you for doing it .
59001026	If you claim to be religious but don’t control your tongue , you are fooling yourself , and your religion is worthless .
59001027	Pure and genuine religion in the sight of God the Father means caring for orphans and widows in their distress and refusing to let the world corrupt you .
59002001	My dear brothers and sisters , how can you claim to have faith in our glorious Lord Jesus Christ if you favor some people over others ?
59002002	For example , suppose someone comes into your meeting dressed in fancy clothes and expensive jewelry , and another comes in who is poor and dressed in dirty clothes .
59002003	If you give special attention and a good seat to the rich person , but you say to the poor one , “ You can stand over there , or else sit on the floor ” well ,
59002004	doesn’t this discrimination show that your judgments are guided by evil motives ?
59002005	Listen to me , dear brothers and sisters . Hasn’t God chosen the poor in this world to be rich in faith ? Aren’t they the ones who will inherit the Kingdom he promised to those who love him ?
59002006	But you dishonor the poor ! Isn’t it the rich who oppress you and drag you into court ?
59002007	Aren’t they the ones who slander Jesus Christ , whose noble name you bear ?
59002008	Yes indeed , it is good when you obey the royal law as found in the Scriptures : “ Love your neighbor as yourself . ”
59002009	But if you favor some people over others , you are committing a sin . You are guilty of breaking the law .
59002010	For the person who keeps all of the laws except one is as guilty as a person who has broken all of God’s laws .
59002011	For the same God who said , “ You must not commit adultery , ” also said , “ You must not murder . ” So if you murder someone but do not commit adultery , you have still broken the law .
59002012	So whatever you say or whatever you do , remember that you will be judged by the law that sets you free .
59002013	There will be no mercy for those who have not shown mercy to others . But if you have been merciful , God will be merciful when he judges you .
59002014	What good is it , dear brothers and sisters , if you say you have faith but don’t show it by your actions ? Can that kind of faith save anyone ?
59002015	Suppose you see a brother or sister who has no food or clothing ,
59002016	and you say , “ Good-bye and have a good day ; stay warm and eat well ” but then you don’t give that person any food or clothing . What good does that do ?
59002017	So you see , faith by itself isn’t enough . Unless it produces good deeds , it is dead and useless .
59002018	Now someone may argue , “ Some people have faith ; others have good deeds . ” But I say , “ How can you show me your faith if you don’t have good deeds ? I will show you my faith by my good deeds . ”
59002019	You say you have faith , for you believe that there is one God . Good for you ! Even the demons believe this , and they tremble in terror .
59002020	How foolish ! Can’t you see that faith without good deeds is useless ?
59002021	Don’t you remember that our ancestor Abraham was shown to be right with God by his actions when he offered his son Isaac on the altar ?
59002022	You see , his faith and his actions worked together . His actions made his faith complete .
59002023	And so it happened just as the Scriptures say : “ Abraham believed God , and God counted him as righteous because of his faith . ” He was even called the friend of God .
59002024	So you see , we are shown to be right with God by what we do , not by faith alone .
59002025	Rahab the prostitute is another example . She was shown to be right with God by her actions when she hid those messengers and sent them safely away by a different road .
59002026	Just as the body is dead without breath , so also faith is dead without good works .
59003001	Dear brothers and sisters , not many of you should become teachers in the church , for we who teach will be judged more strictly .
59003002	Indeed , we all make many mistakes . For if we could control our tongues , we would be perfect and could also control ourselves in every other way .
59003003	We can make a large horse go wherever we want by means of a small bit in its mouth .
59003004	And a small rudder makes a huge ship turn wherever the pilot chooses to go , even though the winds are strong .
59003005	In the same way , the tongue is a small thing that makes grand speeches . But a tiny spark can set a great forest on fire .
59003006	And the tongue is a flame of fire . It is a whole world of wickedness , corrupting your entire body . It can set your whole life on fire , for it is set on fire by hell itself .
59003007	People can tame all kinds of animals , birds , reptiles , and fish ,
59003008	but no one can tame the tongue . It is restless and evil , full of deadly poison .
59003009	Sometimes it praises our Lord and Father , and sometimes it curses those who have been made in the image of God .
59003010	And so blessing and cursing come pouring out of the same mouth . Surely , my brothers and sisters , this is not right !
59003011	Does a spring of water bubble out with both fresh water and bitter water ?
59003012	Does a fig tree produce olives , or a grapevine produce figs ? No , and you can’t draw fresh water from a salty spring .
59003013	If you are wise and understand God’s ways , prove it by living an honorable life , doing good works with the humility that comes from wisdom .
59003014	But if you are bitterly jealous and there is selfish ambition in your heart , don’t cover up the truth with boasting and lying .
59003015	For jealousy and selfishness are not God’s kind of wisdom . Such things are earthly , unspiritual , and demonic .
59003016	For wherever there is jealousy and selfish ambition , there you will find disorder and evil of every kind .
59003017	But the wisdom from above is first of all pure . It is also peace loving , gentle at all times , and willing to yield to others . It is full of mercy and good deeds . It shows no favoritism and is always sincere .
59003018	And those who are peacemakers will plant seeds of peace and reap a harvest of righteousness .
59004001	What is causing the quarrels and fights among you ? Don’t they come from the evil desires at war within you ?
59004002	You want what you don’t have , so you scheme and kill to get it . You are jealous of what others have , but you can’t get it , so you fight and wage war to take it away from them . Yet you don’t have what you want because you don’t ask God for it .
59004003	And even when you ask , you don’t get it because your motives are all wrongyou want only what will give you pleasure .
59004004	You adulterers ! Don’t you realize that friendship with the world makes you an enemy of God ? I say it again : If you want to be a friend of the world , you make yourself an enemy of God .
59004005	What do you think the Scriptures mean when they say that the spirit God has placed within us is filled with envy ?
59004006	But he gives us even more grace to stand against such evil desires . As the Scriptures say , “ God opposes the proud but favors the humble . ”
59004007	So humble yourselves before God . Resist the devil , and he will flee from you .
59004008	Come close to God , and God will come close to you . Wash your hands , you sinners ; purify your hearts , for your loyalty is divided between God and the world .
59004009	Let there be tears for what you have done . Let there be sorrow and deep grief . Let there be sadness instead of laughter , and gloom instead of joy .
59004010	Humble yourselves before the Lord , and he will lift you up in honor .
59004011	Don’t speak evil against each other , dear brothers and sisters . If you criticize and judge each other , then you are criticizing and judging God’s law . But your job is to obey the law , not to judge whether it applies to you .
59004012	God alone , who gave the law , is the Judge . He alone has the power to save or to destroy . So what right do you have to judge your neighbor ?
59004013	Look here , you who say , “ Today or tomorrow we are going to a certain town and will stay there a year . We will do business there and make a profit . ”
59004014	How do you know what your life will be like tomorrow ? Your life is like the morning fogit’s here a little while , then it’s gone .
59004015	What you ought to say is , “ If the Lord wants us to , we will live and do this or that . ”
59004016	Otherwise you are boasting about your own plans , and all such boasting is evil .
59004017	Remember , it is sin to know what you ought to do and then not do it .
59005001	Look here , you rich people : Weep and groan with anguish because of all the terrible troubles ahead of you .
59005002	Your wealth is rotting away , and your fine clothes are moth-eaten rags .
59005003	Your gold and silver have become worthless . The very wealth you were counting on will eat away your flesh like fire . This treasure you have accumulated will stand as evidence against you on the day of judgment .
59005004	For listen ! Hear the cries of the field workers whom you have cheated of their pay . The wages you held back cry out against you . The cries of those who harvest your fields have reached the ears of the L ord of Heaven’s Armies .
59005005	You have spent your years on earth in luxury , satisfying your every desire . You have fattened yourselves for the day of slaughter .
59005006	You have condemned and killed innocent people , who do not resist you .
59005007	Dear brothers and sisters , be patient as you wait for the Lord’s return . Consider the farmers who patiently wait for the rains in the fall and in the spring . They eagerly look for the valuable harvest to ripen .
59005008	You , too , must be patient . Take courage , for the coming of the Lord is near .
59005009	Don’t grumble about each other , brothers and sisters , or you will be judged . For lookthe Judge is standing at the door !
59005010	For examples of patience in suffering , dear brothers and sisters , look at the prophets who spoke in the name of the Lord .
59005011	We give great honor to those who endure under suffering . For instance , you know about Job , a man of great endurance . You can see how the Lord was kind to him at the end , for the Lord is full of tenderness and mercy .
59005012	But most of all , my brothers and sisters , never take an oath , by heaven or earth or anything else . Just say a simple yes or no , so that you will not sin and be condemned .
59005013	Are any of you suffering hardships ? You should pray . Are any of you happy ? You should sing praises .
59005014	Are any of you sick ? You should call for the elders of the church to come and pray over you , anointing you with oil in the name of the Lord .
59005015	Such a prayer offered in faith will heal the sick , and the Lord will make you well . And if you have committed any sins , you will be forgiven .
59005016	Confess your sins to each other and pray for each other so that you may be healed . The earnest prayer of a righteous person has great power and produces wonderful results .
59005017	Elijah was as human as we are , and yet when he prayed earnestly that no rain would fall , none fell for three and a half years !
59005018	Then , when he prayed again , the sky sent down rain and the earth began to yield its crops .
59005019	My dear brothers and sisters , if someone among you wanders away from the truth and is brought back ,
59005020	you can be sure that whoever brings the sinner back will save that person from death and bring about the forgiveness of many sins .
60001001	This letter is from Peter , an apostle of Jesus Christ . I am writing to God’s chosen people who are living as foreigners in the provinces of Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia .
60001002	God the Father knew you and chose you long ago , and his Spirit has made you holy . As a result , you have obeyed him and have been cleansed by the blood of Jesus Christ . May God give you more and more grace and peace .
60001003	All praise to God , the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ . It is by his great mercy that we have been born again , because God raised Jesus Christ from the dead . Now we live with great expectation ,
60001004	and we have a priceless inheritancean inheritance that is kept in heaven for you , pure and undefiled , beyond the reach of change and decay .
60001005	And through your faith , God is protecting you by his power until you receive this salvation , which is ready to be revealed on the last day for all to see .
60001006	So be truly glad . There is wonderful joy ahead , even though you have to endure many trials for a little while .
60001007	These trials will show that your faith is genuine . It is being tested as fire tests and purifies goldthough your faith is far more precious than mere gold . So when your faith remains strong through many trials , it will bring you much praise and glory and honor on the day when Jesus Christ is revealed to the whole world .
60001008	You love him even though you have never seen him . Though you do not see him now , you trust him ; and you rejoice with a glorious , inexpressible joy .
60001009	The reward for trusting him will be the salvation of your souls .
60001010	This salvation was something even the prophets wanted to know more about when they prophesied about this gracious salvation prepared for you .
60001011	They wondered what time or situation the Spirit of Christ within them was talking about when he told them in advance about Christ’s suffering and his great glory afterward .
60001012	They were told that their messages were not for themselves , but for you . And now this Good News has been announced to you by those who preached in the power of the Holy Spirit sent from heaven . It is all so wonderful that even the angels are eagerly watching these things happen .
60001013	So think clearly and exercise self-control . Look forward to the gracious salvation that will come to you when Jesus Christ is revealed to the world .
60001014	So you must live as God’s obedient children . Don’t slip back into your old ways of living to satisfy your own desires . You didn’t know any better then .
60001015	But now you must be holy in everything you do , just as God who chose you is holy .
60001016	For the Scriptures say , “ You must be holy because I am holy . ”
60001017	And remember that the heavenly Father to whom you pray has no favorites . He will judge or reward you according to what you do . So you must live in reverent fear of him during your time as “ foreigners in the land . ”
60001018	For you know that God paid a ransom to save you from the empty life you inherited from your ancestors . And the ransom he paid was not mere gold or silver .
60001019	It was the precious blood of Christ , the sinless , spotless Lamb of God .
60001020	God chose him as your ransom long before the world began , but he has now revealed him to you in these last days .
60001021	Through Christ you have come to trust in God . And you have placed your faith and hope in God because he raised Christ from the dead and gave him great glory .
60001022	You were cleansed from your sins when you obeyed the truth , so now you must show sincere love to each other as brothers and sisters . Love each other deeply with all your heart .
60001023	For you have been born again , but not to a life that will quickly end . Your new life will last forever because it comes from the eternal , living word of God .
60001024	As the Scriptures say , “ People are like grass ; their beauty is like a flower in the field . The grass withers and the flower fades .
60001025	But the word of the Lord remains forever . ” And that word is the Good News that was preached to you .
60002001	So get rid of all evil behavior . Be done with all deceit , hypocrisy , jealousy , and all unkind speech .
60002002	Like newborn babies , you must crave pure spiritual milk so that you will grow into a full experience of salvation . Cry out for this nourishment ,
60002003	now that you have had a taste of the Lord’s kindness .
60002004	You are coming to Christ , who is the living cornerstone of God’s temple . He was rejected by people , but he was chosen by God for great honor .
60002005	And you are living stones that God is building into his spiritual temple . What’s more , you are his holy priests . Through the mediation of Jesus Christ , you offer spiritual sacrifices that please God .
60002006	As the Scriptures say , “ I am placing a cornerstone in Jerusalem , chosen for great honor , and anyone who trusts in him will never be disgraced . ”
60002007	Yes , you who trust him recognize the honor God has given him . But for those who reject him , “ The stone that the builders rejected has now become the cornerstone . ”
60002008	And , “ He is the stone that makes people stumble , the rock that makes them fall . ” They stumble because they do not obey God’s word , and so they meet the fate that was planned for them .
60002009	But you are not like that , for you are a chosen people . You are royal priests , a holy nation , God’s very own possession . As a result , you can show others the goodness of God , for he called you out of the darkness into his wonderful light .
60002010	“ Once you had no identity as a people ; now you are God’s people . Once you received no mercy ; now you have received God’s mercy . ”
60002011	Dear friends , I warn you as “ temporary residents and foreigners ” to keep away from worldly desires that wage war against your very souls .
60002012	Be careful to live properly among your unbelieving neighbors . Then even if they accuse you of doing wrong , they will see your honorable behavior , and they will give honor to God when he judges the world .
60002013	For the Lord’s sake , respect all human authoritywhether the king as head of state ,
60002014	or the officials he has appointed . For the king has sent them to punish those who do wrong and to honor those who do right .
60002015	It is God’s will that your honorable lives should silence those ignorant people who make foolish accusations against you .
60002016	For you are free , yet you are God’s slaves , so don’t use your freedom as an excuse to do evil .
60002017	Respect everyone , and love your Christian brothers and sisters . Fear God , and respect the king .
60002018	You who are slaves must accept the authority of your masters with all respect . Do what they tell younot only if they are kind and reasonable , but even if they are cruel .
60002019	For God is pleased with you when you do what you know is right and patiently endure unfair treatment .
60002020	Of course , you get no credit for being patient if you are beaten for doing wrong . But if you suffer for doing good and endure it patiently , God is pleased with you .
60002021	For God called you to do good , even if it means suffering , just as Christ suffered for you . He is your example , and you must follow in his steps .
60002022	He never sinned , nor ever deceived anyone .
60002023	He did not retaliate when he was insulted , nor threaten revenge when he suffered . He left his case in the hands of God , who always judges fairly .
60002024	He personally carried our sins in his body on the cross so that we can be dead to sin and live for what is right . By his wounds you are healed .
60002025	Once you were like sheep who wandered away . But now you have turned to your Shepherd , the Guardian of your souls .
60003001	In the same way , you wives must accept the authority of your husbands . Then , even if some refuse to obey the Good News , your godly lives will speak to them without any words . They will be won over
60003002	by observing your pure and reverent lives .
60003003	Don’t be concerned about the outward beauty of fancy hairstyles , expensive jewelry , or beautiful clothes .
60003004	You should clothe yourselves instead with the beauty that comes from within , the unfading beauty of a gentle and quiet spirit , which is so precious to God .
60003005	This is how the holy women of old made themselves beautiful . They trusted God and accepted the authority of their husbands .
60003006	For instance , Sarah obeyed her husband , Abraham , and called him her master . You are her daughters when you do what is right without fear of what your husbands might do .
60003007	In the same way , you husbands must give honor to your wives . Treat your wife with understanding as you live together . She may be weaker than you are , but she is your equal partner in God’s gift of new life . Treat her as you should so your prayers will not be hindered .
60003008	Finally , all of you should be of one mind . Sympathize with each other . Love each other as brothers and sisters . Be tenderhearted , and keep a humble attitude .
60003009	Don’t repay evil for evil . Don’t retaliate with insults when people insult you . Instead , pay them back with a blessing . That is what God has called you to do , and he will bless you for it .
60003010	For the Scriptures say , “ If you want to enjoy life and see many happy days , keep your tongue from speaking evil and your lips from telling lies .
60003011	Turn away from evil and do good . Search for peace , and work to maintain it .
60003012	The eyes of the Lord watch over those who do right , and his ears are open to their prayers . But the Lord turns his face against those who do evil . ”
60003013	Now , who will want to harm you if you are eager to do good ?
60003014	But even if you suffer for doing what is right , God will reward you for it . So don’t worry or be afraid of their threats .
