60003015	Instead , you must worship Christ as Lord of your life . And if someone asks about your Christian hope , always be ready to explain it .
60003016	But do this in a gentle and respectful way . Keep your conscience clear . Then if people speak against you , they will be ashamed when they see what a good life you live because you belong to Christ .
60003017	Remember , it is better to suffer for doing good , if that is what God wants , than to suffer for doing wrong !
60003018	Christ suffered for our sins once for all time . He never sinned , but he died for sinners to bring you safely home to God . He suffered physical death , but he was raised to life in the Spirit .
60003019	So he went and preached to the spirits in prison
60003020	those who disobeyed God long ago when God waited patiently while Noah was building his boat . Only eight people were saved from drowning in that terrible flood .
60003021	And that water is a picture of baptism , which now saves you , not by removing dirt from your body , but as a response to God from a clean conscience . It is effective because of the resurrection of Jesus Christ .
60003022	Now Christ has gone to heaven . He is seated in the place of honor next to God , and all the angels and authorities and powers accept his authority .
60004001	So then , since Christ suffered physical pain , you must arm yourselves with the same attitude he had , and be ready to suffer , too . For if you have suffered physically for Christ , you have finished with sin .
60004002	You won’t spend the rest of your lives chasing your own desires , but you will be anxious to do the will of God .
60004003	You have had enough in the past of the evil things that godless people enjoytheir immorality and lust , their feasting and drunkenness and wild parties , and their terrible worship of idols .
60004004	Of course , your former friends are surprised when you no longer plunge into the flood of wild and destructive things they do . So they slander you .
60004005	But remember that they will have to face God , who will judge everyone , both the living and the dead .
60004006	That is why the Good News was preached to those who are now dead so although they were destined to die like all people , they now live forever with God in the Spirit .
60004007	The end of the world is coming soon . Therefore , be earnest and disciplined in your prayers .
60004008	Most important of all , continue to show deep love for each other , for love covers a multitude of sins .
60004009	Cheerfully share your home with those who need a meal or a place to stay .
60004010	God has given each of you a gift from his great variety of spiritual gifts . Use them well to serve one another .
60004011	Do you have the gift of speaking ? Then speak as though God himself were speaking through you . Do you have the gift of helping others ? Do it with all the strength and energy that God supplies . Then everything you do will bring glory to God through Jesus Christ . All glory and power to him forever and ever ! Amen .
60004012	Dear friends , don’t be surprised at the fiery trials you are going through , as if something strange were happening to you .
60004013	Instead , be very gladfor these trials make you partners with Christ in his suffering , so that you will have the wonderful joy of seeing his glory when it is revealed to all the world .
60004014	So be happy when you are insulted for being a Christian , for then the glorious Spirit of God rests upon you .
60004015	If you suffer , however , it must not be for murder , stealing , making trouble , or prying into other people’s affairs .
60004016	But it is no shame to suffer for being a Christian . Praise God for the privilege of being called by his name !
60004017	For the time has come for judgment , and it must begin with God’s household . And if judgment begins with us , what terrible fate awaits those who have never obeyed God’s Good News ?
60004018	And also , “ If the righteous are barely saved , what will happen to godless sinners ? ”
60004019	So if you are suffering in a manner that pleases God , keep on doing what is right , and trust your lives to the God who created you , for he will never fail you .
60005001	And now , a word to you who are elders in the churches . I , too , am an elder and a witness to the sufferings of Christ . And I , too , will share in his glory when he is revealed to the whole world . As a fellow elder , I appeal to you :
60005002	Care for the flock that God has entrusted to you . Watch over it willingly , not grudginglynot for what you will get out of it , but because you are eager to serve God .
60005003	Don’t lord it over the people assigned to your care , but lead them by your own good example .
60005004	And when the Great Shepherd appears , you will receive a crown of never-ending glory and honor .
60005005	In the same way , you younger men must accept the authority of the elders . And all of you , serve each other in humility , for “ God opposes the proud but favors the humble . ”
60005006	So humble yourselves under the mighty power of God , and at the right time he will lift you up in honor .
60005007	Give all your worries and cares to God , for he cares about you .
60005008	Stay alert ! Watch out for your great enemy , the devil . He prowls around like a roaring lion , looking for someone to devour .
60005009	Stand firm against him , and be strong in your faith . Remember that your Christian brothers and sisters all over the world are going through the same kind of suffering you are .
60005010	In his kindness God called you to share in his eternal glory by means of Christ Jesus . So after you have suffered a little while , he will restore , support , and strengthen you , and he will place you on a firm foundation .
60005011	All power to him forever ! Amen .
60005012	I have written and sent this short letter to you with the help of Silas , whom I commend to you as a faithful brother . My purpose in writing is to encourage you and assure you that what you are experiencing is truly part of God’s grace for you . Stand firm in this grace .
60005013	Your sister church here in Babylon sends you greetings , and so does my son Mark .
60005014	Greet each other with Christian love . Peace be with all of you who are in Christ .
61001001	This letter is from Simon Peter , a slave and apostle of Jesus Christ . I am writing to you who share the same precious faith we have . This faith was given to you because of the justice and fairness of Jesus Christ , our God and Savior .
61001002	May God give you more and more grace and peace as you grow in your knowledge of God and Jesus our Lord .
61001003	By his divine power , God has given us everything we need for living a godly life . We have received all of this by coming to know him , the one who called us to himself by means of his marvelous glory and excellence .
61001004	And because of his glory and excellence , he has given us great and precious promises . These are the promises that enable you to share his divine nature and escape the world’s corruption caused by human desires .
61001005	In view of all this , make every effort to respond to God’s promises . Supplement your faith with a generous provision of moral excellence , and moral excellence with knowledge ,
61001006	and knowledge with self-control , and self-control with patient endurance , and patient endurance with godliness ,
61001007	and godliness with brotherly affection , and brotherly affection with love for everyone .
61001008	The more you grow like this , the more productive and useful you will be in your knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
61001009	But those who fail to develop in this way are shortsighted or blind , forgetting that they have been cleansed from their old sins .
61001010	So , dear brothers and sisters , work hard to prove that you really are among those God has called and chosen . Do these things , and you will never fall away .
61001011	Then God will give you a grand entrance into the eternal Kingdom of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ .
61001012	Therefore , I will always remind you about these thingseven though you already know them and are standing firm in the truth you have been taught .
61001013	And it is only right that I should keep on reminding you as long as I live .
61001014	For our Lord Jesus Christ has shown me that I must soon leave this earthly life ,
61001015	so I will work hard to make sure you always remember these things after I am gone .
61001016	For we were not making up clever stories when we told you about the powerful coming of our Lord Jesus Christ . We saw his majestic splendor with our own eyes
61001017	when he received honor and glory from God the Father . The voice from the majestic glory of God said to him , “ This is my dearly loved Son , who brings me great joy . ”
61001018	We ourselves heard that voice from heaven when we were with him on the holy mountain .
61001019	Because of that experience , we have even greater confidence in the message proclaimed by the prophets . You must pay close attention to what they wrote , for their words are like a lamp shining in a dark placeuntil the Day dawns , and Christ the Morning Star shines in your hearts .
61001020	Above all , you must realize that no prophecy in Scripture ever came from the prophet’s own understanding ,
61001021	or from human initiative . No , those prophets were moved by the Holy Spirit , and they spoke from God .
61002001	But there were also false prophets in Israel , just as there will be false teachers among you . They will cleverly teach destructive heresies and even deny the Master who bought them . In this way , they will bring sudden destruction on themselves .
61002002	Many will follow their evil teaching and shameful immorality . And because of these teachers , the way of truth will be slandered .
61002003	In their greed they will make up clever lies to get hold of your money . But God condemned them long ago , and their destruction will not be delayed .
61002004	For God did not spare even the angels who sinned . He threw them into hell , in gloomy pits of darkness , where they are being held until the day of judgment .
61002005	And God did not spare the ancient world except for Noah and the seven others in his family . Noah warned the world of God’s righteous judgment . So God protected Noah when he destroyed the world of ungodly people with a vast flood .
61002006	Later , God condemned the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah and turned them into heaps of ashes . He made them an example of what will happen to ungodly people .
61002007	But God also rescued Lot out of Sodom because he was a righteous man who was sick of the shameful immorality of the wicked people around him .
61002008	Yes , Lot was a righteous man who was tormented in his soul by the wickedness he saw and heard day after day .
61002009	So you see , the Lord knows how to rescue godly people from their trials , even while keeping the wicked under punishment until the day of final judgment .
61002010	He is especially hard on those who follow their own twisted sexual desire , and who despise authority . These people are proud and arrogant , daring even to scoff at supernatural beings without so much as trembling .
61002011	But the angels , who are far greater in power and strength , do not dare to bring from the Lord a charge of blasphemy against those supernatural beings .
61002012	These false teachers are like unthinking animals , creatures of instinct , born to be caught and destroyed . They scoff at things they do not understand , and like animals , they will be destroyed .
61002013	Their destruction is their reward for the harm they have done . They love to indulge in evil pleasures in broad daylight . They are a disgrace and a stain among you . They delight in deception even as they eat with you in your fellowship meals .
61002014	They commit adultery with their eyes , and their desire for sin is never satisfied . They lure unstable people into sin , and they are well trained in greed . They live under God’s curse .
61002015	They have wandered off the right road and followed the footsteps of Balaam son of Beor , who loved to earn money by doing wrong .
61002016	But Balaam was stopped from his mad course when his donkey rebuked him with a human voice .
61002017	These people are as useless as dried-up springs or as mist blown away by the wind . They are doomed to blackest darkness .
61002018	They brag about themselves with empty , foolish boasting . With an appeal to twisted sexual desires , they lure back into sin those who have barely escaped from a lifestyle of deception .
61002019	They promise freedom , but they themselves are slaves of sin and corruption . For you are a slave to whatever controls you .
61002020	And when people escape from the wickedness of the world by knowing our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ and then get tangled up and enslaved by sin again , they are worse off than before .
61002021	It would be better if they had never known the way to righteousness than to know it and then reject the command they were given to live a holy life .
61002022	They prove the truth of this proverb : “ A dog returns to its vomit . ” And another says , “ A washed pig returns to the mud . ”
61003001	This is my second letter to you , dear friends , and in both of them I have tried to stimulate your wholesome thinking and refresh your memory .
61003002	I want you to remember what the holy prophets said long ago and what our Lord and Savior commanded through your apostles .
61003003	Most importantly , I want to remind you that in the last days scoffers will come , mocking the truth and following their own desires .
61003004	They will say , “ What happened to the promise that Jesus is coming again ? From before the times of our ancestors , everything has remained the same since the world was first created . ”
61003005	They deliberately forget that God made the heavens by the word of his command , and he brought the earth out from the water and surrounded it with water .
61003006	Then he used the water to destroy the ancient world with a mighty flood .
61003007	And by the same word , the present heavens and earth have been stored up for fire . They are being kept for the day of judgment , when ungodly people will be destroyed .
61003008	But you must not forget this one thing , dear friends : A day is like a thousand years to the Lord , and a thousand years is like a day .
61003009	The Lord isn’t really being slow about his promise , as some people think . No , he is being patient for your sake . He does not want anyone to be destroyed , but wants everyone to repent .
61003010	But the day of the Lord will come as unexpectedly as a thief . Then the heavens will pass away with a terrible noise , and the very elements themselves will disappear in fire , and the earth and everything on it will be found to deserve judgment .
61003011	Since everything around us is going to be destroyed like this , what holy and godly lives you should live ,
61003012	looking forward to the day of God and hurrying it along . On that day , he will set the heavens on fire , and the elements will melt away in the flames .
61003013	But we are looking forward to the new heavens and new earth he has promised , a world filled with God’s righteousness .
61003014	And so , dear friends , while you are waiting for these things to happen , make every effort to be found living peaceful lives that are pure and blameless in his sight .
61003015	And remember , our Lord’s patience gives people time to be saved . This is what our beloved brother Paul also wrote to you with the wisdom God gave him
61003016	speaking of these things in all of his letters . Some of his comments are hard to understand , and those who are ignorant and unstable have twisted his letters to mean something quite different , just as they do with other parts of Scripture . And this will result in their destruction .
61003017	I am warning you ahead of time , dear friends . Be on guard so that you will not be carried away by the errors of these wicked people and lose your own secure footing .
61003018	Rather , you must grow in the grace and knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ . All glory to him , both now and forever ! Amen .
62001001	We proclaim to you the one who existed from the beginning , whom we have heard and seen . We saw him with our own eyes and touched him with our own hands . He is the Word of life .
62001002	This one who is life itself was revealed to us , and we have seen him . And now we testify and proclaim to you that he is the one who is eternal life . He was with the Father , and then he was revealed to us .
62001003	We proclaim to you what we ourselves have actually seen and heard so that you may have fellowship with us . And our fellowship is with the Father and with his Son , Jesus Christ .
62001004	We are writing these things so that you may fully share our joy .
62001005	This is the message we heard from Jesus and now declare to you : God is light , and there is no darkness in him at all .
62001006	So we are lying if we say we have fellowship with God but go on living in spiritual darkness ; we are not practicing the truth .
62001007	But if we are living in the light , as God is in the light , then we have fellowship with each other , and the blood of Jesus , his Son , cleanses us from all sin .
62001008	If we claim we have no sin , we are only fooling ourselves and not living in the truth .
62001009	But if we confess our sins to him , he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all wickedness .
62001010	If we claim we have not sinned , we are calling God a liar and showing that his word has no place in our hearts .
62002001	My dear children , I am writing this to you so that you will not sin . But if anyone does sin , we have an advocate who pleads our case before the Father . He is Jesus Christ , the one who is truly righteous .
62002002	He himself is the sacrifice that atones for our sinsand not only our sins but the sins of all the world .
62002003	And we can be sure that we know him if we obey his commandments .
62002004	If someone claims , “ I know God , ” but doesn’t obey God’s commandments , that person is a liar and is not living in the truth .
62002005	But those who obey God’s word truly show how completely they love him . That is how we know we are living in him .
62002006	Those who say they live in God should live their lives as Jesus did .
62002007	Dear friends , I am not writing a new commandment for you ; rather it is an old one you have had from the very beginning . This old commandmentto love one anotheris the same message you heard before .
62002008	Yet it is also new . Jesus lived the truth of this commandment , and you also are living it . For the darkness is disappearing , and the true light is already shining .
62002009	If anyone claims , “ I am living in the light , ” but hates a Christian brother or sister , that person is still living in darkness .
62002010	Anyone who loves another brother or sister is living in the light and does not cause others to stumble .
62002011	But anyone who hates another brother or sister is still living and walking in darkness . Such a person does not know the way to go , having been blinded by the darkness .
62002012	I am writing to you who are God’s children because your sins have been forgiven through Jesus .
62002013	I am writing to you who are mature in the faith because you know Christ , who existed from the beginning . I am writing to you who are young in the faith because you have won your battle with the evil one .
62002014	I have written to you who are God’s children because you know the Father . I have written to you who are mature in the faith because you know Christ , who existed from the beginning . I have written to you who are young in the faith because you are strong . God’s word lives in your hearts , and you have won your battle with the evil one .
62002015	Do not love this world nor the things it offers you , for when you love the world , you do not have the love of the Father in you .
62002016	For the world offers only a craving for physical pleasure , a craving for everything we see , and pride in our achievements and possessions . These are not from the Father , but are from this world .
62002017	And this world is fading away , along with everything that people crave . But anyone who does what pleases God will live forever .
62002018	Dear children , the last hour is here . You have heard that the Antichrist is coming , and already many such antichrists have appeared . From this we know that the last hour has come .
62002019	These people left our churches , but they never really belonged with us ; otherwise they would have stayed with us . When they left , it proved that they did not belong with us .
62002020	But you are not like that , for the Holy One has given you his Spirit , and all of you know the truth .
62002021	So I am writing to you not because you don’t know the truth but because you know the difference between truth and lies .
62002022	And who is a liar ? Anyone who says that Jesus is not the Christ . Anyone who denies the Father and the Son is an antichrist .
62002023	Anyone who denies the Son doesn’t have the Father , either . But anyone who acknowledges the Son has the Father also .
62002024	So you must remain faithful to what you have been taught from the beginning . If you do , you will remain in fellowship with the Son and with the Father .
62002025	And in this fellowship we enjoy the eternal life he promised us .
62002026	I am writing these things to warn you about those who want to lead you astray .
62002027	But you have received the Holy Spirit , and he lives within you , so you don’t need anyone to teach you what is true . For the Spirit teaches you everything you need to know , and what he teaches is trueit is not a lie . So just as he has taught you , remain in fellowship with Christ .
62002028	And now , dear children , remain in fellowship with Christ so that when he returns , you will be full of courage and not shrink back from him in shame .
62002029	Since we know that Christ is righteous , we also know that all who do what is right are God’s children .
62003001	See how very much our Father loves us , for he calls us his children , and that is what we are ! But the people who belong to this world don’t recognize that we are God’s children because they don’t know him .
62003002	Dear friends , we are already God’s children , but he has not yet shown us what we will be like when Christ appears . But we do know that we will be like him , for we will see him as he really is .
62003003	And all who have this eager expectation will keep themselves pure , just as he is pure .
62003004	Everyone who sins is breaking God’s law , for all sin is contrary to the law of God .
62003005	And you know that Jesus came to take away our sins , and there is no sin in him .
62003006	Anyone who continues to live in him will not sin . But anyone who keeps on sinning does not know him or understand who he is .
62003007	Dear children , don’t let anyone deceive you about this : When people do what is right , it shows that they are righteous , even as Christ is righteous .
62003008	But when people keep on sinning , it shows that they belong to the devil , who has been sinning since the beginning . But the Son of God came to destroy the works of the devil .
62003009	Those who have been born into God’s family do not make a practice of sinning , because God’s life is in them . So they can’t keep on sinning , because they are children of God .
62003010	So now we can tell who are children of God and who are children of the devil . Anyone who does not live righteously and does not love other believers does not belong to God .
62003011	This is the message you have heard from the beginning : We should love one another .
62003012	We must not be like Cain , who belonged to the evil one and killed his brother . And why did he kill him ? Because Cain had been doing what was evil , and his brother had been doing what was righteous .
62003013	So don’t be surprised , dear brothers and sisters , if the world hates you .
62003014	If we love our Christian brothers and sisters , it proves that we have passed from death to life . But a person who has no love is still dead .
62003015	Anyone who hates another brother or sister is really a murderer at heart . And you know that murderers don’t have eternal life within them .
62003016	We know what real love is because Jesus gave up his life for us . So we also ought to give up our lives for our brothers and sisters .
62003017	If someone has enough money to live well and sees a brother or sister in need but shows no compassionhow can God’s love be in that person ?
62003018	Dear children , let’s not merely say that we love each other ; let us show the truth by our actions .
62003019	Our actions will show that we belong to the truth , so we will be confident when we stand before God .
62003020	Even if we feel guilty , God is greater than our feelings , and he knows everything .
62003021	Dear friends , if we don’t feel guilty , we can come to God with bold confidence .
62003022	And we will receive from him whatever we ask because we obey him and do the things that please him .
62003023	And this is his commandment : We must believe in the name of his Son , Jesus Christ , and love one another , just as he commanded us .
62003024	Those who obey God’s commandments remain in fellowship with him , and he with them . And we know he lives in us because the Spirit he gave us lives in us .
62004001	Dear friends , do not believe everyone who claims to speak by the Spirit . You must test them to see if the spirit they have comes from God . For there are many false prophets in the world .
62004002	This is how we know if they have the Spirit of God : If a person claiming to be a prophet acknowledges that Jesus Christ came in a real body , that person has the Spirit of God .
62004003	But if someone claims to be a prophet and does not acknowledge the truth about Jesus , that person is not from God . Such a person has the spirit of the Antichrist , which you heard is coming into the world and indeed is already here .
62004004	But you belong to God , my dear children . You have already won a victory over those people , because the Spirit who lives in you is greater than the spirit who lives in the world .
62004005	Those people belong to this world , so they speak from the world’s viewpoint , and the world listens to them .
62004006	But we belong to God , and those who know God listen to us . If they do not belong to God , they do not listen to us . That is how we know if someone has the Spirit of truth or the spirit of deception .
62004007	Dear friends , let us continue to love one another , for love comes from God . Anyone who loves is a child of God and knows God .
62004008	But anyone who does not love does not know God , for God is love .
62004009	God showed how much he loved us by sending his one and only Son into the world so that we might have eternal life through him .
62004010	This is real lovenot that we loved God , but that he loved us and sent his Son as a sacrifice to take away our sins .
62004011	Dear friends , since God loved us that much , we surely ought to love each other .
62004012	No one has ever seen God . But if we love each other , God lives in us , and his love is brought to full expression in us .
62004013	And God has given us his Spirit as proof that we live in him and he in us .
62004014	Furthermore , we have seen with our own eyes and now testify that the Father sent his Son to be the Savior of the world .
62004015	All who confess that Jesus is the Son of God have God living in them , and they live in God .
62004016	We know how much God loves us , and we have put our trust in his love . God is love , and all who live in love live in God , and God lives in them .
62004017	And as we live in God , our love grows more perfect . So we will not be afraid on the day of judgment , but we can face him with confidence because we live like Jesus here in this world .
62004018	Such love has no fear , because perfect love expels all fear . If we are afraid , it is for fear of punishment , and this shows that we have not fully experienced his perfect love .
62004019	We love each other because he loved us first .
62004020	If someone says , “ I love God , ” but hates a Christian brother or sister , that person is a liar ; for if we don’t love people we can see , how can we love God , whom we cannot see ?
62004021	And he has given us this command : Those who love God must also love their Christian brothers and sisters .
62005001	Everyone who believes that Jesus is the Christ has become a child of God . And everyone who loves the Father loves his children , too .
62005002	We know we love God’s children if we love God and obey his commandments .
62005003	Loving God means keeping his commandments , and his commandments are not burdensome .
62005004	For every child of God defeats this evil world , and we achieve this victory through our faith .
62005005	And who can win this battle against the world ? Only those who believe that Jesus is the Son of God .
62005006	And Jesus Christ was revealed as God’s Son by his baptism in water and by shedding his blood on the cross not by water only , but by water and blood . And the Spirit , who is truth , confirms it with his testimony .
62005007	So we have these three witnesses
62005008	the Spirit , the water , and the bloodand all three agree .
62005009	Since we believe human testimony , surely we can believe the greater testimony that comes from God . And God has testified about his Son .
62005010	All who believe in the Son of God know in their hearts that this testimony is true . Those who don’t believe this are actually calling God a liar because they don’t believe what God has testified about his Son .
62005011	And this is what God has testified : He has given us eternal life , and this life is in his Son .
62005012	Whoever has the Son has life ; whoever does not have God’s Son does not have life .
62005013	I have written this to you who believe in the name of the Son of God , so that you may know you have eternal life .
62005014	And we are confident that he hears us whenever we ask for anything that pleases him .
62005015	And since we know he hears us when we make our requests , we also know that he will give us what we ask for .
62005016	If you see a Christian brother or sister sinning in a way that does not lead to death , you should pray , and God will give that person life . But there is a sin that leads to death , and I am not saying you should pray for those who commit it .
62005017	All wicked actions are sin , but not every sin leads to death .
62005018	We know that God’s children do not make a practice of sinning , for God’s Son holds them securely , and the evil one cannot touch them .
62005019	We know that we are children of God and that the world around us is under the control of the evil one .
62005020	And we know that the Son of God has come , and he has given us understanding so that we can know the true God . And now we live in fellowship with the true God because we live in fellowship with his Son , Jesus Christ . He is the only true God , and he is eternal life .
62005021	Dear children , keep away from anything that might take God’s place in your hearts .

63001002	because the truth lives in us and will be with us forever .

63001005	I am writing to remind you , dear friends , that we should love one another . This is not a new commandment , but one we have had from the beginning .
63001006	Love means doing what God has commanded us , and he has commanded us to love one another , just as you heard from the beginning .
63001007	I say this because many deceivers have gone out into the world . They deny that Jesus Christ came in a real body . Such a person is a deceiver and an antichrist .
63001008	Watch out that you do not lose what we have worked so hard to achieve . Be diligent so that you receive your full reward .
63001009	Anyone who wanders away from this teaching has no relationship with God . But anyone who remains in the teaching of Christ has a relationship with both the Father and the Son .

64001001	This letter is from John , the elder . I am writing to Gaius , my dear friend , whom I love in the truth .
64001002	Dear friend , I hope all is well with you and that you are as healthy in body as you are strong in spirit .

64001004	I could have no greater joy than to hear that my children are following the truth .
64001005	Dear friend , you are being faithful to God when you care for the traveling teachers who pass through , even though they are strangers to you .
64001006	They have told the church here of your loving friendship . Please continue providing for such teachers in a manner that pleases God .

65001001	This letter is from Jude , a slave of Jesus Christ and a brother of James . I am writing to all who have been called by God the Father , who loves you and keeps you safe in the care of Jesus Christ .
65001002	May God give you more and more mercy , peace , and love .
65001003	Dear friends , I had been eagerly planning to write to you about the salvation we all share . But now I find that I must write about something else , urging you to defend the faith that God has entrusted once for all time to his holy people .
65001004	I say this because some ungodly people have wormed their way into your churches , saying that God’s marvelous grace allows us to live immoral lives . The condemnation of such people was recorded long ago , for they have denied our only Master and Lord , Jesus Christ .
65001005	So I want to remind you , though you already know these things , that Jesus first rescued the nation of Israel from Egypt , but later he destroyed those who did not remain faithful .
65001006	And I remind you of the angels who did not stay within the limits of authority God gave them but left the place where they belonged . God has kept them securely chained in prisons of darkness , waiting for the great day of judgment .
65001007	And don’t forget Sodom and Gomorrah and their neighboring towns , which were filled with immorality and every kind of sexual perversion . Those cities were destroyed by fire and serve as a warning of the eternal fire of God’s judgment .
65001008	In the same way , these peoplewho claim authority from their dreamslive immoral lives , defy authority , and scoff at supernatural beings .
65001009	But even Michael , one of the mightiest of the angels , did not dare accuse the devil of blasphemy , but simply said , “ The Lord rebuke you ! ” ( This took place when Michael was arguing with the devil about Moses’ body . )
65001010	But these people scoff at things they do not understand . Like unthinking animals , they do whatever their instincts tell them , and so they bring about their own destruction .
65001011	What sorrow awaits them ! For they follow in the footsteps of Cain , who killed his brother . Like Balaam , they deceive people for money . And like Korah , they perish in their rebellion .
65001012	When these people eat with you in your fellowship meals commemorating the Lord’s love , they are like dangerous reefs that can shipwreck you . They are like shameless shepherds who care only for themselves . They are like clouds blowing over the land without giving any rain . They are like trees in autumn that are doubly dead , for they bear no fruit and have been pulled up by the roots .
65001013	They are like wild waves of the sea , churning up the foam of their shameful deeds . They are like wandering stars , doomed forever to blackest darkness .
65001014	Enoch , who lived in the seventh generation after Adam , prophesied about these people . He said , “ Listen ! The Lord is coming with countless thousands of his holy ones
65001015	to execute judgment on the people of the world . He will convict every person of all the ungodly things they have done and for all the insults that ungodly sinners have spoken against him . ”
65001016	These people are grumblers and complainers , living only to satisfy their desires . They brag loudly about themselves , and they flatter others to get what they want .
65001017	But you , my dear friends , must remember what the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ said .
65001018	They told you that in the last times there would be scoffers whose purpose in life is to satisfy their ungodly desires .
65001019	These people are the ones who are creating divisions among you . They follow their natural instincts because they do not have God’s Spirit in them .
65001020	But you , dear friends , must build each other up in your most holy faith , pray in the power of the Holy Spirit ,
65001021	and await the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ , who will bring you eternal life . In this way , you will keep yourselves safe in God’s love .
65001022	And you must show mercy to those whose faith is wavering .
65001023	Rescue others by snatching them from the flames of judgment . Show mercy to still others , but do so with great caution , hating the sins that contaminate their lives .
65001024	Now all glory to God , who is able to keep you from falling away and will bring you with great joy into his glorious presence without a single fault .
65001025	All glory to him who alone is God , our Savior through Jesus Christ our Lord . All glory , majesty , power , and authority are his before all time , and in the present , and beyond all time ! Amen .

66004002	And instantly I was in the Spirit , and I saw a throne in heaven and someone sitting on it .
66004003	The one sitting on the throne was as brilliant as gemstoneslike jasper and carnelian . And the glow of an emerald circled his throne like a rainbow .
66004004	Twenty-four thrones surrounded him , and twenty-four elders sat on them . They were all clothed in white and had gold crowns on their heads .
66004005	From the throne came flashes of lightning and the rumble of thunder . And in front of the throne were seven torches with burning flames . This is the sevenfold Spirit of God .
66004006	In front of the throne was a shiny sea of glass , sparkling like crystal . In the center and around the throne were four living beings , each covered with eyes , front and back .
66004007	The first of these living beings was like a lion ; the second was like an ox ; the third had a human face ; and the fourth was like an eagle in flight .
66004008	Each of these living beings had six wings , and their wings were covered all over with eyes , inside and out . Day after day and night after night they keep on saying , “ Holy , holy , holy is the Lord God , the Almighty the one who always was , who is , and who is still to come . ”
66004009	Whenever the living beings give glory and honor and thanks to the one sitting on the throne ( the one who lives forever and ever ) ,
66004010	the twenty-four elders fall down and worship the one sitting on the throne ( the one who lives forever and ever ) . And they lay their crowns before the throne and say ,
66004011	“ You are worthy , O Lord our God , to receive glory and honor and power . For you created all things , and they exist because you created what you pleased . ”
66005001	Then I saw a scroll in the right hand of the one who was sitting on the throne . There was writing on the inside and the outside of the scroll , and it was sealed with seven seals .
66005002	And I saw a strong angel , who shouted with a loud voice : “ Who is worthy to break the seals on this scroll and open it ? ”
66005003	But no one in heaven or on earth or under the earth was able to open the scroll and read it .
66005004	Then I began to weep bitterly because no one was found worthy to open the scroll and read it .
66005005	But one of the twenty-four elders said to me , “ Stop weeping ! Look , the Lion of the tribe of Judah , the heir to David’s throne , has won the victory . He is worthy to open the scroll and its seven seals . ”
66005006	Then I saw a Lamb that looked as if it had been slaughtered , but it was now standing between the throne and the four living beings and among the twenty-four elders . He had seven horns and seven eyes , which represent the sevenfold Spirit of God that is sent out into every part of the earth .
66005007	He stepped forward and took the scroll from the right hand of the one sitting on the throne .

66005009	And they sang a new song with these words : “ You are worthy to take the scroll and break its seals and open it . For you were slaughtered , and your blood has ransomed people for God from every tribe and language and people and nation .
66005010	And you have caused them to become a Kingdom of priests for our God . And they will reign on the earth . ”
66005011	Then I looked again , and I heard the voices of thousands and millions of angels around the throne and of the living beings and the elders .

66005014	And the four living beings said , “ Amen ! ” And the twenty-four elders fell down and worshiped the Lamb .
66006001	As I watched , the Lamb broke the first of the seven seals on the scroll . Then I heard one of the four living beings say with a voice like thunder , “ Come ! ”
66006002	I looked up and saw a white horse standing there . Its rider carried a bow , and a crown was placed on his head . He rode out to win many battles and gain the victory .
66006003	When the Lamb broke the second seal , I heard the second living being say , “ Come ! ”
66006004	Then another horse appeared , a red one . Its rider was given a mighty sword and the authority to take peace from the earth . And there was war and slaughter everywhere .
66006005	When the Lamb broke the third seal , I heard the third living being say , “ Come ! ” I looked up and saw a black horse , and its rider was holding a pair of scales in his hand .
66006006	And I heard a voice from among the four living beings say , “ A loaf of wheat bread or three loaves of barley will cost a day’s pay . And don’t waste the olive oil and wine . ”
66006007	When the Lamb broke the fourth seal , I heard the fourth living being say , “ Come ! ”
66006008	I looked up and saw a horse whose color was pale green . Its rider was named Death , and his companion was the Grave . These two were given authority over one-fourth of the earth , to kill with the sword and famine and disease and wild animals .
66006009	When the Lamb broke the fifth seal , I saw under the altar the souls of all who had been martyred for the word of God and for being faithful in their testimony .
66006010	They shouted to the Lord and said , “ O Sovereign Lord , holy and true , how long before you judge the people who belong to this world and avenge our blood for what they have done to us ? ”
66006011	Then a white robe was given to each of them . And they were told to rest a little longer until the full number of their brothers and sisters their fellow servants of Jesus who were to be martyredhad joined them .
66006012	I watched as the Lamb broke the sixth seal , and there was a great earthquake . The sun became as dark as black cloth , and the moon became as red as blood .
66006013	Then the stars of the sky fell to the earth like green figs falling from a tree shaken by a strong wind .
66006014	The sky was rolled up like a scroll , and all of the mountains and islands were moved from their places .

66006017	For the great day of their wrath has come , and who is able to survive ? ”
66007001	Then I saw four angels standing at the four corners of the earth , holding back the four winds so they did not blow on the earth or the sea , or even on any tree .
66007002	And I saw another angel coming up from the east , carrying the seal of the living God . And he shouted to those four angels , who had been given power to harm land and sea ,
66007003	“ Wait ! Don’t harm the land or the sea or the trees until we have placed the seal of God on the foreheads of his servants . ”
66007004	And I heard how many were marked with the seal of God144,000 were sealed from all the tribes of Israel :
66007009	After this I saw a vast crowd , too great to count , from every nation and tribe and people and language , standing in front of the throne and before the Lamb . They were clothed in white robes and held palm branches in their hands .
66007010	And they were shouting with a great roar , “ Salvation comes from our God who sits on the throne and from the Lamb ! ”

66008002	I saw the seven angels who stand before God , and they were given seven trumpets .

66008009	one-third of all things living in the sea died , and one-third of all the ships on the sea were destroyed .

66008011	The name of the star was Bitterness . It made one-third of the water bitter , and many people died from drinking the bitter water .
66008012	Then the fourth angel blew his trumpet , and one-third of the sun was struck , and one-third of the moon , and one-third of the stars , and they became dark . And one-third of the day was dark , and also one-third of the night .
66008013	Then I looked , and I heard a single eagle crying loudly as it flew through the air , “ Terror , terror , terror to all who belong to this world because of what will happen when the last three angels blow their trumpets . ”
66009001	Then the fifth angel blew his trumpet , and I saw a star that had fallen to earth from the sky , and he was given the key to the shaft of the bottomless pit .
66009002	When he opened it , smoke poured out as though from a huge furnace , and the sunlight and air turned dark from the smoke .
66009003	Then locusts came from the smoke and descended on the earth , and they were given power to sting like scorpions .
66009004	They were told not to harm the grass or plants or trees , but only the people who did not have the seal of God on their foreheads .
66009005	They were told not to kill them but to torture them for five months with pain like the pain of a scorpion sting .
66009006	In those days people will seek death but will not find it . They will long to die , but death will flee from them !
66009007	The locusts looked like horses prepared for battle . They had what looked like gold crowns on their heads , and their faces looked like human faces .
66009008	They had hair like women’s hair and teeth like the teeth of a lion .
66009009	They wore armor made of iron , and their wings roared like an army of chariots rushing into battle .
66009010	They had tails that stung like scorpions , and for five months they had the power to torment people .

66009012	The first terror is past , but look , two more terrors are coming !

66009014	And the voice said to the sixth angel who held the trumpet , “ Release the four angels who are bound at the great Euphrates River . ”
66009015	Then the four angels who had been prepared for this hour and day and month and year were turned loose to kill one-third of all the people on earth .
66009016	I heard the size of their army , which was 200 million mounted troops .

66009020	But the people who did not die in these plagues still refused to repent of their evil deeds and turn to God . They continued to worship demons and idols made of gold , silver , bronze , stone , and woodidols that can neither see nor hear nor walk !
66009021	And they did not repent of their murders or their witchcraft or their sexual immorality or their thefts .

66010002	And in his hand was a small scroll that had been opened . He stood with his right foot on the sea and his left foot on the land .
66010003	And he gave a great shout like the roar of a lion . And when he shouted , the seven thunders answered .

66016001	Then I heard a mighty voice from the Temple say to the seven angels , “ Go your ways and pour out on the earth the seven bowls containing God’s wrath . ”

66016021	There was a terrible hailstorm , and hailstones weighing as much as seventy-five pounds fell from the sky onto the people below . They cursed God because of the terrible plague of the hailstorm .
66017001	One of the seven angels who had poured out the seven bowls came over and spoke to me . “ Come with me , ” he said , “ and I will show you the judgment that is going to come on the great prostitute , who rules over many waters .
66017002	The kings of the world have committed adultery with her , and the people who belong to this world have been made drunk by the wine of her immorality . ”

66017004	The woman wore purple and scarlet clothing and beautiful jewelry made of gold and precious gems and pearls . In her hand she held a gold goblet full of obscenities and the impurities of her immorality .
66017005	A mysterious name was written on her forehead : “ Babylon the Great , Mother of All Prostitutes and Obscenities in the World . ”

And the people who belong to this world , whose names were not written in the Book of Life before the world was made , will be amazed at the reappearance of this beast who had died .
66017009	“ This calls for a mind with understanding : The seven heads of the beast represent the seven hills where the woman rules . They also represent seven kings .

66017014	Together they will go to war against the Lamb , but the Lamb will defeat them because he is Lord of all lords and King of all kings . And his called and chosen and faithful ones will be with him . ”

66017017	For God has put a plan into their minds , a plan that will carry out his purposes . They will agree to give their authority to the scarlet beast , and so the words of God will be fulfilled .
66017018	And this woman you saw in your vision represents the great city that rules over the kings of the world . ”
66018001	After all this I saw another angel come down from heaven with great authority , and the earth grew bright with his splendor .
66018002	He gave a mighty shout : “ Babylon is fallenthat great city is fallen ! She has become a home for demons . She is a hideout for every foul spirit , a hideout for every foul vulture and every foul and dreadful animal .
66018003	For all the nations have fallen because of the wine of her passionate immorality . The kings of the world have committed adultery with her . Because of her desires for extravagant luxury , the merchants of the world have grown rich . ”
66018004	Then I heard another voice calling from heaven , “ Come away from her , my people . Do not take part in her sins , or you will be punished with her .
66018005	For her sins are piled as high as heaven , and God remembers her evil deeds .
66018006	Do to her as she has done to others . Double her penalty for all her evil deeds . She brewed a cup of terror for others , so brew twice as much for her .
66018007	She glorified herself and lived in luxury , so match it now with torment and sorrow . She boasted in her heart , ‘ I am queen on my throne . I am no helpless widow , and I have no reason to mourn . ’
66018008	Therefore , these plagues will overtake her in a single day death and mourning and famine . She will be completely consumed by fire , for the Lord God who judges her is mighty . ”
66018009	And the kings of the world who committed adultery with her and enjoyed her great luxury will mourn for her as they see the smoke rising from her charred remains .
66018010	They will stand at a distance , terrified by her great torment . They will cry out , “ How terrible , how terrible for you , O Babylon , you great city ! In a single moment God’s judgment came on you . ”
66018011	The merchants of the world will weep and mourn for her , for there is no one left to buy their goods .
66018012	She bought great quantities of gold , silver , jewels , and pearls ; fine linen , purple , silk , and scarlet cloth ; things made of fragrant thyine wood , ivory goods , and objects made of expensive wood ; and bronze , iron , and marble .
66018013	She also bought cinnamon , spice , incense , myrrh , frankincense , wine , olive oil , fine flour , wheat , cattle , sheep , horses , chariots , and bodiesthat is , human slaves .
66018014	“ The fancy things you loved so much are gone , ” they cry . “ All your luxuries and splendor are gone forever , never to be yours again . ”
66018015	The merchants who became wealthy by selling her these things will stand at a distance , terrified by her great torment . They will weep and cry out ,
66018016	“ How terrible , how terrible for that great city ! She was clothed in finest purple and scarlet linens , decked out with gold and precious stones and pearls !
66018017	In a single moment all the wealth of the city is gone ! ” And all the captains of the merchant ships and their passengers and sailors and crews will stand at a distance .
66018018	They will cry out as they watch the smoke ascend , and they will say , “ Where is there another city as great as this ? ”
66018019	And they will weep and throw dust on their heads to show their grief . And they will cry out , “ How terrible , how terrible for that great city ! The shipowners became wealthy by transporting her great wealth on the seas . In a single moment it is all gone . ”
66018020	Rejoice over her fate , O heaven and people of God and apostles and prophets ! For at last God has judged her for your sakes .
66018021	Then a mighty angel picked up a boulder the size of a huge millstone . He threw it into the ocean and shouted , “ Just like this , the great city Babylon will be thrown down with violence and will never be found again .
66018022	The sound of harps , singers , flutes , and trumpets will never be heard in you again . No craftsmen and no trades will ever be found in you again . The sound of the mill will never be heard in you again .
66018023	The light of a lamp will never shine in you again . The happy voices of brides and grooms will never be heard in you again . For your merchants were the greatest in the world , and you deceived the nations with your sorceries .
66018024	In your streets flowed the blood of the prophets and of God’s holy people and the blood of people slaughtered all over the world . ”
66019001	After this , I heard what sounded like a vast crowd in heaven shouting , “ Praise the L ord ! Salvation and glory and power belong to our God .
66019002	His judgments are true and just . He has punished the great prostitute who corrupted the earth with her immorality . He has avenged the murder of his servants . ”
66019003	And again their voices rang out : “ Praise the L ord ! The smoke from that city ascends forever and ever ! ”
66019004	Then the twenty-four elders and the four living beings fell down and worshiped God , who was sitting on the throne . They cried out , “ Amen ! Praise the L ord ! ”
66019005	And from the throne came a voice that said , “ Praise our God , all his servants , all who fear him , from the least to the greatest . ”
66019006	Then I heard again what sounded like the shout of a vast crowd or the roar of mighty ocean waves or the crash of loud thunder : “ Praise the L ord ! For the Lord our God , the Almighty , reigns .
66019007	Let us be glad and rejoice , and let us give honor to him . For the time has come for the wedding feast of the Lamb , and his bride has prepared herself .
66019008	She has been given the finest of pure white linen to wear . ” For the fine linen represents the good deeds of God’s holy people .
66019009	And the angel said to me , “ Write this : Blessed are those who are invited to the wedding feast of the Lamb . ” And he added , “ These are true words that come from God . ”
66019010	Then I fell down at his feet to worship him , but he said , “ No , don’t worship me . I am a servant of God , just like you and your brothers and sisters who testify about their faith in Jesus . Worship only God . For the essence of prophecy is to give a clear witness for Jesus . ”
66019011	Then I saw heaven opened , and a white horse was standing there . Its rider was named Faithful and True , for he judges fairly and wages a righteous war .
66019012	His eyes were like flames of fire , and on his head were many crowns . A name was written on him that no one understood except himself .
66019013	He wore a robe dipped in blood , and his title was the Word of God .
66019014	The armies of heaven , dressed in the finest of pure white linen , followed him on white horses .
66019015	From his mouth came a sharp sword to strike down the nations . He will rule them with an iron rod . He will release the fierce wrath of God , the Almighty , like juice flowing from a winepress .
66019016	On his robe at his thigh was written this title : King of all kings and Lord of all lords .
66019017	Then I saw an angel standing in the sun , shouting to the vultures flying high in the sky : “ Come ! Gather together for the great banquet God has prepared .
66019018	Come and eat the flesh of kings , generals , and strong warriors ; of horses and their riders ; and of all humanity , both free and slave , small and great . ”
66019019	Then I saw the beast and the kings of the world and their armies gathered together to fight against the one sitting on the horse and his army .
66019020	And the beast was captured , and with him the false prophet who did mighty miracles on behalf of the beastmiracles that deceived all who had accepted the mark of the beast and who worshiped his statue . Both the beast and his false prophet were thrown alive into the fiery lake of burning sulfur .
66019021	Their entire army was killed by the sharp sword that came from the mouth of the one riding the white horse . And the vultures all gorged themselves on the dead bodies .
66020001	Then I saw an angel coming down from heaven with the key to the bottomless pit and a heavy chain in his hand .
66020002	He seized the dragonthat old serpent , who is the devil , Satanand bound him in chains for a thousand years .
66020003	The angel threw him into the bottomless pit , which he then shut and locked so Satan could not deceive the nations anymore until the thousand years were finished . Afterward he must be released for a little while .
66020004	Then I saw thrones , and the people sitting on them had been given the authority to judge . And I saw the souls of those who had been beheaded for their testimony about Jesus and for proclaiming the word of God . They had not worshiped the beast or his statue , nor accepted his mark on their forehead or their hands . They all came to life again , and they reigned with Christ for a thousand years .
66020005	This is the first resurrection . ( The rest of the dead did not come back to life until the thousand years had ended . )
66020006	Blessed and holy are those who share in the first resurrection . For them the second death holds no power , but they will be priests of God and of Christ and will reign with him a thousand years .
66020007	When the thousand years come to an end , Satan will be let out of his prison .
66020008	He will go out to deceive the nationscalled Gog and Magogin every corner of the earth . He will gather them together for battlea mighty army , as numberless as sand along the seashore .
66020009	And I saw them as they went up on the broad plain of the earth and surrounded God’s people and the beloved city . But fire from heaven came down on the attacking armies and consumed them .
66020010	Then the devil , who had deceived them , was thrown into the fiery lake of burning sulfur , joining the beast and the false prophet . There they will be tormented day and night forever and ever .
66020011	And I saw a great white throne and the one sitting on it . The earth and sky fled from his presence , but they found no place to hide .
66020012	I saw the dead , both great and small , standing before God’s throne . And the books were opened , including the Book of Life . And the dead were judged according to what they had done , as recorded in the books .
66020013	The sea gave up its dead , and death and the grave gave up their dead . And all were judged according to their deeds .
66020014	Then death and the grave were thrown into the lake of fire . This lake of fire is the second death .
66020015	And anyone whose name was not found recorded in the Book of Life was thrown into the lake of fire .
66021001	Then I saw a new heaven and a new earth , for the old heaven and the old earth had disappeared . And the sea was also gone .
66021002	And I saw the holy city , the new Jerusalem , coming down from God out of heaven like a bride beautifully dressed for her husband .
66021003	I heard a loud shout from the throne , saying , “ Look , God’s home is now among his people ! He will live with them , and they will be his people . God himself will be with them .
66021004	He will wipe every tear from their eyes , and there will be no more death or sorrow or crying or pain . All these things are gone forever . ”
66021005	And the one sitting on the throne said , “ Look , I am making everything new ! ” And then he said to me , “ Write this down , for what I tell you is trustworthy and true . ”
66021006	And he also said , “ It is finished ! I am the Alpha and the Omegathe Beginning and the End . To all who are thirsty I will give freely from the springs of the water of life .
66021007	All who are victorious will inherit all these blessings , and I will be their God , and they will be my children .
66021008	“ But cowards , unbelievers , the corrupt , murderers , the immoral , those who practice witchcraft , idol worshipers , and all liarstheir fate is in the fiery lake of burning sulfur . This is the second death . ”
66021009	Then one of the seven angels who held the seven bowls containing the seven last plagues came and said to me , “ Come with me ! I will show you the bride , the wife of the Lamb . ”
66021010	So he took me in the Spirit to a great , high mountain , and he showed me the holy city , Jerusalem , descending out of heaven from God .
66021011	It shone with the glory of God and sparkled like a precious stonelike jasper as clear as crystal .
66021012	The city wall was broad and high , with twelve gates guarded by twelve angels . And the names of the twelve tribes of Israel were written on the gates .
66021013	There were three gates on each sideeast , north , south , and west .
66021014	The wall of the city had twelve foundation stones , and on them were written the names of the twelve apostles of the Lamb .
66021015	The angel who talked to me held in his hand a gold measuring stick to measure the city , its gates , and its wall .
66021016	When he measured it , he found it was a square , as wide as it was long . In fact , its length and width and height were each 1,400 miles .
66021017	Then he measured the walls and found them to be 216 feet thick ( according to the human standard used by the angel ) .
66021018	The wall was made of jasper , and the city was pure gold , as clear as glass .
66021019	The wall of the city was built on foundation stones inlaid with twelve precious stones : the first was jasper , the second sapphire , the third agate , the fourth emerald ,
66021020	the fifth onyx , the sixth carnelian , the seventh chrysolite , the eighth beryl , the ninth topaz , the tenth chrysoprase , the eleventh jacinth , the twelfth amethyst .
66021021	The twelve gates were made of pearlseach gate from a single pearl ! And the main street was pure gold , as clear as glass .
66021022	I saw no temple in the city , for the Lord God Almighty and the Lamb are its temple .
66021023	And the city has no need of sun or moon , for the glory of God illuminates the city , and the Lamb is its light .
66021024	The nations will walk in its light , and the kings of the world will enter the city in all their glory .
66021025	Its gates will never be closed at the end of day because there is no night there .
66021026	And all the nations will bring their glory and honor into the city .
66021027	Nothing evil will be allowed to enter , nor anyone who practices shameful idolatry and dishonestybut only those whose names are written in the Lamb’s Book of Life .
66022001	Then the angel showed me a river with the water of life , clear as crystal , flowing from the throne of God and of the Lamb .
66022002	It flowed down the center of the main street . On each side of the river grew a tree of life , bearing twelve crops of fruit , with a fresh crop each month . The leaves were used for medicine to heal the nations .
66022003	No longer will there be a curse upon anything . For the throne of God and of the Lamb will be there , and his servants will worship him .
66022004	And they will see his face , and his name will be written on their foreheads .
66022005	And there will be no night thereno need for lamps or sunfor the Lord God will shine on them . And they will reign forever and ever .
66022006	Then the angel said to me , “ Everything you have heard and seen is trustworthy and true . The Lord God , who inspires his prophets , has sent his angel to tell his servants what will happen soon . ”
66022007	“ Look , I am coming soon ! Blessed are those who obey the words of prophecy written in this book . ”
66022008	I , John , am the one who heard and saw all these things . And when I heard and saw them , I fell down to worship at the feet of the angel who showed them to me .
66022009	But he said , “ No , don’t worship me . I am a servant of God , just like you and your brothers the prophets , as well as all who obey what is written in this book . Worship only God ! ”
66022010	Then he instructed me , “ Do not seal up the prophetic words in this book , for the time is near .
66022011	Let the one who is doing harm continue to do harm ; let the one who is vile continue to be vile ; let the one who is righteous continue to live righteously ; let the one who is holy continue to be holy . ”
66022012	“ Look , I am coming soon , bringing my reward with me to repay all people according to their deeds .
66022013	I am the Alpha and the Omega , the First and the Last , the Beginning and the End . ”
66022014	Blessed are those who wash their robes . They will be permitted to enter through the gates of the city and eat the fruit from the tree of life .
66022015	Outside the city are the dogsthe sorcerers , the sexually immoral , the murderers , the idol worshipers , and all who love to live a lie .
66022016	“ I , Jesus , have sent my angel to give you this message for the churches . I am both the source of David and the heir to his throne . I am the bright morning star . ”
66022017	The Spirit and the bride say , “ Come . ” Let anyone who hears this say , “ Come . ” Let anyone who is thirsty come . Let anyone who desires drink freely from the water of life .
66022018	And I solemnly declare to everyone who hears the words of prophecy written in this book : If anyone adds anything to what is written here , God will add to that person the plagues described in this book .
66022019	And if anyone removes any of the words from this book of prophecy , God will remove that person’s share in the tree of life and in the holy city that are described in this book .
66022020	He who is the faithful witness to all these things says , “ Yes , I am coming soon ! ” Amen ! Come , Lord Jesus !
66022021	May the grace of the Lord Jesus be with God’s holy people .
